story:
Recently Featured In

 

Our Story

For years, many have turned to mindfulness and meditation as a way to enhance gratitude, awareness and focus but a majority of us struggle with starting and continuing to practice. Our Founder, Eric, was no different.

Eric was a stressed out Software Developer coding on the computer, who without thinking picked up a pen, took off the cap, and started breathing through it. After 15 minutes of this he felt mentally clear and completely relaxed.  He then tried using the pen cap during his Meditation practice and boom, same thing — completely focused and calm. After doing this for a month  Eric says he never felt better and decided to build a device that optimizes breathing mindfully with the world.


 

Introducing b — Mindfulness Made Tangible

Millions of people have attempted to start Meditating and practicing Mindfulness because they've heard about the incredible effects and health benefits. Yet many fail to cultivate an ongoing practice because there's nothing holding them accountable. b changes this by using patent-pending breathing technology to make sure you keep flourishing.

b helps guide you to a happier and healthier life by tapping into the power of our breath. b takes advantage of hardware and software to act as an interactive and intuitive breathing guide. All you have to do is sit back and breathe.

 

 

What People Are Saying

 

How b Works

b uses Bluetooth to pair with a mobile application and pressure sensors to monitor each breath you take.

You can also use the breathe with b mobile application to stream individual breathing exercises directly to your b device, view data from each session, and set up reminders to breathe. This all helps to cultivate a mindful breathing practice, which has been shown to increase lung capacity and improve overall health and wellness.

 

Just Breathe

Choose a breathing exercise on the breathe with b mobile application or simply breathe into b and it will automatically start recording your session.

 

Mindful Breathing Data​

Visualize your breathing data and get suggestions on how to improve. View stats like daily breath count, number of minutes spent breathing mindfully, average length and force of each inhale and exhale, and so much more.

 

 

Live Happier and Healthier

​

Take a break from your screens and enjoy the present moment by breathing with b.

 

Full Device Overview

 

 

Interactive Breathing Guide

b indicates when it's time to inhale or exhale again by using subtle cues like lights, pulses and sounds. All of these cues can be turned On/Off per breathing session.

 

Gentle Vibrations

Feel free to shut your eyes and breathe. A subtle tap when it's time to inhale or exhale guides you during breathing practice.

 

Guiding Visual Lights

The LED Lights are in sync with the pressure sensor to guide you during your practice. The lights illuminate ON individually when inhaling and OFF individually while exhaling.

 

 

Subtle Sounds

Calming device sounds help guide you to a more mindful state-of-being during your breathing practice.

 

The Mobile Application

The b application is integral to optimizing your breathing experience.  The mobile application allows you to send guided breathing practices directly to your b device and view your data once you've completed your session, allowing you to leave your smartphone behind.

 

Select A Breathing Exercise

There are countless breathing exercises that have been proven to induce certain moods. Choose the breathing exercise that best matches your intention, click start and begin your breathing session on your b device.

 

Breathing Data and Insights

View your breathing data once you've completed your practice or watch your breath in real-time on the Live Breath app screen.

 

Customizable Sessions​​

b indicates when it's time to inhale or exhale again by using discrete lights, pulses and sounds. You can adjust average inhale and exhale duration and set up reminders to breathe. All of these cues can be turned On/Off in the Settings screen of the mobile app.

 

Daily Reminders to Breathe

A daily breathing practice gives you ability to stay relaxed, focused, and at peak performance. Set up your own reminders to breathe throughout the day or allow us to determine when you most need a breather.

 

Preorder Before Limited Offers Run Out

 

How We Got Here

From design and concept to prototype and testing, our team spent over a year perfecting the device out of the premier Chicago-based product incubator, mHUB.

 

 

The Team Behind b

We are a group of inventors, engineers and designers aligned with creating a more mindful world to live in.

 

 

Hardware Specs

 

The Science Behind Mindful Breathing

Medical studies show many health benefits directly correlated to mindful breathing, such as: a lower heart rate and blood pressure, mental clarity, reduced stress and improved circulation

 

Everyone Could Use a Breather

Whether you're an athlete, putting together a big presentation, studying, stressed, or on your commute we all deserve a breather.

 

Perfect for Studios and Small Businesses

Mindful Breathing has been shown to improve physical well-being, mental health, and overall happiness. Studios, Clinics or Small Business Owners — give your students, patients or employees the gift of b and watch their overall happiness and productivity sky-rocket.

 

Help Us Spread The Word

Get more from life by breathing with b! Sharing is caring, help us spread the word!

 

 

Press Kit

Want to write or post about b? Click below to download or view our media content.

Shipping

We are able to ship b to the United States and Canada for Free. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

b will begin shipping in February 2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.
     
*Actual shipping dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product shipping date.

By backing you'll get one of the very first products off the line plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Is b a Vaporizer?
No! b has absolutely zero chemicals, oils or aromas. Unlike smoking, b actually improves your lung strength and capacity by encouraging regular breathing practice.

Can’t I just breathe mindfully by myself?

You can, but are you? Be honest, during a regular day, are you taking time to just breathe? It's made all the difference to us.

Also, you can walk, exercise, drink water and sleep by yourself, yet there are products built specifically for each of these because people need someone or something to hold them accountable. b does this by sending you daily reminders to breathe and shows you tips on how to improve your breathing habits.

Why are you Crowdfunding?

Crowdfunding allows us to bring breathe with b to market in the quickest and most efficient way possible. Plus, we get to share it with all of you first!

When will I hear from you?

We will be posting community updates throughout the campaign. You can also email us directly at support@breathewithb.com. Don't worry we're not going anywhere. 

What happens if you don't reach your goal?

We need this amount of funding to manufacture and distribute breathe with b. If we don't reach this amount, we won't be able to fulfill our orders.

What is your refund policy?    
Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point, we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.

What is your return/exchange policy?    
Return and exchange are processed on a case-by-case basis. If you find your b device defective and unable to operate as expected, please contact support@breathewithb.com,  We will get back to you timely with complimentary technical support.

If I have other questions , who should I contact?

Customer Support, Sales and other inquiries: hi@breathewithb.com

story:
Our innovation

We founded "Aerton - psychological services," on January 5, 2015 in order to make treatement and prevention accessible for the largest possible part of the population. We are interested in providing innovative and effective therapies and seminars. 

Our most recent innovative therapeutic project is treating panic disorder as an addictive behavior, quickly and effectively, using the most powerful therapeutic tool of psychodrama. 

Panic disorder is considered an addictive behavior (including withdrawal syndrome and relapses); the counterweight against it is powerful dynamic of the group. The members of the group substitute the addictive nature of panic with the security provided by the group. Having massively postive results with the last year's groups we have decided to expand this project. 

Our goal is to take it to the next level and be able to adress this effective therapy to people who suffer from panic attacks but cannot afford it. Indeed, panic disorder is a common health problem in the population and is usually undertreated. 

The current economic situation in Greece is making it even harder for people to seek and find adequate treatement. 

That is when we thought of commiting other people to our goal. You. 



Let's talk about Panic Attacks

Imagine that you are at the airport and the check-in of your flight is closing in 15 minutes. You don't know the airport, your suitcase is enormously heavy, all the trolleys are taken and the place is overcrowded with thousands of people. You start running panicky, your pulse increases, you sweat, your conception of the space is changed and you arrive at the check-in desk a complete wreck, just in time before it closes. What a relief you are in! Now, think of this situation but without the final outcome and the subsequent decrease of your adrenaline, because there would be no concrete stressful situation that demands your alert. If you succeed in getting into this role you can feel the 1/100 of what a person who suffers from panic attacks experiences.


Panic attacks occur to people with different demographics and socials characteristics, so they represent the torturing reality of many people from different social backgrounds. It's a common health issue which concerns between 3,5% to 6,5% of the adult population. A number that is probably higher if we take into consideration the lack of diagnosis and therapy.

We are talking about panic attacks when the person suffers repeatedly from specific physical and psychological symptoms. Among the physical symptoms we encounter the transpiration, the gasp, the rapid pulse, the thoracic pain, the feeling of being pinched at your body and the change of temperature from warmth to cold and vice versa. In the psychological symptoms we usually find the fear of the person that he/she is losing control, losing his/her mind or that she/he is dying. The panic attacks differ from person to person. What they have in common are a feeling of terror that takes over and paralyzes the person and the expression of the panic attack in a context or in a situation that does not represent a real threat.

The emotional health and life of a person who suffers from panic attacks is affected negatively. Furthermore, the comorbidity with depression and addiction from psychoactive drugs is frequent. For somebody who experiences panic attacks and the fear of a potential attack, the simple act of going out can demand a careful planning based on complicated equations in order to avoid stressful situations. This can lead to the shrinking of their social life and the avoidance of all the possible situations of going out. Because the person is often in a situation of stress and has the need of support from people around him/her, but does not speak of his/her disorder, the emotional relationships become harder. In fact the person does not live his/her life. 

Innovative approach of panic attacks.

In Aerton, we are a group of mental health professionals with different psychotherapeutic approaches (psychoanalytic, cognitive, behavioral, systemic, psychodramatic) but our common aim is to offer integrated treatement to people. 

Aerton proposes a short-term innovative intervention for treating panic disorder in groups, using psychodrama. At this intervention, panic disorder is approached as an addiction; the dynamic of the group is the mainspring of the therapy.  The members of the group substitute their addictive function of panic with the security provided by the group. The results are spectacular.

This therapy was created by Stavros Kevopoulos, founder of Aerton. Having more than 20 years of clinical experience in substance detoxification he noticed the resemblance between Panic disorder and addictive behaviors. This is how he captured the revolutionary idea of approaching Panic disorder as an addictive behavior. Having used psychodrama for years as the most effective therapeutic tool in treating addiction, he created and evolved together with Eleni Karamanou, cofounder of Aerton, the short-term detoxification psychodrama groups for Panic Disorder treatement. 

Since Janyary 2015 we have being verifying the effectiveness, in the field, of this therapy. Both groups of the ex-patients proved, in the follow up sessions, to be Panic free since the end of the therapy. 


The therapy : 

The group is a closed one (meaning that there are no new entries once the group is formed) and it is composed of ten people who suffer from panic attacks. It is coordinated by two Aerton therapists. The program comprises ten (10) therapeutic group sessions. These ten sessions are carried out by the therapists once a week. The group, without the presence of the therapists, meets three times per week with the purpose of creating a stable net of relations and support among the participants. In order to sustain the dynamic of the group and to control the results of the program, ten (10) follow up group sessions are scheduled in the period that follows.

When somebody wants to participate in the group, one (1) personal interview with the therapists is necessary. The therapists assess if the person is ready to participate and if the group therapy is beneficial for him.

At Aerton we want to offer the right therapy to people who don't have the access to it because of their socio-economic situation. We do this, because we believe that the people whom you offer today are those who are going to be of help tomorrow. In any case mental health concerns the whole society and not just the people who, at a specific moment, are, or considered to be, patients.


You make it happen

We need your contribution. Aerton is a profit making company and that means that our work is the source of income for each one of us. The company continues to exist and to offer its services because we are remunerated for our work. 

We propose that you participate to our funding with the amount you want so that we raise money and make a group with people who come from the following sensitive social groups :

  • unemployed

  • women

  • students

  • retired

and offer them the therapy without any charge.

Not only you will be participating in the opening of the therapy in everybody but you will be getting involved in Aerton's life. Meaning that you will be gratified for your involvement. In detail :




All together

When the amount is raised, we will address people who suffer from panic attacks and fulfill the criteria mentioned above and who have expressed their interest in receiving the therapy. If the individual session also allows it, the person will participate in the free group therapy. For ethical reasons and in order to facilitate the therapy, the group will be composed after the receipt of the necessary amount.

Once the group has been created and with the consent of the patients you will be informed if you desire of this difficult but beautiful therapeutic voyage that the group will take. We will, of course, maintain the anonymity of the participants. 

We will be more than happy to work on this project and be able to offer our treatement to everybody, without the constraint of money.  


For 5.100$                                         10 people will be cured from panic disorder

For 2.600$                                          5 people will be cured from panic disorder

For more than 5.100$                     a second group (+10 people) will be created. 


We hope that this crowdfunding will also give us the push to create new therapies and groups and to expand our work. 


Help us give them a solution.

Help these ten people be cured from panic disorder and help them live free from the prism of fear and panic attacks. 

Do not forget to spread the word for our campaign....

story:
YES ! I CAN CHANGE THE WORLD

First of all, I’m not a smart guy nor a genius but standing on someone’s shoulder to                                                     touch the ceiling.

I like to read for knowledge, I’m a long term subscriber of POPULAR MECHANICS,

and former HP ( Hewlett Packard ) APCO R&D (TAIWAN) & TI ( Texas Instrument )                                                (TAIWAN) employee.

I just did this experiment out of curiosity, but what accidentally came out an idea

that can change the world completely, giving those people who suffer from nasal 

                               problem a better quality of life.


Similar products have been around the market for more than 16 years.

Those devices only have temporary effectiveness on relief of nasal congestion.

Temporary effectiveness last for just few minutes once the power is off.

              Temporary Effectiveness on Relief Of Nasal Congestion

                                             Was Clinically Approved.

Usually, the nasal disorder occurs on one side of the nose, not two.

So, here comes my approach and comparison with the old design :

                        Old                                                                    New   

Double outputs for both nostrils                    Single output for one nostril 

        Timer for 3 to 4 minutes                                        On/off switch

   

You might wonder why the old design has a timer, this is because with

two outputs for each nostril, the user could not breathe smoothly, and they

have to open their mouth. That is not all, a small chamber around the nose

and behind the eyes called nasal cavity or sinuses, a very important area

in our head, without the supply of oxygen in this area, the user will suffer a

feeling of heaviness in their head. Therefore the treatment has to be

terminated every 3 to 4 minutes.

A on/off switch replace a timer then I can switch it on as needed.

No more nasal congestion before sleep,

and wake up by alarm clock not by nasal congestion,

no more sneeze, no more running nose in the morning.

Don’t have to clean your throat in the early morning anymore.

Wake up with a light feeling of no more heaviness or pressure in your head,

This provides the user non-nasal congestion sleep & revitalizes the nasal

                               membrane simultaneously.

My design is a new concept by using phototherapeutics effectively.

                                   Therefore, I give it a new title :

                                    NASAL MEMBRANE ACTIVATOR  


                                     So ! What is phototherapeutics ?

In brief, it’s an approach to revitalize living cells and organisms by using 

       monochromatic light, light consisting of only one frequency.


       Phototherapeutics and optogenetics are equivalent in meaning.

                 Facts and benefits from constant use of this device are :

1.  The cold never bothers you anymore. What I mean is sudden changes of

     temperature will not effect you, such as walking into a cold room from a

     scorching heat outside.

2.  Keeping you far, far away from those antibiotics, antihistamine,

      cortisone nasal spray, and nasal decongestant.

3.  Rome was not built in a day. Similarly, it takes at least 3 to 4 months

      to reduce the symptom of constant secretion of phlegm.

      ( Actually it depends on the severity )

4.  How long will the allergy symptom take to go away?

       It differs from patient to patient.  It just goes away without notice.

5.  Reduces allergic reaction dramatically. but you are still allergic

      to those substances. Substances such as pepper powder,

        icy cold water (beverage), etc.

6.  You can take cold shower, if you dare. I’m pretty sure that you will

      have a running nose & shaking body. But you won’t catch nose cold.

                     (Do this at least 6 months later.)

              ( wash your hair with lukewarm water, please!)

7.  A relaxing feeling of “no pressure in your brain” probably lasts for just

        a few mornings. This is actually good news, it’s an indication that 

       the treatment is getting better gradually, or something bad has been

        cleaned from the head.

8. It’s your nose that causes the trouble, not your healthy body.
9.  You are not invincible, you still have a slight chance to catch a nose cold

     even if you have a healthy nose. The best way to stay away from

    catching a cold is ample sleep, plus constant and regular exercise such as              

      jogging, playing basketball game etc. Sports that can make you   

     sweat, even make you unable to catch your breath, and are great for 

       preventing colds according to leading doctors.

10.  Of course, if you get acute sinusitis or acute rhinitis, you should go to

       doctor. Nonetheless, you can handle it easily, since you have a healthy nose.

11.  Phototherapeutics restrain inflammation and shrink nasal polyp, bringing

       your nose back to a normal condition. Nasal polyp is the cause of nasal                 

       congestion, even slightly swollen polyp can be found in a healthy person.

       One is more efficient while the other is less efficient.

12.  You don’t need a pick-me-up (energy drink, coffee, vitamin B group )

                                                  for the day.


                      THINGS I SHOULD REMIND YOU OF

You might want to know “Should I use this device everyday or every night?”

                  My answer is: it depends on the severity.

                                     8 hours per night only. 

                          It doesn’t bother your daily life anyway.

                 Since there have not yet been any study or report

              on the side effects of long-term use of phototherapeutics.

I don’t assume any responsibility or consequence for any side effects

                          that occur from the use of this device.

                                         Therefore you should

                              WEIGHT THE PROS & THE CONS


This deserves repetition : It’s the scientists who found the utility of 

 phototherapeutics. We all have to take our hat off to those scientists.

                         Me? I had the idea for this direction, 

                          and the motivation to make good use.


Life is not what it seems. I have seen the imperfection and unfairness

in our lives. So, please help me to help you and those people

                who suffer nasal problems out there.


                                SPECIFICATION

Dimension: approximately 210mm × 660mm × 900mm

Circuit board: Traditional P.C.B.  Not S.M.D.

Color: white

Operating temperature:  0℃－40℃

Output wire length: approximately 70 centimeters long.

Weigh: approximately 150 grams no battery included. 

A warning blue LED to indicate low battery power.

Continual output. 

 9 volts lithium rechargeable bat is needed.


I do have team members but they don't speak English. That's all.

                                     NOT " ONE MAN ARMY "


                         THANKS FOR WATCHING 

                           THANKS FOR YOUR TIME

                      

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
The Team

Arthur Rice

founder and lead product developer for Ti-Bi Technology has achieved many substantial successes as a fashion consultant, industrial designer and product strategist. Mr. Rice attended Katherine Gibbs college and majored in Fashion Retail/Merchandising. During his academic career his interest expanded into Industrial Design due to a fascination with electronics and gadgets. His education and professional experiences in fashion has been a resourceful tool and complemented his current position by utilizing his acquired expertise in: Creative Design, Product Development, Prototyping, Technology, Manufacturing, Advertising, Packaging and Sales.

Mr. Rice used these skills as the foundation to start a industrial design company that would provide inexperienced inventors and aspiring entrepreneurs with patents illustrations, product development, prototyping, and manufacturing services; helping them bring their ideas to market. Mr. Rice is a advid inventor that supports the cause of helping others before himself. Mr. Rice has worked with various organizations, schools and universities to help establish invention programs for students. Mr. Rice is also a strong supporter of the White House “Go Green” effort and is currently working on a program to bring Green Manufacturing to New Jersey. Mr. Rice was also a victim to Hurricane “Sandy” in 2012 and realized how important is is to invent alternative energy products, especially in times of emergency need .Mr. Rice and Mr. Sommerville joined forces and started to do research and development for Solar Electronic based consumer products. This joint venture produced the product called the “Solar Bright Light” Flashlight System. This is a mission that's true to hos hart because it truly helps others.

Teronn Sommerville 

was born in New Jersey  Mr. Sommerville is a  United States Navy Veteran. During his career, Mr. Sommerville rose from E-1 enlisted man to Lieutenant. He served in various roles within his military career. Mr. Sommerville also served honorably in the war in Iraq. While serving his country in the Navy, Mr. Sommerville amazingly secured an under graduate degree in Psychology from Norfolk State University and a Masters Degree in Public Administration from Troy State University. In 2009 Mr. Sommerville was a key founder and CEO of Solarville   Communications, LLC 2009.

Solarville Communications,LLC currently develops and sells a variety of  Solar Electronic products ranging from(Cell phone chargers, Lap Top chargers, Water Purifiers,Generators, Safety Vest, Air Purifiers, Refrigerators,Air conditioners, Water Heaters,Shavers,Fan Hats,Lights,Headphones,Flashlights,Radios etc….).Solarville Communications,LLC has also joined forces with church organizations in Liberia,Africa and has supplied them with a variety of Solar products such as (Generators,Cell Phone Chargers and Flash Lights,). Solarville Communications,LLC is currently in negotiations to supply solar powered generators and products to other nations such as (Nigeria,Africa,Philippines and Mexico).

In 2012 his family was also a victim of Hurricane” Sandy” and some of his Solar Electronic inventions came in handy for several of his family members. Mr. Sommerville is a true  self innovator when it comes to solar power and renewable energy products. Mr. Sommerville  teamed up with Mr. Rice and they will continue the journey of further researching and developing more advanced renewable energy products for all industries globally.
PLEASE SUPPORT OUR CAMPAIGN ON HELPING BRING SOLAR POWERED ELECTRONICS TO AS MANY PEOPLE AS POSSIBLE!!!

Our Mission

On October 25, 2012 one of the worst storms I ever seen hit our town of Newark, NJ called hurricane “Sandy”. Hurricane Sandy did so much damage we are still repairing shore lines and beaches until this day. When hurricane “Sandy” hit it devastated so many homes and families. Much of the state of New Jersey was left without any electricity or drinking water. Our power was out in our home for over two weeks. This was a very scary time for many people, not just because the lack of electricity but the lack of being able to communicate with others. Our cell phones were down and out of battery power. We also could not listen to the local weather or news on the radio because the batteries we had ran out eventually. We swore after hurricane “Sandy” was over we would come up with a solution to combat these issues if that were to ever happen again. This is how we came up with the Solar Bright Light Multifunction Flashlight. This flashlight has a Solar Powered Panel, Rechargeable Lithium Battery, USB Charging Port, Radio and Speaker, Emergency Flash Lighting, Super Bright Led Lights and can be clamped bicycle handlebars also. The reason we are raising money is to fully develop the Solar Bright Light multifunction flashlight system. We want to get the product manufactured and distributed to as many families as possible.

Our Goal & Purpose

We will even donate some products to charities such as RED CROSS,SALVATION ARMY,GOODWILL and various other community service organization that help people. We believe after the hurricane “Sandy” experience we have to try to help not just ourselves but others that may go through similar situations. Some of the proceeds that are raised from the sale of the product will also be donated to some charities. The funds will also be used to manufacture and assemble the product in the state of New Jersey in which can and will create some “GREEN” jobs.

This is one of the main reasons why we developed  Solarville Communications, LLC. Solarville Communications, LLC is a 100% Military Veteran owned company that's committed to finding new and useful applications for solar technology in our everyday lives.  We have even donated Solar Products to a church organizations in Liberia & Nigeria, Africa. We have invested  heavily in the successful development of solar products and solutions, including flexible, durable, and lightweight solar panels, that provide a wide range of potential uses.  Using our knowledge of the industry, we are able to engineer completely customizable solar solutions for everyday people to use.

Solarville Communications LLC is committed to:

  • Encouraging environmental responsibility by exploring new sustainable energy technologies,
  • Providing end-users with products that make use of solar power and other renewable energies,
  • Creating new opportunities for businesses and workers, and
  • Developing future business leaders who are also committed to these goals

About Solar Bright Light



Solar Bright light can be used to charge your smart phone

Solar Bright Light can be play music with you a SD Card, Radio or USB Port

Solar Bright Light has super bright LED Lighting(Steady Mode & Flash Mode)

Solar bright Light can be clamped to any style bicycle handle bars

Solar Bright Light comes in the various colors (BLACK, BLUE, and RED & SILVER)

Solar Bright Light is stylish and easy to use

Solar Bright Light has built in Lithium Re-Chargeable Battery & a Solar Panel

Solar Bright Light is great for emergency power outage situations

Solar Bright Light comes with adaptors to charge various types of handheld electronics

Solar Bright  Light uses a TF/Micro S card system


Solar Bright Light  FAQ'S

Compared to other Flash Lights on the market which most are powered by traditional batteries. Solar Bright Light stands out  not only because its Solar Powered but it does not use traditional batteries . Solar Bright Light can also be used to charge over 100 other hand held electronic devices including:(Smart Phones,Bluetooth's etc...).



1.) How much extra battery charge does the Solar Bright Light give your smartphone?

Answer: depending on the smartphone battery the Solar Bright Light will provide an extra (30) minutes to (1hour) of battery talk time per use. (Solar Bright Light does not fully charge smart phone battery).

2.) What colors does the Solar Bright Light  come in?

Answer: The Solar Bright Light comes in the following colors (BLACK, BLUE, and RED & SILVER).

3.) Is there a warranty on the Solar Bright Light?

Answer: Yes! There is a 30 day manufactures warranty on each Solar Bright Light unit.

4.) What smart phones can the Solar Bright Light be used to charge?

Answer: (IPhone 5/6,Blackberry,HTC,Androids,LG,GalaxySamsung) Pen n Charge can also be used to charge the batteries in over 100 other hand held devices such as (PSP Games,Bluetooth’s,Bluetooth Head Phones etc…) . Each Solar bright Light  comes with adaptors (Micro USB& IPhone 5/6).

7.) What is the weight of each Solar Bright Light?

Answer: Each Pen n Charge weighs less than 1 lbs.

8.) What is the size of the Solar Bright Light?

  Answer: It’s 8inx2inx2in.

8.) Is shipping charges included in the product purchase?

Answer: No! There is free shipping when to all contributors of this campaign  within the continental United States.

9.) Where can I contact if I have a question or problem with my Solar Bright Light?

Answer: please contact us via email at solarbrightlight@gmail.com. Please allow us 24-48 hours to respond to your request.

10.) Can the Solar Bright Light be used on a bicycle and as a regular flashlight?

  Answer:Yes you can attached the Solar Bright Light to any style bike handle bars and detach it and use it as a regular flashlight also.


Solar Bright Light for Bicycles

For all of the bike riders especially during night time or in dim lighting. Solar bright light can be attached to any bicycle handle bars. Solar Bright Light also has a emergency flash mode on it if a bike rider needs assistance.



 

                                     SOLAR BRIGHT LIGHT

                          FUNDING BREAKDOWN CHART




Title of this section: (Product Manufacturing Cost)

Section Color: (BLUE) This is the largest section of the pie cart its 50% of what the funding will be used for)

The majority of the contributions raised with this campaign will go to manufacturing the “Solar Bright Light “units. There will be approximately 1500 units manufactured & distributed.

Tittle of this section: (Product Shipping & Handling Cost)

Section Color: (RED) This is the second largest section of the pie chart this is 25% of what the funding will be used for

We will have to get the products shipped from manufacture to storage unit in a timely fashion after the campaign closes to ensure delivery of the perks as promised in campaign.

  Title of this section: (Product Storage Cost)

Section Color: (Green ) This is the third largest section of the pie chart this is what 15% of the funding will be used for.

Once the products are delivered we have to store them in a climate controlled storage unit, due to these products have batteries inside of them and are sensitive to extreme heating conditions.

Title of this section: (Product Donation Cost)

Section color: (Yellow ) This is the fourth largest section of the pie chart this is what 10% of the funding will be used for NOTE: Once we have delivered on the perks of this campaign we will donate approximately 10% of the products to charities such as “RED Cross, Goodwill & Salvation Army” in the NJ area.


PERKS CHART

                         

     

  “Donating Your Perk To  Charity”     

We have a program where as the contributors can donate their perk to a charity of their choice. If a contributor would like to donate their Perk to one of the charities listed,which are (Red Cross,Goodwill or Salvation Army) in the NJ Area. We will make assure that the charity of your choice will receive the donation. We will also give the charity the person who donated the perk their name and email address so the charity can contact them directly and thank them. If a contributor would like to donate their perk they can contact us at solarbrightlight@gmail.com and include the following information:

Name:

Email Address:

Perk You Donated:

Perk donation charity name:

Bulk Orders

If a person would like to order bulk/more units of the Solar Bright Light for donations,resale or personal use, during this campaign or after it closes email us at solarbrightlight@gmail.com  or at www.solarbrightlight.com. Please include in email the following:

Name:

Shipping Address:

Phone:

Email Address:

Product Name:

Product Amount:

NOTE: AT THIS TIME WE ONLY SHIP PRODUCTS WITHIN THE USA!


Solarville Communications,LLC products have been featured on



                                                                                SOLARVILLE COMMUNICATIONS

  education and professional experiences in fashion has been a resourceful tool
  and complemented his current position by utilizing his acquired expertise
  in: Creative Design, Product Development, Prototyping, Technology,
  Manufacturing, Advertising, Packaging and Sales.
Mr. Rice used these
  skills as the foundation to start a industrial design company that would
  provide inexperienced inventors and aspiring entrepreneurs with patents
  illustrations, product development, prototyping, and manufacturing services;
  helping them bring their ideas to market. Mr. Rice is a advid inventor that
  supports the cause of helping others before himself. Mr. Rice has worked with
  various organizations, schools and universities to help establish invention
  programs for students. Mr. Rice is also a strong supporter of the White House
  “Go Green” effort and is currently working on a program to bring Green
  Manufacturing to New Jersey. Mr. Rice was also a victim to Hurricane “Sandy”
  in 2012 and realized how important is is to invent alternative energy
  products, especially in times of emergency need .Mr. Rice and Mr. Sommerville
  joined forces and started to do research and development for Solar Electronic
  based consumer products. This joint venture produced the product called the
  “Solar Bright Light” Flashlight System. This is a mission that's true to hos
  hart because it truly helps others.

















Teronn Sommerville 




was
  born in New Jersey  Mr. Sommerville is a  United States Navy
  Veteran. During his career, Mr. Sommerville rose
  from E-1 enlisted man to Lieutenant. He served in various roles within his
  military career. Mr. Sommerville also served honorably in the war in Iraq.
  While serving his country in the Navy, Mr. Sommerville amazingly secured an
  under graduate degree in Psychology from Norfolk State University and a
  Masters Degree in Public Administration from Troy State University. In 2009
  Mr. Sommerville was a key founder and CEO of Solarville   Communications,
  LLC 2009.
Solarville
  Communications,LLC currently develops and sells a variety of  Solar
  Electronic products ranging from(Cell phone chargers, Lap Top chargers, Water
  Purifiers,Generators, Safety Vest, Air Purifiers, Refrigerators,Air
  conditioners, Water Heaters,Shavers,Fan Hats,Lights,Headphones,Flashlights,Radios
  etc….).Solarville Communications,LLC has also joined forces with church
  organizations in Liberia,Africa and has supplied them with a variety of Solar
  products such as (Generators,Cell Phone Chargers and Flash Lights,).
  Solarville Communications,LLC is currently in negotiations to supply solar
  powered generators and products to other nations such as
  (Nigeria,Africa,Philippines and Mexico).
In
  2012 his family was also a victim of Hurricane” Sandy” and some of his Solar
  Electronic inventions came in handy for several of his family members. Mr.
  Sommerville is a true  self innovator when it comes to solar power and
  renewable energy products. Mr. Sommerville  teamed up with Mr. Rice and
  they will continue the journey of further researching and developing more advanced
  renewable energy products for all industries globally.






PLEASE SUPPORT OUR
CAMPAIGN ON HELPING BRING SOLAR POWERED ELECTRONICS TO AS MANY PEOPLE AS
POSSIBLE!!!





Our MissionOn October 25, 2012 one of the worst storms I ever seen hit our town of Newark, NJ called hurricane “Sandy”. Hurricane Sandy did so much damage we are still repairing shore lines and beaches until this day. When hurricane “Sandy” hit it devastated so many homes and families. Much of the state of New Jersey was left without any electricity or drinking water. Our power was out in our home for over two weeks. This was a very scary time for many people, not just because the lack of electricity but the lack of being able to communicate with others. Our cell phones were down and out of battery power. We also could not listen to the local weather or news on the radio because the batteries we had ran out eventually. We swore after hurricane “Sandy” was over we would come up with a solution to combat these issues if that were to ever happen again. This is how we came up with the Solar Bright Light Multifunction Flashlight. This flashlight has a Solar Powered Panel, Rechargeable Lithium Battery, USB Charging Port, Radio and Speaker, Emergency Flash Lighting, Super Bright Led Lights and can be clamped bicycle handlebars also. The reason we are raising money is to fully develop the Solar Bright Light multifunction flashlight system. We want to get the product manufactured and distributed to as many families as possible. Our Goal & PurposeWe will even donate some products to charities such as RED CROSS,SALVATION ARMY,GOODWILL and various other community service organization that help people. We believe after the hurricane “Sandy” experience we have to try to help not just ourselves but others that may go through similar situations. Some of the proceeds that are raised from the sale of the product will also be donated to some charities. The funds will also be used to manufacture and assemble the product in the state of New Jersey in which can and will create some “GREEN” jobs. This is one of the main reasons why we developed  Solarville Communications, LLC. Solarville Communications, LLC is a 100% Military Veteran owned company that's committed to finding new and useful applications for solar technology in our everyday lives.  We have even donated Solar Products to a church organizations in Liberia & Nigeria, Africa. We have invested  heavily in the successful development of solar products and solutions, including flexible, durable, and lightweight solar panels, that provide a wide range of potential uses.  Using our knowledge of the industry, we are able to engineer completely customizable solar solutions for everyday people to use.Solarville Communications LLC is committed to:
Encouraging environmental responsibility by exploring new sustainable energy technologies,
Providing end-users with products that make use of solar power and other renewable energies,
Creating new opportunities for businesses and workers, and
Developing future business leaders who are also committed to these goals

About
Solar Bright Light
Solar Bright light can be used to charge your smart
phone
Solar Bright Light can be play music with you a SD
Card, Radio or USB Port
Solar Bright Light has super bright LED Lighting(Steady Mode & Flash Mode)
Solar bright Light can be clamped to any style
bicycle handle bars

(BLACK, BLUE, and RED & SILVER)
Solar Bright Light is stylish and easy to use

Re-Chargeable Battery & a Solar Panel
Solar Bright Light is great for emergency power
outage situations

various types of handheld electronicsSolar Bright  Light uses a TF/Micro S card system


Solar Bright Light  FAQ'S

market which most are powered by traditional batteries. Solar Bright Light
stands out  not only because its Solar Powered but it does not use
traditional batteries . Solar Bright Light can also be used to charge over 100
other hand held electronic devices including:(Smart Phones,Bluetooth's etc...).

your smartphone?
Answer: depending on the smartphone battery the
Solar Bright Light will provide an extra (30) minutes to (1hour) of battery
talk time per use. (Solar Bright Light does not fully charge smart phone
battery).
2.) What colors does the Solar Bright Light  come in?

following colors (BLACK, BLUE, and RED & SILVER).

4.) What smart phones can the Solar Bright Light be used to

charge the batteries in over 100 other hand held devices such as (PSP
Games,Bluetooth’s,Bluetooth Head Phones etc…) . Each Solar bright Light  comes with adaptors (Micro USB& IPhone
5/6).
7.) What is the weight of each Solar Bright Light?
Answer: Each Pen n Charge weighs less than 1 lbs.
8.) What is the size of the Solar Bright Light?
  Answer: It’s
8inx2inx2in.
8.) Is shipping charges included in the product purchase?
Answer: No! There is free shipping when
to all contributors of this campaign  within the continental United States.
9.) Where can I contact if I have a question or problem with my
Solar Bright Light?
Answer: please contact us via email at solarbrightlight@gmail.com. Please allow us 24-48 hours to respond to your request.
10.) Can the Solar Bright Light be used on a bicycle and as a
regular flashlight?
  Answer:Yes you can attached the Solar Bright Light to any style bike
handle bars and detach it and use it as a regular flashlight also.



Solar Bright Light for
Bicycles
For all of the bike
riders especially during night time or in dim lighting. Solar bright
light can be attached to any bicycle handle bars. Solar Bright Light
also has a emergency flash mode on it if a bike rider needs
assistance.

story: Hi, I'm Josh. I started getting tattooed over 10 years ago and haven't stopped. The problem I kept finding with the aftercare products was that all of them contained petroleum byproducts or chemicals. I set out with the help of my tattoo artist to make all natural, chemical, petroleum, paraben, and lanolin free tattoo butter and tattoo balms. My tattoo butter is made without any water added as well so it is an ultra concentrated formula. One pea sized drop will cover an entire arm. It's made with cocoa butter, shea butter, coconut oil, hempseed oil, vitamin e oil, aloe vera, grapeseed oil, avocado oil, golden jojoba oil, argan oil, tea tree oil, and organic beeswax.  Our goal is to bring this great product to a larger audience. We are currently being carried by a few tattoo artists as well as a tattoo supply store. We are advertising in Tattoo Magazine as well as on their website. In order to expand we need some working capital. We are looking to increase the size of our filler unit in order to make larger orders. This will run us around $900. We are also looking to help keep costs down by purchasing ingredients in large batches to help pass the savings along to you, the customer. This is where you come in. With your donations we can continue to grow. But please don't think you're just giving us money. With each donation there is a perk. We don't expect a handout. You will be receiving some of our great products in addition to some VERY rare and special goodies! So please don't hesitate to contribute and please share this with all your fellow tattoo lovers!

story:
Meet DIRO:


World's First Talking Teddy Bear Robot




What can DIRO do? 



Features








DIRO'S SKILLS:

FUN AND SUPPORTIVE

  • Companion: DIRO's helpfulness and glowing hear will put a smile on your face
  • Storyteller: animatronic face and sound effects create a responsive and interactive storytelling experience

INTELLIGENT AND HANDS-FREE

  • Assistant: politely reminds your child of important tasks and events so that he or she will not forget to take a shower or be on time for lunch
  • Teacher: launch an interactive app on your smartphone or tablet to learn something new
ALWAYS STAY CONNECTED
  • Babysitter: ability to hear what's happening around your child from any location
  • Babyphone: get notified if your child starts crying during the night





Even more:



See DIRO in action:



Tech specs

SIZE: approx. 15" tall, 6" base
WEIGHT: approx 1.5 lbs
SENSORS: touch sensor, microphone, gyroscope
LIGHTING: ambient LED
PROCESSOR: ARM Cortex A9
MEMORY: 8Gb flash
BATTERY: Li-Ion 7000 mAh
SOUND: 2 premium speakers
CONNECT: Bluetooth 4.0 adapter
PLATFORM: STM32



Perks

We are offering our supporters a wide range of perks. No matter what you give, you get a chance to be a part of something truly awesome!




Story

A year ago we conducted first experiments with our new technology and realised that we could create something really unique.The moment when the first DIRO prototype opened his eyes and said "Hello, world!" was really amazing. It was a long journey and we spent all our time in developing and testing the world's first teddy bear robot. Today we have the finished pre-production prototype and with your support we will be able to start manufacturing DIRO on a larger scale. With your help DIRO will be able to get to each house, ecpecially to those who needs him most.


Team

We are a diverse team made up of high-class engineers, inventors, designers and developers. We are unified by one dream: to create an unique home robot with endless possibilties, that will make world better. We are uniquely qualified to make this dream a reality. We hope that you join us in supporting DIRO, so that we can make history together!


Our mission

Nowadays the world is divided into two parts: simple things and high-tech. We want to combine both. We believe that technology should serve simple things in our every day life. Playing with a real teddy bear robot instead of looking into smartphones provides a real sense of technology in a simple object, improving the entertainment kids get.


Timeline

It's been a long journey but now we are 70% ready for mass production. All we need is a little push to get us over the edge!

Risks & Challenges

Supplier delays 

Since DIRO consists of many different technological components, we have to deal with numerous suppliers. Although we do have several options for each component, communication with suppliers or shipment delays can cause unexpected delays which the process, especially since many electronic components are being manufactured in Asia. We will obviously keep everyone updated about our progress and we will do whatever we can to avoid delays but unfortunately not everything can be prevented. 

Voice recognition

We use external services for high quality speech recognition and therefore we depend on the policies of these services' providers. The current policies are favorable to us and it is unlikely that they will change in the future. In fact, we expect to see even greater technologies available to use very soon! 

CE/FCC Certifications

Although we are doing our very best and are in constant communication with test labs, CE and FCC certifications remain a tricky issue. Firstly, they are not cheap and FCC requires extensive testing by accredited labs. And secondly, they might cause a delay with the process if clearance is not given to us within the estimated time frame.



FAQ

DIRO looks too good to be true. Is this for real?

We have an amazing team to bring DIRO to life. While not everything in the video will necessarily be there at launch, the DIRO skills described above are part of the core skill set. 

What languages are supported?

The first version will support English. We will add support for additional languages in future. We will keep the community posted!

What about battery life?

DIRO works approximately 16 hours with a fully charged battery and about 4 days in stand by mode.

story:
Above Limits' Every Body Climbs campaign funds events and programs that use adaptive equipment, expertise, instruction and coaching enabling every body to enjoy climbing and its benefits.    These adaptive events and programs provide a forum where climbing gym staff and therapists learn their roles in adaptive climbing. Veterans who are wounded, ill, or injured as well as their families, will climb; young adults with Autism will climb, folks with paralysis or brain injury will climb; kids with conditions such as Spina Bifida, and Cerebral Paulsy, will climb. For years, our mantra has been, "Everybody climbs" if they desire.          Every Body Climbs.

Please help us share the benefits of climbing with Everybody, by directly funding events and programs that promote therapeutic recreation using adaptive climbing.  We have a sweet T-shirt (see gallery) perk at $50 and an "Event-in-your-Town" perk at $900 contributed.  The latter would identify & indoctrinate your local climbing gym for future inclusivity.  Also, by simply sharing our campaign with others using the Indiegogo tools you could provide an even larger impact.


The ultimate mission of our foundation is to facilitate the inclusivity of Climbing Gym, nationwide.  We hope to promote universal accessibility by educating both care-givers and climbing gym management about existing adaptive systems and programming.  As these folks become more comfortable with the adaptive systems and the participant becomes enthusiastic, future participation can be initiated organically.  Above Limits currently focuses on climbing gyms in the PA, MD and VA region.  Campaign funding will allow for radial expansion to other climbing gyms or as requested.

History:  Above Limits was approved as an I.R.S. 501(c)(3) in 2009 and founded by Michael L. DeCavalcante of Camp Hill, PA and Mark Gerner of Burke, VA.    Mike is an M.I.T./Harvard educated engineer and entrepreneur and Mark is a West Point graduate, teacher and consultant to the Pentagon.  Mike and Mark are both climbers and hold a U.S. patent for their innovative 2:1 advantage, ascending/descending system allowing folks with paralysis to climb independently. They run a lean organization with 94% of each dollar going to directly benefit participants with programming.  Our hourly wage has ranged from $0/hour in the past to a maximum of $30/hour in the future to plan and carry-out events.

Bio:  Mike is an athlete, problem solver, teacher and coach and is passionate about doing work that makes the world a better place for our kids.  His diverse education and experience include learning:  survival and water-board resistance at the U.S. A. F. Academy, engineering and humility at M.I.T., acoustics at Bose Corporation, bankruptcy consulting and life balance in NYC, organizational behavior and marketing at Harvard Business School, and entrepreneurism at Climbnasium. Mike holds both dental and climbing patents, and has founded multiple businesses of recreation, retail, medical research, and therapeutic wellness. 

Mike gave-back the past 9 years as a physics teacher and cross-country coach for kids of social and financial hardship.  He also spent the past 19 years as an adaptive climbing instructor of kids and adults with disabilities.  Throughout his career, Mike has actively sought out employment in recreation, consulting, medical research, education and fitness.  In 2006, to further develop adaptive and therapeutic climbing, he teamed-up with Mark Gerner and founded Above Limits, partnering with the Spina Bifida Association and Easter Seals to give hundreds of kids with special needs the opportunity to experience climbing.  Personally, Mike loves to combine his interests of endurance cycling, running, rock & ice climbing into the grand goal of fast alpinism.  He has been “slow and heavy” up Denali, Aconcagua, and Rainier and “fast and light” up Teton, Bugaboo, Stuart and Sir Donald.  He has practiced multiple forms of Yoga and meditation for 25 years and specifically relates, as an Eagle Scout, to the laws: trustworthy, helpful, friendly, courteous, kind, cheerful and thrifty. He has been married for 20 years with 2 kids. 


Bio:    Mark is a retired Army Infantry Colonel who came to this project motivated by his love of climbing which began during his time in Alaska in 1974 where graduated from a climbing instructor school.  His day to day employment is with Calibre Systems, where he is a senior consultant in strategic planning and force design.  While he was the Chief of military training at West Point in the early 1990’s he was the Officer Representative for the Cadet Climbing Club.  Mark and Mike have climbed together and worked together since 1994 when he practiced many skills at the Climbnasium. 

 Mark's interest in adaptive climbing was motivated by his grand-daughter, Jenna, now 12 years old.  Mark designed the organization and functions of Above Limits, its charter as a charitable institution, outreach and partnerships, and many design features of Above Limits instruction best practices.  Mark’s education includes a BS from the USMA, a Master’s Degree in Logistics Management from the Florida Institute of Technology, and a graduate of the US Army War College.

and thrifty. He has been married for 20 years with 2 kids. 

Bio:    Mark is
a retired Army Infantry Colonel who came to this project motivated by his love
of climbing which began during his time in Alaska in 1974 where graduated from
a climbing instructor school.  His day to
day employment is with Calibre Systems, where he is a senior consultant in
strategic planning and force design.  While
he was the Chief of military training at West Point in the early 1990’s he was
the Officer Representative for the Cadet Climbing Club.  Mark and Mike have climbed together and
worked together since 1994 when he practiced many skills at the
Climbnasium. 
 Mark's interest in adaptive
climbing was motivated by his grand-daughter, Jenna, now 12 years old.  Mark designed the organization and functions
of Above Limits, its charter as a charitable institution, outreach and
partnerships, and many design features of Above Limits instruction best
practices.  Mark’s education includes a
BS from the USMA, a Master’s Degree in Logistics Management from the Florida
Institute of Technology, and a graduate of the US Army War College.

story:
Cumbre Bey - Kilimanjaro Challenge - Cumbre II

Cumbre Bey el ‘Reto de Retos’

#KilimanjaroChallenge 

¡Bienvenidos a "Cumbre Bey" - Kilimanjaro Challenge!

Hola, me presento para los que no me conocéis. Soy Gema Hassen-Bey, medallista paralímpica de esgrima y comunicadora social. He participado en cinco Juegos Paralímpicos consecutivos (Barcelona 92, Atlanta 96, Sydney 2000, Atenas 2004 y Beijing 2008) y también he trabajado como experta en comunicación social con proyectos pioneros como el programa social "El mundo se mueve contigo” en TVE y el primer “Resumen Especial Paralímpicos Londres 2012” de nuestro país durante los Juegos de Londres 2012 en Teledeporte. Soy una persona interesada en grandes retos que ayuden a mejorar mi vida y la de otras personas.

Quiero invitaros a participar en mi nuevo proyecto. Un viaje iniciático reto deportivo histórico  y a la vez social, “Cumbre Bey – Kilimanjaro Challenge”  http://diverscity.es/el-reto-cumbre-bey/  .Me propongo lograr el hito histórico de ser la primera mujer en silla de ruedas en conquistar la cima del Kilimanjaro, casi un seis mil, (5.895m) y culminarlo por mi propio esfuerzo.

Aunque el objetivo es alcanzar la cima, lo más importante para mi es el proceso, el camino que recorreré hasta alcanzarla y los recursos que pueda legar a otras personas para contribuir a una mejora de vida. Por eso, todo el aprendizaje, voy a compartirlo en www.diverscity.es y en las Redes Sociales Twitter, Instagram y Facebook.

Para lograrlo no voy sola, cuento con una “cordada” excepcional compuesta por un equipo altamente cualificado que me asegura el éxito del ascenso.

Aunque mi equipo base es de unas 15 personas quiero ir acompañada por todos vosotros y quiero que lleguemos a ser 15 millones los que conquistemos la cima. Subiré gracias a la contribución de todos y cada uno de vosotros. Unidos por los valores que nos mueven, juntos demostraremos que todos podemos alcanzar nuestra propia cima.

Mi lema de vida es: “Si te mueves tú, el mundo se mueve contigo”

Lo que necesitamos

#KilimanjaroChallenge

·  Para coronar el “techo de África” primero tenemos que planificar bien este año de entrenamiento. No puedo ir directa al Kilimanjaro, antes tengo que lograr el ascenso de hasta 7 cimas, que poco a poco os iré desvelando. Cada cima tendrá un crowdfunding para poder compartirla con todos vosotros y que os sintáis participes de cada una de ellas.

·  La Primera Cumbre y mi primer ‘Reto de Retos’ fué el Monte Abantos 1.753m. Coordenadas 40°37′N, 4°9′W En decimal40.616667, -4.15°

Situado en la Sierra de Guadarrama en la Comunidad de Madrid, en el municipio de San Lorenzo del Escorial. Lo culminé con éxito y los medios de comunicación se hicieron eco de este hito. Podéis verlo en este enlace:

http://diverscity.es/destacado/as-tv-abantos/

·  La Segunda Cumbre y mi segundo ‘Reto de Retos’ es el ascenso de La Bola del Mundo 2.265m.  Conocida también como el Alto de las Guarramillas. Coordenadas 40°47′06″N 3°58′44″O

·  Para subir esta cumbre, lo que necesito es conseguir algunas modificaciones para la Explorer Handbike All Terrain todoterreno fabricada en Polonia, el transporte para trasladarnos a la montaña, la nutrición energética necesaria para realizar la ascensión y la equipación deportiva y técnica de montaña para todo el equipo que realizaremos el ascenso. La logística y comunicación.

·  Aunque vivo rodeada de montañas, nunca antes había subido con mi silla de ruedas. Con este reto, espero promover la fabricación de una silla que permita a más personas con movilidad reducida disfrutar de la naturaleza.

·  Veréis que absolutamente  todo lo recaudado se destinará a la asociación Bey proAction que promueve esta acción y a la consecución de un bien social Os iré contando cómo se prepara y cómo conseguimos lo que necesitamos para el destino final de vuestra contribución. Recordar que os lo cuento todo, con total transparencia en mis redes sociales y en la página del reto www.diverscity.es

·  Si logramos entre todos la financiación, haré un evento al que estaréis invitados para celebrar el éxito de esta segunda etapa. Un momento especial para celebrar con todos los que me habréis ayudado a lograrlo.

·  Muchas gracias por participar directamente en este ‘Reto de Retos’.

El impacto de "Cumbre Bey"

#KilimanjaroChallenge

Muchos medios de comunicación ya se están haciendo eco del reto. Marca, El País, La Razón, La Vanguardia, 20 Minutos, la cadena SER, Cope, RNE, Radio Libertad y Onda Cero, entre otros, nos apoyan. Podéis ver los artículos y entrevistas en la zona de prensa de www.diverscity.es ¡Y es solo el inicio de este maravilloso reto!

·  Va a ser un reto emocional donde compartiré todo sobre coaching, preparación física, además de impulsar el desarrollo tecnológico y de  I+D que favorezca la vida de otras personas.

·  Anteriormente he realizado otros desafíos y os aseguro que objetivo que me propongo, objetivo que consigo.

Otros retos que he conseguido anteriormente son:

o  Ser pionera de la esgrima paralímpica en España.

o  Ganar la primera medalla en unos Juegos para España (Barcelona 92).

o  Participar en cinco Juegos Paralímpicos consecutivos.

o  Ser la primera deportista paralímpica en colaborar activamente en una Candidatura Olímpica (Madrid 2M12).

o  Crear y presentar uno de los primeros programas de televisión de contenido social en la 2 de TVE

o  Impulsar, crear y presentar la primera retransmisión durante los Juegos Paralímpicos de Londres 2012 en Teledeporte (TVE).

·  Y ahora este ‘Reto de Retos’ que quiero compartir con vosotros. Tenéis todo mi compromiso ya que mi vida, de ahora en adelante, sólo estará enfocada en el reto.

Retos que ya he conseguido en el #KilimanjaroChallenge

o La Hanbyke Explorer All terrain y que ya existan empresas trabajando en su mejora para permitir el ascenso en montaña para personas con movilidad reducida.

o Presentación del reto en el Kilómetro 0 de la Puerta del Sol de Madrid

o Ascender mi primera cima El Monte Abantos 1.753m en San Lorenzo del Escorial acompañada de autoridades de la Comunidad de Madrid.

o Acudir como emprendedora social seleccionada por la Embajada Américana al GES2015 en Nairobi impulsado por Obama.

o Recorrer por primera vez una ruta del Camino de Santiago accesible junto a 200 personas con discapacidad y la asociación gallega COGAMI.

o Realizar varias conferencias de motivación para empleados de compañías internacionales e institutos.

Riesgos y desafíos

#KilimanjaroChallenge 

Soy consciente de que el ‘Reto de Retos’ es toda una aventura en la que no me juego una medalla como en los Juegos Paralímpicos, sino en cierto modo la vida. Pero todos los riesgos son asumibles si los planteas con tiempo y cuidado. Por eso llevo un gran equipo detrás que me acompaña y me ayuda a superar todos los obstáculos.

·  Tendré que salvar la dificultad del ascenso con mi silla en tres hábitats diferentes, selva, pendiente volcánica con rocas, y en la cima nos espera la nieve.

·  Superar aspectos vitales como la altura a partir de los 3.000m, el frío, el calor, el esfuerzo y la resistencia física y mental.

·  Para mí cada obstáculo es un desafío. Las personas y la tecnología me ayudarán y de esta forma promoveré desarrollos beneficiosos para otras personas.

·  Además, es un reto iniciático porque será la primera vez que utilizo una silla de ruedas en un terreno tan desconocido. Una experiencia totalmente nueva para mí que me va a alejar de mi área de confort para conectarme con personas y experiencias nuevas.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

#KilimanjaroChallenge

La idea de hacer este crowdfunding es porque quiero que todos podáis colaborar y sentiros participes del reto. Soy consciente de que no todos podréis ayudar con la misma cantidad, pero quiero que sepáis que para mi toda vuestra ayuda y apoyo son igualmente valiosos. Os agradezco enormemente vuestra aportación al reto en alguna de estas formas:

·  Por mínima que esta sea, aportando al reto la cantidad que podáis ya que la suma de todos será la cantidad final que realmente importe.

·  Ayudándome a difundir esta campaña de crowdfunding para que llegue al mayor número de personas y que de esta manera generemos entre todos un importante eco social.

·  Ayudándome a difundir la plataforma en la que compartiré paso por paso todo el recorrido del reto www.diverscity.es

·  Participando y dinamizando las Redes Sociales mías personales y las creadas para el reto

o Twitter: @Diverscity_

o Facebook: www.facebook.com/diversscity

o Instagram: http://instagram.com/diverscity_

o Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjNjiNXJdn5HtgbwJsHUmWw

·  Conectándome con personas, empresas, medios de comunicación o instituciones que pensáis puedan mostrar interés por este ‘Reto de Retos’.

·  Aportando alguna colaboración de la materia que sea. Algunas personas ya se han ofrecido a ayudarme puntualmente, por ejemplo, con una sesión de fotos, una grabación en vídeo, un artículo sobre el reto que han publicado en un blog o, tanto yo como el equipo, podemos probar cualquier producto o servicio que puedan ser útiles en el reto.

. Muchas personas os habéis ofrecido como voluntarias para ayudarme en las distintas tareas que conlleva el reto.

Os agradezco a todos vuestra valiosa contribución para lograr este reto maravilloso. Lo importante es que todos juntos alcanzaremos la cima.

Me tenéis siempre cerca en las redes sociales @GemaHassenBey, @diverscity_, Facebook, Youtube... y en www.diverscity.es

GRACIAS :D

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ENGLISH

‘Cumbre Bey’ - Kilimanjaro Challenge – 2st Mountain Peak

‘Cumbre Bey’ the Challenge of the Challenges

#KilimanjaroChallenge

Welcome to ‘Cumbre Bey’ - Kilimanjaro Challenge!

I would like to introduce myself to those of you who do not know me. My name is Gema Hassen-Bey, Paralympic medallist in fencing and social communicator. I have participated in five consecutive Paralympic Games (Barcelona 92, Atlanta 96, Sydney 2000, Athens 2004 and Beijing 2008) and I have also worked as an expert in social communication. I collaborated with innovative projects like the social program “El mundo se mueve contigo” for the Spanish National TV network, TVE, and in the first recap program about the Paralympic Games in Spain, “Resumen Especial Paralímpicos Londres 2012”, broadcast on Teledeporte channel. I consider myself to be a person interested in big challenges that help me to improve my life and the life of others.

I would like to invite you to take part in my new project. A special trip linked with a personal sports, historical and social challenge, ‘Cumbre Bey – Kilimanjaro Challenge’ http://diverscity.es/el-reto-cumbre-bey/

I hope to become a milestone, to become the first women in a wheelchair to climb Mount Kilimanjaro, almost at 6,000 meters (5,895m), with my own strength and abilities.

Although the first objective is reach the top, the most important goal for me is the process to get there. The road that I follow to reach the top of the mountain, and the way that I can help other people to improve their lives. For that reason I will share everything through the portal www.diverscity.es Twitter, Instagram and Facebook.

I will not go alone, I have an expert team to help me manage everything, “La Cordada”. 

Although 15 people will be involved in the “Kilimanjaro challenge”, anybody can join us to be the best climbing team ever! I hope we will have 15 million people conquering the Mount Kilimanjaro. I will ascend with the help of each of you. Connected by the values that move us, together we will show that everyone can reach their own peak.

My philosophy of life is, ‘if you move, the world moves with you’

Our necessities

#KilimanjaroChallenge

·  To conquer the peak of the Mount Kilimanjaro I must plan my training very well this year. For health reasons, before the Kilimanjaro challenge, I must climb other mountains, around 7 summits that I will tell you about later. To share with all of you, each summit will have a specific crowdfunding; I hope that everyone who collaborates with the Project will be happy to be involved with this kind of challenge.

·  My first peak and my first ‘Challenge of the Challenges’ it was Mount Abantos at 1,753 metres. Located in the Sierra de Guadarrama in the town of San Lorenzo de El Escorial, in the Community of Madrid. The coordinates are: 40°37′N 4°09′W

The successful conclusion and the media echo of this milestone were made. You can see it on this link:

http://diverscity.es/destacado/as-tv-abantos/

· THE SECOND SUMMIT is the BOLA DEL MUNDO 2.265m Alto de las Guarramillas in Navacerrada Madrid - Coordinates 40°47′06″N 3°58′44″O

·  To climb this summit I need to get some changes to the Explorer Handbike All Terrain  manufactured en Poland, a way of transporting the team to the baseline of the mountain, the correct nutrition to ascend the peak and the trekking kit for the team and for me. In addition to the costs of logistics and communications.

·  Even though I live surrounded by mountains, I never have climbed one of them in a wheelchair. I want to provoke the production of a wheelchair like this, in order that people like me can enjoy and discover the nature.

·  Absolutely every cent of money that we collect will be earmarked for this project and I will relate everything that happens and how we invest your money. Don’t forget that you can follow the challenge through www.diverscity.es 

·  If we achieve the funding we will organise a special event with all of you to celebrate this successful first stage. A special time to celebrate with everybody who helped me to reach this challenge.

·  Thank you very much for participating in this ‘Challenge of the Challenges’.

‘Cumbre Bey’ media impact

#KilimanjaroChallenge

A lot of important, well known media are publishing the ‘Kilimanjaro challenge’. The dailies: Marca, El País, La Razón, La Vanguardía and 20 Minutos; the radios: SER, Cope, RNE, Radio Libertad and OndaCero and a lot of websites and blogs are supporting the challenge. You can see the news and interviews in Diversity’ pressroom www.diverscity.es .This is just the beginning, more to come!

·  It will be an effective challenge and I will share everything about coaching, technical training, technical development and R&D&I to try to help other people to improve their quality of life by my responsible and proactive position.

·  Previously I did other challenges and I guarantee you that if I plan something I achieve the objective

Challenges that I have achieved are:

o  I became the pioneer in Paralympic fencing in Spain.

o  I was the first Spanish athlete to win a Paralympic medal (Barcelona 92).

o  I have participated in five consecutive Paralympic games.

o  I was the first Paralympic athlete to take an active part in an Olympic candidacy (Madrid 2M12).

o  I created and presented the first TV program with social contents.

o  I inspired, created and presented the first Paralympic Games broadcast by Teledeporte TV for London 2012.

·  Now I am presenting you with this ‘Challenge of the Challenges’. You have my commitment because henceforth my life will be focused on ‘Cumbre Bey – Kilimanjaro Challenge"

Challenges that have been achieved in the #KilimanjaroChallenge

o All Terrain Hanbyke Explorer and already ther are companies working on their improvement to enable mountan climb for people with disabilities.

o Presentation of the challenge at kilometer 0 of Puerta del Sol in Madrid with the support of president of Community of Madrid.

o Ascend my firt summit Mount Abantos 1.753m in San Lorenzo del Escorial Madrid, acoompanied by officials of the Community of Madrid.

o Attend Social entrepreneur woman or as selected by the USAEMBASSY in Spain to GES2015 Nairobi supported by the President Obama.

o Browse for the first time a pilgrimage route to Camino de Santiago en Galicia accessible along with 200 dsabled people and the galician association COGAMI.

o Perform various conferences or motivation for employees of interntional companies and universitys.

The dangers and the challenges

#KilimanjaroChallenge

I am aware that the ‘Challenge of the Challenges’ is an amazing adventure in where I am not fighting for a medal, I am risking my life for a dream. But all dangers are acceptable if you work with time and care. For that reason, the best team ever is going with me and each one of them is helping me to overcome every obstacle.

·  On Mount Kilimanjaro my wheelchair and I will have to cross three different habitats: jungle, volcanic slopes with rocks and snow at the top.

·  At 3,000 meters I must overcome the altitude, the cold, the heat, the sacrifice and the physical and mental challenges.

·  Each obstacle will be an adversary. People and technology will help me and I will promote beneficial business developments to help others.

·  It is an initiation challenge because it will be the first time that I will use a wheelchair in these kinds of areas. A new experience that will move me away from my comfort zone to connect me with new people and amazing experiences.

Other ways to collaborate

#KilimanjaroChallenge

The beginning to make this crowdfunding is because I would involve all of you in the project to be part in the challenge. I am aware that not everyone will be able to help with the same amount, but I want you to know that for me all your help and support are equally valuable. I will be grateful if you can collaborate with one of the next ways:

·  You can contribute with the challenge the amount that you can. The total raised is what really matters.

·  You can help me to promote this crowdfunding campaign to reach as many people to obtain an important social effect.

·  You can help me to promote www.diverscity.es The portal where I will share everything

·  Following and forwarding all the social media networks. Through my personal Twitter and Facebook and also with Diverscity networks:

o Twitter: @Diverscity_

o Facebook: www.facebook.com/diversscity

o Instagram: http://instagram.com/diverscity_

o Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjNjiNXJdn5HtgbwJsHUmWw

·  To connect me with People, Companies, Media or Institutions that you think they may be interested in the 'Challenge of the Challenges'.

·  Providing me some kind of collaboration. Some people have already offered to help me with a photo shoot, a video recording, an article about the challenge published in their blog or you can send to me, or to the team, useful products or services to the challenge that we can test.

Thank you so much for each effort to reach this amazing challenge.

Whenever you want, you can contact with me through the social networks: @GemaHassenBey, @diverscity_, Facebook, Youtube... or via www.diverscity.es

THANKS!
