We just think we've taken the listening experience and build quality one step further.At first I have to admit that my expectations in producing something that sounded better weren't that high. I have to be honest and tell you that headphones were only one of SEVERAL projects I planned to undertake in 2014.At the start of 2014 I printed out some goals for the year ahead – which included business goals as well as personal goals — such as “be happy and relaxed most of the time” : -)In the business goals section it said “Bring at least 5 new products to market”.And we DID.And then … I launched PUMP Audio.My plan was to continue with more products and brands. I had investigated a quadrocopter product, a tablet computer, TVs… the list went on.But I sort of fell in love with PUMP, and the results were twofold:1- I decided to make sure that my other businesses could run properly with me giving less time to them (turns out they seem to run better, I think because I’ve empowered the people running them to do what *they think is right*, rather than having to ask me all the time);2- I realised how *lucky* I was to be able to attempt a task such as taking on the big audio brands, and that business was not just about how much money you make!I’d instinctively realised the second point when I first started out back in 2004, but somehow had forgotten it in recent years.Money is important, yes, because it allows you to do things (such as start PUMP Audio), and it also allows you to improve people’s lives, including your customers (by offering better products and services), your families, and your own.But money is really not the end goal in itself in my opinion. It’s more about having purpose, passion and doing things that you can be proud of.Anyway, that was the big lesson I learned this year…I've been very honest with you here about how I came to create the PUMP and OMG earphones.It's not exactly a fairy story...I first did it as just one of many products that I planned to bring to market.But as I said, I sort of fell in love with them - I think because of the quality of the product. I know that sounds a bit over the top, but I really mean it.I hope that by reading up on my blog posts you'll see the passion I've got for these earphones.I never really thought we could create something that was MARKET LEADING (in terms of sound quality) when we started, but somehow we did.And from that moment on, I decided to ditch every other new project I was doing and focus all my attention (and available funds) on PUMP and OMG.I could have told you about how it's always been my dream to do it etc., but that would be stretching the truth somewhat!I did try to start a record label in 2007 but that's another story...If you'd told me 18 months ago that I would create and become obsessed with our own audio brand that aimed to BEAT the likes of Beats, BOSE and Sennheiser, I would have probably said "don't be ridiculous, how could we possibly do that?"!Isn't it amazing how much things can change in a year?Anyhow, I've given you a little background on how PUMP and OMG came in to existence. Now here is what you are probably more interested in...Peoples reactions at the ChristmasIdeal Home Exhibition London(November 2014)...


What's the difference betweenPUMP and OMG?
The two brands are aimed at different market segments, but the earphones themselves are close to identical.
The physical design, construction, materials used and build quality are exactly the same.
PUMP has a slightly newer driver design which means that it can operate just outside the frequencies that a normal human ear can hear.
Some people say that they can hear this difference, but most (including me!) can not.
Both sound incredible.The only other difference is the box, which is a bit more high end with PUMP and costs us more to make.
To summarise, if I were you, I would go for the colour(s) that you like best!
The headphones themselves:

Here are the specs.
Frequency Range:
 - PUMP: 16 hz – 24000 hz
 - OMG: 20 hz - 20000 hz

Sensitivity:
 - PUMP: 102 dB (+/- 3dB)
 - OMG: 93 dB (+/- 3dB)
Impedance: 18 ohms
Complete Passive Noise Isolation
Specially tuned earbuds for small or regular/large ear canals
Specially Custom Tuned Drivers
Weight: <15g
3.5mm Gold Connector Jack
In Line Microphone
Water Resistant
Aluminium Casing (not plastic like Beats etc)
5 Year PUMP Full Replacement Warranty


The specs in and of themselves can't really articulate the quality of the sound and in particular the bass.
To do that, the only way I can really think of is for you to hear them for yourself. 
You can watch the response in the videos, but for all you know those people might be paid actors, or we might have just posted the minority of people who thought PUMP and OMG were better, giving a skewed impression.
In fact, the OVERWHELMING MAJORITY preferred PUMP and OMG to the other brands tested (Beats, SMS Audio, Sennheiser, BOSE, Marley), but of course I can't PROVE that here. It does require you to believe me unfortunately!
The only way to really prove what I am saying is for you to HEAR them for yourself.
That's why we've decided to offer Indiegogo Backers the following guarantee:
GUARANTEE
I know that this is a bit unusual for an Indiegogo project, but I would like to propose the following:
If you back us, and at any time within 6 months of the date you receive your headphones they don't live up to your expectations, we will refund your backing amount in full.
All you have to do is email or call us and we will honour this guarantee.
I know that a lot of headphones make bold claims vaguely alluding to the fact that they have amazing sound quality, but then when you listen to them it's hard to distinguish much of a difference. With PUMP and OMG I am categorically stating that you will immediately be able to hear that they sound significantly better than what you are currently using.
A bold claim, and that is why we are offering such a guarantee!
I'm expecting a very small take up on the guarantee, but it's there to give you confidence that what I am saying about the PUMP and OMG sound quality is true.
You can also read the customer reviews we've received so far for PUMP here and OMG here (they are all 100% genuine) and the Artist Endorsements for PUMP so far here (we haven't yet started approaching artists to review OMG, but will soon!).
Where We're At InThe Creation Process
We're already in production and have the finished articles ready to ship in the quantities shown in each reward level. We have physical possession of the first production at our HQ.
We've sold around 1000 units already and have received reviews from both users and -- in the case of PUMP -- artists and industry experts.
Indiegogo Backer Discount!
PUMP is usually sold at £99 plus shipping (or your local currencies equivalent).
OMG is usually sold at £79 plus shipping (or your local currencies equivalent).
That means that Indiegogo Backers are getting a 66.35% discount on PUMP and a 62.63% discount on OMG (or more if you order more than one of either).
And now for the Perks...




Stretch Goal #1 - PUMP Carry Case(If we reach £10,000)!
From feedback from initial users, we found that many wanted carry case or pouch to carry their PUMPs/OMGs in. We've been working on it, with a view to including it in our next generation box design.
However, I've decided to bring it forward and offer a free PUMP carry case to all Backers (whether you've ordered PUMP or OMG).


Hopefully we'll make this stretch goal and then I'll have to think of some more to add!As you've probably worked out, we are trying to really get the PUMP and OMG brands out there so that they start to go 'viral' and I really feel that Indiegogo is the natural way to achieve that.I'll be *eternally grateful* to you if you would be prepared to help us achieve this internationally (while receiving a pretty awesome set of headphones in return!).Thanks so much for your support, and I can't wait to hear your response to the PUMP & OMG headphones. They will change your enjoyment of the music you love forever. That is my promise.
Yours truly,

Adam BlairFounder, PUMP and OMG Audio
P.S. Here's some recent twitter reviews:






You can see many more Artist and User comments at pump-audio.com :-)
Risks and Challenges
As with all Indiegogo projects there are risks, and these are the steps we take to mitigate against them:
1-
Loss of or damage to the shipment en route to us:
We usually use DHL for inbound shipments from the factory to us. This means that all shipments are fully insured. If we did lose a shipment for reasons I don't want to even mention for fear of tempting fate, it would be insured. We would have to re-manufacture (adding around a month to delivery time) but it would not affect your order.
2-
Loss or damage of your headphones en route from our warehouse to you:
We will replace any lost shipments. We will either take insurance, or insure ourselves for this eventuality. In the case of the latter (self insurance) then we will ship orders on separate days to mitigate against any unlikely issues such as a delivery truck crashing etc.
3-
We go out of business or don't deliver on our promises:
The company that owns PUMP and OMG is Speedcam Systems Ltd, which is a registered company in the United Kingdom. Company reg number 07751910. It was incorporated in August 2011 and is 100% owned by me (Adam Blair). It has been profitable every year since 2011. Speedcam Systems Ltd has no bad debt whatsoever. Neither Speedcam Systems or myself are planning to go anywhere any time soon!
4-
Our factory goes out of business:
I think this is extremely unlikely but if it did occur then we would either find a new factory or refund all orders.
5-
I can't think of any other risks but if you have questions please don't hesitate to ask. If the reply is slow then the reason is that I will be answering all emails myself so if we are deluged with questions it might take a while to get through them all! I'll post the most common questions up on Indiegogo as we go along.

story:
INTRODUCING THE NEWEST WINTER SPORT

         

                                        

            



 

       The First Ever Wearable and Steerable Sled Using our Patented Design


ADVANTAGES:


  • Requires little balance to operate safely, making learning fast and easy.    
  • Device costs a fraction of what one might pay for just a snowboard.
  • Lowered impact on crashes due to being at ground level.              
  • Highly enhanced prospective of the snow gives you a thrill, never experienced before!





  • Lightweight and easy to carry giving you freedom to go to Snow Parks, Mountain Ski Resorts, sled hills and even cross-country.
  • Allows a wide range of users including kids, adults, experienced riders and beginners with disabled and handicapped models covered in our Patent Protection.  



AVAILABLE COLOR VARIATIONS - FACE FIRST PICTURED BELOW




AS SEEN ON:

ABOUT THE INVENTOR

My name is Warren Gibson, Founder of the SnoSoot. My passion for inventing goes back to hearing stories of my grandpa who had filed several patents. When I was 8 years old I submitted my own first patent.  It was granted but my family didn't have the money for patent attorney fees. 

My idea was a heated camping/folding chair. Today, you can now find a heated folding chair with a Patent.

This latest idea started when learning to snowboard at the age of 12. I would ride a ski bus alone for over an hour to Mount Ashland every week.  During the time on the bus, an idea of a new snow sport came to me. 

I envisioned a device easier to learn then skiing and snowboarding but also much safer as well. 

I came up with a 5 piece sled, Snosoot, that you can steer/carve, wear and walk. It really gives you an enhanced perspective of the snow you've never experienced before.

Both current SnoSoot models are ridden lying down, requiring minimal balance to operate while lowering the chance of injury dramatically. 

SnoSoot has just received our 21 year Patent for the current models and future development. It's time for the world to see this new snow sport, funds are going directly to expanding our market.

We will first expand our inventory by upgrading CNC production, professional video filming for commercial quality, attend numerous Expositions this winter season, complete website remodel, while also expanding on our Marketing, Advertising, SEO, Brand Name, Product line and Business Plan. With your help we can show the world why this product solves NUMEROUS problems today, with a Patent to back that.

story:
Short Summary

Mexico is currently plagued with issues surrounding Drugs, Corruption, gangs and much more that we do not hear about. Young people and communities need something to help them get involved and be apart of something bigger and feel part of the community where they are from. 

The Mexican government does not fund sports development in the same way some Countries do, and therefore many people do not get the chance to be as active as they could be. This is the reason for setting up this funding site.

What We Need & What You Get

Since there is no funding available for new and developing sports in Mexico, this funding is the lifeline its needs in order to have the best chance to succeed. 

Regardless of how much is raised all fund will go directly to the establishment and development of Mexico RL. The funds will go towards;

  1. Balls and cones
  2. coaching and refereeing manuals, 
  3. practice kit, 
  4. funding official coaching and refereeing courses 
  5. Official Team Kit
  6. Establishing of youth and senior teams
  7. Marketing material

The funding will also enable them to establish a youth development program to ensure future generations have the same opportunity to play and be a part of this great sport that is only possibly through help from people like you and me.

Everyone who donates will have their name and messages of support bound in a book to give to Mexico RL with there current short history. This mean if you donate you will forever be a part of Mexico Rugby League.

We are not asking for much just a dollar, pound or whatever currency you use, if everyone donates just 1, it all will add up in the end.

They are also seeking a National Team Official Sponsor.

The Impact

Mexico currently has a lot of issues and challenges in its political, social and economic areas. What I hope is that with the creation of a National team in Rugby League that they can find some relief through sport. 

We are all aware that a successful sports development on an international scale can assist give direction and dreams to young people. It can channel talent and give them opportunity.

It's a chance to help establish Rugby League in a country that needs help with its communities to ensure people have an opportunity to get involved in something fun and worthwhile that could focus their passion for sports and get them off the streets.

It will help with hundred, if not thousand of people to be able to be a part of, to keep them active and healthy through sports participation. Looking towards the future it gives Mexico RL a chance to become something that will represent it's people and country on the world stage. 

Establishing this league and National team will also help create jobs and new businesses as well. Which will have a huge boost to the communities and wider areas where Rugby League will be involved, with potential growth to all area of mexico.


Risks & Challenges

I have been a part of establishing community clubs in the UK as well as coaching at professional clubs. I am fully aware that the creation of a new sport in an area can be extremely challenging, furthermore I realized that without a decent funding pot to begin, things are even more so.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the Word!!!! Share the links on Facebook, Twitter and other social media sites. Exposure is the biggest thing that will assist if this is to be successful. Please get in contact if you feel there are other ways you can help. 

And that's all there is to it.


Other Links - Mexico Copa 9's

Latin Heat Mexico RL

Facebook Mexico RL

story:
Hier gehts zur deutschen Version >>

Sleep Well in Stressful Times

By listening to a certain tune that directly influences the neural system anyone can effectively lower one's levels of cortisol (the stress hormone that causes long-term health damage), and experience better sleep and higher tolerance for potentially stressful situations. We want to make this available to everyone.

  • Explanation
  • The difference you make
  • What is in it for you?
  • How does it work?
  • Instructions for proper use!
  • Listen to Samples
  • Links
  • Das Gleiche auf Deutsch (The same thing in German)

Explanation

This was originally designed for my wife, because when too many things happened in too short a time, she had a hard time trying to unwind and find rest at night. In search for a solution I got to know Chris C. Stewart. We developed an online working relationship (he is in Australia and I am in Austria ;-) and together we created a nice little audio tool.

Our working title was "Quick Fix", but later we called it Deep Harmony :: peace. My wife was happy! It works like a charm. Listening to it remarkably reduced cortisol levels in her, and does so in most people. So we decided to offer it to the wider community. First we burnt each CD on my home PC, then demand grew and we had them pressed. To date we have sold just over 3000 CDs.

This was physical CDs, taken to the post office, delivered to Austria, Germany and Switzerland. But we know there are way too many stressed sensitives all over the planet! Over-stimulated people, in daily need of a non-drug aid that helps them to unwind and recuperate. And many of them don't even own CD-players any more. We want to meet their needs too.

In order to do this we are now going international. And that's where you come in!

  • We need money for a web-shop with online payment and download logistics
  • We need publicity: people who need it need to know about it!

This campaign is supposed to serve both ends, with the publicity being by far the more important one. If we don't quite meet our financial goals it will still happen, it will just take much longer. But it is essential that people know about this.

Please support us! Maybe you have sleeping problems yourself in challenging times. Put an end to this, treat yourself with Deep Harmony :: peace. Or just help us help others :-)

Please give us your ideas on what we could do in order to make this campaign more successful - feedback, hints, anything!

Please pass it on! I am sure you have kind and sensitive friends who frequently find themselves in the highly unpleasant state of long-term stress, struggling to get to sleep at night, and wishing for a non-drug solution. Let them know about this! (Many are closet sensitives. So please tell all your friends about it!)

The difference you make

You give us the opportunity to do what we like and know best: support the sensitive, creative, empathic, caring and idealistic people out there, so they are less hindered by unfavourable frameworks, encroachments and environmental influences.

How this will influence the world we live in? Hard to say, but I do know that the people who can benefit most from Deep Harmony :: peace are amongst those that have an inherent desire to make the world a better place for everyone, and many of them have plenty of skills and talents to make a meaningful contribution. Chronic over-stimulation can turn even nice and gentle people into a pain-in-the-neck, that can't help but pass their stress on to those around them. Chronic stress can be crippling and shorten life-spans considerably. If more and more creative, idealistic and sensitive people are freed from it's negative aftereffects - God knows what will happen!?

What's in it for you?

If you have been reading so far, I assume that you are one of those creative, empathic sensitives yourself - regardless if you are blessed with sound sleep or have a hard time unwinding. So you have probably already grasped it all, I won't be telling you anything new here:

  • To help make this world a better place has intrinsic satisfaction to it - and helping those that are destined to aspire to just that even more so, because it has a nice leverage effect built in.
  • The gratitude of those friends, that will find relief with this real burden of a chronically high cortisol level might feel a bit embarrassing, but also very nice.
  • And of course, if it is the 'perk' you choose you will have a great tool for self management at your fingertips.
    (BTW, should you be in dire need for less cortisol, but find yourself flat out broke, write us a message - for every 5 perks ordered we will give one out for free if someone is in genuine need.)
    But whatever situation you are in - please do tell your friends about this right away. We need you and your network! We really really do.

How does it work?


Every Deep Harmony :: peace audio track consists of three layers:

  • The obvious, audible surface (music and/or nature sounds)
  • Pink noise - a subtle hissing noise coming in waves
  • The binaural beat composition

The majority of processes that trigger us into unpleasant states of stress and over-stimulation happen subconsciously. So it is the subconscious that is stressed primarily - consciously we often notice only the secondary reactions: sleep evades us, we are less patient with others, react irritated with details, etc. So Deep Harmony :: peace audio tracks work mostly on the subconscious.

Music and nature sounds have a multitude of positive effects on psyche and hormone system, most of which we don't notice consciously. The sound surfaces of the tracks are chosen to be calming and relaxing - which is sometimes a subjective thing.

The background noise is socalled pink noise, the noise that is most common in nature. It contains a harmonized blend all frequencies. Rain, ocean waves, the murmur of a creek, the wind in trees, on grass or on a sand dune - these familiar soundscapes consist in large parts of pink noise. The proper doses of it engenders a feeling of security. Pink noise is also an indispensable technical  part of the composition, needed for it to fully unfold it's desired effect.

The Binaural beats layer contains the unique power of the Deep Harmony :: peace compositions. This technique is an efficient means to influence brainwaves, and the resulting moods and states. Chris C. Stewart has brought this art to perfection with the multi-layered x-box harmonics and progressive phasing. Inaudible by the physical ear, the effect unfolds directly within the brain and nervous system.


"WaveInterference" by Adjwilley - Own work. Licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0via Wikimedia Commons

Binaural beats are heard when the right ear listens to a slightly different tone than the left ear. Usually in acoustics, a beat is an interference between two sounds of slightly different frequencies, perceived as periodic variations in volume whose rate is the difference between the two frequencies. If the binaural compositions are listened to with a headset, the two frequencies only interfere within the brain, which has a profound effect on the brainwaves.

However, the whole is more than the sum of it's parts. Deep Harmony :: peace audio tracks often take effect in a surprising short time of application, even in cases of chronic over-stimulation.

Instructions for proper use

  • Deep Harmony :: peace has to be listened to with a stereo headset, otherwise it will have little or no effect.
  • Do not do anything else while listening (like reading, watching TV, etc.). You can just relax, or observe your own reactions to the sounds. The latter will slightly increase the benefits, but both methods are equally fine. It is no problem if you should fall asleep - as a matter of fact it will be hard not to dose off, especially in the evening.
  • Absolutely do not drive while listening to Deep Harmony :: peace! You could easily doze off and cause an accident. Don't even think it.
  • Under no circumstances should you be driving a vehicle, operate power tools or engage in similarly dangerous activities right after having listened to Deep Harmony :: peace. Your alertness and concentration might be impaired for a while.
  • Listening at any time of the day is possible, with the time right before bedtime being ideal. (If you fall asleep easily, but have a hard time going back to sleep after waking up in the middle of the night, place your audio device next to your bed with the headset plugged in, ready to use. Then if you do wake up at night, just turn on Deep Harmony :: peace and listen to the soothing sounds. Most of the time you will fall asleep within a few minutes.)
  • Choose a comfortable reclining or laying down position.
  • It is usually sufficient to listen to Deep Harmony:: peace once a day, best in the evening. Two sessions a day is the upper limit.

Samples

Please listen to the soundmask, this is the audible surface of the composition. While it is only slightly involved in creating the desired effect, it can be a major factor in inhibiting the desired effect, e.g. if you psychologically or emotionally react negatively to what you hear.

el-Hadra

The el-Hadra version of Deep Harmony :: peace that has been sold more than 3000 times (as CD). The first 5 minutes are a beautiful introduction played solo by Klaus Wiese on the harp, then Ted de Jong joins him on the tablas, and shortly thereafter the music stabilizes itself into the rhythm you hear on the sample.


Pink Noise

This is the pink noise version of Deep Harmony :: peace - the listener is simply flooded with constant and steady noise. What appears as a nuisance or absurdity on first thought, turns out to be perfect for coping with a noisy environment. You could say it is next to silence - the perfectly monotonous noise feels very natural (like sitting next to a waterfall - as a matter of fact pink noise is the most common sound in nature), and is just great in masking any other sounds trying to come in from the outside. You do not need to use high volumes to have the pink noise masking voices, music from other sources, doorbells, ringing telephones etc, making them simply disappear.

Water and Birds

This is the version of Deep Harmony :: peace that is best suited for listening during the day, for it is pleasing, relaxing and refreshing at the same time.

Links

  • TED Talk on the neuroscience of sleep 
  • Binaural beats on Wikipedia
  • With an address in the EU you can order a CD here (German only), it will be sent with an invoice

Below the dashed line you can find a German translation of the whole text.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  - - - 

Für unsere deutschsprachigen Unterstützer:


Gut schlafen in stressigen Zeiten

Durch aufmerksames Anhören bestimmter Audio-Dateien werden Psyche und Nervensystem beeinflusst. So kann jeder die Menge an Cortisol (das Stress Hormon, das mit der Zeit Gesundheitsschäden verursacht) effektiv senken, besseren Schlaf und höhere Toleranz für potentiell stressige Situationen erleben. Das wollen wir verfügbar machen.

  • Erklärung
  • Was das für uns bedeutet
  • Was bringt es dir?
  • Wie funktioniert das?
  • Gebrauchsanleitung !!
  • Hörproben
  • Links

Erklärung

Diese Schlafhilfe wurde ursprünglich für meine Frau entwickelt. Wenn zu viele Dinge in zu kurzer Zeit passierten, oder stressige Situationen vor ihr lagen, dann hatte sie Schwierigkeiten sich in der Nacht zu entspannen und Schlaf zu finden. Auf der Suche nach einer Lösung lernte ich Chris C. Stewart kennen. Wir bildeten ein online-Team (er lebt in Australien und ich in Österreich), und gemeinsam entwickelten wir ein spezielles Klangwerkzeug.

Unser Arbeitstitel war "Quick Fix" (frei übersetzt "Schnelle Hilfe"), später nannten wir es Deep Harmony :: peace (Tiefe Harmonie :: Friede), wegen der erlebten Wirkung. Meine Frau war glücklich! Es funktioniert einfach hervorragen. Das Anhören dieser Komposition reduziert den Cortisolspiegel bei ihr und bei den meisten Menschen, was bei chronsichen Stresszuständen Anspannung nimmt und Erleichterung bringt. So beschlossen wir, die Komposition als CD der Öffentlichkeit anzubieten. Das kam ganz gut an und bis heute haben wir über 3000 CDs verkauft.

Das sind echte CDs die wir zum Postamt tragen und nach D, A und CH versenden. Aber wir wissen, dass es in der Welt überall viele gestresste Sensible gibt! Überstimulierte Menschen die sich oft und oft eine chemiefreie Einschlafhilfe wünschen, die ihnen Entspannung und echte Erholung ermöglicht. Viele von denen haben heute gar keine CD-Player mehr. Wir möchten auch ihnen eine Lösung bieten.

Deshalb wollen wir uns jetzt international aufstellen. Und dazu brauchen wir deine Hilfe!

  • Für diesen Schritt brauchen wir Geld für einen Webshop mit Download Logistik und online Zahlungsmöglichkeit
  • Und wir brauchen vor allem Publicity: Menschen die das benötigen müssen wissen, dass es das gibt!

Diese Kampagne soll uns beides bringen, wobei die Publicity mit Abstand das Wichtigere ist. Wenn wir unsere finanziellen Ziele nicht erreichen wird trotzdem alles stattfinden, es wird nur länger dauern. Aber Menschen, die in Stresszeiten Schlafprobleme haben, müssen davon wissen!

Bitte unterstütze uns! Vielleicht hast du ja auch selbst Schlafprobleme in herausfordernden Zeiten. Nimm das nicht länger hin, gönne dir Deep Harmony :: peace. Oder unterstütze uns einfach so :-)

Bitte sag uns deine Ideen! Was könnten wir tun um diese Kampagne erfolgreicher zu machen? Feedback, Anregungen, Tipps, alles.

Bitte sage es auch weiter! Du hast sicherlich liebe und sensitive Freunde, die sich immer wieder im sehr unangenehmen Zustand von Langzeit-Stress befinden. Informiere sie! (Denk daran, viele verbergen ihre Sensitivität und ihre Probleme damit. Deshalb erzähle am besten allen Freunden davon ;)

Was das für uns bedeutet

Du eröffnest uns die Gelegenheit, weltweit das zu tun was wir gerne tun und gut können: die sensitiven, kreativen, emphatischen, systemisch denkenden und idealistischen Menschen dieser Welt zu unterstützen, auf dass sie weniger von ungünstigen Rahmenbedingungen und Beeinträchtigungen gehindert werden, glücklich und erfolgreich in der Welt zu wirken.

Wie das unsere Welt beeinflussen wird? Schwer zu sagen, aber ich weiß, dass der Großteil der Menschen, die am meisten von Deep Harmony :: peace profitieren können, ein innewohnendes Bedürfnis haben die Welt für uns alle zu einem besseren Platz zu machen. Viele von ihnen haben viele Talente und Fähigkeiten, um einen wirklich bedeutenden Beitrag leisten zu können. Andererseits kann chronische Überstimulation auch nette und sanfte Menschen zu echten Nervensägen machen, weil sie unweigerlich Stress weitergeben. Chronischer Stress kann auch fähige Menschen lahmlegen. Wenn nun mehr und mehr Menschen von den Nachwirkungen dieser Plage befreit werden und mehr aus ihrer Power leben können - da kann viel passieren!

Was hast du davon?

Wenn du bis hierher gelesen hast vermute ich, dass du selbst einer von diesen kreativen, sensiblen, systemischen Denkern und Fühlern bist - unabhängig davon, ob du mit gutem Schlaf gesegnet bist oder nicht. Somit hast du wahrscheinlich schon alles erfasst, und ich werde dir hier nichts Neues erzählen:

  • Mitzuarbeiten an der Verbesserung der Welt hat eine innewohnende Befriedigung - und denen zu helfen, die dazu neigen sich diesem hohen Ziel zu widmen, noch mehr, weil da die Hebelwirkung dazukommt.
  • Die Dankbarkeit jener Freunde, die genau durch dieses Mittel große Erleichterung von dieser sehr realen Belastung eines chronisch erhöhten Cortisol-Spiegels finden werden, wird dir vielleicht etwas peinlich sein. Aber es wird sich gut anfühlen.
  • Und natürlich, falls du diesen Perk (=Belohnung) auswählst, hast du für dich selbst ein wunderbares Werkzeug zur Verfügung, um dein Leben belastungsfreier zu gestalten. 
    (Apropos: wenn du deinen Cortisol-Spiegel ganz dringen senken musst, aber völlig pleite bist, schreib uns - pro 5 angeforderten Perks vergeben wir Deep Harmony :: peace einmal gratis.)
    Aber egal in welcher Situation du dich findest - bitte sag es gleich an deine Freunde weiter. Wir brauchen dich und dein Netzwerk wirklich!

Wie funktioniert das?

Jede unserer Deep Harmony CDs besteht aus mehreren Teilen, bzw. Lagen:

  • die deutlich hörbare Oberfläche (Musik und/oder Naturgeräusche)
  • das mit etwas Aufmerksamkeit auch noch hörbaren Rauschen
  • die Komposition binauraler Rhythmen

Der Großteil der Prozesse, die uns in die unangenehmen Zustände von Stress und Überstimulation versetzen, laufen unbewusst ab. Gestresst ist somit in erster Linie das Unterbewusstsein – bewusst bemerkst du oft nur die sekundären Auswirkungen: du kannst vielleicht nicht einschlafen, hast weniger Geduld mit anderen, reagierst gereizt auf relative Kleinigkeiten, etc. Deshalb wirken die Deep Harmony Audios in erster Linie auf das Unterbewusste.

Musik und Naturgeräusche haben vielerlei Wirkungen auf Psyche und Hormonsystem, die der bewussten Aufmerksamkeit größtenteils entgehen. Die hörbaren Teile der CD sind so gewählt, dass sie beruhigend und entspannend wirken - was natürlich subjektiv unterschiedlich ist.

Das Rauschen ist sogenanntes Rosa Rauschen, das in der Natur am häufigsten vorkommende Geräusch, das eine harmonische Mischung sämtlicher hörbaren Frequenzen enthält. Egal ob Regen, Meereswellen, Bachgeplätscher oder der Wind in Bäumen, Grashalmen oder auf Sand – diese vertrauten Geräuschkulissen bestehen zu großen Teilen aus Rosa Rauschen. Die richtige Dosis davon vermittelt Sicherheit. Daüber hinaus wird das Rauschen aus technischen Gründen benötigt, damit die binauralen Klänge ihre volle Wirkung entfalten können.

Die binauralen Rhythmen beinhalten die eigentliche Power von Deep Harmony. Ist diese Technik an sich schon ein mächtiges Mittel, um bestimmte Gehirnwellen – und die damit verbundenen Stimmungen und Zustände – herbeizuführen, so wurde dies von Chris C. Stewart in den mehrstimmigen "x-box harmonics" und mit progressivem Abstimmen der Phasen zur Perfektion gebracht. Mit dem bewussten Ohr überhaupt nicht hörbar (das von manchen Menschen "gehörte" Pulsieren ist eine reine elektrische Schwingung im Gehirn), entfaltet sich die Wirkung direkt auf das Nervensystem.

Doch das Ganze ist mehr als die Summe seiner Teile. Deep Harmony CDs wirken oft verblüffend schnell, auch in Fällen chronischer Über-Stimulation.

Gebrauchsanleitung

  • Deep Harmony muss man mit Stereo Kopfhörern anhören. Andernfalls hat es kaum oder keinen Effekt.
  • Mache nebenbei nichts anderes (wie z. B. lesen, fernsehen, surfen, etc.). Du kannst dich entweder einfach entspannen, oder - was die Wirkung verbessert - deine eigenen Reaktionen auf die Klänge beobachten. Wenn du dabei einschlafen solltest ist es nicht schlimm. Tatsache ist, dass es sich v. a. abends schwer vermeiden lässt einzunicken.
  • Auf gar keinen Fall darfst du ein Auto; Motorrad oder auch nur ein Fahrrad lenken, während du dir Deep Harmony anhörst. Die Gefahr ist groß, dass du einnickst oder in deiner Aufmerksamkeit beeinträchtigt bist und dich und/oder andere in Lebensgefahr bringst. Denk nicht mal dran.
  • Jede Tageszeit ist möglich, besonders geeignet ist die Zeit unmittelbar vor dem Schlafengehen. Bei Durchschlafschwierigkeiten kannst du den Audio-Player mit Kopfhörern bereitlegen, und dir den Soundtrack in der Nacht anhören.
  • Auf keinen Fall solltest du unmittelbar danach Autofahren, mit schwerem Werkzeug arbeiten oder ähnlich gefährliche Dinge tun. Deine Konzentrationsfähigkeit oder Präsenz kann eine Zeitlang beeinträchtigt sein.
  • Die CD einmal täglich - abens - anzuhören, sollte ausreichen, von mehr als zwei Sitzungen pro Tag wird dringend abgeraten.
  • Wähle eine bequeme sitzende oder liegende Stellung; aufrechte Meditationshaltung ist nicht erforderlich.

Hörproben

Bitte hör dir die Klangmaske an, das ist die deutlich hörbare Oberfläche der Komposition. Sie spielt zwar eine geringe Rolle im Erzeugen des gewünschten Effektes, kann aber ein ausschlaggebender Faktor sein, um die Entspannung zu verhindern, nämlich wenn du psychologisch oder emotional negativ auf das was du hörst reagierst.

el-Hadra

Die el-Hadra Version von Deep Harmony :: peace wurde bereits mehr als 3000 mal verkauft  (als CD). Die ersten 5 Minuten sind eine sehr lyrische Einleitung, von Klaus Wiese als Solo auf der Harfe gespielt. Dann gesellt sich Ted de Jong an den Tablas hinzu, und bald danach stabilisiert sich die Musik in den Rhythmus, den du in der Hörprobe hören kannst.


Rosa Rauschen (Pink Noise)

Bei der Version Pink Noise badet der Zuhörer in dem gleichbleibenden und stetigen Rauschen. Was man sich im ersten Moment vielleicht unangenehm oder absurd vorstellt hat seine Vorzüge. In der Praxis ist es perfekt geeignet, um sich in einem lärmigen oder wechselhaft lauten Umfeld zu entspannen. Man könnte sagen, dass es der Stille sehr nahe ist - das völlig monotone Geräusch fühlt sich sehr natürlich an (wie neben einem Wasserfall oder im starken Regen auf einer Veranda zu sitzen), und maskiert Außengeräusche sehr gut. Du musst es dafür gar nicht sehr laut aufdrehen, das Rosa Rauschen verschluckt Stimmen, Musik von anderen Quellen, Straßenlärm, Telefonläuten etc., so dass sie einfach verschwinden.

Wasser und Vögel

Diese Version von Deep Harmony :: peace ist am besten dafür geeignet, untertags gehört zu werden. Sie ist heiter, entspannend und belebend zugleich.

Links

  • TED Talk über die Neurowissenschaft des Schlafs (Englisch)
  • Binaurale Beats auf Wikipedia
  • Information zu Stress, Überstimulation und Cortisol
  • Wenn du eine Adresse in der EU hast, kannst du  hier eine CD bestellen (auf Deutsch), sie wird mit einer Rechnung geschickt.
story_txt:
Hier gehts zur deutschen Version >>


Sleep Well in Stressful Times
By listening to a certain tune that directly influences the neural system anyone can effectively lower one's levels of cortisol (the stress hormone that causes long-term health damage), and experience better sleep and higher tolerance for potentially stressful situations. We want to make this available to everyone.


Explanation
The difference you make
What is in it for you?
How does it work?
Instructions for proper use!
Listen to Samples
Links


Das Gleiche auf Deutsch (The same thing in German)


Explanation
This was originally designed for my wife, because when too many things happened in too short a time, she had a hard time trying to unwind and find rest at night. In search for a solution I got to know Chris C. Stewart. We developed an online working relationship (he is in Australia and I am in Austria ;-) and together we created a nice little audio tool.
Our working title was "Quick Fix", but later we called it Deep Harmony :: peace. My wife was happy! It works like a charm. Listening to it remarkably reduced cortisol levels in her, and does so in most people. So we decided to offer it to the wider community. First we burnt each CD on my home PC, then demand grew and we had them pressed. To date we have sold just over 3000 CDs.

This was physical CDs, taken to the post office, delivered to Austria, Germany and Switzerland. But we know there are way too many stressed sensitives all over the planet! Over-stimulated people, in daily need of a non-drug aid that helps them to unwind and recuperate. And many of them don't even own CD-players any more. We want to meet their needs too.
In order to do this we are now going international. And that's where you come in!

We need money for a web-shop with online payment and download logistics
We need publicity: people who need it need to know about it!

This campaign is supposed to serve both ends, with the publicity being by far the more important one. If we don't quite meet our financial goals it will still happen, it will just take much longer. But it is essential that people know about this.
Please support us! Maybe you have sleeping problems yourself in challenging times. Put an end to this, treat yourself with Deep Harmony :: peace. Or just help us help others :-)
Please give us your ideas on what we could do in order to make this campaign more successful - feedback, hints, anything!
Please pass it on! I am sure you have kind and sensitive friends who frequently find themselves in the highly unpleasant state of long-term stress, struggling to get to sleep at night, and wishing for a non-drug solution. Let them know about this! (Many are closet sensitives. So please tell all your friends about it!)



The difference you make
You give us the opportunity to do what we like and know best: support the sensitive, creative, empathic, caring and idealistic people out there, so they are less hindered by unfavourable frameworks, encroachments and environmental influences.
How this will influence the world we live in? Hard to say, but I do know that the people who can benefit most from Deep Harmony :: peace are amongst those that have an inherent desire to make the world a better place for everyone, and many of them have plenty of skills and talents to make a meaningful contribution. Chronic over-stimulation can turn even nice and gentle people into a pain-in-the-neck, that can't help but pass their stress on to those around them. Chronic stress can be crippling and shorten life-spans considerably. If more and more creative, idealistic and sensitive people are freed from it's negative aftereffects - God knows what will happen!?



What's in it for you?
If you have been reading so far, I assume that you are one of those creative, empathic sensitives yourself - regardless if you are blessed with sound sleep or have a hard time unwinding. So you have probably already grasped it all, I won't be telling you anything new here:



To help make this world a better place has intrinsic satisfaction to it - and helping those that are destined to aspire to just that even more so, because it has a nice leverage effect built in.

The gratitude of those friends, that will find relief with this real burden of a chronically high cortisol level might feel a bit embarrassing, but also very nice.
And of course, if it is the 'perk' you choose you will have a great tool for self management at your fingertips. (BTW, should you be in dire need for less cortisol, but find yourself flat out broke, write us a message - for every 5 perks ordered we will give one out for free if someone is in genuine need.)But whatever situation you are in - please do tell your friends about this right away. We need you and your network! We really really do.




How does it work?



Every Deep Harmony :: peace audio track consists of three layers:



The obvious, audible surface (music and/or nature sounds)


Pink noise - a subtle hissing noise coming in waves


The binaural beat composition


The majority of processes that trigger us into unpleasant states of stress and over-stimulation happen subconsciously. So it is the subconscious that is stressed primarily - consciously we often notice only the secondary reactions: sleep evades us, we are less patient with others, react irritated with details, etc. So Deep Harmony :: peace audio tracks work mostly on the subconscious.
Music and nature sounds have a multitude of positive effects on psyche and hormone system, most of which we don't notice consciously. The sound surfaces of the tracks are chosen to be calming and relaxing - which is sometimes a subjective thing.
The background noise is socalled pink noise, the noise that is most common in nature. It contains a harmonized blend all frequencies. Rain, ocean waves, the murmur of a creek, the wind in trees, on grass or on a sand dune - these familiar soundscapes consist in large parts of pink noise. The proper doses of it engenders a feeling of security. Pink noise is also an indispensable technical  part of the composition, needed for it to fully unfold it's desired effect.
The Binaural beats layer contains the unique power of the Deep Harmony :: peace compositions. This technique is an efficient means to influence brainwaves, and the resulting moods and states. Chris C. Stewart has brought this art to perfection with the multi-layered x-box harmonics and progressive phasing. Inaudible by the physical ear, the effect unfolds directly within the brain and nervous system.


"WaveInterference" by Adjwilley - Own work. Licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0via Wikimedia Commons
Binaural beats are heard when the right ear listens to a slightly different tone than the left ear. Usually in acoustics, a beat is an interference between two sounds of slightly different frequencies, perceived as periodic variations in volume whose rate is the difference between the two frequencies. If the binaural compositions are listened to with a headset, the two frequencies only interfere within the brain, which has a profound effect on the brainwaves.
However, the whole is more than the sum of it's parts. Deep Harmony :: peace audio tracks often take effect in a surprising short time of application, even in cases of chronic over-stimulation.



Instructions for proper use


Deep Harmony :: peace has to be listened to with a stereo headset, otherwise it will have little or no effect.
Do not do anything else while listening (like reading, watching TV, etc.). You can just relax, or observe your own reactions to the sounds. The latter will slightly increase the benefits, but both methods are equally fine. It is no problem if you should fall asleep - as a matter of fact it will be hard not to dose off, especially in the evening.

Absolutely do not drive while listening to Deep Harmony :: peace! You could easily doze off and cause an accident. Don't even think it.
Under no circumstances should you be driving a vehicle, operate power tools or engage in similarly dangerous activities right after having listened to Deep Harmony :: peace. Your alertness and concentration might be impaired for a while.
Listening at any time of the day is possible, with the time right before bedtime being ideal. (If you fall asleep easily, but have a hard time going back to sleep after waking up in the middle of the night, place your audio device next to your bed with the headset plugged in, ready to use. Then if you do wake up at night, just turn on Deep Harmony :: peace and listen to the soothing sounds. Most of the time you will fall asleep within a few minutes.)
Choose a comfortable reclining or laying down position.

It is usually sufficient to listen to Deep Harmony:: peace once a day, best in the evening. Two sessions a day is the upper limit.




Samples
Please listen to the soundmask, this is the audible surface of the composition. While it is only slightly involved in creating the desired effect, it can be a major factor in inhibiting the desired effect, e.g. if you psychologically or emotionally react negatively to what you hear.
el-Hadra
The el-Hadra version of Deep Harmony :: peace that has been sold more than 3000 times (as CD). The first 5 minutes are a beautiful introduction played solo by Klaus Wiese on the harp, then Ted de Jong joins him on the tablas, and shortly thereafter the music stabilizes itself into the rhythm you hear on the sample.


Pink Noise
This is the pink noise version of Deep Harmony :: peace - the listener is simply flooded with constant and steady noise. What appears as a nuisance or absurdity on first thought, turns out to be perfect for coping with a noisy environment. You could say it is next to silence - the perfectly monotonous noise feels very natural (like sitting next to a waterfall - as a matter of fact pink noise is the most common sound in nature), and is just great in masking any other sounds trying to come in from the outside. You do not need to use high volumes to have the pink noise masking voices, music from other sources, doorbells, ringing telephones etc, making them simply disappear.


Water and Birds
This is the version of Deep Harmony :: peace that is best suited for listening during the day, for it is pleasing, relaxing and refreshing at the same time.




Links



TED Talk on the neuroscience of sleep 

Binaural beats on Wikipedia
With an address in the EU you can order a CD here (German only), it will be sent with an invoice

Below the dashed line you can find a German translation of the whole text.

Durch aufmerksames Anhören bestimmter Audio-Dateien werden Psyche und Nervensystem beeinflusst. So kann jeder die Menge an Cortisol (das Stress Hormon, das mit der Zeit Gesundheitsschäden verursacht) effektiv senken, besseren Schlaf und höhere Toleranz für potentiell stressige Situationen erleben. Das wollen wir verfügbar machen.

Links

Das Rauschen ist sogenanntes Rosa Rauschen, das in der Natur am häufigsten vorkommende Geräusch, das eine harmonische Mischung sämtlicher hörbaren Frequenzen enthält. Egal ob Regen, Meereswellen, Bachgeplätscher oder der Wind in Bäumen, Grashalmen oder auf Sand – diese vertrauten Geräuschkulissen bestehen zu großen Teilen aus Rosa Rauschen. Die richtige Dosis davon vermittelt Sicherheit. Daüber hinaus wird das Rauschen aus technischen Gründen benötigt, damit die binauralen Klänge ihre volle Wirkung entfalten können.
Die binauralen Rhythmen beinhalten die eigentliche Power von Deep Harmony. Ist diese Technik an sich schon ein mächtiges Mittel, um bestimmte Gehirnwellen – und die damit verbundenen Stimmungen und Zustände – herbeizuführen, so wurde dies von Chris C. Stewart in den mehrstimmigen "x-box harmonics" und mit progressivem Abstimmen der Phasen zur Perfektion gebracht. Mit dem bewussten Ohr überhaupt nicht hörbar (das von manchen Menschen "gehörte" Pulsieren ist eine reine elektrische Schwingung im Gehirn), entfaltet sich die Wirkung direkt auf das Nervensystem.
Doch das Ganze ist mehr als die Summe seiner Teile. Deep Harmony CDs wirken oft verblüffend schnell, auch in Fällen chronischer Über-Stimulation.



Gebrauchsanleitung

Deep Harmony muss man mit Stereo Kopfhörern anhören. Andernfalls hat es kaum oder keinen Effekt.
Mache nebenbei nichts anderes (wie z. B. lesen, fernsehen, surfen, etc.). Du kannst dich entweder einfach entspannen, oder - was die Wirkung verbessert - deine eigenen Reaktionen auf die Klänge beobachten. Wenn du dabei einschlafen solltest ist es nicht schlimm. Tatsache ist, dass es sich v. a. abends schwer vermeiden lässt einzunicken.

Auf gar keinen Fall darfst du ein Auto; Motorrad oder auch nur ein Fahrrad lenken, während du dir Deep Harmony anhörst. Die Gefahr ist groß, dass du einnickst oder in deiner Aufmerksamkeit beeinträchtigt bist und dich und/oder andere in Lebensgefahr bringst. Denk nicht mal dran.
Jede Tageszeit ist möglich, besonders geeignet ist die Zeit unmittelbar vor dem Schlafengehen. Bei Durchschlafschwierigkeiten kannst du den Audio-Player mit Kopfhörern bereitlegen, und dir den Soundtrack in der Nacht anhören.
Auf keinen Fall solltest du unmittelbar danach Autofahren, mit schwerem Werkzeug arbeiten oder ähnlich gefährliche Dinge tun. Deine Konzentrationsfähigkeit oder Präsenz kann eine Zeitlang beeinträchtigt sein.
Die CD einmal täglich - abens - anzuhören, sollte ausreichen, von mehr als zwei Sitzungen pro Tag wird dringend abgeraten.
Wähle eine bequeme sitzende oder liegende Stellung; aufrechte Meditationshaltung ist nicht erforderlich.




Hörproben
Bitte hör dir die Klangmaske an, das ist die deutlich hörbare Oberfläche der Komposition. Sie spielt zwar eine geringe Rolle im Erzeugen des gewünschten Effektes, kann aber ein ausschlaggebender Faktor sein, um die Entspannung zu verhindern, nämlich wenn du psychologisch oder emotional negativ auf das was du hörst reagierst.
el-Hadra
Die el-Hadra Version von Deep Harmony :: peace wurde bereits mehr als 3000 mal verkauft  (als CD). Die ersten 5 Minuten sind eine sehr lyrische Einleitung, von Klaus Wiese als Solo auf der Harfe gespielt. Dann gesellt sich Ted de Jong an den Tablas hinzu, und bald danach stabilisiert sich die Musik in den Rhythmus, den du in der Hörprobe hören kannst.


Rosa Rauschen (Pink Noise)
Bei der Version Pink Noise badet der Zuhörer in dem gleichbleibenden und stetigen Rauschen. Was man sich im ersten Moment vielleicht unangenehm oder absurd vorstellt hat seine Vorzüge. In der Praxis ist es perfekt geeignet, um sich in einem lärmigen oder wechselhaft lauten Umfeld zu entspannen. Man könnte sagen, dass es der Stille sehr nahe ist - das völlig monotone Geräusch fühlt sich sehr natürlich an (wie neben einem Wasserfall oder im starken Regen auf einer Veranda zu sitzen), und maskiert Außengeräusche sehr gut. Du musst es dafür gar nicht sehr laut aufdrehen, das Rosa Rauschen verschluckt Stimmen, Musik von anderen Quellen, Straßenlärm, Telefonläuten etc., so dass sie einfach verschwinden.


Wasser und Vögel
Diese Version von Deep Harmony :: peace ist am besten dafür geeignet, untertags gehört zu werden. Sie ist heiter, entspannend und belebend zugleich.




Links



TED Talk über die Neurowissenschaft des Schlafs (Englisch)

Binaurale Beats auf Wikipedia
Information zu Stress, Überstimulation und Cortisol

Wenn du eine Adresse in der EU hast, kannst du  hier eine CD bestellen (auf Deutsch), sie wird mit einer Rechnung geschickt.

story:
Expectations of 

Tomorrow’s Technology

Technology make our lives easier and more convenient, we wouldn’t wanna live without it, but we can change the way we use it.

Kavenir, it’s the way how we make your expectations come true. Just like Theodore’s earphone, Kavenir is a smart wireless headphone, it’s a personal assistant on your ear.



What Can Kavenir Do?



Kavenir Helps You Everywhere


Eyes Off The Screen


Safer driving, Kavenir feedback the realtime traffic information or response to a text message by ear to keep your hands off your smart phone and on the wheel, then your eyes can focus on the road. Even Kavenir can roll down the window by voice control if your car support.


Manage Your Schedule


Kavenir help you manage schedule effectively, for example, you can appoint a date to your TODO list or record all your thoughts to your notes at anytime, and not only that, if you book a ticket over Kavenir, it will remind you at the right time.


Interact With Any Screen


Kavenir is a connector and controller between you and any Third-Party-Screen.


Take Care of Your Health


Kavenir have tracker, sensor and monitor to measure your steps, heart rate and oxygen saturation of blood.


Living The Simple Life


Enjoy your leisure time, Kavenir knows songs you like, news you interest and funny jokes that will make you smile.


Home Automation


With Kavenir, you can turn off the light and TV, lower the temperature, open the surveillance or anything that control through voice, cool and smart home as you wish.



Our Services



This is Kavenir


Detail of Kavenir


Kavenir is a terminal device we developed for a long time. It can connect to our powerful system by wireless and also interact with screens through Bluetooth.


Features of Kavenir


Kavenir has 4GB of flash storage to store your offline music, measured body data and tracked movements.


Control of Kavenir


In order to make Kavenir look like smaller and more cool , we did not use any button except a touchpad.



Wireless Charging


Wireless charging standard - Qi technology support,  you can charge Kavenir on any Qi wireless charging pad or our's. It's very easy to use, just put Kavenir on the charging pad, pick it up when you need and it will be full charged. 




Awesome Free App For Interactive Display


When your friend post and share a video with you, you can show it on your ipad or laptop(what we mean the Third-Party-Screen), these awesome free app can control by touch and voice.


Different Colors


 Kavenir has more than 5 colors, you can choose a favorite .You can also tell us your lucky color , we will customize for you . 




Why We Need You Help?

 



Rewards

By contributing to our project, here are some of the rewards you can expect.



TimeLine



Our Team

We are Kalamodo, the creators of Kavenir. We believe that the eyes and hands are extremely important for each person, not just the communication needs , but also essential tools for perceiving the world .So we asked the question: how can we change the way of interaction, so that people 's eyes and hands can get rid of the screen temporary? Our answer: voice - the most simple way of interaction, can improve efficiency and reduce people's interaction time , to allow people have moretime to experience the precious things in the world. By Kavenir, we believe we can eliminate the various cumbersome and inconvenient of screen interaction, lead people into a more intelligent and comfortable society.


FAQ

Q:Can i rename my Kavenir Assistant?

A:Yes!Of course, you can name “her” what you want.

Q:What's the meaning of Kavenir?

A: 'K' is abbreviation for Kalamodo, 'avenir' is meaning of the future in French.

Q:How does Kavenir measure movement and body vitals?

A:Kavenir has a movement tracker(accelerometer sensor), it’s able to track steps, pace, cadence, rotation, gforces and other. Kavenir use blood monitors(PhotoPlethysmoGraphy PPG sensor) and Oximeter trackers to measures heart rate, blood oxygen level and so on.

Q:How do we know you’re the right team for this?

A:We have spent over 1 years designing this device, develop software ...

Q:What can i do if a service i need is not in the Kavenir?

A:There are many services we are working on it, your can check it at www.kalamodo.com/services , and if your services is not in working process, you can contact us at support@kalamodo.com , we will add it to our worksheet as quick as we can. 

Q:Are all services free?

A:Buildin services (voice chat, schedule management, and so on) are all free for you, and some is depend on service provider.

Q:What languages you currently support?

A:English, Chinese for now, and more to come.

Q:Will there be different size?

A:Yes.We have 3 kinds of shape size for different figure. 

Q:If i have further questions where can i contact Kalamodo?

A:You can reach us at support@kalamodo.com.



Legal Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

story:
-Water is Life -

Water is the most important resource that the human race needs to survive, besides air, but unfortunately many Countries and regions around the World are facing severe Water shortages. According to the United Nation, about 1.2 Billion people do not have access to safe drinking water and by 2025 the number will increase to about 1.8 Billion. About 3.6 Million people die yearly from consequences of water, sanitation and hygiene-related diseases, these mostly children under the age of 5. In the developing Countries, especially in the sub-Sahara Africa, over 40 Percent lack access to safe drinking water. Over 400 Million school days are lost yearly from water related illness. Millions of Women and Children spend several hours a day collecting water. Children and women are on these often arduous paths victims of sexual violence and abuse.

                          


The easy access to clean drinking water is the foundation for other forms of development; not only saves lives, it can change a whole life. There can be no economic development, no prosperity, no health and no formation without healthy water. Water is life.

Dakie e.V. has designed this project to help fight Global water crises using the latest technology of the world’s most innovative solar water pump. This solar pump helps people to access safe, clean drinking water even in the most remote areas of the world.

                               

This Dakie solar pump has been designed to ensure that

  • it incurs No extra running cost and uses renewable solar energy to easily pump water out of the water wells;

  • it requires No maintenance at all – all high quality maintenance-free-materials makes this possible;

  • it efficiently pump up water from a depth of about 100m/300ft even on cloudy days;

  • it is salt water resistance to avoid corrosion;

  • it can easily be assembled locally using local skills and parts.

    This project is a solution to everyone in the developing world who lacks access to safe, clean drinking water especially those in the Sahel region, extending from the west to the east coast of Africa and separating the vast Sahara desert from the sub-Saharan tropics, lies within a unique climatic zone, characterized by unstable weather conditions. For the past few decades the region has suffered from extreme drought, inflicting a severe water burden on the area and causing widespread hunger.

                    

    Due to increased drought and desertification, much of the area’s surface water have evaporated. The remaining scarce water resources must be shared between agriculture and human consumption.

                   

    Poor quality dirty drinking water collected from ponds causes serious water-borne diseases such as diarrhea, dysentery, typhoid and cholera that can be lethal in remote areas without access to modern medicine.

     

    So our people, we need your help because the situation in this region is more than what we read or see in the news. Apart from poverty which is the order of the day, access to clean water is one of the greatest problem confronting the people today. That is why we have created this project of drilling boreholes in every community and installing for them the Solar water pump Systems. Many of our current projects of providing potable water to the affected Communities are at a standstill and we cannot continue without your support. 

     

                            



    Where will the funds go?

  • Hardware (Drilling Rig / Solar water pump / equipments)

  • Shipping/Transport

  • Installations / Engineering

    So donate now and make a difference. As a donor or sponsor to this project, you are actively involved in the fight against poverty and global water shortage. Every cent counts. Make a direct impact by involving your friends online and together we will make a difference. Thankyou for donating to


                                 



                                             - The DAKIE Team -

_____________________________________________________________________________

Water is Life in the Press

story:
Mysore Yoga Accessories was created in 2009 by Mark Flint and Stephanie Yau, both long-term ashtanga yoga practitioners and teachers authorised by the Shri K. Pattabhi Jois Ashtanga Yoga Institute (KPJAYI) in Mysore, India.

We share a deep love of yoga and travel for three months a year teaching workshops in Asia and Europe.

In Mysore, we run a heritage guest house ‘Shanti Nilayam’ (peaceful house) catering to the numerous yogis whom make a pilgrimage in order to study at the city’s many yoga shals.

We married in Mysore and our son Oliver Suraj was born in this charming South Indian city in 2014.

Our aim is to create props and accessories that deepen and enhance your daily practice while also providing health benefits to non practitioners.

  

The original Mysore Yoga Back bender (above), launched in 2010, currently delights thousands of yogis and people with back problems around the world from Hong Kong to New York.

After the success with the original Mysore Backbender, we made a commitment to make it even stronger, easier to send, ecological and easier on the pocket.

  


INTRODUCING THE NEW - MYBB ECO2 BENEFITS:

  • increases flexibility and blood flow to the spine.

  • works as an aid to safely stretch the vertebrae, offering support to the spine when entering and exiting reclined back bends. This is great for both new and experienced yoga practitioners.

  • corrects bad posture and trains associated muscles.

  • gradually increases flexibility for those wishing to deepen their backbends.

  • provides significant relief to those who suffer from lower back and chest pain.

  • helps scoliosis sufferers safely stretch out their spinal column, which corrects the misalignment and prevents further deterioration.

  • Opens the chest cavity enabling expansion of the heart and lungs, helping respiratory problems.

  • a wonderful complement to weight-training regimes for bodybuilders or gym devotees, helping to open the chest, upper arms and shoulders to counterbalance upper-body strength training. 

  • a valuable tool for cyclists, helping to re-align the spine after long rides .

  • is of huge benefit to yogis and non-practitioners alike.

It only takes 20 minutes a day and you’ll say goodbye to back pain FOR GOOD!


                   


As seen above, the MYBB has a very unique design specifically molded to fit the curve of a spine. The steep arch targets the lower back while the smoother top curve helps open the upper back and chest areas. This is extremely beneficial for yogis working on the elusive “catch” in dropbacks. Stretching the arms over the head while resting on the back bender provides an even deeper opening for people with a tight chest and shoulders from sitting at computers and driving.

There are over a thousand satisfied people already using MYBB, Including Kino Macgregor (below)


                   



Senior Ashtanga yoga teacher, Kino Macgregor,"Loves MYBB!"

She’s not the only one loving the MYBB!:

Kamal Maliramani - Energiser yoga India:

“We have been using MYBB in our shala for several years, even our least flexible students love it because it allows them to practice backbends safely.”

Connie Yan - Yoga Teacher HK:

“I have used MYBB for several years to relax my back after long days teaching. I also recommend it to all my students.”

Ken The Rolfer - Boulder USA & Asia:

“Maximum effect, ease of use, and easy to travel with.”

Kishore Sujanani - HK:  

“I started using the MYBB after a martial arts training injury. I now make a habit of using it daily to prevent any further problems; my spine feels light and refreshed afterwards.”

Lien Davies - UK:

“I use my MYBB after cycling which helps straighten and relax my back after spending several hours hunched over the handlebars on long rides.”

Kelly Coborn- Yin, Restorative yoga teacher - Minneapolis USA

“I was only recently introduced to MYBB. I have always had a fear of backbending because I suffer from arthritis in my lumbar and cervical spine and scoliosis in my thoracic spine. MYBB gives me a completely supported,  passive approach to backbending with the full therapeutic benefits.”

If you’d like to see more, click on the link below to access our youtube channel which includes videos, testimonials, and full instructions for use!  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkf6Vp2DWbPWtIa7LKJr4hw

  

The new Mysore Yoga Back Bender ECO2 (above) is sturdier and has an eco-friendly design. We have kept the dimensions and contours of the beloved original MYBB but as you can see, the side pieces have been completely removed, making the MYBB ECO2 lighter, stronger, and more portable,  it weighs less than one 1 KG and we  reduced the price by 50%. We have also improved its design by relying on steam-press Indian technology to bend the plywood to the perfect curve. The MYBB ECO2 is crafted from sustainably-harvested Indian medicinal neem wood - a strong and aromatic wood revered for its medicinal properties. Only eco-grade glues and polishes are used during the manufacturing and hand-finishing process to create the ultimate sustainable, ecologically-friendly back bender.

The MYBB ECO2’s strong and sturdy design is perfect for use in yoga shalas and gyms. Attractive natural sustainable timber, individually hand-finished. Eco-friendly. Reduced shipping and retail costs, making it more affordable for future customers.

What We Need & What You Get in Return.

We need your help to pre-sell 150 units and get this improved Mysore Yoga Back Bender into the international market. This sleek designed product will benefit hundreds, if not thousands, of people with back and chest pain as well as all those inspiring yogis who are on the quest to go 'Deeper'.

The $15,000 campaign target will be distributed as per the graph below.


We are offering the MYBB ECO2 at a discounted rate and including international delivery to our esteemed backers. This is a saving on the standard MRP post campaign cost!

Shala owners, body workers, and practice groups can take advantage of our shala packs which contain either 6 or 12 pieces. The packs are great for distribution amongst family and friends!

If we do not reach our total funding goal, we are still committed to deliver the MYBB ECO 2 to our backers. We will invest our own capital for the mold and for an initial minimum production run. "We are committed to delivering this improved product!"

Impact of the new MYBB ECO2

This crowdfunding campaign is asking for your support to help us cover the costs of creating the initial mold and design and manufacture costs by pre selling 150 units. Pre-sales will help us bring this unique, much-needed therapeutic aid to the international market at a much lower cost than the original MYBB.

We know we can produce the product with ease! The cost of the initial mold and design makes the investment hard for us, but if we are able to get the support of the community by pre selling 150 units, we can easily overcome any financial obstacle!

We have overcome many problems along our journey with the earlier, more complex Mysore Yoga Back Bender. We are fully equipped to handle any problem which could arise with this project, as our manufacturing team have proved many times over the last 6 years!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in a position to make a pledge, you can still help us raise our goal by sharing our Indiegogo campaign amongst your friends, family and broader network. Without your help we are nothing! Join us!

Same goes for our backers! "Make Some Noise" and celebrate that you have helped our campaign by notifying all your friends through social media platforms such as FB, Twitter, Instagram, tumblr etc.

Around 4% of the world population suffers from back pain, 240 million people.

According to the International Yoga Federation, A recent study indicated that 300 million people worldwide now practice yoga.

Thousands of people can benefit from using MYBB ECO2 but we need your help and support to reach them!
story_txt:
Mysore Yoga Accessories was created in 2009 by Mark Flint and Stephanie Yau, both long-term ashtanga yoga practitioners and teachers authorised by the Shri K. Pattabhi Jois Ashtanga Yoga Institute (KPJAYI) in Mysore, India. 
We share a deep love of yoga and travel for three months a year teaching workshops in Asia and Europe.
In Mysore, we run a heritage guest house ‘Shanti Nilayam’ (peaceful house) catering to the numerous yogis whom make a pilgrimage in order to study at the city’s many yoga shals.
We married in Mysore and our son Oliver Suraj was born in this charming South Indian city in 2014.
Our aim is to create props and accessories that deepen and enhance your daily practice while also providing health benefits to non practitioners.  
The original Mysore Yoga Back bender (above), launched in 2010, currently delights thousands of yogis and people with back problems around the world from Hong Kong to New York.After the success with the original Mysore Backbender, we made a commitment to make it even stronger, easier to send, ecological and easier on the pocket.  
INTRODUCING THE NEW - MYBB ECO2 BENEFITS:

increases flexibility and blood flow to the spine.
works as an aid to safely stretch the vertebrae, offering support to the spine when entering and exiting reclined back bends. This is great for both new and experienced yoga practitioners.
corrects bad posture and trains associated muscles.
gradually increases flexibility for those wishing to deepen their backbends.
provides significant relief to those who suffer from lower back and chest pain. 

helps scoliosis sufferers safely stretch out their spinal column, which corrects the misalignment and prevents further deterioration.
Opens the chest cavity enabling expansion of the heart and lungs, helping respiratory problems.
a wonderful complement to weight-training regimes for bodybuilders or gym devotees, helping to open the chest, upper arms and shoulders to counterbalance upper-body strength training. 
a valuable tool for cyclists, helping to re-align the spine after long rides .
is of huge benefit to yogis and non-practitioners alike.

It only takes 20 minutes a day and you’ll say goodbye to back pain FOR GOOD!                   
As seen above, the MYBB has a very unique design specifically molded to fit the curve of a spine. The steep arch targets the lower back while the smoother top curve helps open the upper back and chest areas. This is extremely beneficial for yogis working on the elusive “catch” in dropbacks. Stretching the arms over the head while resting on the back bender provides an even deeper opening for people with a tight chest and shoulders from sitting at computers and driving.
There are over a thousand satisfied people already using MYBB, Including Kino Macgregor (below)                   
Senior Ashtanga yoga teacher, Kino Macgregor,"Loves MYBB!"She’s not the only one loving the MYBB!:
Kamal Maliramani - Energiser yoga India:
“We have been using MYBB in our shala for several years, even our least flexible students love it because it allows them to practice backbends safely.”
Connie Yan - Yoga Teacher HK:
“I have used MYBB for several years to relax my back after long days teaching. I also recommend it to all my students.”
Ken The Rolfer - Boulder USA & Asia:
“Maximum effect, ease of use, and easy to travel with.”
Kishore Sujanani - HK:  
“I started using the MYBB after a martial arts training injury. I now make a habit of using it daily to prevent any further problems; my spine feels light and refreshed afterwards.”
Lien Davies - UK:
“I use my MYBB after cycling which helps straighten and relax my back after spending several hours hunched over the handlebars on long rides.”
Kelly Coborn- Yin, Restorative yoga teacher - Minneapolis USA
“I was only recently introduced to MYBB. I have always had a fear of backbending because I suffer from arthritis in my lumbar and cervical spine and scoliosis in my thoracic spine. MYBB gives me a completely supported,  passive approach to backbending with the full therapeutic benefits.”If you’d like to see more, click on the link below to access our youtube channel which includes videos, testimonials, and full instructions for use!  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkf6Vp2DWbPWtIa7LKJr4hw  The new Mysore Yoga Back Bender ECO2 (above) is sturdier and has an eco-friendly design. We have also improved its design by relying on steam-press Indian technology to bend the plywood to the perfect curve. The MYBB ECO2 is crafted from sustainably-harvested Indian medicinal neem wood - a strong and aromatic wood revered for its medicinal properties. Only eco-grade glues and polishes are used during the manufacturing and hand-finishing process to create the ultimate sustainable, ecologically-friendly back bender.The MYBB ECO2’s strong and sturdy design is perfect for use in yoga shalas and gyms.
