story:
What is the FlyFit Lifestyle?

FlyFit Lifestyle is a health & wellness concept visualized by Curtis & Alexis Washington, husband and wife entrepreneurs residing in Denver, CO. 

We are fitness professionals looking to step outside of traditional "training" methods and bring our unique brand of Lifestyle Coaching to the world.  While working in the fitness industry for 3 years as a personal trainer in a large corporate gym setting, I (Curtis) began to notice that many of my clients would only take their fitness seriously within that hour of face time, only to go back to their not-so-healthy habits when they leave.  This causes any results they may have earned in the gym to be negated.  The psychological toll that hindered progress takes on someone can even cause them to throw in the towel on their fitness.

As a Health Coach, Alexis deals with the mental aspects of wellness with her clients, as well as educating them on proper nutrition from a holistic approach.  While her clients take care of themselves and their nutrition, we both noticed their level of physical fitness to be minimal. Analyzing the struggles we have been facing with our clients, we noticed that our programs fit together like puzzle pieces.  From here, we created the FlyFit Fitness Trifecta:

We have believe that fitness is achieved beyond the gym... it even goes beyond the kitchen... in fact, fitness BEGINS mentally with a positive, goal-oriented mindset, encompasses physical training and proper nutrition, and fully manifests itself through a higher quality of life; LIFESTYLE FITNESS!

Each program includes:

  • Bi-Weekly Lifestyle Assessment & Goal Setting Sessions
  • Weekly Physical Activity Program & Log Based on Individual Goals
  • Weekly Meal Plan & Log Based on Individual Goals
  • Access to Curtis & Alexis for the Duration of your Program to Address any Questions or concerns
  • Motivation & Accountability

Through our free community fitness events and webinars, we have been able to reach many people who love what we are doing.  We want to expand by doing online fitness events (boot camps and classes via webcam), larger webinars and classes, and online coaching, making Lifestyle Fitness convenient and accessible to people across the world. We believe in this concept so much and want to dedicate our lives to helping individuals worldwide experience their greatest mental, physical, and spiritual potential.

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to make our dream of changing lives through Lifestyle Fitness a reality, we need help.  As you may know, being an entrepreneur can involve a lot of out-of-pocket funding, and we have put a great deal of our personal finances into this machine.  For us to take this to the next level, we are asking for $5000 to:

  • cover remaining business expenses
  • website development and online program implementation
  • purchase high-quality video production equipment and software
  • expand advertising over multiple formats

We don't just want you to invest in FlyFit Lifestyle because it sounds like a good idea.  We want you to be able to experience first-hand what it is like to work with a Lifestyle Coach!  Investing in FlyFit Lifestyle will not only help us bring our dream to life, but it will also give YOU the opportunity to be one of the first to actually work with a FlyFit Lifestyle Coach.  We setup the investment process so that you have the opportunity to be a part of something new and exciting, without paying the full price!

$120 - 1 Week of Lifestyle Coaching
$400 - 1 Month of Lifestyle Coaching
$2200 - 6 Months of Lifestyle Coaching
$5000 - 1 Year of Lifestyle Coaching w/grandfathered rate
(to be delivered at the end of campaigned)

Should we not reach our entire goal, we will remain dedicated to FlyFit Lifestyle Coaching.  The funds we do receive will go directly into the business, covering the aforementioned elements in that order.  It is our hope that we can meet or exceed our goal so that we can continue our mission.

 

The Impact

Alexis and I believe that we can make a positive impact on the world by helping individuals realize their highest quality of life.  We are so passionate about this because we have seen the changes in ourselves.  Mind, Body, and Soul Conditioning is a daily process.  We have the background, education, and drive to educate our clients and keep them motivated to make daily overall healthy life choices, but the real beauty comes with the development of self-reliance.  As we coach our clients, they become equipped with the tools necessary to sustain these positive lifestyle changes on their own, spreading their positive outlook to the people around them.

You can help by investing in FlyFit Lifestyle Coaching.

Alexis and I want to prove that with a little perseverance and A LOT of hard work, you can realize your dreams.  We believe that there are people in this world that are sincerely interested in your success, and we hope that whoever reads this is that type of individual. 

We have dedicated a great deal of time and resources helping our community become fit with our free weekly fitness events, and we would love nothing more than to spread this message to the world.  With your help, we can develop the online platform to achieve this goal!

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge we have faced so far is funding.  We have had to personally finance every aspect of this business, even the trial and error.  This has caused us to go into a bit of debt.  A huge reason we are seeking help through IndieGoGo is to avoid sinking further into debt.  With a little help, we truly believe we can get past the minor obstacles and succeed.

In terms of risk, there are a few things we have definitely taken into consideration.  In implementing online programs, there will be a few kinks to work out in the early stages.  Luckily, I have a few colleagues that know a great deal about online programs and can guide us once we have the necessary pieces in place.

It is through perseverance and steadfast dedication to the success of this product that we will be able to work though any and all obstacles on our quest to bring FlyFit Lifestyle to life.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute monetarily to our campaign, you can still help!

The best thing you can do to help us is share our message!  Please share this campaign with anyone and everyone you know.  The more eyes we can get on this, the better!  There are tools within IndieGoGo that will help you spread our campaign and get the word out.

We absolutely hope this is the beginning of something spectacular.  With your help, we can turn a simple idea into something MASSIVE that is capable of helping people around the world.

Thank you SO MUCH for your contribution.  Our appreciation is beyond measure.

Curtis & Alexis Washington
FlyFit Lifestyle
www.flyfitlifestyle.com

story:
The story

In Moldova, kids consume on average only two thirds of the minimum recommended quantity of fresh fruits, compared to Romania and other countries in the region, and about 70% of the WHO recommended quantity.  The deficit in the school meals has a negative effect on children’s health with no actions taken during the last two decades. Another factor of low consumption is that kids tend to avoid consuming big, whole fruits as they are more difficult and messier to eat.

Who are we?

Our team consists of a group of idealistic enthusiasts that aim to change gradually the eating habits of the young generation of an entire country.

What can we do about it?

We aim to increase the consumption of fruits and vegetables among children of kindergarten and school age, thus to educate health enhancing eating habits from an early age.

How?

We plan to tackle this issue by involving SMEs to deliver fresh fruit snacks on a regular basis to public schools and kindergartens.

 

Backed by technological ideas from the SMEs and a thorough analysis of children's preferences, we plan to deliver a new product made of fresh fruits that would be highly attractive to kids. We believe that apples should be as popular as potato chips, so we came up with the idea to create an attractive snack box with sliced apples.

We can’t do it without your help !

Join us and donate as much as you can! 

For just 1 $, you can provide 7 kids with a fresh fruit snacks!

For just 14 $, you can cover the yearly consumption of fruit snacks for a kid (twice a week). As children will develop healthy eating habits, they will become the ambassadors of fruit consumption and create a snowball effect that will impact positively their surrounding. With the collected money, children will be able to form agro school cooperatives with informal education activities connected to this cause ( e.g. planting jointly apple trees in orchards), being thus introduced to the apple agricultural cycle and motivated to interact with a larger range of apple products (gems,juices,etc)

You can also donate directly to the account:

INTERMEDIARY BANK : THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON., NEW YORK, USA

SWIFT CODE: IRVTUS3N

BENEFICIARY’S BANK:  BC “EXIMBANK- Gruppo Veneto Banca” SA

Chisinau, Moldova

SWIFT CODE: EXMM MD 22

IBAN: MD90EX2000002251440007US

 

BENEFICIARY’S NAME: U.N.D.P.MOLDOVA

What if we collect more / less funds?

We believe a successful campaign will allow us to upscale the project to cover a higher number of schools. In case we do not collect the necessary amount, ALL the money will still go to provide snacks to as many kids as we can afford :(

What do you get for supporting us?

Since this is a socially impactful and health oriented campaign, you will receive very good karma in return for your generosity. In addition to this unbeatable reward, we are offering some interesting perks:

Q: When will I receive my perk?

A: The digital perks (PDF postcard, photo of your tree being planted, photo of the donation of 1 kg of apples) will be sent to you within one month. The physical perks (backpack, apron, t-shirt) will be shipped to you within 2-3 months after the donation.  If there are any delays or complications in perk shipment, we’ll send out an update to let you know. add conditions of shipping

 

Our yummy perks

             

           

           

                                          

 

And if you're broke?

If you cannot provide a monetary contribution but still want to support the campaign, we would be very grateful if you could share and spread the word about this campaign. 

 

More about us

 
This campaign is launched within the framework of the UNDP AltFinance Lab and Crowdfunding Academy and is supported by the Ministry of Finance of the Republic of Slovakia .

story:
Speedball is a FUN cardio & core challenge using a small, handheld weighted ball. Speedball offers progressions and regressions to cater to a broad range of fitness levels while keeping it safe and SMART! You only need a ball and the space to take one large step in each direction so it's PERFECT for an at-home workout! Help us by contributing or by selecting your "perk" and you'll be one of the first in the world to own the revolutionary weight shifting SpeedBALL, apparel and have access to our online SpeedBALL workouts!


FOR FITNESS INSTRUCTORS: The official Speedball Online Instructor Certification Package is available for pre-order! Select the "Instructor Trainer Package" perk to reserve yours today! 

Note: Instructors who received a discount certificate while attending a conference, or wish to receive multiple packages for a group rate, please see the "About the Speedball Online Instructor Certification Package" instructions below.

About Speedball Fitness: Speedball Fitness is a global brand with classes at Equinox in New York City and in various facilities throughout Europe. The method was developed by Steve Feinberg in an effort to create a group fitness class that combined cardio and muscular endurance work. Steve has since trained instructors in 8 countries! The company is currently developing an online educational system, the revolutionary SpeedBALL, a trendy line of apparel, and a digital platform where consumers can access Speedball workouts anywhere anytime.

The Workouts: 

  • The Fundamental Flow builds the 11 Speedball base techniques into a sequence that moves your body in every direction, burns calories and prepares you for more advanced Speedball workouts.
  • MetaBlast is an intense challenge where we vary tempo to increase intensity without adding impact! 
  • Choreography links base techniques together in different ways for fun new challenges.
  • Speedball Core includes standing & floor exercises using the ball and body weight for resistance.

The SpeedBALL will be developed in 2lb, 3.5lb, and 5lb weights of the SAME size - unlike traditional medicine balls which are larger size in heavier weights. The balls will have a non-slip grip so they won't fly out of your sweaty hands during the workout. To increase the challenge, the weighted material inside the ball will shift as you move it!

About the Speedball Online Instructor Certification Package: By supporting us now and selecting the "INSTRUCTOR TRAINING PACKAGE" perk you will save $ and become one of the first instructors in the world to become an instructor entirely online for the fast growing Speedball fitness program. This comprehensive package includes: 

  • Performance, Cueing, Common Mistakes for each Base Technique
  • Flexible Formula for Class Structure with MetaBlast, Call & Response, Choreography
  • Resources Library with Supplemental Study Materials
  • Official Speedball instructor certificate
  • 2 lb revolutionary weight shifting SpeedBALL
  • Speedball branded tee or tank
  • Official Speedball Power Music playlist
  • ACE/ACSM CEUs
  • Ongoing marketing support (including website and social media marketing tools, and customizable print marketing material templates)

(NOTE: If you received a discount code while attending a conference, please: 1) Click on the pink "Contact" button above. 2) Send us a message with your name, email address, shipping address, phone # and your Discount Code. 3) Go to the "Your Contribution" box (above the "Select A Perk" section) and type in "$195" and hit the "Contribute Now" button. 4) Complete your payment by either credit card or PayPal. 5) We'll  email you a confirmation of your Speedball Online Instructor Certification Package perk.)

About Steve Feinberg: Steve Feinberg created the Speedball class format and developed the instructor training program. With 18 years of industry experience, Steve is a seasoned group fitness instructor and strength and conditioning coach. He is also an experienced performer and choreographer; notable credits include Gilad Jankowitz's Lord of the Abs Series, the Cardio Karate transformational workout with JB Berns, the Power Kick series for PowerHitNation, and Ilaria Montagnani's Millennium series workouts. Steve is also a master instructor for Kettlebell Concepts, for which he created the group fitness educational program. Steve's specialties include functional athletic movement, martial arts, boxing, kettlebells, ViPR, cycling, and para-natal fitness.

Now, through this IndieGoGo campaign, you can be one of the first people in the world to experience the methodology with our revolutionary equipment!
story_txt:
Speedball is a FUN cardio & core challenge using a small, handheld weighted ball. Speedball offers progressions and regressions to cater to a broad range of fitness levels while keeping it safe and SMART! You only need a ball and the space to take one large step in each direction so it's PERFECT for an at-home workout! Help us by contributing or by selecting your "perk" and you'll be one of the first in the world to own the revolutionary weight shifting SpeedBALL, apparel and have access to our online SpeedBALL workouts!


FOR FITNESS INSTRUCTORS: The official Speedball Online Instructor Certification Package is available for pre-order! Select the "Instructor Trainer Package" perk to reserve yours today! Note: Instructors who received a discount certificate while attending a conference, or wish to receive multiple packages for a group rate, please see the "About the Speedball Online Instructor Certification Package" instructions below.

story:
[Note: ALL contributions are processed, and funding is NOT dependent upon reaching the "goal."]


I'm John Clifton, the author of Your Fourth Choice. Two of my books were groundbreaking Amazon best sellers, and I became a seasoned guest, talking about my books on radio and television. I never expected that one day I would write a book about cancer. But when I discovered something remarkable about treating this dreaded disease, that all changed. . . .

   Two years ago, my wife Josée was diagnosed with Stage Four lung cancer. Chemotherapy would help, the doctors told us, but nothing more could be done. They described her case as terminal.

    After I got over the initial shock, I got angry. I shouted: “Hell, no!” Josée refused to accept this terrifying verdict, and so did I. We began researching our options. I found studies of alternative cancer treatments and spent months plowing through them, hundreds of pages at a time.

It was a “eureka” moment.

   What was I looking for? Not theories or speculation, but an ap­proach with genuine science behind it. A treatment that had been tested and proven to work against cancer. Weeks went by, without success. My quest seemed fruitless. Some days, I was exhausted. But I persisted. I wouldn’t give up.

   And then, almost by accident, I discovered the answer. One morn­ing, I booted up my computer and went to Facebook. I saw a post about something called “paw paw.” Huh? The name sounded silly and unseri­ous. I was tempted to skip over it. But my curiosity was aroused . . . .

A treatment that really works.

   What is paw paw? I learned that it’s a tree, native to the eastern half of the United States.

   Its anti-cancer properties have been studied for 30 years. Hard evi­dence exists proving its amazing ca­pabilities. My thorough research de­termined that it works for all types of cancer.

   But the news got even better. While the total cost of treatment for an average cancer case can easily run over $100,000, a paw paw supple­ment, available over the counter, costs about $45 per month. That’s not a typo!

   Applying the information I had read, Josée began a regimen of paw paw, along with conventional treat­ments. But the chemo and radiation soon became so intolerably toxic that her doctors advised us to stop both. She contin­ued taking paw paw, experiencing no side effects whatsoever.

   Nine months later, she was can­cer-free.

How Paw Paw Attacks Cancer

   Josée’s doctors were amazed. Pre­viously, whenever we had brought up the subject of natural or alternative remedies, they had been either hostile or clueless.

   I had an inspiration. I thought: “If this little-known treatment could help my wife so dramatically, why not other peo­ple?” So I decided to write a book that would explain—simply, thor­oughly, accurately—everything they need to know. I felt strongly that this paw paw  should be known by every cancer patient. I made the book readable and non-technical—so everyone would understand it.

   I did exhaustive research on paw paw. The more I discovered, the more I was convinced that it was highly overlooked and needed to be much more visible--to say the least! I discovered that paw paw kills cancer cells in a unique way. Whereas chemotherapy drugs basically poison cells (both cancerous and normal), paw paw works on the cells' metabolism--it deprives cells of their ability to create the energy they need to live and replicate. Paw paw actually kills the drug resistant cells that chemo leaves behind.

   Here's an illustration of the process:

Multiple Drug Resistant (MDR) cancer cells are not affected by chemotherapy (which is basically poison), and can remain after treatment. Then they multiply, causing cancer to return with a vengeance. However, drug resistant cells are not resistant to paw paw, which can weaken or kill them.

   The manuscript of this important book has been vetted by medical doctors and experts in natural healing, and is fully documented with references to rele­vant studies. I call the book Your Fourth Choice: Killing Cancer Cells with Paw Paw - that Little Known Treatment that Grows on Trees.



Paw paw fruit on the tree. Surprisingly, the most powerful paw paw extract is made from the TWIGS, not the fruit.

Why Hadn't Anybody Told Us
About This?

   The book is basically written now, but of course that's just the beginning. It needs to be published and promoted. My publishing company, Foley Square Books, can get the book produced, but that would be of little effect unless we can mount a significant promotional campaign. We have prepared a budget, allowing for printing, editing, indexing, distribution, etc. But the biggest item on the list is advertising and promotion.


The Need to Spread the Word

   We're a small publishing company, but this is a big effort. We are thinking national TV and radio interviews, magazines, newspapers, book signings, the works.

   It costs nothing for an author to do a radio or TV interview. What costs is landing those interviews. This involves mailings, ads, press releases, printing hundreds of copies for reviewers and media people.                                

  

Here's Your Chance to Help!

   Your pledge, large or small, will help. This book can save lives. You can be part
of this important crusade. We need you to simply pledge what you can.

    If you check out the PERKS above, you'll see that you can get a signed copy of the book (shipped!) for a $25 pledge. And you'll get it even before it's available to the general public!  The minute this fundraising campaign is over, we'll start shipping books to contributors to this Indiegogo effort!

  If you would rather send books to verified cancer patients at no cost to them, you can choose one of the perks headed "You Get ABSOLUTELY NOTHING!" And we thank you for your selfless generosity!

   And check out the other PERKS as well—ranging from the e-book copy to lunch with the author to a custom designed poster.

   But your greatest reward will be that you have helped many cancer victims—maybe yourself.

Here is a sample of the book's contents and the opening pages, including the Preface, Josée's story, and the Table of Contents:

Link

Your Fourth Choice (Website of the book)

____________________________________________________________________________


                  DISCLAIMER

Please know that no claim is being made here about treating or curing any disease. This book relates the experience of the author only, and is presented solely for informational purposes. The author has no connection whatsoever to any entity that produces or sells health related products or services. Readers are advised to consult qualified medical professionals for diagnosing and treating any disease.
_________________________________________________________________

story:
who is holisticole?


That would be me! hello, my name is nicole and I am a holistic nutritionist + entrepreneur. 


holistic + nicole = holisticole.. finding my name was somewhat easy, getting my feet off the ground is where you come in. 

     

but wait...

Before I go any further, we must first go through a quick holistic nutrition 101.

 

  • holistic nutritionists are trained professionals who use "alternative " or "natural " practices to help clients reach optimal health and achieve personal goals.
     
  •  the practice includes using whole fresh foods (from "earth to table"), nutritional supplements (like vitamins, minerals and herbs), as well as complementary holistic lifestyle recommendations, such as eliminating toxic products from the home, and learning about things like food combining and the true power of your thoughts.
     
  • a holistic nutritionist is someone you may find online though a recipe blogging site, you may be referred to one from your naturopathic doctor, or you may just stumble upon one (such as now).
     
here's what makes holistic nutrition different
      1. we don't do "diets" - we do lifestyle changes for lasting results. diets will give you the quick results you want, but the results do not last. with holistic nutrition the ideal is for you to both reach + maintain your goals!
         
      2. we educate you on correcting nutritional deficiencies. deficiencies in vitamins and minerals can lead to unpleasant symptoms that may cause you to seek medical help. 
         
      3. we take everything into consideration. we even look at emotions being linked with overall health. (stress and negative thinking patterns are a killer).
       
       

      more on holisticole

      what I, nicole, love most about holistic nutrition, was my journey to finding it. 
       
      we find and look into alternative medicine when we are down on our luck with getting help and answers on what is happening inside our body. alternative medicine comes into our lives when we need it most. I believe holistic nutrition is found by word-of-mouth or self-discovery.
       
      when we are finally fed up of symptoms like:
      • being constantly tired 
      • always feeling bloated
      • having fertility issues or menstrual problems
      • suffering from environmental allergies or food sensitivities
      • experiencing dizzy spells
      • losing concentration + focus
      • developing unexplained acne + skin problems
      • not sleeping well + insomnia
      you may be searching for a second opinion or another insight on what's going on. & i can tell you now that all of these conditions listed above are in one way or more linked to what we EAT, it would amaze you of what can be reversed by proper nutrition and lifestyle changes. That's what I am here to help with.
       
      those who become a holistic nutritionist, have likely chosen this career path because they have had success healing themselves or family members, and now want to help others to feel their very best. (this is industry is rapidly growing).
       
      I hope you see the passion and energy I bring into the work that I do. If you are still reading along, this is what I want to do.
       
      what holisticole is in search of + what you get

       

      my goal is to raise $5000 to get my feet on the ground and cover the cost of starting up and operating a successful business in this industry. I need to cover the costs for web design, start up costs, advertisement (google ads), graphic design & renting spaces for workshops! a strong online presence is extremely essential and important.

       

      perks for you!                

      check out the perk section!

      you can receive my latest recipe ebook, shopping guides, services and more for your contribution. but more importantly, you can constantly be following my journey online via website and social media to stay inspired. you will be supporting a young entrepreneur who wants nothing more than to make a positive impact on the world.

      • I dream big and my '$$' goal is BIG! If I do not raise what I have visioned I will still use all of the earnings to exactly what I have listed above. Every dollar makes a difference and every dollar will be spent wisely. 

       

      the impact

      the efforts of one person making a healthy lifestyle change causes a rippling effect for all those around them. All in all, we all have the same wish, we all wish to be healthy and happy. If I can inspire just one person to make lifestyle changes then this one person will most definitely talk to someone else (family or friend), then this has the potential to inspire another to make a change, the health kick ripple is already moving! 

      my goal is to bring awareness, that there is another path that you can take, one that supports your body instead of breaking it down more.


      other ways you can help

      for those who can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

      • follow me on facebook, twitter, instagram & pinterest @holisticole
      • keep up to date with my website www.holisticole.com
      • watch documentaries on our food system: Food Matters, Fat Sick and Nearly Dead, GMO OMG, etc.

other ways you can help
for those who can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

follow me on facebook, twitter, instagram & pinterest @holisticole
keep up to date with my website www.holisticole.com

story: My journey began a year and a half ago.. I was tired of working and going to school. Soccer has always been apart of my life, so I started training everyday, going to the gym, getting my fitness up, so,I went to a Pro European tryout in Cali. I performed well, and was invited to a Pro Development Tour in Turkey that I recently just got back from. Based on my outstanding performance in Turkey, I was invited to a 2 month long Residential Program in Sweden this June training and competing with and against top level Pro teams all over Europe. Funds are a major factor in me pursuing this once in a lifetime opportunity, the cost will be just over $11K, not including the flights... I will be working 3 jobs trying to raise as much as I can. But i am going to need YOUR help, in any way, and as much as you are willing to donate. I am not the kind of person to ask for a handout, but in this case.. I am begging anyone and everyone to lend a hand. Thanks for tuning in, I will keep this page updated as the time grows closer.

story:
Ninety-three percent of sex trafficking victims in Canada are Canadian girls between the ages of 12 - 21, with the average age being 13. 

Once forced into trafficking, they are made to have sex with up to 15 men a day in an ongoing cycle of threats and abuse. For many of these girls, a way out seems impossible. 

But a way out is possible, and you can help.

I am Timea, founder of Timea's Cause. Over the past five years, my organization has provided support to 300 victims of trafficking. We know this is just the beginning, but for each and every girl we have been able to help, the results are life changing. As a survivor of sex trafficking, I know how desperately these girls need our help – and how powerful an impact we can have by helping even one girl. 

Prevention is an important part of the solution. Since 2009, we have trained over 10,000 law enforcement and social service providers in 55 cities across Canada and the US. This training is vital to in ensuring frontline workers are equipped to identify and properly support victims of trafficking - we can’t do it without your support.

What we've done so far

Why we need your help

To continue our mission, we need to raise $50,000. This will allow us to rally awareness and provide 1,250 law enforcement and social service providers with the training they need to help victims in crisis. With this amount, we will also be able to provide direct support to 5 - 10 victims of sex trafficking.

All money raised beyond this amount will go to Walk With Me Canada Victim Services, our sister organization that provides direct victim support and helps survivors of sex trafficking transition to the the lives they led before their nightmare started.

This is your opportunity to help combat one of the most devastating crimes happening in Canada today. We hope you join us.

Timea's story

Timea Nagy was born in Hungary and came to Canada with the promise of employment as a nanny or housekeeper. Once here, she was forced into sex work and endured the horror that is the life of a human trafficking victim firsthand before making her miraculous escape. She has since devoted her life to rescuing other victims through training law enforcement across Canada.

In 2012, Timea's was awarded the Prime Minister's Volunteer Award for her work to fight trafficking in Canada.

In this video, Timea shares her knowledge on the realities of trafficking here in Canada.


Other ways you can help

Your donation will directly support our effort to eradicate sex trafficking in Canada. You can also help get the word out by sharing this page with your friends and family. Find out more about sex trafficking and our work by visiting Timea's website.
story_txt:
Ninety-three percent of sex trafficking victims in Canada are Canadian girls between the ages of 12 - 21, with the average age being 13. 
Once forced into trafficking, they are made to have sex with up to 15 men a day in an ongoing cycle of threats and abuse. For many of these girls, a way out seems impossible. 
But a way out is possible, and you can help.
I am Timea, founder of Timea's Cause. Over the past five years, my organization has provided support to 300 victims of trafficking. We know this is just the beginning, but for each and every girl we have been able to help, the results are life changing. This training is vital to in ensuring frontline workers are equipped to identify and properly support victims of trafficking - we can’t do it without your support.

We hope you join us.

story:
Friday 13 June became a black day for many people. Our fabulous friend Fabo got a horrible accident in Italy. 

Since he was teenager he moved to Ibiza for a long period of studies  while he started to work  in parties staff of the island attending the most beautiful dance floors of the world.
Maybe because of the magical influence of the island, maybe by vocation, immediately he realized that his place was behind the consolle! 
It 'so' that in a moment, thanking the past music studies , his musicality and  the numerous acquaintances of DJ sets,  in a short time he started to play his music in the best  consolle of some italian cities.
But to let his dream become true, he moved with his girlfriend in Goa...where he started his real career! After so much time his dream finally became reality!!! One of the best Dj in Goa! So definitely he really falled in love with India and they decide to set their life there!


His life was divided between Italy, producing music with emerging italiansDJs  and Goa parties. 


Suddenly his dream was interrupted because of a car accident in Italy last May: the doctors did not give him any chance to get back on his feet and few possibilities to come back to see...mostly no any sperimental stemcells treatment allowed in Italy in this moment.

All people shocked and incredulous around him! Me, Valeria, his girlfriend and his family ,we all started to look for any chance he could get all around the world to let him come back to his life and finally we found in our India the stemcells treatment, the only thing wich can help him at least to move his arms first of all. I've met the doctor and they explained me all. So our decision his to bring him there to give him kind of hope. The cost of treatment is 10.000 dollars and his family cant get all money because only Mum is there.  

The project is to bring him in India next September and if he will have any improvement to repeat the treatment after 5 months because doctors says is better to repeat it 4/5 times to get more and more improvement!  

So I am asking to all of you to help me and his family to bring him back to his dream and to his life in any how, also sharing this campaign!

He's a 37 years man, who loves to live and share his energy with all people from wich is surrounded and he wants to come back to share his full power and energy with all of you!  

thank you to all  

his girlfriend Valeria

story:
Mainly unknown in the west, Gujarat riots of 2002 ( a three-day period of inter-communal violence between Hindus and Muslims, followed by mass killings against the minority Muslim population during three months) have dispaced around 250,000 people from their homes. Many years later, thousands of families are still living in relief colonies (16,000 in 2012, http://www.dnaindia.com/india/report-muslims-ar...). They cannot return to the villages where they had homes, farms or shops. They are struggling to survive in areas often lacking even basic amenities, including portable water and daily face serious health issues due to limited access to potable water.

I am raising funds to bring as many MVP filters as possible, each of which costing 50 USD would provide 100 people with potable water for 5 years http://store.wavesforwater.org/products/mvp-filter


Please, contribute

More info on the Gujarat riots can be read in the book "The three mistakes of my life"

story:
Hey, guys. I am Nikola, 25 y.o. , from Bulgaria, and my health has been deteriorating for the past 3 years. I am in serious need of help. It took me about 18 months to figure out what exactly is wrong with my body and then an additional 5 months to understand how to heal it most effectively. This is where I am at right now.

              However, since our family’s budget is tight due to the economic crisis, I cannot buy all or even most of the powerful supplements that I need in order to recover from my terrible health problems. The treatment costs are becoming a bigger and bigger burden on my family and I am constantly being put under pressure to get better and start working again. So that’s why I need some help to be able to do the full protocol rather than just half of it, which won’t get me anywhere.

                                            My health story (short version) :

              All throughout 2012 I struggled with Candida overgrowth in my upper respiratory tract. I managed to get rid of it within a year, but it had already taken its toll on my body. All functions of my body deteriorated and for the last 2 years I have been struggling with the following conditions:

Pituitary tumor

Adrenal insufficiency

Fibromyalgia

Unhealthy parasympathetic dominance (exhausted nervous system)

Chronic Fatigue Syndrome

Hypothyroidism

Persistent thymus gland

Constant tension headache

                  On top of all this, my breathing is very difficult due to the wasting of my muscles throughout my body, especially the breathing muscles.

                   For the last 6 months I have been on a strict diet and all I need to add now are the right supplements. I have been trying a few different supplements and protocols the last few months and finally came up with the protocol I describe here, based on thousands of hours of research and consultations with top doctors and nutritionists. I already tried some of these supplements in small quantities (due to tight budget) just to make sure they work as they should and the results were significantly positive. Now I need to get a hold of all the supplements in the correct dosage to heal my body.

Here is the list of the supplements, which are part of my healing protocol that should bring my body back to perfect health:


Glucosamine-Sulfate – 240 pills/month = $15

http://www.amazon.com/Doctors-Best-Glucosamine-Capsules-180-Count/dp/B000I4C0J2/ref=sr_1_2?s=hpc&ie=UTF8&qid=1426088691&sr=1-2&keywords=best+glucosamine

Ultimate Selenium – 2 bottles/month = $48

http://www.amazon.com/ULTIMATE-SELENIUM-90-CAPSULES-Pack/dp/B006QC2E8C/ref=sr_1_1?s=hpc&ie=UTF8&qid=1426091164&sr=1-1&keywords=ultimate+selenium+youngevity

Natrol Omega-3-6-9 Complex  -  300 pills/month = $32

http://www.amazon.com/Natrol-Omega-3-6-9-Complex-Borage-Softgels/dp/B001G7QW26/ref=sr_1_13?s=hpc&ie=UTF8&qid=1426094041&sr=1-13&keywords=omega+3+6+9


Beyond Tangy Tangerine 2.0(1 lb) – 1 can/month = $43

http://www.amazon.com/Beyond-Tangerine-Citrus-Infusion-Canister/dp/B00IB6NJUS/ref=pd_sbs_hpc_3?ie=UTF8&refRID=1W5TY5QG3AVTP2QTYD3E

Beyond Osteo FX – 1/2 can/month = $21

http://www.amazon.com/BEYOND-Osteo-Fx-POWDER-Canister/dp/B00DVNLRSM/ref=sr_1_1?s=hpc&ie=UTF8&qid=1426151612&sr=1-1&keywords=youngevity+osteo

Great Lakes Gelatin – half a can/month = $11

http://www.amazon.com/Great-Lakes-Collagen-Hydrolysate-Unflavored/dp/B005KG7EDU/ref=sr_1_1?s=hpc&ie=UTF8&qid=1426164146&sr=1-1&keywords=great+lakes+gelatin -

Intracal – 60 pills/month = $20

http://www.globalhealingcenter.com/supplements/intracal.html

Mega Hydrate - 1 bottle/month = $53

http://www.vitaminrocket.com/phi-sciences-mega-hydrate-powder-50-g/

Crystal Energy – 1/3 of a bottle/month = $10

http://www.vitaminrocket.com/phi-sciences-crystal-energy-4-fl-oz/

Protandim – 1/2 bottle/month = $25

http://www.lifevantage.com/products/protandim/



This protocol along with the diet are derived from the methodology of the legendary health expert Dr. Joel Wallach with the addition of the products of the genius Dr. Patrick Flanagan



Total cost of supplements per month: $278

The shipping to Bulgaria through USPS is $75.

The taxes are about $35.

The total cost for this protocol is $388 per month.

                My family can provide for $200 per month, so I need an additional $188 per month. My estimation is that within 12 months on this protocol I will be either completely healed from all health problems I currently have or I will be well enough to work and eventually finish my healing on my own. This is why I have set my goal at raising $2256 ($188 per month for 12 months = $2256) for this campaign.

                                            PERKS / REWARDS / CONTEST

I have set up different perks that you can buy:

1. $1 - you write and send me an inspirational quote for people in difficult situations in life, which I will put in a video on my youtube channel along with other people’s quotes. The video will be of the ‘vertical credit roll’ type (the end of movies).

2. $5 - same as the $1 perk but I will put your quotes at the top of roll of quotes with bigger font size.

3. $10 - gives you a 5% discount at www.hodileko.bg ( you can use the discount only at Shop #2 – Sofia, bul. Vasil Levski, 100B )

4. $15 - gives you a 20% discount at https://www.etsy.com/shop/RainbowNursery?ref=sh...

5. $20 - gives you a 10% discount at www.hodileko.bg ( you can use the discount only at Shop #2 – Sofia, bul. Vasil Levski, 100B )



After you purchase a perk I will contact you and send you the coupon code. The quote-video will be made after the completion of this campaign.

You can also choose to make a non-perk donation by utilizing the upper-right hand corner’s white field.

You can give the coupon code/prize to someone else.

                                                             Referral contest:

Login to your Indiegogo account and click the “Share” button (any social media like Facebook) on my campaign page if you want to be a part of this contest. Every person who clicks on your social media post you just shared and then contributes to my campaign will be automatically counted as your referral.

The total sum of money contributed by your referrals is what matters in this contest. The 5 people, whose referrals have contributed the most, will win a certain percentage (listed below) of the total money generated by their referrals. So, if you have 4 referrals, each of whom has donated $100, you will win a certain percentage of the total - $400 in this case. The percentages for the top 5 referrers are:

1. 20%

2. 15%

3. 10%

4. 5%

5. 5%

                                                                      OR

…you can choose to exchange this prize for a coupon code of the same value to purchase the products of the shops listed below and you will get an additional $5 discount from your purchases. Here are my partners you can choose from:

1. www.hodileko.bg ( you can use the discount only at Shop #2 – Sofia, bul. Vasil Levski, 100B )

2. https://www.etsy.com/shop/RainbowNursery?ref=sh...

After the end of the contest I will contact you and send you the prize you choose.



                                                               Medical Tests

These are scanned medical documents. I don’t have the money to translate these documents but you can use www.translator.google.com to check out what is written on the documents.


This is a scanned document of the MRI test that found a pituitary adenoma in my head. The conclusion at the bottom left hand corner states “Хипофизарен аденом”, which means “Pituitary adenoma (tumor)”.

Hypothyroidism

persistent thymus gland = "персистираща тимусна жлеза"

I will be very grateful if you contribute to my campaign and help me heal myself so I can get back to normal life and be a productive member of society.

:)

story:
WHY WE NEED THE BABY TIME STUDY

Many people are familiar with the treatment protocols of a breast cancer diagnosis including surgery, chemotherapy and radiation, but getting through those treatments is not the end of the line for the 70% of women with hormone responsive breast cancers. Most hormone responsive patients follow up their adjuvant treatment with five to ten years of endocrine therapy (such as Tamoxifen) to reduce the chances of recurrence. As a result, a young woman who is diagnosed at age 30 could be 40 by the time she can safely try to start having a family. 

Rethink Breast Cancer, a Canadian charity whose mission is to empower young people who are concerned about and affected by breast cancer, is asking you to help fund the international Baby Time (POSITVE) clinical trial in Canada to understand and overcome the challenges some women face when trying to get pregnant after cancer.

WHERE THE MONEY GOES

More than 60 breast cancer centres in 20 countries around the world are participating in the Baby Time study. Rethink Breast Cancer has committed to raising $100,000+ over the next 4 years to run the Canadian research arm of this study. But we can't do it without your help!

We need to raise $25,000 in 2015 so that breast cancer centres across Canada can begin enrolling patients as early as this summer.

The initial $15,000 we're aiming to raise RIGHT NOW will cover the cost of the very first patients who enter the trial.

It costs approximately $3,000 for each woman to participate in the trial.
This includes all start up costs to get the study up and running with Health Canada and the Research Ethics Board as well as:

  • recruitment and enrollment
  • nursing staff costs
  • data collection, analysis and reporting
  • personalized care by dedicated medical team
  • coordination of data with all participating centres
  • follow up of each participant for up to 10 years*
  • providing the Canadian data to the international centre

By raising $15,000 we will be able to cover the cost of establishing the trial at hospitals across Canada and enrolling the first five women to participate! Money raised beyond this will be used to enroll additional women throughout 2015 and ongoing over the next four years.

*Each woman will be guided through taking a break from their endocrine therapy (3 months), attempting pregnancy (up to 2 years) and then monitored (up to 10 years) to track possible recurrence of breast cancer.

WHY DONATE?

The donation you make will directly support the Baby Time study enabling women from all across Canada to participate in the study. Funding the study in Canada, ensures the results will be applicable here, as well as offers Canadian women the opportunity to participate in the research. 

Your money will be used to directly cover the costs involved for participants in the trial and ultimately, provide answers for future generations of young women who wish to interupt their endocrine therapy to try to have a baby and evaluate the safety of doing so. 

INTRODUCING JOY, STEPH AND JANELLE:

We are so thankful to Joy, Janelle and Steph for sharing their stories in our video but they had so much more to share! Here is a little bit more about each of these women's touching stories.

Meet Joy.

Joy is 34 years old. About a year after she got married she discovered she was pregnant. During this time she also found a lump in her breast which turned out to be breast cancer. Unfortunately, she lost the baby shortly after her diagnosis. Knowing how much her and her partner wanted to have children she pushed to meet with a fertility specialist to do egg retrieval and embryo freezing. Unfortunately, after someone offered to be a surrogate for her, they discovered that their embryos had not survived which means that now Joy's only options for having a family are to take a break from her endocrine therapy to have a baby herself, adopt, or wait another five years, when she’s close to 40 years old, to try and get pregnant despite a history of miscarriages in her family.

Meet Steph.

Steph was diagnosed when she was 28 years old. She had been married for nearly a year when she found out and despite dreams of starting a family together her and her husband decided against her doing any fertility preservation because there just wasn't really enough time between surgery and chemotherapy. “It was just going to be really tight to try to preserve the embryos…and I also just didn't feel comfortable with all the kind of hormones that you have to inject yourself with as I have hormone positive cancer.”  Steph shares, “I sometimes wonder if I made the right decision but I don't have any regrets because I know that in that moment that's what I had to do.” Steph really hopes to be considered as a participant in the Baby Time trial.


Meet Janelle.

Janelle was diagnosed with breast cancer when she was 29. She was prescribed Tamoxifen for five years which would mean she would be 36 when she finished and she felt that was too late for her to start a family.  So, she found an oncologist who was sympathetic and agreed to guide her in pausing her endocrine therapy to try to have a baby. She said, “I talked to a couple different oncologists [and] other women with breast cancer. I went online and there didn't really seem to be any information as to how safe it was or what coming off Tamoxifen [would do] to the course of [my] treatment so it was really a leap of faith just to come off it and hope for the best.” She went off Tamoxifen after three years and it took her four months to get pregnant. She now has a beautiful baby girl! Janelle said “I look at my daughter Zara I feel so lucky, so blessed to have her and she's definitely...she's definitely worth the risk.”

PERKS

We are so thankful to all of the generous partners who supported this campaign by offering perks to our donors. Pick your perk** and support #BabyTimeCAN!   

                     

                                          



**If any of these perks don't tickle your fancy, you can opt out and we'll issue you a tax receipt for the full amount of your donation ($50 and over).

CAN'T SPARE A DIME?

Even if you can't make a donation to support this project, please share our project through your social media channels.

Tweet for Baby Time

Help @rethinktweet fund #BabyTimeCAN to help women get pregnant after breast cancer http://bit.ly/babytimeCAN

Share the campaign

Use the Indiegogo share tools at the bottom of the page to spread the word about the campaign to your network.

Stay tuned

Follow Rethink Breast Cancer on Facebook for campaign updates and to share messages about Baby Time https://www.facebook.com/RethinkBreastCancer

Or sign up for our eNews at http://rethinkbreastcancer.com/newsletter

WHAT IF WE DON'T REACH OUR GOAL?

All funds raised will be used for the Baby Time Study. Rethink is committed to raising $100,000 over the next four years to support this trial and will be appealing to our donors and supporters for support through many different channels during this time. With your help, we will get there!

WHO IS RETHINK BREAST CANCER?

Rethink Breast Cancer’s mission is to empower young people worldwide who are concerned about and affected by breast cancer. Rethink is the first ever Canadian charity to bring bold, relevant awareness to the 40s and under crowd; foster a new generation of young and influential breast cancer supporters; infuse sass and style into the cause; and most importantly, respond to the unique needs of young women going through it. By taking a breakthrough approach to all aspects of breast cancer – education, resources, advocacy, community building, and fundraising – Rethink is thinking differently about breast cancer.


BIG THANKS 

To Nate + Alibi Entertainment Inc, Imprint Music,
Joy, Steph + Janelle for sharing their stories
with us and with the world!
story_txt:
WHY WE NEED THE BABY TIME STUDY
 



Many people are familiar with the treatment protocols of a breast cancer diagnosis including surgery, chemotherapy and radiation, but getting through those treatments is not the end of the line for the 70% of women with hormone responsive breast cancers. Most hormone responsive patients follow up their adjuvant treatment with five to ten years of endocrine therapy (such as Tamoxifen) to reduce the chances of recurrence. As a result, a young woman who is diagnosed at age 30 could be 40 by the time she can safely try to start having a family. 
Rethink
Breast Cancer, a Canadian charity whose mission is to empower young people who are concerned about and affected by breast cancer, is asking you to help fund the international Baby Time
(POSITVE) clinical trial in Canada to understand and
overcome the challenges some women face when trying to get
pregnant after cancer.


WHERE THE MONEY GOES
More than 60 breast cancer centres in 20 countries around the world are participating in the Baby Time study. Rethink Breast Cancer has committed to raising $100,000+ over the next 4 years to run the Canadian research arm of this study. But we can't do it without your help!


We need to raise $25,000 in 2015 so that breast cancer centres across Canada can begin enrolling patients as early as this summer. The initial $15,000 we're aiming to raise RIGHT NOW will cover the cost of the very first patients who enter the trial.

It costs
approximately $3,000 for each woman to participate in the trial. This includes
all start up costs to get the study up and running with Health Canada and the
Research Ethics Board as well as:

recruitment and enrollment
nursing staff costs
data collection, analysis and reporting
personalized care by dedicated medical team
coordination of data with all participating centres
follow up of each participant for up to 10 years*
providing the Canadian data to the international centre

By raising $15,000 we will be able to cover the cost of establishing the trial at hospitals across Canada and enrolling the first five women to participate! Money raised beyond this will be used to enroll additional women throughout 2015 and ongoing over the next four years.
*Each woman will be guided through taking a break from their
endocrine therapy (3 months), attempting pregnancy (up to 2 years) and then
monitored (up to 10 years) to track possible recurrence of breast cancer.




WHY DONATE?


The donation you make will directly support the Baby Time study enabling women from all across Canada to participate in the study. Funding the study in Canada, ensures the results will be applicable here, as well as offers Canadian women the opportunity to participate in the research. 
Your money will be used to directly cover the costs involved for participants in the trial and ultimately, provide answers for future generations of young women who wish to interupt their endocrine therapy to try to have a baby and evaluate the safety of doing so. 

INTRODUCING JOY, STEPH AND JANELLE:

We are so thankful to Joy, Janelle and Steph for sharing
their stories in our video but they had so much more to share! Here is a little bit more about each of these women's touching stories. 



Meet Joy.Joy
is 34 years old. About a year after she got married she discovered she was
pregnant. During this time she also found a lump in her breast which turned out
to be breast cancer. Unfortunately, she lost the baby shortly after her
diagnosis. Knowing how much her and her partner wanted to have children she
pushed to meet with a fertility specialist to do egg retrieval and embryo
freezing. Unfortunately, after someone offered to be a surrogate for her, they
discovered that their embryos had not survived which means that now Joy's only
options for having a family are to take a break from her endocrine therapy to
have a baby herself, adopt, or wait another five years, when she’s close to 40
years old, to try and get pregnant despite a history of miscarriages in her
family.


Meet Steph.

Steph was
diagnosed when she was 28 years old. She had been married for nearly a year when she found out and despite dreams of starting a family together her and her
husband decided against her doing any fertility preservation because there just
wasn't really enough time between surgery and chemotherapy. “It was just going to be really tight to try
to preserve the embryos…and I also just didn't feel comfortable with all the
kind of hormones that you have to inject yourself with as I have hormone
positive cancer.”  Steph shares, “I sometimes wonder if I made the right
decision but I don't have any regrets because I know that in that moment that's
what I had to do.” Steph really hopes to be considered as a participant in
the Baby Time trial.

Meet Janelle.

Janelle was
diagnosed with breast cancer when she was 29. She was prescribed Tamoxifen for
five years which would mean she would be 36 when she finished and she felt that
was too late for her to start a family. 
So, she found an oncologist who was sympathetic and agreed to guide her
in pausing her endocrine therapy to try to have a baby. She said, “I talked to a couple different oncologists
[and] other women with breast cancer. I went online and there didn't really
seem to be any information as to how safe it was or what coming off Tamoxifen [would
do] to the course of [my] treatment so it was really a leap of faith just to
come off it and hope for the best.” She went off Tamoxifen after three
years and it took her four months to get pregnant. She now has a beautiful baby
girl! Janelle said “I look at my daughter
Zara I feel so lucky, so blessed to have her and she's definitely...she's
definitely worth the risk.”
PERKS
We are so thankful to all of the generous partners who supported this campaign by offering perks to our donors. Pick your perk** and support #BabyTimeCAN!                        

                                          
**If any of these perks don't tickle your fancy, you can opt out and we'll issue you a tax receipt for the full amount of your donation ($50 and over).
CAN'T SPARE A DIME?

Even if you can't make a donation to support this project,
please share our project through your social media channels.

campaign

Follow Rethink
Breast Cancer on Facebook for campaign updates and to share messages about Baby
Time https://www.facebook.com/RethinkBreastCancerOr sign up for our eNews at http://rethinkbreastcancer.com/newsletterWHAT IF WE DON'T REACH OUR GOAL?
All funds raised will be used for the Baby Time Study.
Rethink is committed to raising $100,000 over the next four years to support
this trial and will be appealing to our donors and supporters for support
through many different channels during this time. With your help, we will get there!WHO IS RETHINK BREAST CANCER?

story:
Who am I?


I'm a 37-year-old runner from Bulgaria. A father of 3-year-old kid who loves getting outdoors. I have participated in lots of ultra runs in my home country in the last 5 years and now it is time to tackle one of the most challenging runs in Europe - the UTMB - Courmayeur Champex Chamonix Run. The race is 101 km long (around 63 miles) with 6100 meters positive attitude change. To be part of it you need to collect points from previous runs and then get selected randomly. So I did all that. I'm one of the 1900 athletes from around the world that have the chance to be part of this competition!


I want to thank you for getting familiar with my campaign. It means you are considering to support me and I really appreciate that.


video from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Uq0lf8nP8-4


What's my goal?

To receive enough funding to buy the needed equipment and traveling cost for me and my supporter.


The organization of the race is quite strict. You need certain equipment to be allowed to start in the race. Things like high level waterproof jackets and gloves, special socks, etc., which I'm not able to get right now. Also the traveling cost are over my budget. Even though I'm getting a second job, I won't be able to save enough until the deadline of the race. This is why I'm addressing the Indiegogo community of supporters to help me out on this.


Where are we now?

A local Athletic store offered some of the equipment for free. It's not the complete set but still a major help. Also I'm actively saving for the race and looking for a second job to cover as much as possible of the expenses.


How will the money be used?

- Buy the expensive equipment that I'm required to have in order to participated in the race.

- Get myself and my supporter a plane ticket to Switzerland

- Pay for an economy accommodation for both of us.



How You Can Help

1.  Well, the best way is to contribute - look over the perks and contribute at a level that works for you.

2.  Share this campaign and help me spread the word.



Please use the "Share this Campaign" tool at the top of this page.

Re-post our Indiegogo link on your Facebook and Twitter pages

story:
Note:

If we should ship the perks to you, you also have to pay additional shipping costs. 


Short  

On the 23rd and 24th of July, the quidditch World Cup is going to take place in Frankfurt, Germany and we want to go there as the Korean National Quidditch Team. 

But to get there, we need your help - or to be more direct: your money. 


If you don't know what quidditch is, here is a short video by UBC Quidditch:

 


Long 

Quidditch is a mixed-gender, full-contact sport. Even though it's only existed for 10 years, it has already spread throughout the world. To determine which nation has the best quidditch team worldwide, a World Cup is held every two years. The 2016 edition is going to take place in Frankfurt, Germany and our goal is to go there. 

We are the only Korean quidditch team so far and have been around since September 2015. World Cup is one of our only chances to play official games and breathe some of the renowned quidditch air, since we're the only team in this area - the next team is a six-hour flight away.

But as we are all students, we need financial help to get there. A round-trip flight from Seoul to Frankfurt costs about 811€ (~920$) and there are still some other costs to cover. (There is stuff we can do without, but food is not one of them.) 

With the raised money we want to cover all these additional costs first, and then use the rest to reduce the traveling costs at least a bit for everyone.

Also, we're only seven players who can afford going to Europe. If we raise enough money, we might be able to get more people to join us on our trip. 


What's your job?

Support us! That can be easily done. Buy some awesome perks you've always been waiting for, or, if you can't help us financially share this campaign on facebook (or any other social media platform). Either way ... THANK YOU!

Our Jerseys:






**New perks** 

Supporter's tshirt


1. black

2.white

story:
Our Story.

A few years ago while backpacking through the island of Sri Lanka, I found myself lost in a remote village in the heart of Sri Lanka`s lush coconut triangle. The leader of that village, a happy and energized 92 year old farmer named “Selva Perera” guided me to where I had intended and along the way shared with me the miraculous health benefits of the Sri Lankan coconut. His stories were truly inspiring and from that day onwards, Palm Bare was born. With passions deeply rooted in social responsibility and agricultural sustainability. 

Palm bare may well be the World’s Best Coconut Oil.


 

Why Palm Bare?

For anyone that knows their 'Coconuts", they will know that Sri Lanka produces the very highest quality of raw coconut, found anywhere in the world.  With the recent craze of Coconut Oil sweeping the globe, we have seen more and more brands spring up on our supermarket shelves! However these brands really are just "Brands".  Many housing low quality coconut oil to reap in bigger profits!.

The name Palm Bare comes straight from the product itself!  Bare, untreated, unheated, pure, raw Coconut oil.  

  • 100% Organic
  • 100% Pure
  • Un-refined
  • Cold pressed
  • Vegan friendly
  • Cholesterol free
  • Zero trans fats
  • High in Lauric acid
  • Non GMO

Once you smell and sample Palm Bare, you will quickly realize that other oils just cannot rise to the challenge.  The Oil itself smells smooth, creamy and almost cake like.  This can only come from the highest quality raw wild Sri Lankan coconuts.


Supporting our Community.

Unlike many large corporate giants, we do not solely concentrate on company profit! There are far to many "Takers" in the world and not enough "Givers".  With this vision in mind we hold a strong focus and responsibility within the Sri Lankan community.  Each time you purchase any of our delicious products, we donate 10% of the profits, straight back to the communities that have provided our beautiful products.

These donations go straight into the communities themselves, helping build facilities, healthcare and education.  You will be able to read updates via our website and blogs on our work in the community.  

From a beautiful country, harvested by beautiful people, producing a beautiful product!  Each one of them is proud to be Palm Bare.


The Beauty of Coconut Oil

Here are just some of the many benefits and uses of Coconut Oil:

Keep You Healthy and Slim  

  • You can help boost and regulate your metabolism to keep your weight under control with this wonder oil.

Support Your Immune System

  • Organic coconut oil is jam-packed with lauric acid, the immune supporting nutrient.

Promote Heart Health

  • Packed full of healthy fats that are good for your heart, organic coconut oil is a great addition to your daily diet.

Give You Instant Energy

  • Organic coconut oil can help you feel less fatigued and require less sleep by stimulating your metabolism. It can also enhance athletic performance.

Support Healthy Thyroid Function

  • Organic coconut oil helps to stimulate the activity and proper functioning of this important gland which provides energy, supports the health of your skin and metabolism, and keeps your moods in balance.

Help Keep Your Skin Youthful, Smooth & Healthy Looking

  • Using organic virgin coconut oil as a lotion will help improve your skin, hair, and nails due to its moisturizing and smoothing effects that also promote elasticity.

Increase Cell Regeneration

  • When your metabolic rate increases, your cell regeneration speeds up, too. This means that your body will more quickly replace old cells with newer, healthier cells.

Promote Anti-Viral, Anti-Fungal, and Anti-Bacterial Activity

  • Teeming with lauric acid, organic coconut oil possesses abundant natural agents that may reduce fungus, bacteria and the viruses that cause influenza, herpes, and other illnesses.

Improve Insulin Secretion

  • This helps to better utilize glucose to balance insulin output which can help relieve the symptoms and reduce the health risks associated with diabetes.

Protect Your Body from Disease

  • Organic coconut oil may help protect your body from cell damaging free radicals.

Teeth & Oral Care

  • Coconut oil can be used both as a natural teeth whitener and also protects your gums from disease

For more information on further uses and benefits, while not visit our site at www.palmbare.com


What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking to raise an initial investment of USD 25,000 to bring this product to market.  We currently have everything set up and ready!  Our Sri Lankan team are already cracking the coconuts!! 
  • In return we would like to thank each of our contributors by sharing our products with them to enjoy in their own homes.
  • Our product offers a win / win advantage over our competitors.  Our happy customers enjoy an extremely high quality oil, while our Sri Lankan communities benefit from both the production revenue, along with our GIVE BACK to the community scheme.
  • If we do not reach our target, then we will simply keep pushing until we do!  We are confident the world will see the benefit of our high quality products and charity work, over our competitors.

The Impact

This project will have a massive impact to our product awareness, and also our support within the community.  "If you give a man a fish then he will eat for a day, give a man a fishing rod and he will eat for a lifetime".  Palm Bare is that fishing rod for our local Sri Lankan Communities.  


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to contribute financially to this project, then we would ask you to create some noise about Palm Bare, share this page, share our website, share our social media... The more you shout, the more people will hear!
