story:
About Us

In our 17 year old careers in HR and Law, we never knew that healthcare in the developing world would be something that we would end up being passionate about.  In 2015, we focussed on providing doctor on call services, where people irrespective of age, ability or time could request for a specialist doctor to visit at home for a higher fee in our local town of Calcutta, India with a population of 5 Million.

However we were soon contacted by various patients and stake holders as a result of some press coverage, for healthcare help beyond our borders. We soon realised that the magnitude of the healthcare crisis in certain parts of the world are beyond our imagination. 

The Reality

We found that Zimbabwe has 1.6 doctors for every 10,000 people. There are only 2 heart surgeons in the entire country of 15 million.

We found that in Iraq, lack of equipment and more importantly lack of trained surgeons has created a huge void in healthcare with everyone from babies and young children, to old men and women suffering from lack of medical care.

Afghanistan today suffers from one of the worst health crises in the world. Years of war and civil strife have left behind enormous poverty, and a crumbling infrastructure. The doctors lack enough training, the hospitals have no equipment and the medicines are often fake. Most medical laboratories and diagnostic centres are unable to diagnose the issues correctly. Moreover, women were banned from receiving treatment from male doctors under Taliban rule, and with few female doctors in the country, many illnesses were left untreated.

Bangladesh on the other hand is in a much better position than all of these countries. However, the tertiary healthcare infrastructure in Bangladesh is still in its nascent stage and therefore for high end medical procedures patients need to travel outside their country. Doctor training, nurse and paramedic training are areas where private hospitals and looking for collaborations with partners.

Our Solutions

Online Consultations

Facilitating online doctor consultations with our own partner doctors for patients in these countries for a very nominal fee, will help balance the doctor patient ratios. We can organise online doctor consultations with female doctors from India for countries where this is a special challenge

Surgical Camps and Out Patient Consultations

Working with our 190 partnered doctors and our 10 JCI accredited partner hospitals, and sending them for regular visits for consultations or surgical camps to these countries

Medical Education & Training

Organising continuing medical education conferences in these countries for doctors, para medics and nurses

What $150,000 in crowdfunding would help us achieve

Infrastructure for online consultations

Your contribution will help us build an infrastructure to support web based consultations. For this we need space, computers, internet and translators in various countries. 

Subsidize travel for surgeons and doctors

It would subsidise tickets for surgeons and their teams to go to Baghdad or Kabul or Harare to conduct a few life saving surgeries. It would support travel for doctors to go to these places for regular consultation visits and relieve some of the pressure on the local healthcare systems.

Support Medical Education & Training

It would help us conduct doctors medical education conferences, nurses training programs, and paramedical training for our neighbours like Bangladesh. We have a roster of senior doctors and specialist along with senior head nurses and trainers willing to go that extra mile. 

This in turn would turn peoples lives around - save some, make it easier for some, and give a ray of home to many.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $150000 to start with.

Some sample costs.

For online consultations from other countries we need to rent out small space, have at least 3 computers each with internet connectivity and english translators for our doctors, which would be at least $50k including recurring costs for a year

A single return flight from New Delhi to Baghdad visa, license or equalization fees for doctors, local transportation, accommodation and security can cost upwards of $3000 for one person alone. A surgical camp usually has teams of 2-3 surgeons, and if required, nursing staff, anaesthetist, assistant surgeons etc.

We organised a cardiology and orthopaedic medical conference for doctors in Harare in March 2017, which cost us $16836 including tickets, venue, and certification

For OPD consultations in a place like Kabul, doctors can charge as much as $7500 for a 2.5 day visit due to the security threats. Our partners would bear some of the costs, but we would like to be able to support some of it in the intial days.

We have a staff of 5, operating at the bare minimum. However we need to employ ground support staff for patients and translators as well to be able to communicate with patients from other countries where English is not the main language. We see staff costs going up to $60k this year. 

The Impact

Your contribution will help provide additional resources by sending doctors to these  challenged countries for consultations, and surgeries. You will help provide training to create more nurses and more skilled doctors. You will also help give them cheaper options and access to consultations online with doctors in India. 

Together we can improve lives and help these countries with very basic healthcare needs that a lot of the world take for granted.

story:
Where it began?

EZIHOLD's original and very first basic bottle band was designed and made for my mother (Gerry) while she was recovering from cancer. The idea spawned one day in the gym shortly after her surgery. On that day, I noticed every time she bent over to pick up her water bottle off the floor, she would cringe in pain. I wanted to help her in this moment and thought about how... aside from being her personal bottle butler. Now, I couldn't help her with her stitches but I did find a solution that works.

If you have ever been in the gym and put a bottle, towel, keys, card on the ground or knocked over your bottle and forgotten it, then EZIHOLD will help! 

And as it turns out many people were experiencing the same issues. The inconvenience of putting their:

Gym card or locker keys- in their pockets during exercise (if they had pockets) or attaching pins to workout clothes

Water bottle- trying to find a place that is out of the way, avoiding spills & where you won't forget it) and 

Gym towel (the one you wipe your face with) on the floor

These are all real concerns that needed better a solution.   

Along the way we realised that we were solving not only a safety and convenience issue but a very important hygiene issue. Currently, there is only one third of the gym that allows and provides a safe and sanitary place to put your bottle and personal gym items... the cardio machines. Scattered on the floor in the other two thirds of the gym you'll see water bottles, towels, keys, and cards. This can cause an unsafe and unhygienic gym environment. Plus, it is a pain in the gluteus maximus to carry and place your keys, card and towel in your pocket or on the floor after/ during each exercise or set.

Due to the interest from gym goers asking where they too could get an Ezihold band, I started to develop EZIHOLD's first prototype. Through continuous feedback we've developed the key features which include; a way to attach your keys, your gym card, towel all the while holding your bottle at eye height. 

EZIHOLD's patent pending function & design allows you to show your flare with our fantastic colour range whilst not taking away from your water bottles design or function. So, help back  our campaign and take all of that mess and inconvenience and put it on one EZIHOLD band.

What We Need & What You Get

The funding goal we'd like to reach will help us keep the first manufacturing run price low and at a price that everyone can afford and enjoy. Also, at this price point we can offer the entire range of colours (6) .    

If we don't reach our funding goal we will still be able to offer our EZIHOLD bands but in limited colour options. The amount raised will determine how many colour options will be available to you.

When we do reach our funding goal we will be able to deliver you a fun and exciting new product. We are proud of the EZIHOLD band and are sure you will be too!

 

Risks & Challenges

We understand that there will be challenges down the road and we’re confident we’ll overcome them because of the support from our mentors who have over 30 years experience delivering great fitness products to happy customers.

We’ll face challenges with production, packaging and shipping worldwide but we have top notch advisers on board. With their extensive background and work experience, we'll be able to navigate the road with ease.

We’ll work hard and relentlessly to deliver you an incredible product, which has been our commitment since the beginning of this project!

Shipping

Shipping costs will be automatically calculated once you select a reward.

Depending on the EZIHOLD perks you select + where you live on the planet, the shipping cost will vary.

Shipping worldwide!

Please note that shipping to any country outside North America and Canada may be delayed or cancelled depending on the feasibility of local product approval requirements or local import regulations. In a case of cancellation we will refund your pledge. There may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.

We are really excited to launch the amazing EZIHOLD band for your personal items. So you can focus on what's important, your workout!

Other Ways You Can Help

Ok, for all you who are awesome and want to contribute in other ways, which is equally important to the Ezihold family!

  • Please share this campaign with friends and family
  • Like us on Facebook and 
  • Follows us on Instagram pronto!

Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools, located at the top of this page under the funding goal. See you soon!

 

FAQ's

Q. What size bottle will the band hold?

A. Your EZIHOLD band will hold up to 24oz (700ml) comfortably.

Q. Will it hold my protein shaker too?

A. Yes. Your band will hold the average size protein shaker, no problem.

Q. Does the magnet affect anything?

A. The magnet is strong and should be used with care. Please keep the magnet at a minimum of 15"inches away from any internal/ external medical devices. This would include but not limited to hearing aids and pacemakers. If contact does occur seek medical advice promptly. We also suggest to keep magnetic strip cards (e.g.Bank cards) and phones from prolonged contact with the magnet.

Q. Is there a risk if I'm contributing?

A. We feel fully accountable to our backers. You can be sure that we'll keep a rigorous eye on the financials. We are 100% dedicated to ship an outstanding product, no matter what.

Q. How do I know my bottle will hold?

A. There are two main factors: 1) The magnet and 2) the ferrous surface material you attach it too.

 1) The magnet is a strong rare earth magnet with a quality coating protecting it from the elements like water, heat and freezing temperatures. It will hold a bottle up to 700mls or 24Oz easily. 2) The thickness of surface metal you attach your Ezihold to will also the determine it's performance. 

Q. How do I choose my colour?

A. The colour selection will happen shortly after purchase.

Funding this campaign you will be leading the way in helping to create a safer, fun and cleaner workout environment. Plus we think they look pretty cool too!

story:
The quality of training off the ice is crucial. Especially young players don’t have enough time on ice to train their skating technique. After years of battling with different methods of off-ice training – including sliding on smooth plywood with slippery socks – we decided to design our own.

 

Wiuhu Slideboard (patent pending) is designed to go with you wherever your favorite training spot is. It is easy to assemble on spot. Wiuhu is made from durable composite and can be adjusted to either 2 (6' 7") or 3 meters (9' 10") wide. Ball bearing equipped foot elements give you a steady and smooth slide every time.

 

Due to its design Wiuhu helps you achieve correct knee-nose alignment when training. Stable foot elements guarantee you slide only in the direction your training needs you to. Correct postitioning and the angle of your kick allow you to concentrate your training to the right muscle groups. This gives you more power and speed where it is needed – on the ice.

 

Even though we designed Wiuhu to help your skating technique, you can do a variety of different exercises with our slideboard. Grab your stick and drop the puck on some plywood and you have a nice setup for a hand-eye coordination training. An elastic band gives you extra resistance when you need it.

 

We are currently in prototype phase. The look and material of the final product may differ from the images shown but the quality and properties concerning the use of the product will remain the same.

 

 

Below you can find some of the most frequently asked questions. If you have any other questions about Wiuhu, feel free to send them to info@wiuhu.com and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

WHAT ARE THE MAIN DIFFERENCES BETWEEN WIUHU AND OTHER SLIDEBOARDS?

Foot elements equipped with ball bearings give the user a better and steadier slide compared to traditional slideboards. The rail-like construction of Wiuhu allows a stable slide posture. Due to this design the kick is directed only sideways to help you learn to skate efficiently. It’s also possible to use Wiuhu with exercise band.

HOW TO ASSEMBLE WIUHU?

Assembling Wiuhu is quick and easy. No extra tools (besides your hands) are needed and it’s possible to set Wiuhu up and running in less than a minute. Any sort of base is ok as long as it’s flat and hard. (Thorough technical details are sorted out when we decide eventual method for mass production.)

IS IT SAFE TO USE WIUHU OUTDOORS?

Yes.

WHAT IS THE RECOMMENDED AGE FOR WIUHU?

4 years and up

WHAT IS WIUHU MADE OF?

The board and foot elements are made of durable plastic composite. The board base is rubber and therefore it’s very stable. The foot element bearings are made of metal. Construction materials are subject to change during product development process in case possible new better materials improve the quality of Wiuhu

ARE THERE ANY WEIGHT LIMITS OR RESTRICTIONS?

Preferred weight limit is 100 kg (220 lbs).

HOW LIKELY ARE YOU ABLE TO STICK TO THE ESTIMATED DELIVERY SCHEDULE?

Our partner Tackla has over 50 years of experience in product manufacturing and sales. We believe firmly that this know-how helps us to keep in schedule.

IS WIUHU INTENDED ONLY FOR HOCKEY PLAYERS?

Wiuhu Slideboard is suitable for anyone interested in exercising and improving their stamina, enhancing motor coordination and strengthening leg, core, and lower body muscles.

 

We are a team of three dudes from northern Finland where hockey is a way of life. Our background is in hockey – ex-players and junior coaches.

Especially junior hockey players don’t have much time on the ice and they still need to master their skating technique if they wish to reach a professional career. Today skaters and hockey players train their skating technique with different kinds of platforms with something to reduce the friction. This does not properly imitate how the slide with real skates and ice is like.

After years and years of battling with different methods of off-the-ice training – including sliding on smooth plywood with slippery socks – we decided to design a method of our own. After long thinking and testing we managed to find the solution which now is named Wiuhu Slideboard.

For research and development as well as for logistics and production, we have partnered with Tackla.

story:
In June 2016, we received the devastating news that Vita Tiesnese, one of our closest friends, and one of the kindest, most caring and intelligent people you could wish to meet, was diagnosed with a very rare and aggressive cancer, known as cholangiocarcinoma.

The symptoms of this type of cancer are incredibly difficult to spot, and when Vita was diagnosed on the week of her 48 birthday, it was already too late for surgery.
The cancer has spread to her liver, lungs and lymph nodes and is therefore inoperable and incurable.

Chemotherapy is being used to slow the spread of the cancer, but sadly for this type of cancer, it can only control the disease for an average of 10 months. Vita has now had six months of chemotherapy and time is incredibly precious in the search for plan B.

However, we have not given up hope and that’s why we are asking for your help.

Vita’s best chance is immunotherapy, a treatment which harnesses the body’s immune system to fight its own cancer. This has been used in the US to extend the life of a cholangiocarcinoma patient, who has now survived the disease for 6 years and counting. It has shown such success in treating other types of cancer that it is now routinely available on the NHS for many patients. But - although this treatment offers a chance to slow the growth of Vita’s cancer considerably or, in the best circumstances, put it into remission entirely - immunotherapy is not currently available on the NHS for this type of cancer. And it is extremely expensive. To privately fund a course is expected to cost in excess of £100,000.
No one expects to save for a situation like this.

It is unbelievably hard to see one of your best friends going through this. Someone who has always been there for you and for so many others. Someone you imagined growing up and growing old with, standing beside at her wedding, drinking tea with while you watched her children play, having dinner parties with when you’re older - someone who you can’t really imagine life without. And it’s so difficult to feel there is little you can do to help, which is why we’ve made this page.

Any support you can give to help Vitas and ensure her the best possible future will be appreciated more than you can know!!
story_txt: In June 2016, we received the devastating news that Vita Tiesnese, one of our closest friends, and one of the kindest, most caring and intelligent people you could wish to meet, was diagnosed with a very rare and aggressive cancer, known as cholangiocarcinoma.The symptoms of this type of cancer are incredibly difficult to spot, and when Vita was diagnosed on the week of her 48 birthday, it was already too late for surgery.The cancer has spread to her liver, lungs and lymph nodes and is therefore inoperable and incurable.Chemotherapy is being used to slow the spread of the cancer, but sadly for this type of cancer, it can only control the disease for an average of 10 months. Vita has now had six months of chemotherapy and time is incredibly precious in the search for plan B.However, we have not given up hope and that’s why we are asking for your help.Vita’s best chance is immunotherapy, a treatment which harnesses the body’s immune system to fight its own cancer. This has been used in the US to extend the life of a cholangiocarcinoma patient, who has now survived the disease for 6 years and counting. It has shown such success in treating other types of cancer that it is now routinely available on the NHS for many patients. But - although this treatment offers a chance to slow the growth of Vita’s cancer considerably or, in the best circumstances, put it into remission entirely - immunotherapy is not currently available on the NHS for this type of cancer. And it is extremely expensive. To privately fund a course is expected to cost in excess of £100,000.No one expects to save for a situation like this.It is unbelievably hard to see one of your best friends going through this. Someone who has always been there for you and for so many others. Someone you imagined growing up and growing old with, standing beside at her wedding, drinking tea with while you watched her children play, having dinner parties with when you’re older - someone who you can’t really imagine life without. And it’s so difficult to feel there is little you can do to help, which is why we’ve made this page.Any support you can give to help Vitas and ensure her the best possible future will be appreciated more than you can know!!

story:
Summary

Anel Bellevue, Founder & CEO of Nouflex LLC., always had playing sports and being active in his blood. He is passionate about track & field, soccer, basketball, cross-country, martial arts, weightlifting, yoga, Pilates, skiing, rock climbing, and hiking.

Anel is a Nouflex certified Personal Trainer, a Women’s Fitness Specialist, and a Senior Fitness Specialist through the National Academy of Sports Medicine (NASM). While earning his B.S. in Exercise Kinesiology at UMass Amherst he specialized in total body makeovers, weight management, injury prevention, fall prevention, corrective exercise, and functional training. Anel believes that fitness is a way of being and a lifelong commitment.

After entering Medical school Anel realized that medicine was not his calling. He decided to connect with people in the preventive phase of health by pursuing a career in fitness and business. After years as a personal trainer working with many clients and other trainers, Anel founded Nufit and now Nouflex LLC. with the intent of bringing changes to the health and fitness industry. With years of training experience, utilizing innovative exercises and dietary instruction, Anel can craft a custom plan to help you reach your goal faster than you might imagine.

 

The Nouflex training system is simple, with three products areas:

  1. Home & Personal Use
  2. Gyms & Studios
  3. Workshops to certify personal trainers

Anel started his career in fitness primarily serving young professionals, mostly men, but he soon realized the impact he was having and the challenges of training women and the aging. Physical fitness contributes so much to one’s quality of life and well being, yet there isn’t enough fitness equipment that addresses the needs of women and our aging population. Anel was inspired to design and build the Nouflex training system that focuses on techniques for achieving balance and fall prevention, does not require large muscle mass, yet may be used to benefit men and women of all strengths and ages.


How to Engage
Your support will make it possible for Nouflex to exist in the marketplace, build inventory, and create jobs. You can engage with Nouflex:

  1. As gym owner
  2. For home & personal use
  3. As a personal trainer
  4. As an investor

Behind the scenes we have been working to set up our company for success. We have been testing our products in the Boston market through physical therapy clinics, personal training sessions, and group fitness classes; and we have patented the Nouflex System in the United States and countries in Europe, Asia, and South America. With your support we are confident of becoming a competitive force in the marketplace.

Impact on the Aging
It is estimated that by 2050, 70 million 56 year old or older adults will account for 25% of the US population.

A small percentage of older adults stay active, but most have inadequate fitness and are underserved. It is commonly thought that aging necessitates surrendering activities of our youth. Some surrender is inescapable but far less than most think.

Most older adults don’t exercise due to:

  • Fear of Injury
  • Discomfort in health clubs—intolerance, disparagement
  • Lack of time

Research shows that exercises that improve balance and build strength reduce the risk of falls among older adults by 33% or more.

Nouflex is an ideal system for the aging.


Risks & Challenges

Most small businesses that fail do so due to lack of cash flow and insufficient funding. We  have overcome most barriers that lead to failure, but your financing—investing or purchasing our products—will sustain us, so we can continue to grow.

Our product is unique, affordable, and portable. It makes it easier for those who are not savvy about exercise to learn, engage, and become active.

The missing link for Nouflex is capital investment to allow us to begin mass production. This is where you come in! Our funding goal represents the capital needed to place an initial order with our manufacturer and to warehouse and ship Nouflex directly to the consumer. Meeting our financial goal is vital to our success.

Despite the successes we have had, we have encountered a number of challenges, particularly on the production end. Our current methods are time-intensive and costly. In order to reduce cost and pass savings to our customers, we have established ties with manufacturing and warehousing facilities that are prepared to more efficiently produce our product and process orders. Since Nouflex is manufactured and packaged locally, your help will create jobs and support our economy.

Other Ways You Can Help

In the event you are not able to contribute financially, we would truly appreciate other levels of support such as letting your families and friends know about Nouflex.

Sharing our campaign through social media networks will also be appreciated.

story:
Toefreedom®, is a biomechanical concept in shoe design that has been used to great positive effect within the orthopedic shoe industry which is now being introduced to the world of sports medicine and athletic performance.

Conventional running shoes dramatically reduce stability when running due to the non-anatomical, symmetrical design philosophy.

Toefreedom® provides the runner with an increase in stability due to extra room for the big toe to anchor and control the foot. 

The nimbleToes Addict is the first of its kind: a running shoe designed on the biomechanical principles of Functional Footwear to bring the benefits of toefreedom® to runners worldwide.

 

 

 


THE RUNNER´S PAIN MAP

What hurts a runner the most, is not being able to run.

Running is the largest participation sport in the world with over 100 million recreational runners registered in the US and Europe alone. The majority of this population have started running with the intention of improving their levels of helath and fitness but unfortunately the health and fitness benefits of running come at a price as injury rates are extraorinarily high in runners (more than 1 in 3 runners report a running related pain or injury whilst preparing to enter a half or full marathon).

 

 

 

 

 

BIOMECHANIST, RUNNING COACH AND CREATOR​ OF THE FUNCTIONAL FOOTMAP.

Lee is one of the most recognised coaches for running technique on an international level.  
His knowledge and experience in running biomechanics and foot function has benefited injured runners, both recreational and elite around the globe and led him to develop the Functional FootMap assessment system. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SHOE PIONEER AND INVENTOR OF THE FUNCTIONAL FOOTWEAR DESIGN CONCEPT

Sebastian´s family has been making shoes with toefreedom® for over three decades.  His experience of helping people all around the world to improve their foot function through the benefits of toefreedom® and his passion for running has led him to create the Functional Footwear Design Concept.

 

__________________________________________________________________________________________

 

Michelin has been forging a better way forward for over 100 years. They have spanned millions of miles on the mission to develop groundbreaking multi-surface contact for vehicles operating in the most challenging environments all over the world. We decided to partner with Soles by Michelin because of their unrivalled expertise in rubber and tread design to equip our nimbleToes Addict with the perfect outsole for Functional Footwear in long distance running.

 

 

 

The inspiration for the nimbleToes Addict

When crewing at the worlds toughest footrace, the Badwater Ultramarathon, a few years ago, Sebastian observed that a lot of the elite athletes cut open the front of their running shoe to have more freedom for their toes and reduce the risk of injury.  His unique know-how in making casual shoes with toefreedom® inspired him to introduce this design philosophy to the running shoe industry.

 

 

DR WILKINSON
Dr Wilkinson´s research area is the biology of human health and performance. His work has included the biomechanics and performance determinants of distance running and the link between plantar sensation and regulation of bipedal gait.  He has a particular interest in the influence of footwear on foot structure, function and joint loading during running.


 

FUNCTION
noun
an activity that is natural to or the purpose of a person or thing. (Oxford English Dictionary)

The purpose of the foot is to provide a stable base of support to control the direction of the body weight during the stance phase of locomotion [1-3]. Newtonian physics dictates that a wider base of support is more stable than a narrow base. Width and stability of the forefoot is crucial in this regard as the highest forces during mid stance occur at the forefoot [4, 5]. A greater spread of the toes, the great toe in particular, reduces forefoot peak pressures, distributes force more evenly, and stabilises the foot and ankle [6-8]. Toes squashed together by years of wearing narrow shoes that do not respect the natural fan shape of the human foot [9] are common [10] and are linked to instability and movement-related pain [11, 12]. Natural function can be restored by regular loading of the feet in footwear that respect natural design of the foot [13] and permit freedom for the toes to spread and stabilise the foot.

Pain-free movement begins with a stable base of support. A stable foot requires Toe freedom, only functional footwear provides toe freedom. Joe Nimble ‘functional footwear’ is based on this science. 

*References below

 

 

If you’re new to Joe Nimble Functional Footwear you might be wondering what the right shoe size is you should buy. Well, the good news is: You just need to order your regular shoe size.

MEASURE YOUR FEET
If you are not sure about your right shoe size, here are some simple instructions for measuring your feet. You only need:

  • a sheet of paper
  • a pencil
  • a ruler or measuring tape

This is how it works: Stand on the paper with both feet while you are wearing socks. Simply trace around the outline of your feet with a pencil one after the other.

Important: Always hold the pencil upright on the paper, not leaning tot he inside or outside in order to get an accurate result.

Now simply measure the length of your drawing. Measure from the tip oft he longest toe tot he bottom (at the center) of your heel. If your feet are different sizes, then the bigger foot determines the correct shoe size.
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

PERKS

 

 

We are excited to let you know that the production process has now started!

 

  • the molds for the soles are finished and in production (we are sorry that we can not share any photography, as this is insider know-how from "Soles by Michelin" that can not be shared in public)

  • the knitting processes for the uppers has started (see the video above)

  • you will receive two free shoe bags with every pair ordered, production has already started

  • shoe boxes are confirmed and are being processed

  • toefreedom® upper stabilizers have also been confirmed and are now being produced to keep your shoes in perfect shape during transport

  • insoles are also now perfectly fitted and put into production

 

 

 

References

1. Mann R and Inman VT. Phasic Activity of Intrinsic Muscles of the Foot. The Journal of Bone and Joint Surgery 1964 46(3): 469-481. (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/14131426)

2. Reeser LA, Susman RL, and Stern JT. Electromyographic Studies of the Human Foot: Experimental Approaches to Hominid Evolution. Foot and Ankle 1983 3(6): 391-407. (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/6409717)

3. Rolian C, et al. Walking, running and the evolution of short toes in humans. 
Journal of Experimental Biology 2009 212: 713-721. (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/19218523)

4. Wilkinson M and Saxby L. Form determines function: Forgotten application to the human foot? . Foot and Ankle Online Journal 2016 9(2): 5-8. (https://faoj.org/2016/06/30/form-determines-fun...)

5. Wilkinson M, Stoneham R, and Saxby L. Feet and footwear: Applying biological design and mismatch theory to running injuries. International Journal of Sports and Exercise Medicine.
2018 4(2). (https://clinmedjournals.org/articles/ijsem/inte...)

6. D'Aout K, et al. The effects of habitual footwear use: foot shape and function in ntaive barefoot walkers.Footwear Science 2009 1(2): 81-94. (http://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1080/1942...)

7. Mei Q, et al. A comparative biomechanical analysis of habitually unshod and shod runners based on foot morphological difference. Human Movement Science 2015 42: 38-53. (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/25964998)

8. Shu Y, et al. Dynamic loading and kinematics analysis of vertical jump based on different forefoot morphology. SpringerPlus 2016 5: 1999. (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC51...)

9.  Munteanu SE, et al. Hallux valgus, by nature or nurture? A twin study. Arthritis Care and Research 2017. (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/27863158)

10. Nix S, Smith M, and Vicenzino B. Prevalence of hallux valgus in the general population: a systematic review and meta analysis. Journal of Foot and Ankle Research 2010 3: 21. (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/20868524)

11. Vorobiev G. Evolution of injuries in athletics. New Studies in Athletics 1999 4: 23-26. 

12. Travell J and Simons D, Myofascial Pain and Dysfunction: The Trigger Point Manual. 1993: Lippincott Williams & Wilkins

13. Knowles FW. Effects of shoes on foot form: An anatomical experiment. The Medical Journal of Australia 1953 1(17): 579-581. (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/13062868)

story:
The NION Purity Hands Anti-Bacterial Hand Scrubber is a novel product for us. Its main goal is to address the global health crisis we face today. Through the campaign we are contributing proceeds from the campaign to the International Red Cross to help fight the COVID 19 pandemic.



The COVID-19 pandemic has changed our world and society in unprecedented ways. Correct hygiene practices is the important new norm of life. Besides of social distancing and face masks there is actually another more dire issue at hand! Are your hands clean?
 

Did You know?


SOFT AND FLEXIBLE SILICON - it easily bends to the shape of your hand

 

Ultra Fine Silicone Bristles - Makes it easier to clean finger tips and under finger nails.

 

Compact Card Shaped Easy To Carry - Take it with you everywhere you go, use it every time you wash your hands.

 

HOW TO USE YOUR NION HAND SCRUBBER
 

 

 

HOW TO USE YOUR NION HAND SCRUBBER WITH SANITIZERS

 


About Our Materials

NEGATIVE ION INFUSED SILICONE




WHO IS NION?

Founded in 2015 from Seattle WA, we are dynamic skincare experts from the USA. Our experts have drawn on one of nature’s most extraordinary marvels: S-ion Technology (Negative ions merged with silicone) - to bring the good clean back to your skin. We’re on a mission to make people all over the world glow with confidence. To guarantee success, we’ve enlisted the very best tools Mother Nature has to offer. NION Beauty is revolutionizing skincare, combining cutting-edge advances in materials science with leading dermatological research to produce a range of beauty products that are years ahead of the competition. Find out more about us www.nionbeauty.com

story:
have you heard of plasmalogens?
learn more:

 

Hello!

My name is Dr. Dayan Goodenowe. I am an expert on neurodegenerative diseases. I was the first to discover low blood plasmalogen levels in Alzheimer’s disease and dementia and I first published research in 2007 about plasmalogens in the cause of Alzheimer’s. Plasmalogens are a special type of lipid molecule that your brain cells need to function normally. Since then, the causative role of plasmalogens has expanded to include other neurodegenerative diseases including Parkinson's and multiple sclerosis. There are now numerous independent scientific studies linking low plasmalogens with neurodegeneration. Based upon this collective information, the Alzheimer’s Association is funding a clinical trial to test our Prodrome-Neuro Plasmalogen Oil supplement in Alzheimer’s patients (begins in 2020).

 

 

Pre-order Today!

Pre-order our Prodrome-Neuro Plasmalogen Oil supplement today! Right now it is sold for research use only. Before offering our supplement for personal use we need to reach a few important milestones.

 

SPREAD THE WORD

We appreciate your support in any way! Sharing this campaign with your friends and family to spread the word about plasmalogens would be amazing. Follow us on social media so you can keep up to date with the latest research and milestones.

 

Science

Our plasmalogen oil supplement is backed by strong scientific evidence and is scientifically designed by Dr. Dayan Goodenowe who is an expert on the biochemical basis of diseases.

 

Recent clinical trial results from the Rush University Memory and Aging Project

The Rush University Memory and Aging project has been going on for over 17 years and has enrolled thousands of healthy elderly persons and tracked their health yearly. 

In summary, the results show that...

 

Breaking it down a bit more:

1. Who had dementia?

People with high levels of plasmalogens have lower and lower rates of dementia. People with low levels of plasmalogens have higher and higher rates of dementia.

 

2. Who got dementia?

People with high levels of plasmalogens were 80% less likely to get dementia over a 6 year period.

 

3. Who died?

This was the the scariest graph Dr. Goodenowe made. It showed who actually died. People with high plasmalogen levels lived longer. 

A 95 year old person with high plasmalogen levels had the same chance of living to their 100th birthday as a 65 year old person with low plasmalogens had of living to their 70th birthday.

 

For those who want to dig deep into the extensive science backing the causative role of plasmalogens in neurodegenerative diseases, watch Dr. Goodenowe's scientific presentation on the topic: 

 

Product Comparison

Plasmalogen supplements have been commercialized in the last few years. They are all a very low dose (less than 15 mg, compared to our 900 mg dose!), lower than what has been shown to have an effect. The other supplements are also a different type of plasmalogen that has low bioavailability when ingested - unlike our Prodrome-Neuro plasmalogen oil that has been scientifically designed for optimal, targeted biological activity.

 

 

DISCLAIMER

  1. Our products and services are not intended to diagnose or treat any disease. You should always seek the advice of your physician or other healthcare provider with any questions you have regarding the diagnosis, cure, treatment, mitigation, or prevention of any disease or other medical condition or impairment of status of your health. We do not provide medical advice. The research information provided has not always been clinically validated. 
  2. None of the statements above or in any of our other materials, including but not limited to our website and videos, have been evaluated by the FDA.
  3. The prices do not include taxes, shipping, or any import or customs duties or fees. If applicable, you are responsible for all shipping, taxes, or import and customs duties or fees which may be assessed prior to or after shipping.
  4. GEOGRAPHICAL REGIONS. We cannot promise that we will be able to ship to all locations in the world. It is your responsibility that if you are outside of North America or Japan, you are able to order and receive this product, which will be shipped from Temecula, California, USA.

story:
Doctor Tested, Doctor Approved.

Vision is our most important sense, yet most people take it for granted.  You need to do more for your eyes. NOW.

That's why we have created the EyeQue Vision Monitoring Kit, an assembly of our award-winning and best-selling tools with the latest software (25,000+ units in the market today). All you need is a smartphone for the most convenient and personalized eye care.

Insight Plus: Anyone 6+ can screen their vision in about a minute

 

VisionCheck: Using MIT patented tech, adults can update RX glasses with the results

 

PDCheck: Say "cheese"! Snap a selfie to get the best fitting glasses

 

Bundle it: Get it all in a travel case

✅ Measure your visual acuity, contrast sensitivity, color perception, and your refractive correction (degree of nearsightedness, farsightedness, and astigmatism).

✅ Get new glasses using your EyeGlass Numbers, the refraction corrective values*, sphere, cylinder, and axis, from select online retailers.

✅ Track vision changes with our proven technology.

✅ Check whether your current glasses or contacts are correcting your vision to 20/20 (normal range) as they should.

✅ Share the entire kit with everyone you love. 

*EyeQue's refraction corrective values, EyeGlass Numbers®, are NOT prescriptions and does not replace regular eye exams. 

 

What's in the box?

The EyeQue Vision Monitoring Kit comes with everything you need for your eyes:  Screen, Test, & Verify!

 

THE PERFECT GIFT

This EyeQue Vision Monitoring Kit makes an incredible gift and can be shared with everyone you love. SHIPPING NOW!!!

EyeQue Insight Plus

NEW AND IMPROVED! The EyeQue Insight app is updated with more comprehensive features like the ability to create and manage multiple user profiles and at-a-glance vision tracking charts. For a more intuitive test-taking experience, we've developed accessories like the head mount and a Bluetooth enabled remote control.

Confirm if you are seeing 20/20 in less than a minute and check for color perception and contrast sensitivity. Works for everyone ages 6 and up. Use the results to monitor vision changes and know when you need to visit an eye care professional.

Insight Plus Features:

  • Sleek and lightweight binocular device with head mount
  • Bluetooth enabled remote control for improved usability; comes with an ergonomic holder! 
  • Industry standard Snellen and ETDRS visual acuity tests; Ishihara color deficiency test, and Pelli-Robson contrast sensitivity test.
  • Each screening session takes about a minute
  • Tests for individual eye performance as well as dual eye
  • Letters are randomly generated so there's no memorization at play
  • International conversion system included: not familiar with 20/20? Use the metric system (6/6), decimal system (1.0) or logMAR (0.0). Ready to be used around the globe.
  • Highly scalable platform for added tests in the future
  • Unlimited testing and data storage
  • App and membership is free and you can add as many user profiles as you'd like
  • No subscription fees

 

Use the new Bluetooth remote control for tests and navigation

 

Industry standard "Tumbling E" letters; swipe or click in the direction of the opening side of the letter "E". Great for kids too!

 

EyeQue VisionCheck

Test your vision whenever, wherever. Our MIT patented technology measures your refractive error- your level of nearsightedness, farsightedness, and astigmatism. Get spherical, cylindrical and axis numbers to monitor specific vision changes closely. After a few rounds of tests, you can obtain a set of EyeGlass Numbers, which you can use to order glasses from select online retailers, or share the results with your eye doctor. VisionCheck is a self-administered vision test and does not evaluate your ocular health. We recommend regular eye doctor visits!

 EyeQue VisionCheck Features:

  • Bluetooth-enabled optical device works with our free EyeQue VisionCheck smartphone app (iOS and Android)
  • Accurately tests for nearsightedness, farsightedness (-10D to +8D), and astigmatism (0D to -5D)
  • Provides recommended power for reading glasses
  • Comprehensive tutorial and practice session
  • Game-like interface: overlap lines and repeat 9 times per eye
  • Takes an average of 30 minutes to achieve your first set of EyeGlass Numbers
  • Test results can be used to order eyeglasses from select online retailers
  • Monitor your refraction changes by viewing your personalized vision report 
  • Device can be shared. Each person must have his/her own account to avoid data mixing which leads to inaccurate results.
  • Device purchase comes with one All Access Membership for the first year; each additional account is $4.99 per year for VisionCheck

 

Tap the touch sensors to move the red and green lines

Like a game: overlap the lines into one solid yellow line. Repeat 9 different angles per eye

 

EyeQue PDCheck

Accurately measure your pupillary distance in seconds. Put on our proprietary PDCheck frames and snap a selfie (or ask a friend to take your picture), adjust alignment markers if necessary, and you are done! Your PD is one of the most critical numbers needed to order a proper fitting set of eyeglasses. You can also use the number to set the PD on your Insight Plus vision screener and even your VR headset. 

EyeQue PDCheck Features:

  • Patent-pending frames with special markers for alignment
  • Works with the free PDCheck app (iOS and Android)
  • Flexible and one-size-fits-all
  • Easy to use- as simple as snapping a picture
  • Get instant results
  • Accurate to within +/-1 mm
  • Friend mode: use it on friends and email them their PD
  • Unlimited usage and data storage
  • A free, basic EyeQue membership is required

 

 

Why EyeQue?

EyeQue is the leader in at-home vision care. 

We have four successful products and crowdsourcing campaigns under our belt since 2016. But don't just take our word for it. We've been recognized by the prestigious CES innovation awards three times, as well as the photonics industry's Prism award. Our first-generation Insight vision screener has received the National Parenting Center's seal of approval, and has been honored as Product of the Year by Creative Child Magazine. 

We've been reported and recognized in the technology and vision industry for the past three years.

What eye doctors say:

 

With over 25,000 happy customers (and counting), check out what they have to say: 

Yes, these are REAL feedback from our customers!

World-class support

You are never alone! Our US-based customer support team is available through our support email or online chat. 

 

What's NEW you ask?

We took our award-winning Insight and made it even easier to use and more insightful (no pun intended) with enhancements to both software and hardware. 

Insight Plus boasts a brand new iOS/Android app chock-full of new stuff.

New! At-a-glance tracking table - enhanced in-app visualizations of test results and result tracking over time.

New! Profiles feature -  add multiple user profiles to one account and easily switch profiles between tests and test takers. Great for families or organizations to quickly screen multiple people with a single device. 

New! Edit capabilities - did you swipe “left”when you really meant to swipe “right”? Now you can  correct a mistake during a test, plus you can delete individual test results from the app, right on the dashboard.

New! ETDRS visual acuity test - an even faster way to test for 20/20 (about 30 seconds!). Love the Snellen chart? That’s still there too! 

New! Offline testing capability - temporarily disconnected from the Internet? No problem. Screen now, upload later. Once you regain an Internet connection, your test data will be uploaded to the EyeQue Cloud automatically. 

New! More detailed result definitions - we’ve added more information behind the test results, so you’ll learn even more about your personal vision.  

New! The Insight Plus accessory pack -  test taking is now more accessible.

  • Adjustable mount to secure your smartphone to the Insight goggles and the goggles to your head, leaving your hands free to focus on inputs.
  • A Bluetooth-enabled handheld remote control for an intuitive test taking experience, plus…
  • A game-like controller holder, designed for children’s smaller or adult’s larger hands, or those with low dexterity.

 

How It Works

Insight Plus:

VisionCheck:

PDCheck:

The Science

EyeQue's intelligent vision solutions are based on MIT patented and proprietary technologies and use complex optical devices and smartphone applications. Our product are self-administered vision tests that can be used anywhere, anytime. 

We cannot explain the science without explaining the human eye first. Nearsightedness, farsightedness, and astigmatism occur when the eye lens and eye distance are “out of sync". Normal distance vision is the result of the light entering the eye and focusing exactly on the retina, where the brain interprets sharp images. Common deviations from normal vision, nearsightedness, or myopia, occurs when the lens focuses the light before your retina; Farsightedness, or hyperopia, occurs when the lens focuses the light past your retina, both causing the brain to interpret "blurry" images. Almost 50% of the human population has some degree of nearsightedness, farsightedness, or astigmatism. These conditions are also known as "refractive errors".

EyeQue Insight Plus

The Insight Vision Screener represent a complex work of art and technology. Within each device exist several aspheric optical lenses that de-magnifies the screen, creating the perfect 20-feet distance of the “tumbling E” images in a dark room with only 6 inches between your screen and your eyes.

The EyeQue Insight uses the industry-standard Snellen and ETDRS visual acuity tests, the Ishihara color blindness test, and the Pelli-Robson contrast sensitivity test.

The sleek binocular design is lightweight (less than 8 ounces, not including smartphone), durable, safe, and easy to hold; comes fully assembled. One-size-fits-all design with PD (pupillary distance) adjustments so one device can be used for everyone in the family. 

 

EyeQue VisionCheck

The EyeQue VisionCheck is an optical device that achieves the effect of a variable corrective lens as it translates pixel spacing on the smartphone screen to corrective powers. To simulate the effect of converging or diverging rays into your eye that a correction lens would provide. You simply move the pixels on the screen closer or further to emulate the effect of a corrective lens by overlapping the red and green lines. VisionCheck can determine corrections from a range of + 8D to – 10D. Think of the VisionCheck as a custom converter of pixel spacing to optical power.

VisionCheck uses your smartphone's high-resolution display to work; with a pixel spacing on the order of .07 mm (70 microns) or better– comparatively, about the diameter of a human hair. VisionCheck works well for smartphones down to 250 pixels per inch (PPI). Any PPI below 250 means that the resolution is too low for it to be optometrically accurate.

The device projects two parallel beams of light that comes from the smartphone display into your eyes and onto your retina; The beams of light are red and green lines formed by illuminated pixels on your phone, separated by 2.5 mm when they leave the device, so that they can fit through your pupil.

Using interactive touch sensitive buttons, the user overlaps the two lines to form what looks like one yellow line. Based on the amount of pixel movement made, EyeQue calculates the user's refractive error in that particular direction. The device then rotates the lines to another angle and you repeat the measurement. Measuring the refractive power over a number of different angles gives the sphere, cylinder, and axis needed to correct your vision with eyeglasses. The method works for most people who are willing and able to follow the instructions we provide.

EyeQue PDCheck

The PDCheck is a simple, elegant design that can measures pupillary distance in seconds using our special frames and smartphone app. Our patented PDCheck technology uses the smartphone camera to take a “selfie” and extracts the PD to an accuracy of +/- 1 mm.

The patent-pending EyeQue PDCheck Frames have three "T" marks; two near each edge and one in the center. The PDCheck mobile app uses image processing the detect the locations of the T-marks, as well as the pupils of the user.  As an added layer of accuracy assurance, once the picture is taken, the user has the opportunity to adjust the location cursors (green "+" signs), making sure that they fall on the T-marks and pupils. The result is an incredibly accurate PD measurement, rivaled only by in-person measurements at office visits.

 

Who is EyeQue?

We are a small team of passionate individuals who believe that technology can change the world. In our minds, clear vision is a right, not a privilege. We are dedicated to putting affordable, accurate, and convenient vision tests into the hands of millions of people.

 
 

Tech Specs

 

 

SHIPPING NOW! 

EyeQue ships worldwide. To guarantee delivery and tracking of your package, UPS shipping may be required for certain locations. EyeQue is not responsible for any customs, duties, and taxes when shipping outside of the US.

EyeQue does not issue prescriptions. The EyeQue VisionCheck® and EyeQue Personal Vision Tracker® accurately measure for refractive error and detect changes between regular eye exams when properly used. These tests do not replace a comprehensive eye exam that evaluates ocular health and binocularity. EyeQue strongly recommends people visit an eye care professional regularly to receive a complete eye health exam.

 


As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.

We are dedicated to putting affordable, accurate, and convenient vision tests into the hands of millions of people.  Tech Specs  SHIPPING NOW! EyeQue ships worldwide. To guarantee delivery and tracking of your package, UPS shipping may be required for certain locations. EyeQue is not responsible for any customs, duties, and taxes when shipping outside of the US.EyeQue does not issue prescriptions. The EyeQue VisionCheck® and EyeQue Personal Vision Tracker® accurately measure for refractive error and detect changes between regular eye exams when properly used. These tests do not replace a comprehensive eye exam that evaluates ocular health and binocularity. EyeQue strongly recommends people visit an eye care professional regularly to receive a complete eye health exam. As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.

story:
Is there a snorer in your bedroom?

Hupnos detects, tracks, and eliminates snoring.

 

What is Hupnos?

Hupnos is an intelligent sleep mask that analyzes your snoring habits and takes gentle steps to fix it. All you have to do is wear it and whenever the mask detects that you’re snoring, it will send gentle vibrations to the Hupnos Sleep Mask to cue you to change positions and open your airways.

How it Works

Hupnos makes use of a treatment known as EPAP (Expiratory Positive Airway Pressure). We’ve spent many months designing hardware and software that can bring EPAP technology to a fully-functional luxury sleep mask.

The mask uses a built-in accelerometer to monitor your movement as you sleep, track your snoring patterns, and automatically apply the sleep treatment known as EPAP to eliminate your snoring.

Our powerful smartphone application gives you real-time data on your snoring patterns based on multiple factors. It then communicates with the mask, which monitors your movement with a built-in accelerometer.

Based on the sleep data, the application will decide whether or not to send you a tiny vibrational cue to change positions or increase your expiration pressure, which opens your airways.

The overall design and system is the result of over fifty user-testing cycles of the Hupnos sleep mask. We have perfected the design. It’s different from anything else out there.

It will stop your snoring and leave you and your partner feeling refreshed, rested, and full of energy.

Has Snoring Hurt Your Relationship?

It’s the big elephant in the room. Persistent snoring leads to many restless nights and weary mornings for your partner.

At first, it seems harmless or is even a bit cute, but over time, it can affect your work, family, friends, and be a source of tension in your relationships.

We’ve heard about many couples relationship stress caused by snoring.

Julie Bane was pestered by her husband for years about losing sleep over her snoring. Constantly having to shake her awake so he could sleep was exhausting for both of them. And the issue spilled into the day, too. “It made me irritable because I wasn't sleeping well, and I'd be crabby the next day,” she remembers.

Angela Durrant, 48, was so sleep-deprived because of partner David Bazley’s snoring that she struggled to concentrate at work.

"I’ve often had to explain to my bosses why I’m not feeling my usual self. After being kept awake by David half the night, I struggle to focus because my head is so foggy.”

Full-Time mom Christina Koutoula, 31 was so exhausted due to her husband Dimitrios’s snoring that she moved into the spare room.

"Dimitrios and I have slept apart on and off for years but four months ago I moved into the spare bedroom permanently. I couldn’t take it a moment longer.”

This problem has an easy fix. It shouldn’t be causing you sleepless nights or affecting your relationship. If you’ve finally had enough and want to stop you or your partner’s snoring for good, then we’d love to tell you a bit about Hupnos.

Hupnos is different from every other solution out there when it comes to snoring. By now, you might have tried mouth guards, special pillows, nasal sprays, nostril dilators, and even herbal remedies.

We did too. They didn’t work. Some worked for a little while, but then you’ll go back to your old ways. Who knows, maybe your partner is even complaining about your consistent obstructive snoring.

It leads to sleepless nights, weary mornings, and a heck of a lot of stress.

What we’ve designed is completely different…

Real-Time Snore Detection

The FREE downloadable Hupnos app detects snoring and records it for you. You can easily see all the snoring through your night and track it so that you can figure out which factors hurt your sleep and which remedies help you to sleep perfectly.


 

You’ll never have to worry about your snoring again. You and your partner can customize the app to your lifestyle, making it easy to see:

  • The factors that influence your sleep (caffeine, stress, alcohol)
  • Sleep remedies you are trying and their direct effect
  • Your recorded sleeping patterns, including body position, snoring duration, and even the audio of your night!

This system combines the Hupnos sleep mask with a powerful smartphone app to give you real-time snore detection. 

Sleep Position Optimization

Our mask knows your position throughout the night. You’ll feel a gentle vibration via your mask if you are snoring while on your back. These gentle vibrations cue you to roll over without fully waking.

Snoring is caused by many different factors. It can come from mouth construction, where overweight individuals experience a narrowing of their airways due to throat tissue or an elongated uvula.

It can be due to a block nasal channel, chronic congestion, or a deviated nasal septum. Additionally, a “clogged hose” can occur where some patients who have a long soft palate, or large tonsils or adenoids, can narrow the airway and cause snoring.

Frequently, a poor sleeping position will force the closure of your upper airway, putting undue stress on your uvula. The Hupnos app analyzes when this occurs and then, through tiny vibrations, signals your body to change positions and then if snoring continues it activates the EPAP in the mask which increases the exhalation pressure so you stop snoring.

You don’t have to worry about any of this. It all does it automatically and you won’t even notice it while you’re sleeping.

Comfortable Fit

You’re getting a premium microfiber face mask with a easily adjustable rear head strap. We specifically designed Hupnos to be comfortable to wear and give you a luxurious sleeping experience.


 

The Hupnos mask is made with hypoallergenic, BPA-free, medical-grade material. It has a soft, gently, and form-fitted design. Based on the clinical study of 4,000 facial structures, Hupnos is guaranteed to fit your face perfectly.

Believe us, it’s so comfy, you won’t want to take it off!

Respiratory Airway Dilation

Our patent-pending mask will increase your exhilation pressure, which opens your airways, so you breathe quietly, WITHOUT SNORING.


 

Ever notice how you or your partner don’t snore when you’re awake?

It sounds silly to say, but it’s actually part of the core reason why we snore.

Snoring occurs because the muscles in the body relax during sleep, allowing your soft palate, tongue, and uvula to vibrate as air flows by them. When people are awake, these muscles are active, and the structures are much less likely to vibrate during breathing.

By dilating your airways, Hupnos ensures that your snoring is quickly remedied. Your air passages remain clear, leading to a restful night’s sleep for you and your loved one.

“Research has shown that chronic snoring has the potential to lead to changes in a person’s health including fatigue, headaches, irritability, and even depression. Simple, comfortable solutions to stop snoring can be the first step to enhancing your health," according to Dr. Leah Millheiser of Stanford University.

Travel-Ready and Easy to Clean

Take it with you wherever you sleep. The detachable face mask is machine-washable. The removable silicone nose piece can be cleaned with an alcohol wipe.


 

You can take Hupnos wherever you go, including:

  • On an airplane
  • At your hotel on a business trip
  • Vacations with your family
  • Or even in your office for a quick nap

It fits perfectly into any small suitcase, backpack, or even purse.

How Hupnos Stacks Up

Dimensions

Size: 11in x 4.25in x 1.75in

Weight:  4 ounces

Sensors

  • Temperature
  • 3-Axis Accelerometer

Connectivity

  • Bluetooth 4.0 LE Connectivity
  • iOS and Android

​Power

  • Charge from any USB port
  • Battery
  • 300mAh (20+ hours of monitoring time)

What's In The Box?

Here is one of our first users sharing her unboxing experience

 
Hupnos Sleep Mask

Removable  silicone nose  piece can be cleaned with an alcohol wipe, and the remaining mask can be machine-washed.

  • Premium  microfiber,  form-fitted mask  with a gentle, soft  feel.
  • Constructed  with medical-grade,  hypo-allergenic, BPA-free  materials
  • Adjustable  rear head strap

FREE Downloadable Hupnos Sleep App

This app is customizable, easy to use, and can track your sleeping habits. It can help you measure the effect of sleep remedies, record your body position throughout the night, and more. 

You'll also get a: 

  • Micro USB to USB cable
  • Quick Start Guide

 

Team

Our Story

Our founder was receiving complaints of his snoring becoming bad. After trying everything he could buy he stepped back and looked at core technologies that were proven and efficacy was high. CPAP machines were the highest on the list for efficacy, but people don’t always wear them and they are perhaps too much for people who only snore.

Another treatment is EPAP (Expiratory Positive Airway Pressure). EPAP had high efficacy but users again had difficulty using the device. Our founder has experience in designing hardware and software which is easy to use and so began to design a sleep mask which used EPAP technology to reduce snoring. Sleep masks are considered a luxury by many people and provide a comfortable refuge from the busy daytime world.

We immediately began user testing to improve the user experience following modern practices in Lean Design promoted by Eric Ries, author of The Lean Startup. The main issue we found with our user tests were people had difficulty falling asleep with the increased expiratory pressure. The users fell asleep while breathing through their mouth and woke with a dry mouth because they breathed through it all night.

A second issue was the users did not know how much pressure they needed to use. So we designed an EPAP system controlled by a smartphone app. The app listens to a user and decides if he/she is snoring. The EPAP is off until the user snores. Pressure is applied by closing the expiratory valve until the snoring goes away. It is opened if the user is sensed to be awake. We determine if the user is awake by monitoring movement with an accelerometer built into the mask.

We have completed over fifty lean cycles of learning now with user testing of our Hupnos sleep mask and are continue to make improvements to what we think is by far the best anti-snoring device available.

 

Getting Started

 
 

Help Us Spread the Word

Our Partners

As a contributor, we will always keep you informed about how the seed that you are helping us plant will go on to benefit children in need. (and you will become a part of the Lemon Tea Club 4 good! :-)

story:
No matter who you are or where you live, you should be able to drink a glass of water in your home, neighborhood or school without worrying that it will make you sick. This isn’t a reality for more than a million Californians however according to California’s Human Right to Water Bill, access to safe drinking water is a basic human right.

Approximately 25 percent of California’s 9,846 schools do not meet the state and federal mandate to provide free, fresh drinking water to school children at mealtimes. We estimate that more than 500 California schools do not provide safe drinking water at all to their students because of recurring safe drinking water compliance violations.

To address these issues, Rural Community Assistance Corporation (RCAC) is partnering with Community Water Center (CWC) and Pueblo Unido Community Development Corporation (PUCDC) in an innovative pilot program called Agua4all. This program aims to increase access to and consumption of clean drinking water in California, starting with the communities of South Kern County and the Eastern Coachella Valley. Through the Agua4All pilot program, RCAC is installing 120 water dispensers in schools and other public places throughout these two areas. (The water bottle filling station pictured above is an EXAMPLE of the many water dispensers we are installing.) These water dispensers will provide water treatment where necessary to filter out arsenic or other contaminants so that residents will finally have access to potable water. Reusable bottles will also be made available to optimize access.

The two local community partners, CWC and PUCDC, are providing on-the-ground support for the year-long pilot.

(Pictured above are students at the San Jose Community Learning Center where we recently installed two water dispensers and related infrastructure through the help of a crowdfunding campaign like this one.)

Your donation to this campaign will help us to ensure that California students and families have access to safe, affordable drinking water.

(Pictured above is the water dispenser we recently installed at the La Familia School  in Eastern Coachella Valley.)

This is an interim solution, but it’s needed urgently. Every day children in these schools are exposed to harmful contaminants, like arsenic, that are found in their current water. We can’t encourage them to drink water as a healthy alternative to sodas or other sugary beverages because their water is unsafe. How are we to teach children that drinking water is a healthy option if we can’t provide safe drinking water in their schools and/or their homes?

Permanent solutions, which include upgrading local community water systems and treating harmful contaminants so that the water is at a safe level, are very costly to implement and maintain. In the meantime, Agua4All provides an interim solution that could positively affect more than a million Californians’ health as we expand across the state. This replicable model that RCAC and partners have developed in the Kern and Coachella pilot communities can be used to expand access to safe drinking water to children and their families throughout California.

With your help we can achieve this. Your donation will allow us to exceed our goal of installing 120 water dispensers in Kern and Coachella and expand our program during the next year.

With your assistance, Agua4All will address two significant public health concerns: a lack of affordable access to safe drinking water and disproportionate consumption of soda and other sugary drinks.

Access to Safe Water:

Between the two pilot locations of South Kern County and the Eastern Coachella Valley, the water bottle filling stations will provide safe water access to as many as 150,000 residents.

Currently, much of the water in these two communities is not safe for drinking, and may not be safe for washing or cooking. Poor quality is a result of naturally occurring and human-caused contaminants in the water, like arsenic, that can cause many health problems.

According to the World Health Organization, long-term arsenic consumption can cause cancer and skin lesions. Arsenic consumption also has been associated with developmental defects, cardiovascular disease, neurotoxicity and diabetes.

Offering an Alternative to Soda and Other Sugary Drinks:

A lack of access to safe drinking water makes it a lot more difficult for Californians to maintain healthy lifestyles. Without safe water, the nearest and most affordable beverage options are often sodas and other sugary drinks.

In California, 41 percent of children, 62 percent of adolescents and 24 percent of adults drink at least one soda or other sugar-sweetened beverage every day.

The situation is at its most dire in rural communities where residents lack access to safe drinking water. In a recent California Health Interview survey, 73 percent of South Kern and 58 percent of Eastern Coachella Valley children drank sugar-sweetened beverages the day before the survey was administered, as compared to just 40 percent of children surveyed statewide.

Regardless of location, adults who drink one or more sodas or other sugar-sweetened beverages every day are 27 percent more likely to be overweight or obese. Agua4All offers Californians safe drinking water as a healthy beverage alternative to help address this health concern.

The $50,000 we seek will go toward installing 10 brand new water bottle filling stations in the communities of South Kern County and Eastern Coachella Valley. In addition to the stations themselves, your donations can provide residents with the following:

  • $20 could provide 3 re-usable water bottles for school children
  • $50 can help to educate 20 students on the benefits of choosing fresh water over soda or other sugary drinks
  • $250 could cover the cost of one certified point-of-use arsenic filter
  • $500 could pay for the installation costs of one water bottle filling station

Your generous donations will also be used for operation and maintenance costs, water treatment costs, program coordination and administration, and program communications and outreach.

First Giving deducts a 4 percent fee to process payments and send donation confirmations.

Indiegogo deducts a 3 percent fee to host the campaign if we reach our campaign goal. If not, Indiegogo deducts 6.75 percent.

You get the gift of providing easy access to safe water to people in rural California communities AND you can choose perk or no perk. It's up to you!

We know not everyone has the resources to contribute money to our campaign but there are other ways you can help. Spread the word. Share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter and other social media. Tell your friends and family about our Agua4All campaign. 

Founded in 1978, Rural Community Assistance Corporation (RCAC) provides technical assistance, training and financing so rural communities achieve their goals and visions. We serve 13 western states and the Pacific Islands. For nearly four decades, we have funded and guided sustainable projects in the areas of clean water; environmental infrastructure; affordable housing and leadership and economic development. Learn more: www.rcac.org 

The California Endowment (TCE) is a private, statewide health foundation with a mission to expand access to affordable, quality health care for underserved individuals and communities, and to promote fundamental improvements in the health status of all Californians.  Learn more: www.calendow.org

Pueblo Unido Community Development Corporation (PUCDC) is a nonprofit organization born from the initiative of community leaders with extensive experience and knowledge of local issues and concerns in rural areas of the Coachella Valley. Learn more: www.pucdc.org

The Community Water Center acts as a catalyst for community-driven water solutions through organizing, education, and advocacy in California’s San Joaquin Valley. The center helps build strategic grassroots capacity to address water challenges in small, rural, low-income communities and communities of color. Learn more: www.communitywatercenter.org

The Jamie Oliver Food Foundation (USA) is a California-based 501c3 nonprofit organization that works to bring food education to schools and youth groups, businesses and communities. It does this by raising awareness to galvanize policy changes at a local and national level, offering hands-on training to instill food skills and knowledge, and founding relationships to enable us to scale nationally. Learn more: www.jamieoliverfoodfoundation.org/
