Access to Safe Water:
Between the two pilot locations of South Kern
County and the Eastern Coachella Valley,
the water bottle filling stations will provide safe water access to as many as
150,000 residents. 

Currently, much of the water in these
two communities is not safe for drinking, and may not be safe for washing or
cooking. Poor quality is a result of naturally occurring and human-caused
contaminants in the water, like arsenic, that can cause many health problems.

According
to the World Health Organization, long-term arsenic consumption can cause cancer and skin lesions.
Arsenic consumption also has been associated with developmental defects,
cardiovascular disease, neurotoxicity and diabetes.
Offering
an Alternative to Soda and Other Sugary Drinks:
A lack of access to safe
drinking water makes it a lot more difficult for Californians to maintain
healthy lifestyles. Without safe water, the nearest and most affordable
beverage options are often sodas and other sugary drinks. 
In California, 41
percent of children, 62 percent of adolescents and 24 percent of adults drink
at least one soda or other sugar-sweetened beverage every day. 
The situation is at its
most dire in rural communities where residents lack access to safe drinking
water. In a recent California Health Interview survey, 73 percent of South Kern
and 58 percent of Eastern Coachella Valley children drank sugar-sweetened
beverages the day before the survey was administered, as compared to just 40
percent of children surveyed statewide. 
Regardless of location,
adults who drink one or more sodas or other sugar-sweetened beverages every day
are 27 percent more likely to be overweight or obese. Agua4All offers
Californians safe drinking water as a healthy beverage alternative to help address
this health concern.





The
$50,000 we seek will go toward installing 10 brand new water bottle
filling stations in the communities of South Kern County and Eastern
Coachella Valley. In addition to the stations themselves, your donations can provide
residents with the following:

$20 could provide
3 re-usable water bottles for school children
$50 can help
to educate 20 students on the benefits of choosing
fresh water over soda or other sugary drinks
$250 could cover
the cost of one certified point-of-use
arsenic filter

$500 could
pay for the installation costs of one water bottle filling
station



Your generous donations will also be used for
operation and maintenance costs, water treatment costs, program coordination
and administration, and program communications and outreach.
First Giving deducts a 4
percent fee to process payments and send donation
confirmations.
Indiegogo deducts a 3
percent fee to host the campaign if we reach our campaign
goal. If not, Indiegogo deducts 6.75 percent.

You get the gift of providing easy access to safe water to people in rural California communities AND you can choose perk or no perk. It's up to you!



We know not everyone has the resources to contribute money to our campaign but there are other ways you can help. Spread the word. Share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter and other social media. Tell your friends and family about our Agua4All campaign.  

Founded in 1978, Rural Community
Assistance Corporation (RCAC) provides technical assistance, training 
and financing so rural communities achieve their goals and visions. We 
serve 13
western states and the Pacific Islands. For nearly four decades, we have
 funded
and guided sustainable projects in the areas of clean water; 
environmental
infrastructure; affordable housing and leadership and economic 
development.
Learn more: www.rcac.org 
The
California Endowment (TCE) is a private, statewide health foundation with a mission
to expand access to affordable, quality health care for underserved individuals
and communities, and to promote fundamental improvements in the health status
of all Californians.  Learn more: www.calendow.org

Pueblo
Unido Community Development Corporation (PUCDC) is a nonprofit organization
born from the initiative of community leaders with extensive experience and
knowledge of local issues and concerns in rural areas of the Coachella Valley.
Learn more: www.pucdc.org



The Community Water Center acts as a catalyst for community-driven water solutions through organizing, education, and advocacy in California’s San Joaquin Valley. The center helps build strategic grassroots capacity to address water challenges in small, rural, low-income communities and 
communities of color. Learn more: www.communitywatercenter.org




The Jamie Oliver Food Foundation (USA) is a California-based 501c3 nonprofit organization that works to bring food education to schools and youth groups, businesses and communities. It does this by raising awareness to galvanize policy changes at a local and national level, offering hands-on training to instill food skills and knowledge, and founding relationships to enable us to scale nationally.

Learn more: www.jamieoliverfoodfoundation.org/

story:
Hello, My name is Gerry Washington
My campaign is about the

Magical Powers of Herbs

For centuries Our ancestors relied upon the earth for all our food and medicines.
Herbal products and herbal medicines is an ancient form of healing that have 
been used for centuries by our ancestors.
Herbal products and Herbal Medicines are still healing us.  
The Problem is us not believing in the healing powers that they do possess.
We depend not on the natural but more on the un-natural things.
The bad part is that we do it to ourselves daily; for instance
We all know if we are to be healthy in Mind Body and Spirit.
We must eat healthy and maintain putting healthy things In and On our bodies.
The old folk ways have been long been forgotten under-use and extinct for years
 But are becoming more popular today because of the Magical Healing Powers  
they hold with-in.

Hopefully with just a little effort and a little help from you, we hope to change our
 world back to its original power of  Natural  Products.
Inspired by this One Herbal Product, with many different uses and benefits.
We call this product Herbal Deluxe.
We have discovered that this product has proven to be effective on so many
 different platforms.
Herbal Deluxe is an excellent moisturizer, 
it cures any dry skin condition upon contact and your skin stays moisturized all day long.   
Also some other discoveries were made with Herbal Deluxe;   
Herbal Deluxe was being used all over the body and being used as a moisturizer;
It was placed underarms as well as other private areas on the body.

What was miraculous discovered is that (Herbal Deluxe) has the ability to
 absorb odor in those areas.
 I was amazed that such a natural product has the ability to moisturized and take away odor too,Wow
It is also discovered to be useful for burns bruises and other skin conditions.
The magical powers of Herbs is Magical Indeed.
Allow Herbal Deluxe to heal the skin you are in.
We tested Herbal Deluxe on other areas of the body
We tested it on the Hands, Mouth. Underarms. Groin and Feet.
From head to toe Herbal Deluxe has proven to be effective
 and up for more challenging odors.
I would consider this a Miracle Product indeed. 
Try it and see what benefits it can have and do for you.
This product has been called A Raw Skin Food, because we all know'
Raw foods are good for us Internally;
Herbal Deluxe is good for you Externally.
This product Naturally reduces wrinkling of the skin in addition to nourishing and moisturizing and providing vitamins and minerals directly on the skin.
Herbal Deluxe has many benefits all wrap up in one product,
a little goes a long way.
It is especially good for after showers and baths as the hard water.
can leave our skin extremely dry.
Herbal Deluxe softens the skin instantly, its an excellent moisturizer for dry skin.
Above all; Its A Powerful odor remover from anywhere on the body.
Its natural and it's chemical free,
Imagine; One product Herbal Deluxe.
a skin healer and a powerful odor remover from anywhere on the body.
All in One Product.
Imagine how much money time and plastic bottles you'll save,
and at the same time saving and healing your skin.
I am raising funds to make more of 
Herbal Deluxe and to Grow More Herbs and Food
and to produce more products with our herbs and to help make more bodies
externally chemical free.
We also plan to work with local communities to bring awareness to special herbs and food that we can grow and harvest at home.
Help Us To Grow and cultivate and continue to make Herbal Deluxe and other herbal products necessary to heal a nation with herbs and food.
We will use the funds to upgrade our growing facility.
And also be able to ship products with the use of a better computer program 
and record keeping software.
The Funds will help cover the cost of bills and  services as we grow;
and lastly you will be helping us to expand our line of product into retail stores.
please take a moment to make a contribution  and share this campaign, with family friends and social media,
 any amount you give is greatly appreciated.
I Thank You for your time and your contribution to Herbal Deluxe.
Sincerely,

story:
Greetings!

Thank you for checking out my project.  My name is Ahuva Gamliel.  I am a naturopathic doctor and licensed acupuncturist*.  My mission with this project is to help people on their journey of healing their mind-body-spirit.  Since the mind effects the body and the spirit, the goal of my meditations is to promote optimal wellbeing and cultivate inner peace.  Numerous health conditions today are stress-related, so if we can reduce stress, we can reduce illness!

My project involves creating meditation CDs for healing, stress reduction, relaxation and optimal wellbeing.  The meditations consist of positive affirmations, visualization as well as relaxation techniques. Besides the 5 samples for the CDs I am pre-selling here, I am also working on producing others which utilize Eastern medicine, Kabbalah, Psalms, Chakras, affirmations, and other spiritual practices for birthing, addictions, prosperity, healing, relationships, and many other topics.  These meditations are written so that people of all religious backgrounds can enjoy them.  They are universal and transcendent.

Each CD or MP3 will contain an audible guided-meditation with affirmations as well as background binaural beats.  The binaural beats contain various sound frequencies for training the brain subconsciously on the topic of the corresponding meditation.  The binaural beats consist of specially programmed nature sounds, soft music or other relaxing sounds.  In binaural recordings, different frequencies are sent to the left and right ears so for best results it is recommended to wear stereo earphones.   

By working on both the conscious mind as well as the subconscious mind simultaneously, we can achieve the best results.

*For more information about me and my healing and wellness practice, please visit www.mibaso.org or click here to my youtube channel where you can watch interviews of me on the news etc.  To check out my latest meditations please visit www.MeditationsForSuccess.com

 What We Need & What You Get

Each CD costs approximately $1,200 to produce.  This includes professional graphics design, sound technician, custom background music, production, and marketing (CD Baby, Amazon, etc).  So far we already have 11 scripts ready for production and need to raise $13,200 in order to fund all those projects.  We have additional titles for meditations which have not been written yet so any surplus funding will go to producing additional new projects.  If our goal of the initial 11 meditation CDs/MP3s is not met, we will use the funding to produce however many meditations that it will cover.

The following MP3 downloads are available for purchase via this pre-sale offer:

Chakra Balancing Meditation 33 minutes

This meditation combines deep breathing, visualization, and positive affirmations to balance the 7 major chakra centers of the body from head to foot.  Using color, sound, and repetition, we affirm and manifest perfect balance and harmony of the mind-body-spirit.

The background binaural beats assist in bringing stability and has a dynamic, stimulating, and energizing effect on the body-mind.  The sound energy healing beats combined with the relaxing guided meditation put many people to sleep but have no fear, your subconscious mind is still listening and the meditation will still be effective!
Here is a demo:
Spiritual Growth Meditation  20 Minutes

This meditation focuses on 5 universal principles and teachings which are a common thread for spiritual growth for people of all religious faiths and backgrounds. It combines conscious breathing, visualization, and positive affirmations for enhancing spiritual growth.  Using vibration, sound, and repetition, we create the perfect environment to manifest optimal spiritual potential.  For best results, practice this meditation daily.

The background binaural track for this meditation combines modern brainwave technologies with calming and ambient sounds to help you melt away stress and feel great.

Here is a sample of this meditation:

  


Optimal Weight Meditation 19 Minutes

This guided-meditation incorporates progressive muscle relaxation and a

visualization of a journey to meet your higher-self. It is suitable for anyone who

is overweight, underweight, or has body image issues. Using 8 positive

affirmations that are repeated 3 times each, your higher self will teach you

about 4 key emotional factors which are consistent with obtaining optimal

weight, self-image, and self-esteem. By addressing the mental and emotional

aspects of eating disorders and weight problems, we can achieve true and

lasting physical healing. Optimal weight realization is the natural

byproduct of mental and emotional healing. Internalizing these positive

messages can help to deprogram incorrect thoughts and emotions which are

blocking you from realizing your optimal weight, health and wellbeing.

The background music for this meditation contain binaural beats which

support will power, physical energy, ability for achievement, and

addiction treatment.

Here is a sample:


Smoking Cessation Meditation 25 Minutes

This guided-meditation incorporates progressive muscle relaxation and a

visualization of the benefits of quitting smoking. Using 8 positive affirmations that

are repeated 3 times each, the emotional factors which are consistent with

breaking the negative habit of smoking are addressed and you are given support

and empowerment to overcome the addiction of smoking. Internalizing these

positive messages can help to deprogram incorrect thoughts and emotions which

are blocking you from breaking this harmful habit. For additional smoking

cessation support, please see a qualified health care provider.

The background music for this meditation contain binaural beats which

support will-power, physical energy, ability for achievement, and addiction

treatment.

Here is a sample:


Self Empowerment Meditation 21 Minutes

This guided-meditation incorporates progressive muscle relaxation and a

visualization of a journey to meet your higher-self. Using 10 positive

affirmations that are repeated 3 times each, your higher self will teach you

about several emotional factors which are consistent with obtaining optimal

self-acceptance and self-esteem. Internalizing these positive messages can

help to deprogram incorrect thoughts and emotions which are blocking you

from realizing your optimal mental and emotional wellbeing.

The background music for this meditation contains the relaxing nature

sound of birds chirping and the binaural beats are programmed for

relaxation, mental clarity, good mood, and wellbeing.

Here is a demo:


Corporate sponsors of $1,200 will receive:

1. Advertisement in the form of their name/website on my YouTube video. 

2.  Their name on my website on the about us page: www.meditationsforsuccess.com

4.  Receive 7 FREE COPIES of the CD project that they funded.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us spread the word by:

Sharing our campaign in your social media (facebook, twitter, blog, newsletter, email, etc)

And remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

THANK YOU so much for sponsoring and participating in our campaign.

The background music for this meditation contains the relaxing nature

Here is a demo:

Corporate sponsors of $1,200 will receive:
1. Advertisement in the form of their name/website on my YouTube video. 
2.  Their name on my website on the about us page: www.meditationsforsuccess.com
4.  Receive 7 FREE COPIES of the CD project that they funded.
 


Other Ways You Can Help
Please help us spread the word by:
Sharing our campaign in your social media (facebook, twitter, blog, newsletter, email, etc)
And remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

 
THANK YOU so much for sponsoring and participating in our campaign.

story:
Hello,good people! My name is Lili and i,m retired MD with Sogren syndrome who can,t be cured properly in my country ...I suffer of dry eyes ,nose ,sinuses,mouth and throat,for short all my mucous membranes are so dry that they are not allowing me to see well because of lack of tears,breath well because of the nose& sinuses dryiness and eat proper because of the Dry mouth & throught ...i live in constant pains and lack of air and i suffer a lot.I also have many allergies,including an allergic asthma .If i am using decongestive drops or asthma spays  my blood pressure is rising and my heart rate too...in the last 10 days i ended 2 times in ER !! All the eye drops / ointments/ even Restasis that i tried  are causing me bad allergies in the nose and sinuses,causing congestion,pain and bleeding ....then asthma crisis because the nose is stuffed and even great anxiety because i can,t breath.....and recently vertigo crisis because the Eustachio tubes get stuffed too and damage  the vestibular nerve in the inner ear.....and so on...i can,t brake this vicious cercle! i,ve seen a lot of  specialist doctors here in Romania,they prescribed anything they knew ,nothing is working. ...the eye -doctor prescribes his neds,the otho laryngologist his own med,the  cardiologue cares only for the heart and blood pressure and gives you medication who dries even more your nose ...and so on....I explain you all of that because i want you to understand what is torture i live in,i have to  choose between seeing and breathing ...my eyes are hurting badly and my vision diminishes without artificial tears,but then my nose becomes stuffed and i can,t breath....what to choose? now ,for instance,in order to  be able to write here,i can,t breath well..because i used eye drops and my nose reacted ,like usually.... I found out there are Eye clinics who treat dry eyes condition with autologous serum drops made from the patient,s own blood most of them in the US very expensive......but ,I found one in Alicante/ Spain and i would like to go there,but i don,t have money. This is my last choice to improve,maybe even to heal my eyes .....they say the rate of recovery is 80% ! .I was a doctor myself,i am retired now at 58 years old..,with a small pension and i don,t have any family left. With all my savings my month income is 500$ ,which allows me only to exist...I,ve changed mails with the clinic and found out the prices,for short i need for each visit at least 2500$( 1000$ the consult and the drops for 3 months/ 6-700$ the flight / the rest for hotel & food) ....and i need to go at least 3 times there....I also want to  be admited in a good hospital specialised in autoimune  diseases who could  improve my condition ,but for the beginning i would only try to heal my eyes....if they will produce again tears ,thenose will i prive too...please help me! it was not easy for me to make my own campaign and to beg for money.. a friend told me about this site ....i asked for help all the people i knew,i wrote on FB too,but i ,ve  only received advices and ...books.  Believe i,ve tried everything i knew or been told by other doctors and nothing is working..acupuncture too,homeopathy,Bach flowers...
.i have days when i wished to be dead ...i can,t function any more....this is my only chance to survive,because i don,t know how long i will be able to  live like that...i just hope there still are people with kind hearts in this world...thank you for reading my sad story... ...Recently i found out there is another revolutionary treatment for dry eyes,the LIPI FLOW...again not available in my country, again ,expensive for my modest income...in fact few eye clinics have it in Europe in Italy,UK ,France and Germany ( ..there are many more in theUS,)I .need to go in one of them as soon as i can...my vision is geting worst and the vertigo too,nose too ...they are all related and i have to brake this vicious cercle somehow....need your help,my dear ones... God bless you all!

With all my savings my month income is 500$ ,which allows me only to exist...I,ve changed mails with the clinic and found out the prices,for short i need for each visit at least 2500$( 1000$ the consult and the drops for 3 months/ 6-700$ the flight / the rest for hotel & food) ....and i need to go at least 3 times there....I also want to  be admited in a good hospital specialised in autoimune  diseases who could  improve my condition ,but for the beginning i would only try to heal my eyes....if they will produce again tears ,thenose will i prive too...please help me! it was not easy for me to make my own campaign and to beg for money.. a friend told me about this site ....i asked for help all the people i knew,i wrote on FB too,but i ,ve  only received advices and ...books.  Believe i,ve tried everything i knew or been told by other doctors and nothing is working..acupuncture too,homeopathy,Bach flowers....i have days when i wished to be dead ...i can,t function any more....this is my only chance to survive,because i don,t know how long i will be able to  live like that...i just hope there still are people with kind hearts in this world...thank you for reading my sad story... ...Recently i found out  there is another revolutionary treatment for dry eyes,the LIPI FLOW...again not available in my country, again ,expensive for my modest income...in fact few eye clinics have it in Europe in Italy,UK ,France and Germany ( ..there are many more in theUS,)I .need to go in one of them as soon as i can...my vision is geting worst and the vertigo too,nose too ...they are all related and i have to brake  this vicious cercle somehow....need your help,my dear ones... God bless you all!

story:
To date, I have raised over $4,500 from my local community in Eastern Oregon. I've been busy giving Parkinson's speeches, selling "Pottery for Parkinson's" and have received generous business and personal donations. 


 
Hi, I’m Tanya! I am conducting research on the plant Mucuna pruriens, and its potential to treat Parkinson’s disease.

When my grandmother died from the ravages of Alzheimer’s disease 12 years ago, I was devastated. For 6 years she declined, losing her ability to communicate and interact with the world around her, she no longer recognized me, I was a frightening stranger to my once capable and compassionate grandmother. It was during those somber times that I made a sincere commitment to study medicine. From these heartbreaking early experiences, neuroscience became my passion.

Over the past 5 years I have been researching Parkinson’s and the plant Mucuna. My proposed research project will aid in my preparation for Naturopathic Medical School Fall 2016. 


My campaign is to raise $30,000 to fund 3 months of research to study the plant Mucuna at a College of Pharmacy in Southwestern India. This research is in conjunction with Amala Soumyanath Ph.D at Oregon Health and Science University (OHSU).

I am crowd funding because federal funds have faced huge budget cuts for science and research, the biggest hurdle for my research project is funding. Unfortunately, traditional medicine falls outside the realm of imminent grant funding. However, I am not letting this stop my passionate pursuit of Mucuna. Now, I am looking to crowd funding and my community of complementary health advocates to help support my research.

I plan to study Mucuna in its native environment. I will be working with tribes and JSS College of Pharmacy to collect and document ethnobotanical knowledge, and  lab analysis of the plant Mucuna for Parkinson’s research.


I graduated from the University of Portland (B.S., and minor in psychology) my emphasis was in neuroscience. Shortly after, I began volunteering at Oregon Health and Science University (OHSU) studying Mucuna & Parkinson’s disease.

 
My passion for neuroscience grew into an appreciation for natural medicine, and how it can protect and restore brain chemistry.

I became interested in naturopathic neurology, preventive medicine and traditional plant medicine or “ethnobotany” (how people historically used plants to treat illness). With all the wonderful advances of western medicine, we seem to have forgotten or bypassed the wisdom of traditional medicine and the possible cures plants possess.

My passion for neuroscience and natural medicine has led me to Mucuna, and I am excited to see how this plant will continue to inspire me and benefit Parkinson’s disease. I am also thrilled to expand Mucuna’s repertoire to other diseases and neurological imbalances, research has shown Mucuna has the potential to treat a myriad of illnesses (epilepsy, depression, ADHD, infertility, high cholesterol, high blood sugar, anxiety, drug additions, parasites and is very useful for bodybuilders). 
 


Mucuna (Mucuna pruriens, Mucuna L. Fabaceae)  has been used in Ayurvedic (the traditional Hindu system of medicine, translates as "life knowledge") medicine since 300 BC for the treatment of “kamptvata,”similar in diagnosis to Parkinson’s disease.

Also known as “Kapikachu,” “Atmagupta,” “Velvet Bean,” “Cowitch” and “Poona Kachi.” Mucuna is legume indigenous to tropical regions such as India, Hawaii, West Africa, and Central America. Mucuna is a vigorous annual (sometimes biannual), twining herb, stems extending up to 18m in length, with large trifoliate leaves.  Mucuna produces inflorescences in axillary racemes, up to 32 cm long with many flowers in shades of purple or white. Pods are oblong 4-13 cm long, with light brown hairs. Mucuna is self-pollinating. Interest exists in developing Mucuna species as a sustainable, edible cover crop. 

  

Mucuna seeds are high in the amino acid: levodopa 7% (L-DOPA) which is the precursor compound to the neurotransmitter dopamine. Dopamine is deficient in Parkinson’s disease. 


Mucuna is used occasionally as a minor crop for human consumption. In Mexico and Honduras the seeds are roasted as beans and used as a coffee substitute “Nescafe.” The beans can also be cooked and the young leaves can get eaten as vegetables high in minerals K, Mg, Ca, Fe, and lysine. 


    

                                            Pottery & Prints for Parkinson’s

Pottery for Parkinson’s - I’ve teamed up with John Denne (my papa) who has been honing the art of traditional southwestern Anazai & Prehistoric Pueblo handcoiled pottery for over 45 years. 

Prints for Parkinson’s – Whit Deschner (see video clip) has been living with Parkinson's for over 14 years. He is an amazing digital artist & published writer. He has travelled the world kayaking, exploring and taking pictures of his adventures. Whit has raised over $60,000 for Parkinson's research for OHSU (Oregon Health and Science University).                      

                                                     POTTERY for PARKINSON'S


                                                PRINTS for PARKINSON'S 

    
                                                
                                                       POTTERY for PARKINSON'S  




 




                                         
 

 

Departure: End of November (team of 3: Principal Investigator, Videographer, and Anthropologist).

The budget includes: airfare, train and bus fare to/from/in India for 3 people, room and board (on campus) for 3 months.

Lab/Equipment Costs: Lab Analysis (High Performance Liquid Chromatography (HPLC), Thin Layer Chromatography (TLC)), overhead costs at J.S.S. College of Pharmacy, (phytopharmacy lab electricity, chemical supplies) computer equipment. 

Field Costs: field interperator, soil analysis and field equipment, video equipment, field travel costs to tribal communities from Ooty. 

 

Clearly, plants and other natural products offer excellent sources of health-promoting medicines. Thus, it is extremely important that we enhance our capacity to further examine these traditional modalities and achieve a solid scientific understanding of their potential health benefits.

 

My proposed research is of conservational and medical significance. Indian tribal medicinal knowledge is being lost at an increasing rate due to the deforestation of tribal land for tea plantations.  Documenting the ecosystem and ethnobotanical factors that alter Mucuna will work to conserve traditional knowledge of the Irula and Paniya tribes and insure indigenous plant conservation. Conservation and scientific investigation of medical wisdom traditions is key to finding new modalities for healing.  

With your help we can archive the ethnobotany of Mucuna to facilitate future Parkinson’s research. 

 

Parkinson’s is a degenerative disease affecting the nervous system. The underlying cause is unknown; as of now, there is no known cure.

                                             PARKINSON’S STATISTICS

According to the Parkinson’s Disease Foundation, an estimated ~10 million people world wide are living with Parkinson’s disease, and this number does not reflect the thousands of cases that go undetected. As many as 1 million Americans are affected by Parkinson’s disease, which is more than the combined number of people diagnosed with multiple sclerosis, muscular dystrophy, and Lou Gehrig’s disease. Men are 1.5 times more likely to have Parkinson’s than women.

                                   WHAT DOES PARKINSON’S COST ?

It is estimated to cost ~$25 billion per year in the United States alone (this figure represents the combined direct and indirect cost, including treatment, social security payments and lost income from inability to work).

An average Parkinson’s patient will spend ~$2,500 a year, and therapeutic surgery can cost up to ~$100,000 dollars per patient.

                                                 ALARMING STATISTICS

According to the Journal of Neurology the number of worldwide cases of Parkinson’s disease is predicted to double in the next 25 years. The number of individuals with Parkinson’s disease in 15 of the world’s largest nations will double over the next generation.

Infectious diseases attract the greatest attention from research funding, however, it is non-communicable chronic diseases, such as Parkinson's, that represent a far greater burden in terms of economic and social cost to developing nations.

                         PARKINSON’S PATHWAY & CURRENT TREATMENT


Dopamine cannot cross the blood brain barrier (a selective semi-permeable membrane that protects the brain, it only allows selective chemicals to pass through), so in Parkinson’s treatment the patient is given levodopa (L-DOPA), which is the precursor compound to dopamine.

According to the Journal of Asia Pacific Clinical Nutrition, pharmacological treatment of Parkinson’s disease with synthetic L-DOPA/carbidopa is the most practical and effective physiological way, to-date, to ameliorate the underlying deficiency of endogenous dopamine release in the striatum. However, the pharmacokinetic properties of orally administered synthetic L-DOPA lead to fluctuating blood levels, generating ‘on-off’ fluctuations of motor performance in patients. Side-effects of this treatment are common (nausea, vomiting, constipation), and unfortunately long-term treatment can result in hallucinations.

                                         WHAT MUCUNA CAN OFFER

In clinical studies published in the Journal of Phytotherapy Research, Mucuna seed powder, which contains L-DOPA, has been shown to alleviate Parkinson’s dyskinesia (involuntary movement) more effectively, while suppressing symptoms longer than synthetic L-DOPA without producing ‘on-off’ fluctuations of motor performance.  Studies suggest that Mucuna may contain unidentified synergistic compounds that affect the pharmacokinetics of the seed’s L-DOPA in a way that enhances L-DOPA’s anti-Parkinson’s activity.

The Journal of Phytotherapy Research published a study stating that the active components in Mucuna have neuroprotective impacts on the substantia nigra and nigrastriatel pathways, and the high-fiber content of Mucuna also makes it a laxative that helps digestion and reduces constipation frequently problematic in Parkinson’s patients. Thus, the plant’s biological properties and naturally occurring compounds may offer safer, and improved, treatment alternatives for Parkinson’s disease.

                              

What key concepts are we missing, or what compounds haven’t yet been identified in Mucuna as useful for the treatment of Parkinson’s disease? It is my hope that my research will help to shed light on these key questions.

Plants are essential sources of medicine, they offer a diverse reservoir of biologically active components. To date, Mucuna has more L-DOPA than any other known plant in the world.

Mucuna protects from damaging chemical conversions that occur naturally as the body ages. Mucuna has shown to be neuroprotective  (it functions as an antioxidant and protects the brain from oxidative damage). Mucuna provides symptomatic relief; moreover, animal studies have indicated a neurorestorative effect in the dopamine neurons of the substantia nigra.  In Parkinson’s, the substantia nigra (the area of the brain containing cells that manufacture dopamine) are damaged or dying, and the brain loses the ability to manufacture these chemicals. Research on Mucuna may hold promising results for the treatment, prevention and even neurorestoration of brain areas affected by Parkinson’s disease.

                                                   MUCUNA SUPPORTS:

Nervous system- supports mental alertness and enhances nervous system function

Adaptogenic – increases resistance to stress (anxiety relief, eliminating addictive drug cravings, restful sleep, calming the nerves and uplifting the mood)

Adrenal tonic – strengthens/nourishes adrenal glands (works on the kidney adrenal meridian)

Antibacterial- suppresses/combats growth of bacteria

Antiviral- inhibits viral replication

Antiparasitic – ability to destroy/expel parasitic worms

Immune tonic – nourishes/strengthens the immune system

Reproductive tonic (both male & female)- strengthens/nourishes reproductive system

Aphrodisiac- increases libido and potency

Anti-convulsion- used to treat epilepsy

Antidepressant – works on dopamine pathways to restore balance

 


Traditionally Mucuna has been used in India as an anti-venom for snakes and scorpions, depression, epilepsy and to increase fertility and is used as an aphrodisiac.

Today Mucuna is used as a supplement for bodybuilders, it can increase the production of Human Growth Hormone (HGH). An increase in HGH levels can increase the body’s ability to build lean muscle and break down fat.

To control high cholesterol, it is abundant in the amino acid levodopa which has shown to lower cholesterol and blood sugar levels.  

Mucuna is used to treat Infertility, increase libido, erectile dysfunction and acts as an aphrodisiac. Mucuna can increase testosterone levels, and increases tissue resiliency.

                                                         OBJECTIVES

This project will (1) document ethnobotanical knowledge and practices regarding Mucuna cultivation and harvest; (2) investigate the chemical properties of seeds grown under different practices and ecosystems and their relation to medical use for Parkinson’s disease; and (3) preserve the medical wisdom tradition of the Irula and Paniya tribes to encourage the protection of the plant’s native habitat.

  

                                                  PROJECT ABSTRACT

The proposed field research will document ethnobotanical knowledge of the plant Mucuna cultivated by the Irula and Paniya tribes of the Niligri Hills, located in southwestern India.I will then conduct laboratory analysis to determine respective L-DOPA concentrations.

                                            THE MUCUNA HYPOTHESIS

I hypothesize that the two geographically distinct ecosystems of the Irula and Paniyas tribes will cultivate Mucuna seeds of containing varying L-DOPA concentrations. Under the supervision of Nilgiri Hills ethnobotanist Dr. Dhanabal (whom is the current principal at JSS College of Pharmacy).

I propose to document and compare the two ecosystems in which these tribes live, while also evaluating any differences in traditional cultivation and harvest practices of the Mucuna plant. I then propose to collect seed samples from the Mucuna plants cultivated and harvested by the two tribes. I will then conduct laboratory analysis to determine respective L-DOPA concentrations. Laboratory analysis will include High Performance Liquid Chromatography (HPLC), and Thin Layer Chromatography (TLC).

My goal is to better understand the factors that alter Mucuna seed chemistry, this project is intended to research ‘ideal growing’ conditions for the most potent Mucuna crop for Parkinson’s treatment.

                                                                                                                                         

                                                         METHODS

                                                  LAB PROCEDURES 



Document historical tribal knowledge that is being lost due to deforestation for tea plantations.  

Bring Mucuna into the Parkinson’s research limelight, to encourage future clinical research studies.

I intend to publish my research findings in conjunction with Oregon Health & Science University (OHSU). I plan to give informational lectures in grade/high schools upon return.

 Research will produce an ethnobotanical Parkinson’s documentary:  an ethnobotanical analysis of Mucuna pruriens, documenting tribal tradition for the treatment of Parkinson’s disease’.

This research opportunity will aid in my preparation for Naturopathic Medical School, where I will continue to research Parkinson’s disease, Mucuna and other neurological diseases. 

Scientific research and documentation of traditional knowledge is essential to ensure meaningful interrelationship between science and traditional knowledge. Ethnobotanical analysis of Mucuna will protect the valuable species and bring attention to its implications as a natural source of L-DOPA for the treatment of Parkinson’s disease.

 

Together we can bring awareness and hope to Parkinson’s disease, and work toward new avenues for treatment, prevention and neurological restoration.

I want to increase cultural sensitivity and awareness for the advancement of global medicine. I believe that the medical future is optimistic, and if we can implement preventative medicine sooner we will be able to halt many diseases before they manifest. 

I believe it is important, to scientifically study and carry on the wisdom of traditional medicine. Understanding historical plant knowledge is essential to finding modern cures.

is used as a supplement for bodybuilders,
it can increase the production of Human Growth Hormone (HGH). An increase in
HGH levels can increase the body’s ability to build lean muscle and break down
fat.

To control high cholesterol, it is abundant in the amino acid levodopa which has shown to lower cholesterol and blood sugar levels.  
Mucuna is
used to treat Infertility, increase libido, erectile dysfunction and acts
as an aphrodisiac. Mucuna can
increase testosterone levels, and increases tissue resiliency.


                                                         OBJECTIVES
This project will (1) document ethnobotanical knowledge and practices regarding Mucuna cultivation and harvest; (2) investigate the chemical properties of seeds grown under different practices and ecosystems and their relation to medical use for Parkinson’s disease; and (3) preserve the medical wisdom tradition of the Irula and Paniya tribes to encourage the protection of the plant’s native habitat.




  

                                                  PROJECT ABSTRACT
The proposed field research will document ethnobotanical knowledge of the plant Mucuna cultivated by the Irula and Paniya tribes of the Niligri Hills, located in southwestern India.I will then conduct laboratory analysis to determine respective L-DOPA concentrations.
                                            THE MUCUNA HYPOTHESIS
I hypothesize that the two geographically distinct ecosystems of the Irula and Paniyas tribes will cultivate Mucuna seeds of containing varying L-DOPA concentrations. Under the supervision of Nilgiri Hills ethnobotanist Dr. Dhanabal (whom is the current principal at JSS College of Pharmacy).
I propose to document and compare the two ecosystems in which these tribes live, while also evaluating any differences in traditional cultivation and harvest practices of the Mucuna plant. I then propose to collect seed samples from the Mucuna plants cultivated and harvested by the two tribes. I will then conduct laboratory analysis to determine respective L-DOPA concentrations. Laboratory analysis will include High Performance Liquid Chromatography (HPLC), and Thin Layer Chromatography (TLC).


My goal is to better
understand the factors that alter Mucuna seed chemistry, this project is
intended to research ‘ideal growing’ conditions for the most potent Mucuna crop
for Parkinson’s treatment.
                                                                                                                                         
                                                         METHODS





                                                  LAB PROCEDURES 




Document historical
tribal knowledge that is being lost due to deforestation for tea plantations.  
Bring Mucuna
into the Parkinson’s research limelight, to encourage future clinical research
studies. 
I intend
to publish my research findings in conjunction with Oregon Health & Science
University (OHSU). I plan to give informational lectures in grade/high schools upon return.
 Research
will produce an ethnobotanical Parkinson’s documentary:  an ethnobotanical analysis of Mucuna pruriens, documenting tribal tradition for the treatment of
Parkinson’s disease’.
This research
opportunity will aid in my preparation for Naturopathic Medical School, where I
will continue to research Parkinson’s disease, Mucuna and other neurological
diseases. 







Scientific research and documentation of traditional knowledge
is essential to ensure meaningful interrelationship between science and
traditional knowledge. Ethnobotanical
analysis of Mucuna will protect the valuable species and bring attention to its
implications as a natural source of L-DOPA for the treatment of Parkinson’s
disease. 

 
Together we
can bring awareness and hope to Parkinson’s disease, and work toward new avenues for treatment, prevention and
neurological restoration.
I want to
increase cultural sensitivity and awareness for the advancement of global
medicine. I believe that the medical future is optimistic, and if we can
implement preventative medicine sooner we will be able to halt many diseases before
they manifest.  
I believe it
is important, to scientifically study and carry on the wisdom of traditional
medicine. Understanding historical plant
knowledge is essential to finding modern cures.

story:
Poisoning My Love - The Backstory.

A while back, I was on a date with an amazing woman, and in my effort of wooing her, I offered to cook dinner at my place. Seriously what guy wouldn't? She had indicated some food preferences, including making sure whatever I made was "gluten free" due to a longstanding sensitivity she had, and from there, I just let my creativity flow. At the store, while picking up some items I made sure I read every ingredient and product label, and I even double checked with the grocery store clerk on some items. Well, needless to say, dinner was great, the mood was perfect, and the conversation was even better (yep, we're still dating)...and then about an hour after finishing dinner, she started itching her hands substantially and her arms developed a slight rash thereafter, and that was just the start of it. It was blatantly noticeable to the both of us...she was having an allergic reaction to something. She later shared with me that she "felt embarrassed" (even though she had absolutely no reason to be) and I was thinking to myself "oh my god, I just poisoned this beautiful woman." Well, come to find out, after going back over every thing I bought and researching a little more online, guess what I found? Apparently, I bought a well-known product that even though it was labeled as "gluten free," it had been a recalled product dated just a week prior for "containing gluten," as you might have guessed. I was still somehow able to buy it and feed it to some one else that had an adverse reaction, which I could do nothing about at the time. NOT OK!

The Present

We are Ingredient Identity, a preeminent regulatory management consulting firm specializing in safety and compliance for a variety of industries, but most notably for Food, Beverage and Dietary Supplement companies around the world. For starters, we provide consulting on FDA matters for these types of products and on Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) for literally every aspect of our clients' quality and regulatory operations, starting with the ingredients they use in their products all the way through to ensuring that the marketing and labeling of the finished products conform with the applicable regulations so the products are safe to be consumed. However, most importantly, the reason why we are so driven to do what we do is that we are dedicated to ensuring the health and safety of end consumers.

We are a privately held, self-funded, ~five year old start-up with a very strong track record of growth, and driven by our dedication to identifying the right projects and right clients. We reinvest heavily in our people and systems, and related technologies to ensure strong added value to the projects we take on, especially when it comes to highly complex quality issues. We've developed some of the most cost-effective solutions for some of the most well known brands in the Food, Beverage and Dietary Supplement industries and we're only getting started. We've designed our operations with efficient and scalable technologies, incorporating Best Compliance Practices©, and leveraging the extensive scientific and regulatory expertise of our team to help reduce clients' overall legal and regulatory risks when it comes to developing, manufacturing and marketing Foods, Beverage and Dietary Supplements. Now we are ready for the next step!

We aim to build out a new offering and technology platform based on what services we already provide and what we have already built (moGMP™). Our intent is to expand this technology as a service to make it easier for our clients, but more importantly for their end customers "the consumers" to access real-time compliance and safety information about the foods, beverages and/or dietary supplements (and ingredients) that they consume either before, during or after consumption. This includes any health, ingredient or related claims!

Food and Dietary Supplement product recalls and other safety warnings are rampant in the news at present, often resulting from issues like undeclared allergens like my own personal story above or unexpected microbial contaminations, which are entirely too common. The lawsuits following such events are also sky rocketing and don't really benefit most consumers as a whole. These types of events can also include deliberate adulteration with ingredients not allowed in food products, such as certain drugs or other controlled substances not to mention counterfeit products! Unfortunately, not all companies in these industries have good business ethics or comply with the FDA's GMP regulations all the time whether based in the United States or abroad, and the FDA can only regulate so much given its limited resources. Moreover, numerous companies do not have sufficient product recall procedures (if any) or no experience in actually conducting a product recall even though this is a federal requirement, which leaves consumers at high risk of getting hurt. If you have ever consumed a food product and were sickened due to E. Coli contamination, Salmonella contamination, or perhaps an undeclared allergen such as Gluten, Shellfish or Peanut, or some drug active ingredient, this is situation we are tackling head on! This is what I'm talking about and why we are here asking for your support today, to help build out this technology as a service and take consumer food safety to the next level!

The Reality.

Adverse Event Reporting (AER) and Serious Adverse Event Reporting (SAER) to the FDA are requirements by law, but still go largely unenforced due to the sheer number of companies and products out in the marketplace. Even for those companies touting consumer health and safety as paramount, all too often they conduct business with that being much less of a priority. By the time a warning notice or product recall hits the press that you "might" read about, whether announced by the company itself or directly by the FDA, it is too late for dozens if not hundreds or more consumers already sickened or worse. Trust me, I know! We handle these matters all the time for our clients. The consumers though, the people like you and me, won't get the message or even really ever know what happened, and have little recourse not to mention possible unexpected medical bills. We can absolutely change this in 2016 and beyond!

We aim to change this in fact, by putting the power of food and ingredient safety information into the hands of consumers utilizing already existing technology in such a way that we've developed that helps them to make more informed decisions before putting such products in their bodies as well as after, and we want to accomplish this much sooner than later with your help here today!

We are talking about ensuring food safety for consumers of foods, beverages and dietary supplements, which last we checked, is pretty much everyone. We want to build the next generation of compliance and safety reporting technology targeting consumer products starting with Foods, Beverages and Supplements that consumers can access on their mobile smartphone to ensure 100% transparency and traceability of all such products and ingredients thereof. If there is a claim, you should know why it is on the product and if it is allowed. If there is an ingredient in the product you don't recognized, you should be able instantly research it so as to make a real-time educated decision about the product. If there is a safety concern or recall, you should know immediately!

The budget we've identified to help us start down this path is a very conservative $380,000 USD, but with more, we'll do more...and we mean we will do a lot more a lot faster! The system design and workflows are already complete, and the regulatory and scientific expertise needed to ensure the accuracy and applicability of the information captured resides within the very people work at this company. In fact this is already the type of work our amazing team supports day in and day out. And we aren't starting from scratch, as we've already launched our smartphone app for our business clients available on iTunes and Google Play (moGMP™). However, we need expand this technology as a service further on a sophisticated database driven platform that simplifies the overall process for our clients and their consumers to access and qualify information that already exists with the companies making such products, and that is required to be available/accessible by law. Most importantly, such a system could greatly reduce upfront costs of product development in these industries, while ensuring compliant labels or label claims on the product are permitted based on the regulations that apply. Literally, we are already doing this manually for our clients, and by raising money we will be able to do the following:

As a consumer yourself, imagine having the power to verify the quality, compliance and safety of a product before making that final purchase decision about any food, beverage or dietary supplement product you are considering to put into your body or give to your children or other loved ones. Then imagine having the piece of mind in that if a health issue were to arise after buying a specific product, you would be notified promptly (via our enhanced app) of any issues thereby avoiding a potential health nightmare. We can make this a reality with your help!

There is no question that technology enables consumers to have greater buying power when they are shopping either online or in-store. While some companies embrace technology to reach consumers, few use it to ensure those same consumers are protected or informed about the products being sold to them, especially after the purchase. Additionally, because companies making Foods, Beverages and Dietary Supplement or ingredients thereof, are so diverse and fragmented, the result is a continual reoccurrence of safety and health issues that we read about in the news...mass food recalls, etc. 

Fancy packaging or flashy bottles, celebrity endorsements, key positioning and other creative marketing infomercials will always be important to these products, but we want to help ensure there is more "accountability" by such companies making these products. Companies embracing this technology and related services will have a tremendous advantage to build consumer loyalty, by giving consumers, unprecedented access to fundamental quality and safety information about the products...something that is not readily available in these industries for consumers and should be. I'm talking real transparency with the foods you eat! Let's make it better today, and not just talk about it!

The advantages of what we want to build though are not only for consumers - oh no, rather contrary. The companies embracing this technology and related services will have the ability to refine and differentiate their product(s), show traceability of a given products' compliance and label claims at all times, and educate their consumer(s) in the now. More importantly, for products that have been contaminated or recalled, which are either still on store shelves or have already been purchased, instant push-message notifications from the app (by respective brand holder) about the urgent matter or other critical recommendations to that specific consumer who purchased their product, exudes increased corporate social responsibility. It is not only a competitive advantage in general, but a tool to help mitigate non-compliance events, which can have tremendous legal and regulatory cost advantages down the road. We know the numbers! We plan to create a highly proactive solution to a common unfortunate reactive-only matter, and we want to bring it to market with your help!

Your contribution will have the following impact on what we finally launch:

There are costly, inefficient practices of dealing with these matters that are fraught with delays and legal or regulatory liabilities if handled incorrectly. Additionally, it is no secret that sales and marketing teams do not often play well with the people in the quality and regulatory departments that develop food products. Why is this important to know about the products we're consuming on a daily basis? 
For businesses we can reduce the costs associated with this sort of internal disfunction and improve not only the overall quality of such products in the marketplace, but how consumers feel about the brands they consume because of the transparency and commitment to quality, compliance and accessible safety information as demonstrated with this technology and the companies who use it. There is no third-party "certificate," "accreditation" or "stamp of approval" that any other organization can provide that will give you better assurance or that continually manage and assess such safety info in real-time like what we will build. Not a single organization in these markets. And for what is available, it is extremely limited. So we need your help!

Ingredient Identity already provides food safety and regulatory consulting services for all these issues to the companies making and selling food, beverages and dietary supplement products, and the ingredients thereof. However, we want to grow our offerings in a more robust and scalable way that reaches consumers, educates consumers, and empowers consumers to learn about what they consume or intend to consume.

Once consumers put a product in their body, we want to make sure that they have the peace of mind to know they aren't accidentally compromising their health or being misled by the labeling, or even jeopardizing their career in the cases of many aspiring elite or professional athletes that have consumed tainted supplements. Trust us, we know about this!

With your help today, we will enable companies making such products to actually stand behind the quality of their products, by providing consumer access to that information, not just talk about it and hid behind a seal of approval or quality certificate...those things are nice, but not functional, and not something the FDA recognizes or approves. Whether an issue arises from an undisclosed allergen, an accidental microbial contamination or some adulteration with a drug ingredient, what we intend to build will only empower consumers of food and dietary supplement products of all ages, and ideally improve the over all level of quality, safety and confidence of such products in the marketplace worldwide. What is available only captures some of the basic needs to protect consumers, we will address and help ensure all needs are covered.

Next steps.

With your assistance, we will be able to make a difference faster in multiple ways that we can all measure:

story:
A Little Bit About Me:

Hi everyone. My name is Alexandra. I am a University of Miami grad with a degree in Advertising, Art and Marketing. I am a Copywriter at a marketing agency in Manhattan and live in Brooklyn, NY. I am a pianist and drummer and adventurer by nature. Eight years ago, in college, I discovered I had Lyme Disease. I, however, was one of the many people who are "familiar" with the disease but unaware of the battle that would ensue. 
Lyme disease is a bacterial infection. To this day, I am unaware when I contracted it. I began feeling faint and blacking out in college and attributed it to staying up late studying, running myself dry and so on. Upon testing, I finally found out I had Lymes and my life changed forever. Fatigue, muscle deterioration and exhaustion are a few of the chronic aliments associated with living with Lymes. As someone who loves to surf, snowboard, hike and more, it was a huge blow. I continued school after treatment, graduating with a 3.9 GPA and on the Dean's List - still participating in the many activities I love, attempting to not let the disease rule my life.
After college I landed a job in Manhattan doing what I love. Between paying for college loans, rent, constant medical bills for Lymes and the additional conditions it has caused I am at a standstill in achieving my next goal - becoming a certified yoga instructor. Yoga has been an outlet that helps relieve the stress in my everyday life and relax my joint and muscle pain associated with Lymes. By helping me get certified I will continue to keep as healthy as possible while helping spread the joy and health benefits of yoga to others. Yoga has truly changed my life physically and mentally and I could only wish to take others on this journey with me.

What We Need & What You Get

For $3,000 I will be able to sign up for my first yoga teacher training course in Brooklyn. The course runs from May- August consistently and I will be taking an online anatomy course as well. Upon completion of the 200-hour course I will be ready to start teaching students and opening their eyes to what it is I so deeply love. Every penny raised will go directly to my teaching fund, which I am also contributing to as well.

Every Bit Helps

It means more than anything that you have taken the time to read my story. Whether you choose to participate is up to you, but every little bit helps and I am incredibly grateful.

Yoga has been an outlet that helps relieve the stress in my everyday life and relax my joint and muscle pain associated with Lymes. By helping me get certified I will continue to keep as healthy as possible while helping spread the joy and health benefits of yoga to others. Yoga has truly changed my life physically and mentally and I could only wish to take others on this journey with me.What We Need & What You GetFor $3,000 I will be able to sign up for my first yoga teacher training course in Brooklyn. The course runs from May- August consistently and I will be taking an online anatomy course as well. Upon completion of the 200-hour course I will be ready to start teaching students and opening their eyes to what it is I so deeply love. Every penny raised will go directly to my teaching fund, which I am also contributing to as well.
    Every Bit HelpsIt means more than anything that you have taken the time to read my story. Whether you choose to participate is up to you, but every little bit helps and I am incredibly grateful.

story:
Friendly Lights is the new social interaction device designed to help you meet people, at the right time, in the right place and the right mood.

Friendly Lights is a locator device that can be worn as a wristband, on a keychain or clipped onto your jacket, connecting users via a map of their local area, highlighting availability, location and intention to meet new people and make new friends.

Friendly lights is an interactive wearable technology device that helps you to meet people in a simple, friendly and safe way.

We do not collect personal data, we are helping people to build new relationships!

What are the statuses?

The standard traffic lights system makes Friendly Lights the perfect communication tool for meeting people. Everyone knows green is for go and red is for stop, yellow – maybe. 

I want to make friends! Let's talk!
I'm not sure, perhaps I want to meet new people.
I'm not interested in meeting new people.


So wherever you go you can meet others in similar mood using the map and activating your device, in real time.  Please visit our  Site for more details.

How does Friendly Lights Improve social connection?

If you’ve ever moved to a new town to start College, a new job, or you just want to make some new friends, you would know how hard it can be to meet people who are also interested in making new connections.

Wouldn’t it be great to know who is open to meet new people, where they are and when they are available?

The standard traffic lights system makes Friendly Lights the perfect communication tool for meeting people. Everyone knows green is for go and red is for stop, yellow – maybe.

How does it look like?

Here the first stage prototypes.
 We don't focuse on bracelet types and colours, custom wrist watch strap can be simply attached to the device. More images and details at  Friendly Lights Site . 
Here the second stage prototypes.  If we reach  goal more than $70.000, we will release these samples.

How to use it?

Friendly Lights works with a mobile application that simply adds each locator device to the Friendly Lights map of the local area, allowing all users to see who is active and where they are.

There is no need to fill in personal details, this is not about personal data collection, just connect your device and go.

Simply connect your Friendly Lights locator to your mobile phone using the latest Bluetooth technology, set your mood on your wearable device, and activate your setting on the friendly lights map. 

The Friendly Lights locator can also be linked to social networks such as LinkedIn and Facebook, enhancing your social profile.

First use case, sport events.

Second use case, party.

This third use case.


This third use case only for individuals and small companies wishing to provide services, which is rapidly changing the status of free/busy. We are doing two branches: first one for persons and second one for services, now we have plans to release only for persons.

How Friendly Lights helps your business

If you’re working as a freelancer, have your own small business and are seeking new customers, then set your friendly lights locator to indicate where you are, when you’re available and simply let your new customers find you.
It’s simple, once you set up your profile, simply activate your mood according to your availability, ready for work? Then it’s green for go. Busy right now? Then it’s red for stop. If you’re soon to be available? Then activate yellow.

Where are we so far?

We are not in production yet, and that is the reason for the campaign. We would like to raise the money to begin the production cycle, develop the mobile application and get the first products to market.

We have the first 3D printed prototype, so we know how the product looks and feels, and we are happy with it.

3D printed prototype bellow:

We will release three versions of our mobile application providing access for our main target groups:
1.   Individual free for use - with restricted functionality
2.   Individual annual paid subscription – full functionality
3.   Company annual paid subscription (bars, clubs)
On the second stage we are going to release Bluetooth 4.0 compatible devices with anti-theft technology.

Friendly Lights specification.

•   Micro-USB connector for charging.
•   Long battery capacity (4 hours of lighting).
•   Clip connector to attach Friendly Lights device to clothing.  
•   Fastener to connect device to key chain, or other types of jewellery.
•   Wristband connector to wear on the wrist.
•   Mobile application available on iPhone, Android and Windows Phone platforms.
•   Bluetooth 4.0 support (second stage devices).

Todays in dynamic world people are constantly on the move, relocating for work, study, or travelling the world. In each case people are open for trying new things, and need quick, simple and easy ways to connect with others.
Friendly Lights works for:

1. Shared interest groups
2. Dating and new relationships
3. Business contacts
4. Networking
5. Making new friends in college.
Whatever the situation, Friendly Lights makes everywhere a friendly place.

Friendly Lights story.

The original team member Kristina and her friends were passionate about finding a way to connect with new people in a safe and friendly manner. Having spent lots of time looking at different ideas for online dating, social meet ups and shared interest groups, they came up with the idea of helping people to take online social interaction into a face to face scenario in a safe and friendly way, and Friendly Lights was born.

At this stage Aleh became a part of the team, with a software development background, and the idea was fast became a reality. After many sessions brainstorming on the idea and trying out various concepts, the team finally arrived at the traditional traffic light system, a universal visual concept that is simple to use and understand. After months of product prototyping and software development, the team are now ready to go to the next level and bring the product into full development.

Our Goal

Friendly Lights is a unique product that appeals to all ages, races, genders and social groups. We know how important social interaction is to humanity, we all crave it, we all need it and we all deserve it.
Sometimes it can be difficult getting out there and meeting people, and other times you just don’t want to be bothered. With this simple to use technology, it makes the entire process of connecting easy, smart and safe.
With the money we raise we want to make this a reality, benefitting people the world over helping them to make new connections, in real time, in real locations and with real intentions. It’s important to us to be connected so we know it’s important to you.

Where is the money going?

The money that we raise will be broken down as follows:
Taxes and commissions $9,000.
Mobile application for IOS, Windows Phone development $11,000.
Unit production $32,000.
Advertising and Marketing $4,000.
Product development (legal, licensing, patents) and FCC certification $8,000.

How you can support us

We want Friendly Lights to be more than just a prototype, but we need your help, your support and contributions to make our dream your reality.

We decided to launch our campaign on Indiegogo because we know it’s a great way to reach out to socially active individuals, wearable tech pioneers, enthusiastic early adopters, and next generation enthusiasts. We have lots of ideas for developing Friendly Lights and we know that with your help, we can continue to innovate this simple yet effective product

We need all of you socially active individuals to get on board and help us out by testing the beta version, sharing our message on social media sites and contribute by purchasing our first generation products. Please visit our  Site to subscribe our news.

Sharing our campaign using the buttons that you can find on the left side of the page.    (Please click the picture below to share with your friends on Facebook.)

Risks and challenges

We've worked hard to minimize the risks associated with this project. The product has already gone through several design/prototyping stages and tests. Android application is almost finished, IOS and Windows Phone versions are required to be done. We have qualified our manufacturers and first-level fulfillment partners. If we can raise enough funds, we are confident that we can ship the final product by September 2015. We have verified prototype level manufacturing, but we need large orders to bring the manufacturing costs down to an affordable level.

More details at Site

Thanks for help.

story:
About the Charity (http://www.comicrelief.com/);

Comic Relief is an operating British charity, founded in 1985 by the comedy scriptwriter Richard Curtis and comedian Lenny Henry in response to famine in Ethiopia. The charity states that its aim is to "bring about positive and lasting change in the lives of poor and disadvantaged people, which we believe requires investing in work that addresses people's immediate needs as well as tackling the root causes of poverty and injustice".

The charity now supports development campaigns throughout Europe and Africa.

The highlight of Comic Relief's appeal is Red Nose Day, a biennial telethon which this year will be held on 13th March.

About the Trek;

On March 11th my brother and I will be starting a 17 day trek to the most iconic base camp of all, at the foot of the greatest mountain in the world, Mount Everest (8848m). Walking through Sherpa country past cultivated fields and small villages, we have time to acclimatise before reaching spectacular high altitude scenery: the incredible monastery at Thyangboche, views of Ama Dablam, Everest and other mighty Himalayan peaks. As well as reaching Base Camp, we have the opportunity to climb Kala Pattar (5545m) for a breath taking views of Mount Everest. A brief itinerary of the trek is below;

DAY 1 Travel to Kathmandu

DAY 2 In Kathmandu, sightseeing Kathmandu Valley

DAYS 3/4 Fly to Lukla, commence trek through Sherpa villages

DAYS 5/6 Arrive Namche Bazaar, rest and acclimatise with an optional walk to the pretty village of Khumjung

DAYS 7/8 Trek to Dingboche via Thyangboche Monastery

DAY 9 Rest and acclimatise in Dingboche

DAY 10 Slowly ascend through yak pastures to Khumbu Glacier

DAYS 11/12 Ascend Kala Pattar (5545m) to gain uninterrupted views of Everest (8848m) & trek to Everest Base Camp

DAYS 13/15 Return trek via Namche to Monjo

DAY 16 Return to Lukla

DAY 17 Fly Lukla to Kathmandu

DAY 18 In Kathmandu, trip concludes

The trip is being financed personally, so 100% of the donations will go to the charity.

story:
Our government has a form of therapy that when our soldiers return home from being on the battlefield the best way to handle their experiences is to relive them. Regression is the the way of the VA at Sow it Now our way is exercise is medicine.

     Currently housing former servicemen and servicewomen we have had successful results in not only fostering to what the body is capable of, but what the mind is able to overcome thru the extensive training of the body through muscle strength and training.  

     Our facility offers basic equipment today and is looking to update with the state of the art machines to equipt our disabled soldiers with endless opportunities.  Without these brave men and women fighting for our freedom selflessly, at Sow it Now we are honored to plant the seeds of abilities in each body.  Never put a cap on what we are capable of.

story:
YOU MADE IT HAPPEN!!!
With Your support of 5952 $ we hosted the First Afghan Surf Championship. It has been great fun and a nice experience for us and all the participants and fans! Thank you sooooo  much!!!!!!!

(Pictures by: David Lohmueller)

We are WRAA, the Wave Riders Association of Afghanistan. We want to host the 1. Afghan Surf Championship in May 2015 in Ericeira, Portugal. The winners of the championship will participate in the ISA World Games in June 2015. 

During the championship we will present to you the beauty of our culture, i.e. cooking classes, Afghan music and a workshop for crafting Afghan fighter kites. 

Our aim is  to develop a sustainable organization that represents, supports and grows the young Afghan surf culture and at the same time show the beauty of Afghanistan to the outside world.

Yes that's right!!! :-)  You  can help us writing history…!!!

Known from

         

Intended use

The Championship will take place from 22.05. till 25.05. in Ericeira, close to Lisbon (Portugal). We will use the donations to organize and host the championship, including supplying participants with surfing gear and giving them surf lessons, as well as covering the travel expenses of the qualifiers to the ISA World Games in Nicaragua in June 2015. A part of the expenses goes to the local surf-club in Ericeira, which helps us organizing the contest, i.e. getting permission for reserving the surf spot, providing an independent jury and facilitating a sun protected area for the athletes. Moreover we are going to pay the expenses for up to five participants who otherwise could not take part due to financial reasons.
Beyond that we will offer many different insights to Afghan traditions, regarding cuisine, music and games.

(left: WRAA in Portugal 2014, right: Austrian Surf Championships in Ericeira co-organized by the Ericeira Beach Club. Picture by:  www.alexpapis.com)

Perks

In any case, our supporters will receive some WRAA perks,  such as T-Shirts (with our logo or with Tazi the Afghan surf-hound), traditional Afghan fighter-kites, hats and customized WRAA surfboards. Please note that there will be additional costs for international shipping. EU-shipping (10$) and worldwide-shipping (18$) have to be booked with the perks.

Background 

WRAA is an official member of the ISA (The International Surfing Association). We founded WRAA, because we love surfing. Our goal is to serve as a platform for the Afghan surfing community. One can ask why that should be something to support? Well, for us the answer is clear. Let's forget about the obvious benefit of showing people the joyful sport of surfing, because it is more than that. We think that with a platform like WRAA we can actually start to show the world a different and more diversified picture of Afghanistan. To counter the negative stories about Afghanistan in the media coverage, we present the beauty of its landscapes, the life affirming spirit of its people, and its intriguing culture, thus presenting Afghanistan in the proper light!

  OK, it is true, Afghanistan has no access to the ocean. But it is also true that over 8 million Afghans live around the world in exile. So the potential of Afghan surfing exists. Our task is to introduce the world oceans and the spirit of surfing to more people from Afghanistan. The 1. Afghan Surf Championship will be a perfect start on our path to achieve our goals.                                       

Our administrative staff consists of 12 people with diverse expertise in Project Management, PR, Design, Marketing, Law etc. Moreover, our friends and families will support us during the contest in terms of workshops and logistics.

We are convinced that our intentions can contribute to the reconstruction of Afghanistan. The feedback so far is overwhelming and motivates us to keep working.

Alternative ways to support us

In case you can't make a donation, there are other ways to support us. Spread our campaign in your social media network, like it on indiegogo and tell people about it. Join us in writing history! 

Thank you very much!!!

General

Questions or advices? 

Contact us: info@wraa.net

Or visit our website: www.wraa.net

  

 

Credits:

Video: starkad, music: lazerhawk
