story:
The Dream

 

My dream is to provide leadership coaching, training and support to changemakers and organizations in the social and environmental justice movement to go for the biggest wins and to bring the radical and inclusive vision for the world that we want to create into reality. I also dream of achieving vibrant health by personally overcoming chronic illness, in order to fully make the contribution I am here to make, and to be able to provide coaching and support to others who suffer from chronic illness.

Donate!

I am raising funds for two reasons:

1.) to cover my tuition and expenses for the Coach Training Program at the Academy for Coaching Excellence, in order to become a certified Life & Leadership Coach. 

2.) to cover the out of pocket medical care costs with holistic practitioners associated with my recovery.

All funds raised will be split 50/50 between these two.

 

The Big Vision

In our world, we face huge, urgent, seemingly insurmountable problems, most of which are all already falling under the larger umbrella of climate change: persistent structural racism, economic inequality and environmental devastation. To face these tremendous challenges, we need our leaders and community members to be healthy and building sustainable lives of joy and fulfillment both in and outside of the work place. We need organizations linked into a larger collective movement, with big, open, inclusive visions, the ability to move past assumptions and habits, think outside of the box and nurture long-term, committed employees in a supportive work environment. As I coach I want to work to support individuals and organizations to embrace their most "unreasonable" visions, strengthen their relationships both internally and externally, and create an awesome work environment for their staff and volunteer leadership.

 

 

 A Sit-In that I was part of with a coalition campaign to support workers' rights

The Journey

I was raised in the liberal hotbed of Ithaca NY, where activism and organizing for various campaigns and causes was infused into daily life ever since I was a small child. I took to community organizing professionally by the age of 19, and was fortunate to be trained and mentored by some of the very same organizers who mentored our President, Barack Obama, as a young person in Chicago. I spent several summers as an intern organizer in Syracuse, served as a campus organizer for student climate justice groups during college, and lived for a year in Latin America and China, respectively. In 2011 I moved to Pittsburgh for an exciting an multi-issue organizing position. I was privileged to work with some the most courageous and experienced community and faith leaders in the country on campaigns to protect and create local, family sustaining jobs and build environmentally sustainable infrastructure that benefits and uplifts marginalized communities. 

 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't contribute financially right now, no problem! You can still help:

    • Use the Indiegogo share tools to share my campaign on your social media or blog
    • Email my campaign to friends, family or colleagues who may be interested

    Resources

    • Learn more about the Life & Leadership Coach Training Program through the Academy for Coaching Excellence and Coaching for Social Change

    Thank You!

    Thank you SO much for all of your support. I treasure your many contributions that have helped to bring me to this exciting moment. Thank you for being a part of it all!
story_txt:
The Dream
 
My dream is to provide leadership coaching, training and support to changemakers and organizations in the social and environmental justice movement to go for the biggest wins and to bring the radical and inclusive vision for the world that we want to create into reality. I also dream of achieving vibrant health by personally overcoming chronic illness, in order to fully make the contribution I am here to make, and to be able to provide coaching and support to others who suffer from chronic illness.
Donate!
I am raising funds for two reasons:
1.) to cover my tuition and expenses for the Coach Training Program at the Academy for Coaching Excellence, in order to become a certified Life & Leadership Coach. 
2.) to cover the out of pocket medical care costs with holistic practitioners associated with my recovery.
All funds raised will be split 50/50 between these two.
 
The Big Vision
In our world, we face huge, urgent, seemingly insurmountable problems, most of which are all already falling under the larger umbrella of climate change: persistent structural racism, economic inequality and environmental devastation. To face these tremendous challenges, we need our leaders and community members to be healthy and building sustainable lives of joy and fulfillment both in and outside of the work place. We need organizations linked into a larger collective movement, with big, open, inclusive visions, the ability to move past assumptions and habits, think outside of the box and nurture long-term, committed employees in a supportive work environment. As I coach I want to work to support individuals and organizations to embrace their most "unreasonable" visions, strengthen their relationships both internally and externally, and create an awesome work environment for their staff and volunteer leadership.
 
 

 A Sit-In that I was part of with a coalition campaign to support workers' rights

The Journey
I was raised in the liberal hotbed of Ithaca NY, where activism and organizing for various campaigns and causes was infused into daily life ever since I was a small child. I took to community organizing professionally by the age of 19, and was fortunate to be trained and mentored by some of the very same organizers who mentored our President, Barack Obama, as a young person in Chicago. I spent several summers as an intern organizer in Syracuse, served as a campus organizer for student climate justice groups during college, and lived for a year in Latin America and China, respectively. In 2011 I moved to Pittsburgh for an exciting an multi-issue organizing position. I was privileged to work with some the most courageous and experienced community and faith leaders in the country on campaigns to protect and create local, family sustaining jobs and build environmentally sustainable infrastructure that benefits and uplifts marginalized communities. 


 


Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute financially right now, no problem! You can still help:

Use the Indiegogo share tools to share my campaign on your social media or blog
Email my campaign to friends, family or colleagues who may be interested

Resources
Learn more about the Life & Leadership Coach Training Program through the Academy for Coaching Excellence and Coaching for Social Change
Thank You!
Thank you SO much for all of your support. I treasure your many contributions that have helped to bring me to this exciting moment. Thank you for being a part of it all!

story:
Heal yourself, Heal the Planet


Who we are

The time has come for us to follow our dreams of creating a healing arts center that is centered around Service to a community that gives of itself on a daily basis. Conscious Body Yoga & Massage opened its doors in 2008 and has been growing exponentially ever since. Since its inception, CB has emphasized the connection between yoga, mindfulness, and bodywork and has offered specialized therapy to combine these modalities. We have been on a personal journey to heal ourselves and believe that this is the first step in healing our planet. Our motto is "Heal Yourself, Heal the Planet!" Our mission is help clients do just that! The Conscious Body Crew consists of Jasper Elliott Wolfe , Perrin Makofski, and our newest addition Robbie McGiboney.  


All of our therapists are fully licensed, educated, experienced, compassionate people. We have been serving the Greater Birmingham area by providing  therapeutic and specialized massage services such as Relaxation Massage, Deep Tissue, Neuromuscular Massage, Pre-natal Massage, Reiki, Oncology Massage, Thai Yoga Massage,  and Private Yoga instruction. Our passions revolve around the healing benefits of therapeutic touch, yoga, mindfulness, and Service to others and to our Community.  

We would like the new and improved Conscious Body Healing Arts Center to be a place where all people can come to rejuvenate and heal, open their hearts and minds, and be a part of something inspiring... Community! Our present office is only 200 square feet. The new expanded Conscious Body facility is 1500 square feet and will be the home to a Small Yoga Studio with a Big Heart. It will also consist of 3 Massage Therapy Rooms, a bathroom, and a small lobby. We will finally have the space we need to combine our passions and give our clients a place of refuge from the stresses of our sometimes chaotic world. For more information Check out our website here.

What we need

When you donate funds to support this campaign you will help us with the construction and build out of of lobby and storage area for the yoga studio, bamboo floor and soundproofing for yoga studio, yoga props, washer and dryer and installation, seating and reception desk, custom storage build out of therapy rooms, Massage therapy supplies and equipment, technological support, computer, printer, decor, furniture, phone and internet services, front desk staff, web design, and marketing design materials.  Indiegogo will collect up to 5% of all money raised. After these needs are met and fees and taxes are paid, all remaining funds will go into helping us launch several Community and Service Oriented Projects.  

We are so passionate about realizing this dream that we have invested our personal savings into this project. However,if we are able to meet our fundraising goals we can avoid high interest rates on bank loans and credit cards, replenish some of our personal savings, and instead put all of our energy into providing the services we are so passionate about. If we don't meet our projected goal on Indiegogo, we will still receive the funds donated. Any money donated will go a long way in helping us open our doors.  

What you get

We have so many great Perks for you! Please considering donating and dependent upon the level of donation you will receive gifts/discounts  of Yoga or Massage, and an exclusive invite to Gratitude Saturday! The date will be announced closer to the end of the Launch. Gratitude Saturday will be an event organized just for our Sponsors. There will be a variety of yoga classes to choose from like Slow & Sacred Flow and Sacred Touch Yoga, as well as Chair Massage,Reiki Sessions, Discounts, Give-a-ways, Yummy Snacks, Hugs and much more!  It will be an amazing weekend where we get to express so much love and gratitude for the support we've received. Sponsors will also be listed on the Gratitude page of our website.

We appreciate any and all support you can give us in creating this new healing space. If you are not able to give cash at this time, please share our campaign with your family and friends or come out and visit us when we open! Our projected soft opening is January 1, 2016. Grand opening to TBA. Stay tuned for Yoga Class Specials once the studio is open.

The Impact

After working with massage clients and yoga students for the past decade we are more than aware of how much stress affects a person's daily life. Our new Conscious Body Yoga Studio will be the home of many unique therapeutic yoga classes, workshops, and events. Slow & Sacred Flow was created by one of our own and emphasizes slowing down and practicing yoga in a way that is unhurried and focuses on gratitude. 

We are developing specialized class offerings that aim to combine the benefits of both yoga and healing therapeutic touch. We are really excited to introduce Sacred Touch Yoga to our clients. This is a class that incorporates the talent and skills of our massage therapists as well. Conscious Body will also be the host of Just Laugh Birmingham and the Birmingham Kirtan Satsang Community. 

The CB Yoga studio aims to inspire the practitioner by introducing new yoga class experiences such Ashtanga Slow, Lunch Bunch,  Chakra Flow, Reiki Love, Yogaromatherapy, Therapeutic Couples Massage Classes, and Yoga Fundamentals. Our plan is to let the studio evolve naturally. As we build our network we hope to be able to invite some of the beautiful yoga instructors in our community to offer their own unique therapeutic workshops.  

Our new Conscious Body Massage Center will employ some of the most compassionate, educated, intuitive, and inspired massage therapists you will ever have the pleasure of knowing! We have over 30 years of combined experience working with clients and helping them with stress relief, chronic pain, anxiety, depression, pre-natal and post-natal symptoms, injury prevention and rehabilitation. Our mission is to always give 110% and to use our skill sets to the best of our abilities. Each one of us has specific holistic therapies  that we are passionate about. We truly care about each and every one of our clients and cannot wait to be able to offer even more therapy options to choose from. Read here for more information about our therapists and their personal bios.  

Our mission

Service is Joy! As we become more Conscious of our own body and minds, we begin to understand our place on the planet and our social responsibility to take care of others.  

(Conscious Body + Conscious Mind) Conscious Being = Conscious World

 Our dream is to have a business that centers around giving to those who give.  We love you guys and are humbled and amazed by the work you are doing to make Birmingham a better place. We need you and you need us! Providing services that we love gives us meaning and purpose. Through yoga and healing therapeutic touch you can continue giving of yourself everyday, doing what you love! It has been our hope and dream to be able to use our natural talents to help the greater community at large. When you support Conscious Body, you help us help you! The circle is complete!

Click on this link below to read  more about the meaning behind the name Conscious Body and the logo of the lotus flower carrying the Earth. 

                            Risks and Challenges
Although we are confident that this IS the next step for Conscious Body, we are aware that there are many options for quality massage therapy and yoga instruction in the Greater Birmingham area. Each of us have been involved in various studios, gyms, spas, and wellness centers throughout the years and have much respect and gratitude for the healers, therapists, and instructors that grace our fine city. We know that the competition is fierce and we will never take for granted the loyal and supportive clients that we've gained thus far. We plan to minimize the risks and challenges of opening our healing arts center through thoughtful and organized business management practices, continuing education, authentic connections with clients, service to our greater community, and by bringing our passion for the healing arts into the center each and every day.  

Inspired to make a difference

Future Service projects for 2016

Conscious Body Yoga Studio would like to offer  Community Classes to benefit local organizations as well as the teachers instructing the classes. This gives us an opportunity to share on going quality yoga instruction with those who may have limited resources as well as a way to give to the non-profits in our Community. 

Conscious Yogi Program will launch in 2016 and gives volunteers of local organizations and non-profits a way to receive discounted prices on yoga class packages.  

Conscious Body Massage hopes to  launch the Hug More Scholarship Fund in 2016 to raise money for Therapeutic Massage for those in need. We would like to give back to the care givers in our community. Our clients and community will be given an opportunity to nominate deserving participants for this Scholarship! 

Conscious Body You Tube Channel will be a later addition in  2016 and will provide high quality yoga instruction, meditation techniques, and inspirational programming for Free so that you will always have a way to practice no matter where you are or what's going on in your life! Subscribe Here for more info as it is updated. 

Conscious Drives for local non-profits is something Conscious Body has already been committed to for several years. We are excited to be able to further this work and get involved in giving back to our local community as well as give our clients a way to easily get involved.  



We thank you from the bottom of our hearts!  We can't wait to help you in your own journey of health and wellness.


Heal yourself, Heal the Planet!

story:
What Could Happen To Your Family's Health
If You Had Support Like This?

  • A Practitioner (with online 'office hours' for your questions)
  • 3 Levels Of Classes (what, when, why, how...family style)
  • Videos (how to bring it to the home)
  • A Year-Round Tribe Of People-Who-Care (kinship) 
I would venture to guess that it could be life changing.

Up to now I've been offering support one class, one client at a time... 
I'm doing it well, but I want to do it better. 

I want to offer:
  • My classes & guides under one cohesive membership roof 
  • A virtual 'cornucopia' of family health resources to choose from
  • Guidance from myself and guest experts
  • A VERY AFFORDABLE rate 
  • Tools! Really practical tools that make it easier
  • A community, a movement...a place to feel at home
We face a modern 'dragon' in that we have an epidemic of families who are struggling with chronic illness or "soft signs" of sickness. There are a great deal of hurting moms...and hurting kids. The numbers and statistics are staggering.  

The good news is that there are solutions that can fight this 'dragon' regardless of the pathophysiology that brought it... 

A primary one being the therapeutic use of FOOD. 

The families I work with want to make changes smartly... supported with practitioner guidance and a community of friends who understand the inherent challenges and rewards involved.

This is what I'm passionate about. 
And I need a ballyhoo (clamorous and vigorous attempt) to advance this cause. 

What's This Campaign About?

I'm Melanie Christner, mother of four, Nutritional Therapy & GAPS Practitioner, and founder of the company Honest Body. 

Today Honest Body successfully facilitates resources for many happy & supported families. My classes and resources help eliminate the overwhelm and uncertainty with effective nutritional protocols.

I can make it so much better with:

  • Professionally filmed cooking videos
  • An exceptionally affordable annual membership model
  • Easy on-line access for more families worldwide

What I Need...And What You Receive In Return

I'm asking for:

  • $4,000 - 10 key food prep concepts to be professionally filmed 
  • Additional funds - to go towards a better membership platform and resources 
You receive:
  •  Unique and high-quality offerings like:



Why Am I Qualified?

My own family and I went through a digestive healing protocol called GAPS™. It was formidable to start at the time, but delivered huge health benefits.

Food, and a focus on digestion, profoundly changed our lives for the better.  

I knew I wanted to help others, and create something that addressed the challenges I had faced. It seemed completely natural to train as a Nutritional Therapist & GAPS Practitioner.

Now I want to do something even better... 

A New Way To Do Your Family's Health - 

HONEST BODY MEMBERSHIP

One year of membership will include the following:

* Links:

  • Class #2 - GAPS™ Class, Gut & Psychology Syndrome Protocol
  • Class #3 - GAPS™ Masterclass, Advanced Concepts 

Testimonials 

Here is a sampling of words from those I've been privileged to help...

Testimonials From Classes:

“This class will provide you with the tools to be successful! If you intend to work with the GAPS diet, you will be much better prepared after taking this course. The Facebook forum is worth the price of the course all by itself… Don’t miss the opportunity to enroll!” – Lisa K.

“I was able to finally dive into gaps with my daughter, after reading the book three times, researching different websites etc. I finally felt confident enough to go for it.” – Kristal H.

“Lots of information, really good guidance and a teacher who never stops searching for more information if needed.” – Anne-Marie O.

“Very good information about gut health, leaky gut, and how to heal it with GAPS and an awesome support community! Lots of great tips, recipes, and info on supplements to go along with the GAPS book. Access to our wonderful teacher, who patiently answered endless questions.” – Megan H.

“I have a much deeper understanding of the primacy of food – its role as both villain (when we eat modern processed food) and the hero (when we eat real, nutrient dense, healing food) of our health. I have learned that my health, and how I feel on a day to day basis, is 100% about what I eat. I honestly – no exaggeration – feel better than I have felt in decades. I have lost 10 lbs (was not overweight before) and have so much more energy and a more clear (less fuzzy) brain.” – Skotti F.

“Informative, easy to navigate, great resources and access to a wonderful Facebook community.” – Alyssa A.

“Module 7 [Supplementation] was the most useful to me. Finally figured out why I had so much indigestion and was able to address it with supplements and stop taking Prilosec!” – Cheryl W.

“It’s hard to choose a favorite module… I love the wealth of information included and how well you have organized it. Your GAPS Class is so thorough.” – Julie M.

Testimonials From 1 to 1 Clients:

I was lucky enough to meet Melanie in June of 2013.  A middle school teacher at the end of the school year, I was drained, exhausted, and struggling with chronic anxiety, chronic fatigue, bloating, fatigue after eating, diarrhea, dark under-eye circles, irregular periods and severe PMS.  Meeting Melanie was a breath of fresh air - her expertise and her ability to truly listen and hear my needs, guided our creation of a GAPS diet that worked with my lifestyle.  She supported me through a dramatic GAPS Stage 1 diet, in which I experienced a great deal of detox reactions, and then through the process of transitioning to the normal GAPS diet.  Her patience and availability was unfailing, and I knew she was there to support me through choosing the best probiotic for my system, to sending me the best recipe in the whole world for homemade mayonnaise.  After being on the full GAPS diet for 5 months, I feel more at home in my body than I have since childhood - it has allowed me to return home to myself.  My anxiety is gone, I feel energized after eating, have no food cravings whatsoever (goodbye sugar - hurray!), my digestion is strong and regular, my periods are regular, my PMS is much less, and I now have flawless skin with no under-eye circles.  I will be forever grateful to Melanie for helping me to find myself again. ~ Gretchen Miller, educator

Melanie was fantastic and thorough to work with.  She helped me understand our family diet better and minimize the anxiety I have over nutrition.  We've incorporated a lot of the changes into our daily routines, and I often check my notes and emails from her sessions when I need help with something.  The Skype calls were flexible, wonderful and worked well with our lifestyle.  I would highly recommend Melanie to anyone seriously seeking to maximize their nutrition, and for a thorough, comprehensive and custom plan of action. ~Vesna L.

Working with Melanie has been a huge step and gift to me in nourishing my family and doing everything I can to help us obtain and maintain optimal health. We started out with my three year old who has asthma and food allergies seeking to help her body and particularly her immune system to function as best it can. While she was our main focus, every member of my family has benefitted tremendously from this partnership. My daughter is doing well and her immune system seems to be functioning better than it has in the past. My year-and-a-half year old son increased his concentration remarkably and became more relaxed and less high-needs. My husband has more energy now and usually refuses to eat things he was not eager to give up in the beginning because he feels so much better now. Severe painful eczema had begun to plague me and is now under control. I’m also enjoying improved mood and overall functioning.

Although I had learned much about nourishing and traditional foods as well as GAPS on my own, Melanie helped me to take more steps to get our family fully on track and the results have been more than worth the investment. She made changes that seemed overwhelming on my own manageable by helping me to put a plan in place. Melanie is an encouraging, knowledgeable, and supportive coach, and I’m so thankful for the privilege of working with her and will turn to her again as a resource as needed in the future. ~Beth H.

Why Contribute Now? The October GAPS™ Class!

Contributing $100 not only helps pay for professionally done cooking videos now, but it also qualifies you for a one year membership into Honest Body... AND that means you can go through the next live round of the GAPS™ Class... running in October. This class last sold for over $400, now it will be accessible for $100! 

  • Contribute now
  • Take the October 2015 GAPS™ Class

Would You Help Share This?

I realize some won't be able to contribute, or won't be needing the particular support I offer, but there is still a way you can help:

  • Spread the word and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for your support.

Warmly, 

Melanie

An exceptionally affordable annual membership model


Easy on-line access for more families worldwide


What I Need...And What You Receive In Return
I'm asking for:


$4,000 - 10 key food prep concepts to be professionally filmed 

Additional funds - to go towards a better membership platform and resources 

You receive: Unique and high-quality offerings like:













Why Am I Qualified?
My own family and I went through a digestive healing protocol called GAPS™. It was formidable to start at the time, but delivered huge health benefits.
Food, and a focus on digestion, profoundly changed our lives for the better.  
I knew I wanted to help others, and create something that addressed the challenges I had faced. It seemed completely natural to train as a Nutritional Therapist & GAPS Practitioner.


Now I want to do something even better... 
A New Way To Do Your Family's Health - 
HONEST BODY MEMBERSHIP
One year of membership will include the following:




* Links:

Class #2 - GAPS™ Class, Gut & Psychology Syndrome Protocol

Class #3 - GAPS™ Masterclass, Advanced Concepts 





Testimonials  Here is a sampling of words from those I've been privileged to help...
Testimonials From Classes:

“This class will provide you with the tools to be successful! If you intend to work with the GAPS diet, you will be much better prepared after taking this course. The Facebook forum is worth the price of the course all by itself… Don’t miss the opportunity to enroll!” – Lisa K.
“I was able to finally dive into gaps with my daughter, after reading the book three times, researching different websites etc. I finally felt confident enough to go for it.” – Kristal H.
“Lots of information, really good guidance and a teacher who never stops searching for more information if needed.” – Anne-Marie O.
“Very good information about gut health, leaky gut, and how to heal it with GAPS and an awesome support community! Lots of great tips, recipes, and info on supplements to go along with the GAPS book. Access to our wonderful teacher, who patiently answered endless questions.” – Megan H.
“I have a much deeper understanding of the primacy of food – its role as both villain (when we eat modern processed food) and the hero (when we eat real, nutrient dense, healing food) of our health. I have learned that my health, and how I feel on a day to day basis, is 100% about what I eat. I honestly – no exaggeration – feel better than I have felt in decades. I have lost 10 lbs (was not overweight before) and have so much more energy and a more clear (less fuzzy) brain.” – Skotti F.

“Informative, easy to navigate, great resources and access to a wonderful Facebook community.” – Alyssa A.
“Module 7 [Supplementation] was the most useful to me. Finally figured out why I had so much indigestion and was able to address it with supplements and stop taking Prilosec!” – Cheryl W.
“It’s hard to choose a favorite module… I love the wealth of information included and how well you have organized it. Your GAPS Class is so thorough.” – Julie M.
Testimonials From 1 to 1 Clients:
I was lucky enough to meet Melanie in June of 2013.  A middle school teacher at the end of the school year, I was drained, exhausted, and struggling with chronic anxiety, chronic fatigue, bloating, fatigue after eating, diarrhea, dark under-eye circles, irregular periods and severe PMS.  Meeting Melanie was a breath of fresh air - her expertise and her ability to truly listen and hear my needs, guided our creation of a GAPS diet that worked with my lifestyle.  She supported me through a dramatic GAPS Stage 1 diet, in which I experienced a great deal of detox reactions, and then through the process of transitioning to the normal GAPS diet.  Her patience and availability was unfailing, and I knew she was there to support me through choosing the best probiotic for my system, to sending me the best recipe in the whole world for homemade mayonnaise.  After being on the full GAPS diet for 5 months, I feel more at home in my body than I have since childhood - it has allowed me to return home to myself.  My anxiety is gone, I feel energized after eating, have no food cravings whatsoever (goodbye sugar - hurray!), my digestion is strong and regular, my periods are regular, my PMS is much less, and I now have flawless skin with no under-eye circles.  I will be forever grateful to Melanie for helping me to find myself again. ~ Gretchen Miller, educator
Melanie was fantastic and thorough to work with.  She helped me understand our family diet better and minimize the anxiety I have over nutrition.  We've incorporated a lot of the changes into our daily routines, and I often check my notes and emails from her sessions when I need help with something.  The Skype calls were flexible, wonderful and worked well with our lifestyle.  I would highly recommend Melanie to anyone seriously seeking to maximize their nutrition, and for a thorough, comprehensive and custom plan of action. ~Vesna L.
Working with Melanie has been a huge step and gift to me in nourishing my family and doing everything I can to help us obtain and maintain optimal health. We started out with my three year old who has asthma and food allergies seeking to help her body and particularly her immune system to function as best it can. While she was our main focus, every member of my family has benefitted tremendously from this partnership. My daughter is doing well and her immune system seems to be functioning better than it has in the past. My year-and-a-half year old son increased his concentration remarkably and became more relaxed and less high-needs. My husband has more energy now and usually refuses to eat things he was not eager to give up in the beginning because he feels so much better now. Severe painful eczema had begun to plague me and is now under control. I’m also enjoying improved mood and overall functioning.
Although I had learned much about nourishing and traditional foods as well as GAPS on my own, Melanie helped me to take more steps to get our family fully on track and the results have been more than worth the investment. She made changes that seemed overwhelming on my own manageable by helping me to put a plan in place. Melanie is an encouraging, knowledgeable, and supportive coach, and I’m so thankful for the privilege of working with her and will turn to her again as a resource as needed in the future. ~Beth H.

Why Contribute Now? The October GAPS™ Class!  Contributing $100 not only helps pay for professionally done cooking videos now, but it also qualifies you for a one year membership into Honest Body... AND that means you can go through the next live round of the GAPS™ Class... running in October. This class last sold for over $400, now it will be accessible for $100!   Contribute now Take the October 2015 GAPS™ Class    

Would You Help Share This? I realize some won't be able to contribute, or won't be needing the particular support I offer, but there is still a way you can help:  Spread the word and make some noise about my campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools!   Thank you for your support.Warmly, Melanie

story:
Oprimir Aquí Para Español!


Our Story

HOLA Hospice, which translates to “Hospice of the Angels," is both a California 501(c)(3) Non-Profit Corporation and Mexican nonprofit organization A.C. (Associación civil) established in 2013 to provide direct care to terminally ill patients in Morelia, the capital city of the state of Michoacán, Mexico.

Elena Lopez, a licensed vocational nurse and a graduate of Pacific Coast College, is the HOLA Hospice founder. She is a longtime dedicated hospice nurse and has 25 years of experience as a case manager, having worked at the City of Angels Hospice, AIDS Healthcare Foundation, St Vincent’s Medical Center, Kaiser Permanente and IPC In-Patient Consultants in California. In 1991 she went to Michoacán to personally care for her dying grandmother and encountered many other people who were suffering from a lack of basic medical resources such as pain medications and oxygen to relieve the agonizing symptoms of their terminal illness.

Realizing the alarming need for in-home hospice care and the greater necessity for a hospice facility, Ms. Lopez made a commitment to provide compassionate care to terminally ill patients and their loved ones.

We are currently working towards two specific goals, and have made significant progress for both:

* The first goal is to fund a one year program for a dedicated team of skilled and experienced professionals to care for people facing a terminal illness in the comfort of their own homes, free of charge to the patient. This will be the first program to provide hospice care in Morelia, Michoacán.

  • Our current status: An interdisciplinary team is already in place in Morelia and will provide in home hospice services as soon as funds are available. 

* The second, a longer-term goal, is to build the first hospice facility in Morelia, Michoacán, accommodating 30 patients. The team at this facility will collaborate with hospitals and local universities including: La Universidad de San Nicolás de Hidalgo, Instituto Tecnológico de Morelia and La Universidad de la Salle’s psychology department internship program.

  •  Our current status: The government of the state of Michoacán donated the land for the hospice site in June of 2015, thanks in part to Lolita Gutierrez, president of the Federación de Michoacanos in California. Doho Constructivo and La Universidad de la Salle are currently designing the facility pro bono, based on hospice facilities research in Europe and the US.

HOLA’s Mission

Hospice care is for patients whose life expectancy is likely to be six months or less. Hospice care professionals help patients and their families understand treatment options and make critical informed decisions so that they may have peace, comfort and dignity during the natural process of death.

HOLA Hospice is a team of interdisciplinary professionals specializing in hospice and palliative care. We focus on pain and symptom management, holistic care, and providing access to local health care programs and resources for terminally ill patients while educating their families to care for their loved ones at home.

The Impact

Hospice care programs and facilities offer vital end of life services which are readily available in the United States through 5,500 hospice facilities.  In 2013 the National Hospice and Palliative Care Organization estimated that 1.1 million people in the United States died under the care of a hospice program, and that number continues to climb as more hospice facilities open each year nationwide. However, in many other places of the world, hospice care is not always an option.

Mexico has a population of 122 million people but there are approximately only 10 stand-alone hospice facilities in the entire country.  In the state of Michoacán, with a population of 4.5 million people, there are currently no hospice facilities.

Your donations to HOLA Hospice will benefit approximately 5-10% of the population in Michoacán, Mexico.

Already Making a Difference

HOLA met Daisy when she was 7 years old. At the time she was terminally ill with leukemia, and she lived with her family and brothers in Cotija, Michoacán. HOLA provided transportation for Daisy and her parents to her chemotherapy appointments in Morelia, making a 150-mile trip each way for several months. When she passed, HOLA offered one year of bereavement counseling and support to her family.

What We Need and Why

The $75,000 raised will enable HOLA Hospice to provide in-home hospice care for 20 patients a week for one year, offering necessary psycho-social services, medications, medical equipment and bereavement programs at the patient’s residence by a full-time team of hospice professionals: 1 doctor, 1 psychologist, 2 nurses, 1 dietician, 2 social workers, 5 home health aides, 2 spiritual/bereavement counselors, and 15 volunteers.

This start-up capital campaign constitutes only a portion of our overall long-term budget.


Read more about the need for hospice care in Mexico

https://www.hrw.org/report/2014/10/28/care-when-there-no-cure/ensuring-right-palliative-care-mexico


HOLA is an official member of the International Association for Hospice and Palliative Care

Sources

http://hospicecare.com/home/ 
http://www.nhpco.org/sites/default/files/public/Statistics_Research/2012_Facts_Figures.pdf
http://www.nhpco.org/sites/default/files/public/Statistics_Research/2013_Facts_Figures.pdf

As a token of appreciation for your gift of $125 or more, you will receive a one time free evaluation and one treatment of Acupuncture at Green Acupuncture & Herbs in Los Angeles (Appointment only, www.okbalance.com Exp 12/31/15, simply present your Indiegogo donation receipt when you arrive for your appointment) and you will be supporting the revolution of in home hospice care in Morelia, Michoacan. Your support makes a huge difference to our cause! Your name will be added to the HOLA Hospice website on the Wall of Appreciation and you will receive a hand written thank you card. Thank you!



Español


HOLA promueve el cuidado de hospicio para aliviar el sufrimiento físico y emocional de los enfermos terminales con compasión.

Nuestra Historia

HOLA Hospicio, que se traduce como "Fundación de los Ángeles," es una organización sin fines de lucro  en California 501 (c) (3) al igual que en México AC (Asociación civil), establecida en 2013 para brindar atención directa a enfermos terminales en Morelia,  la capital del estado de Michoacán, México.

Elena López, una enfermera vocacional graduada de la universidad de la Costa del Pacífico, es la fundadora de HOLA Hospicio. Como enfermera de hospicio, y  administradora de casos, ella cuenta con 25 años de experiencia  y ha trabajado en el hospicio  City of Angeles Hospice, AIDS Healthcare Foundation, St Vicent’s Medical Center,  Kaiser Permanente y en IPC In-Paciente Consultants en California. En 1991 se fue a Michoacán para cuidar personalmente a su abuela  moribunda y se encontró con muchas otras personas que sufrían de una falta de recursos médicos básicos, como medicamentos para el dolor y el oxígeno para aliviar los síntomas agonizantes de su enfermedad terminal.

Al darse cuenta de la alarmante  falta de cuidado de hospicio en el hogar y la gran necesidad de un hospicio permanente, la Srta. López se comprometió a brindar atención compasiva a pacientes con enfermedades terminales y a sus seres queridos.

Actualmente estamos trabajando en dos objetivos específicos, y hemos progresado significativamente en ambos:

• El primer objetivo es financiar un programa de un año para que un equipo de expertos profesionales calificados puedan cuidar a los enfermos terminales en la comodidad de sus propios hogares. Este será el primer programa para proporcionar Cuidados Paliativos en Morelia, Michoacán.

• Nuestra  situación actual: En Morelia un equipo interdisciplinario  ya esta seleccionado y proporcionará servicios de hospicio domiciliario tan pronto como se disponga de fondos.

• El segundo, un objetivo a más largo plazo, es la construcción del primer hospicio en Morelia, Michoacán, con capacidad para 30 pacientes. El equipo de este centro colaborará con los hospitales y las universidades locales, como: La Universidad de San Nicolás de Hidalgo, Instituto Tecnológico de Morelia y  el programa de internados  del departamento de psicología  en La Universidad de la Salle.

• Estado actual: El gobierno del estado de Michoacán ha donado el terreno para  la construcción del hospicio, gracias en parte a Lolita Gutiérrez, presidenta de la Federación de Michoacanos en California. Actualmente Doho Constructivo y La Universidad de la Salle están diseñando el hospicio pro bono, basándose en una investigación de  las instalaciones de Cuidados Paliativos en Europa y los Estados Unidos.

Misión de HOLA

El cuidado de hospicio es para los pacientes cuya expectativa de vida es probablemente de seis meses o menos.  Los profesionales del cuidado de hospicio ayudan a los pacientes y sus familias a entender las opciones de tratamiento y tomar decisiones críticas acertadas para que puedan tener  tranquilidad, comodidad y dignidad durante el proceso natural de la muerte.

HOLA Hospicio es un equipo de profesionales interdisciplinarios especializados en Cuidados Paliativos y de hospicio.  Nos enfocamos en el control del dolor, el manejo de los síntomas, cuidados holísticos, el acceso a recursos y programas de atención de salud locales para pacientes con enfermedades terminales, a la vez que educamos a sus familias para cuidar a sus seres queridos en casa.

El Impacto

En Estados Unidos existen 5,500 programas e instalaciones  que ofrecen Cuidados Paliativos y de hospicio. En 2013, la Organización Nacional de Hospicios y Cuidados Paliativos estimó que 1.1 millones de personas en los Estados Unidos murieron bajo el cuidado de un programa de hospicio, y cada año ese número sigue aumentando a medida que más hospicios abren sus puertas en todo el país.  Sin embargo en muchas otros lugares del mundo el cuidado de hospicio no siempre es una opción.

México tiene una población de 122 millones de personas, pero hay aproximadamente sólo 10 centros de Cuidados Paliativos independientes en todo el país. En el estado de Michoacán, con una población de 4.5 millones de personas, en estos momentos no existe ninguna instalación para cuidados de Hospicio.

Sus donaciones a HOLA Hospicio beneficiarán a aproximadamente 5-10% de la población en Michoacán, México.

Haciendo la Diferencia

HOLA conoció a  Daisy cuando ella tenía 7 años de edad. En ese momento ella sufría gravemente de leucemia aguda, y vivía con su familia y hermanos en Cotija, Michoacán. HOLA proporcionó transporte para Daisy y sus padres a sus citas de quimioterapia en Morelia.  Hacían este viaje de 150 millas en cada sentido durante varios meses. Cuando falleció, HOLA ofreció a su familia un año de orientación y apoyo para el duelo.

Lo Que Necesitamos y Por Qué

Los  $ 75,000  USD recaudados permitirán a HOLA Hospicio proporcionar Cuidados Paliativos domiciliarios para 20 pacientes a la semana durante un año, ofreciendo servicios  psicosociales, medicamentos, equipo medico programas de apoyo para el  duelo en la residencia del paciente por un equipo de tiempo completo profesionales de Cuidados Paliativos : 1 doctor, 1 psicólogo, 3 enfermeras, 1 nutriólogo, 2 trabajadores sociales, 5 ayudantes de salud en el hogar, 2 consejeros espirituales / duelo, y 15 voluntarios.

El capital inicial que esta campaña recaudará constituye sólo una parte de nuestro presupuesto general a largo plazo.


Lea más acerca de la necesidad de cuidados de hospicio en México

https://www.hrw.org/report/2014/10/28/care-when-there-no-cure/ensuring-right-palliative-care-mexico

HOLA es un miembro oficial de la Asociación Internacional de Hospicios y Cuidados Paliativos

Fuentes

http://hospicecare.com/home/

http://www.nhpco.org/sites/default/files/public/Statistics_Research/2012_Facts_Figures.pdf

http://www.nhpco.org/sites/default/files/public/Statistics_Research/2013_Facts_Figures.pdf

Incentivos

$ 25 USD Agradecimiento en nuestro sitio Web!

Estamos agradecidos de que usted eligió ayudarnos con nuestro esfuerzo para cambiar la forma en que cuidamos de los enfermos terminales. Su donación ayudará a cambiar vidas! Como muestra de nuestro agradecimiento, se añadirá su nombre a la página Web de HOLA Hospicio en nuestro Muro de Agradecimiento. ¡Gracias!

$ 35 USD Imán de Mariposa Monarca

Apreciamos profundamente su compromiso con este movimiento. A este nivel, le enviaremos un imán  en forma de mariposa monarca hecha de metal repujado elaborado en Michoacán por artesanos locales, que representa la migración de la mariposa monarca,  con una tarjeta de agradecimiento escrita a mano.  Se añadirá su nombre a la página Web de HOLA Hospicio en nuestro Muro de Agradecimiento. ¡Gracias!

$ 50 USD Un Diario con motivo de libélula cortado en láser

Gracias por apoyar  a HOLA Hospicio. Su donación hará una gran diferencia en los cuidados de los enfermos terminales. Con su donación, usted recibirá un diario de cartón reciclado con un diseño de libélula cortado en  láser hecho en Michoacán por un artista local.  También su nombre será añadido a  la página Web de HOLA Hospicio en nuestro Muro de Agradecimiento. ¡Gracias!

$ 100 USD Camiseta con logo de HOLA

Recibe una camiseta personalizada con el logotipo de HOLA. La libélula, como un poderoso mensajero, simboliza la libertad del espíritu y la gratitud por las pequeñas cosas; la contemplación del significado más profundo de la vida. Nos enseña la magia del cambio de vibraciones que nos permite encontrar nuestro verdadero poder y así oír la sabiduría de nuestra alma.  (Favor de especificar tamaño.)

Se añadirá su nombre a la página Web de HOLA Hospicio en nuestro Muro de Agradecimiento. ¡Gracias!

$ 150 USD Libro de Arte o de Cultura

Como muestra de agradecimiento por su donación a este nivel,  usted recibirá un libro que ilustra el arte o la cultura de Michoacán, México,  donado por la Secretaría de Cultura  de Michoacán. (Disponible sólo en español.)  Estará apoyando la revolución del cuidado de hospicio domiciliario en Morelia, Michoacán. Su apoyo hace una gran diferencia por nuestra causa! Se añadirá su nombre a la página Web de HOLA Hospicio en nuestro Muro de Agradecimiento. ¡Gracias!

Como muestra de nuestra apreciación por su donación usted recibirá gratis una evaluación y tratamiento de Acupuntura en Green Acupunture & Herbs en Los Angeles (Se requiere previa cita, www.okbalance.com Expira 12/13/15.) ¡Su apoyo hará una gran diferencia a nuestra causa! Estará apoyando la revolución de los cuidados de hospicio domiciliarios en Morelia, Michoacán. Se añadirá su nombre al Muro de Agradecimiento en la página Web de HOLA Hospicio y recibirá una nota de agradecimiento personalizada. ¡Gracias!


Banco Santander Fundacion Hospicio de Los Angeles, Numero de Cuenta 65-504 44940-7 en Morelia, Michoacan MX.

Su contribución es muy apreciada por nosotros y todo el mundo que se encuentra a benficio de HOLA Hospicio de los Ángeles.

¡GRACIAS!

Encuentra esta campaña

Facebook Twitter You Tube  SitioWeb

en el hogar y la gran necesidad de un hospicio permanente, la Srta. López se
comprometió a brindar atención compasiva a pacientes con enfermedades
terminales y a sus seres queridos.
Actualmente estamos trabajando en dos objetivos específicos, y hemos
progresado significativamente en ambos:
• El primer objetivo es financiar un programa de un año para que un
equipo de expertos profesionales calificados puedan cuidar a los enfermos
terminales en la comodidad de sus propios hogares. Este será el primer programa
para proporcionar Cuidados Paliativos en Morelia, Michoacán.
• Nuestra  situación actual: En
Morelia un equipo interdisciplinario  ya
esta seleccionado y proporcionará servicios de hospicio domiciliario tan pronto
como se disponga de fondos.
• El segundo, un objetivo a más largo plazo, es la construcción del
primer hospicio en Morelia, Michoacán, con capacidad para 30 pacientes. El
equipo de este centro colaborará con los hospitales y las universidades
locales, como: La Universidad de San Nicolás de Hidalgo, Instituto Tecnológico
de Morelia y  el programa de
internados  del departamento de
psicología  en La Universidad de la
Salle.
• Estado actual: El gobierno del estado de Michoacán ha donado el
terreno para  la construcción del
hospicio, gracias en parte a Lolita Gutiérrez, presidenta de la Federación de
Michoacanos en California. Actualmente Doho Constructivo y La Universidad de la
Salle están diseñando el hospicio pro bono, basándose en una investigación
de  las instalaciones de Cuidados
Paliativos en Europa y los Estados Unidos.
Misión de HOLA
El cuidado de hospicio es para
los pacientes cuya expectativa de vida es probablemente de seis meses o menos.  Los profesionales del cuidado de hospicio
ayudan a los pacientes y sus familias a entender las opciones de tratamiento y
tomar decisiones críticas acertadas para que puedan tener  tranquilidad, comodidad y dignidad durante el
proceso natural de la muerte.
HOLA Hospicio es un equipo
de profesionales interdisciplinarios especializados en Cuidados Paliativos y de
hospicio.  Nos enfocamos en el control del dolor, el manejo de los
síntomas, cuidados holísticos, el acceso a recursos y programas de
atención de salud locales para pacientes con enfermedades terminales, a la vez
que educamos a sus familias para cuidar
a sus seres queridos en casa.
El Impacto
En Estados Unidos existen 5,500 programas e instalaciones  que ofrecen Cuidados Paliativos y de
hospicio. En 2013, la Organización Nacional de Hospicios y Cuidados Paliativos
estimó que 1.1 millones de personas en los Estados Unidos murieron bajo el
cuidado de un programa de hospicio, y cada año ese número sigue aumentando a
medida que más hospicios abren sus puertas en todo el país.  Sin embargo en muchas otros lugares del mundo
el cuidado de hospicio no siempre es una opción. 
México tiene una población de 122 millones de personas, pero hay
aproximadamente sólo 10 centros de Cuidados Paliativos independientes en todo
el país. En el estado de Michoacán, con
una población de 4.5 millones de personas, en estos momentos no existe ninguna instalación para cuidados de Hospicio.
Sus donaciones a HOLA Hospicio beneficiarán a aproximadamente 5-10% de
la población en Michoacán, México.
Haciendo
la Diferencia



HOLA conoció a  Daisy cuando ella
tenía 7 años de edad. En ese momento ella sufría gravemente de leucemia aguda,
y vivía con su familia y hermanos en Cotija, Michoacán. HOLA proporcionó
transporte para Daisy y sus padres a sus citas de quimioterapia en
Morelia.  Hacían este viaje de 150 millas
en cada sentido durante varios meses. Cuando falleció, HOLA ofreció a su
familia un año de orientación y apoyo para el duelo.
Lo
Que Necesitamos y Por Qué

Los  $ 75,000  USD recaudados permitirán a HOLA Hospicio proporcionar
Cuidados Paliativos domiciliarios para 20 pacientes a la semana durante un año,
ofreciendo servicios  psicosociales,
medicamentos, equipo medico programas de apoyo para el  duelo en la residencia del paciente por un
equipo de tiempo completo profesionales de Cuidados Paliativos : 1 doctor, 1
psicólogo, 3 enfermeras, 1 nutriólogo, 2 trabajadores sociales, 5 ayudantes de salud
en el hogar, 2 consejeros espirituales / duelo, y 15 voluntarios.
El capital inicial que esta campaña recaudará constituye sólo una parte
de nuestro presupuesto general a largo plazo.




Lea más acerca de la necesidad de cuidados de hospicio en México
https://www.hrw.org/report/2014/10/28/care-when-there-no-cure/ensuring-right-palliative-care-mexico
HOLA es un miembro oficial
de la Asociación Internacional de Hospicios y Cuidados Paliativos

Fuentes
http://hospicecare.com/home/


http://www.nhpco.org/sites/default/files/public/Statistics_Research/2012_Facts_Figures.pdf

http://www.nhpco.org/sites/default/files/public/Statistics_Research/2013_Facts_Figures.pdf

Incentivos

$ 25 USD Agradecimiento en nuestro sitio
Web!
Estamos agradecidos de que usted eligió ayudarnos con nuestro esfuerzo
para cambiar la forma en que cuidamos de los enfermos terminales. Su donación
ayudará a cambiar vidas! Como muestra de nuestro agradecimiento, se añadirá su
nombre a la página Web de HOLA Hospicio en nuestro Muro de Agradecimiento.
¡Gracias!
$ 35 USD Imán de Mariposa Monarca
Apreciamos profundamente su compromiso con este movimiento. A este
nivel, le enviaremos un imán  en forma de
mariposa monarca hecha de metal repujado elaborado en Michoacán por artesanos
locales, que representa la migración de la mariposa monarca,  con una tarjeta de agradecimiento escrita a
mano.  Se añadirá su nombre a la página
Web de HOLA Hospicio en nuestro Muro de Agradecimiento. ¡Gracias!
$ 50 USD Un Diario con motivo de libélula cortado en
láser

Gracias por apoyar  a HOLA Hospicio.
Su donación hará una gran diferencia en los cuidados de los enfermos
terminales. Con su donación, usted recibirá un diario de cartón reciclado con
un diseño de libélula cortado en  láser
hecho en Michoacán por un artista local. 
También su nombre será añadido a 
la página Web de HOLA Hospicio en nuestro Muro de Agradecimiento.
¡Gracias!
$ 100 USD Camiseta con logo de HOLA 
Recibe una camiseta personalizada con el logotipo de HOLA. La libélula,
como un poderoso mensajero, simboliza la libertad del espíritu y la gratitud
por las pequeñas cosas; la contemplación del significado más
profundo de la vida. Nos enseña la magia del cambio de vibraciones que nos
permite encontrar nuestro verdadero poder y así oír la sabiduría de nuestra
alma.  (Favor de especificar tamaño.)
Se añadirá su nombre a la página Web de HOLA Hospicio en nuestro Muro
de Agradecimiento. ¡Gracias!
$ 150 USD Libro de Arte o de Cultura



Como muestra de agradecimiento por su donación a este nivel,  usted recibirá un libro que ilustra el arte o
la cultura de Michoacán, México,  donado
por la Secretaría de Cultura  de
Michoacán. (Disponible sólo en español.) 
Estará apoyando la revolución del cuidado de hospicio domiciliario en
Morelia, Michoacán. Su apoyo hace una gran diferencia por nuestra causa! Se
añadirá su nombre a la página Web de HOLA Hospicio en nuestro Muro de
Agradecimiento. ¡Gracias!

Como muestra de nuestra apreciación por su donación usted recibirá gratis una evaluación y tratamiento de Acupuntura en Green Acupunture & Herbs en Los Angeles (Se requiere previa cita, www.okbalance.com Expira 12/13/15.) ¡Su apoyo hará una gran diferencia a nuestra causa! Estará apoyando la revolución de los cuidados de hospicio domiciliarios en Morelia, Michoacán. Se añadirá su nombre al Muro de Agradecimiento en la página Web de HOLA Hospicio y recibirá una nota de agradecimiento personalizada. ¡Gracias!


Banco Santander Fundacion Hospicio de Los Angeles, Numero de
Cuenta 65-504 44940-7 en Morelia, Michoacan MX.
Su contribución es muy apreciada por nosotros y todo el mundo que se
encuentra a benficio de HOLA Hospicio de los Ángeles.

story:
What We Do?

In one sentence- We minimize your visits to the clinic and help you take control of your health

How we do it?

  • We provide an online platform, which allows you to access on your phone/tablet/PC, your medical reports sent by the diagnostic center which you can share it with your doctor for consultation, all from the comfort of your home. 

  • You also get access to all your historical medical records (EMR) in one place and can select and share these reports to other doctors as well, for a second opinion with just a couple of clicks. So now you do not need to make multiple non-essential trips to the clinic.

  • With the DoctorSigma App, the diagnostic centers will upload your test results online directly to you, which will give you complete control
  • The doctor gets access to the reports which you share and shall provide his observations and prescriptions online which only you can access. 
  • So now get your reports and consultations at home!
  • Additionally, we also provide you with unique state-of-the-art technology "Healthcare Predictive analysis". We will provide you with preventive healthcare solutions based on the statistics collected in your region, and also suggest corrective measures for improving living conditions to avoid prevalent diseases.
Lets take a scenario: Jim is a business traveller, who often travels to developing nations for meetings. On one such trip, he contracts a deadly virus which is diagnosed on his return. However, if he uses the DoctorSigma App, he will be informed about the potential risks of prevalent diseases in the region based on live statistical data, even before reaching his destination and he will be offered suggestions on preventive steps to avoid contracting the virus.

  • We also understand the need for privacy and security of your data so we are deploying bank grade security levels, making the entire scheme of actions private and secure. Your data will never be shared with any third party without your consent. This service will be totally free of charge for the users (patients and doctors).

About us!

We at DoctorSigma are a team of Futurists, Technologists, Data Scientists and Biologists. We have been part of global management consulting firms, researching, developing and implementing technologies and solutions for large banks, hospitals and corporations. Our team has specialization in Advanced Analytics, Pervasive Computing and Embedded Technologies.

We have started building a solution for healthcare, to address a problem affecting more than a billion people. Our aim is to simplify and integrate the process of diagnosis, consultation and treatment and to also minimize the number of visits to the doctor or diagnostic centers. This will be beneficial not only to the patients but also doctors, medical technicians, healthcare centers and so on.

This campaign is important to us, since it will give us enough resource to finish building up the solution we have designed. With the funding we intend to pace up the development effort and launch the services and solution soon.

  


Your contribution to this project can make a difference in a huge way.

The Usual Story, of experience!

If someone falls ill today, the usual chain of process would be something like this:

1. A visit to a doctor, who would most commonly prescribe a multitude of tests, 

2. A visit to the clinic to get those tests done,

3. Another trip to collect the reports the next day and

4. Finally reporting to the doctor thereafter, to consult him on the same.

Doesn’t this sound familiar? It is this long, winding process that we intend to terminate, making medical diagnostics a lot more hassle-free for the patients as well as the doctors.

                      


The Reach!

Although these are typical problems faced majorly in developing countries but some of the developed nations also face similar scenarios, therefore, we are striving to create massive impact to billions of people. 

We research health patterns, medical diagnostics, diseases, medicines and cures. and are also driven towards using smart predicting techniques for any outbreak of epidemics or disease.

                                                


Using this App, you can save a lot of dollars by:

1.  A better control on your health and fitness.

2.  Saving on time and your fuel

3.  Inflated medical bills

4.  Unnecessary work holidays

5.  Reduced Insurance Premiums

Why we require funding:

  • We require funding and support to build a bigger team and speed up the pace of our research and development. Once the product is rolled out, we will require ground force to reach out to major hospitals, doctors and nursing homes. 
  • After we receive the funding we will use it -
    • To continue developing the App, upgrading the features, and roll out as soon as possible.
    • For research and development.
    • For global expansion and growth of our services
    • For infrastructure and assets, to provide seamless support on the service 24x7.

For your contribution we shall offer you great perks. Please refer to the perks sections for more information.

You can visit our website for more details on our progress and achievements : www.doctorsigma.org

Other Ways You Can Help

Though we request you participate financially in this project, however if you can't contribute today, but are as excited as us about this project, there are other ways to help us by:

  • Spreading the word around and make people aware about our campaign.
  • Using social media (Facebook and Twitter) to reach out to your friends and relatives.

    • Please don't forget to use the Indiegogo Share tools! 

    You can also follow us on Facebook and Twitter.

story:
The Problem

Struggling to eat better? You are not alone! Making healthy food choices is harder than expected because the majority of them are based on convenience. Perhaps it is our busy schedule and limited time to prepare healthy meals. When our schedule starts to interfere with healthy eating habits, we start skipping meals and choose convenient or fast foods to eat instead. This brings us to today where 70% of all eating out consumption happens at a fast food restaurant, being readily available, inexpensive and filling and... unhealthy.


The Solution

Meet Salad Street - America's own drive thru salad bar. Featuring made-to-order salads, wraps, power smoothies and  a chidren's menu;  we are changing the way we eat fast food one drive thru at a time. From our locally sourced fruits and vegetables to our hormone free proteins we can finally feel good about what we eat. With business hours from 6am to 10pm we offer healthy and nutritious breakfast, lunch and dinner meals, all through the convenience of a drive thru.

Our first location is set to open in northern Chicago land and we will then rapidly expand throughout the country.


About Us

My name is Vladimir Cvetkov and I am the founder of Salad Street. I have over a decade of restaurant experience. Throughout my career I have been able to turn around or build from scratch a hand full of  restaurants. Facing serious health problems in 2014, just a month after my 30th birthday, I realized the importance of healthy eating and decided to take my experience and knowledge in the restaurant industry and fix the problem that we all face, the lack of convenient healthy food options. The team that I have assembled to date has over 4 decades of combined restaurant experience!

If you would like to get in touch with me, feel free to email me at: Vladimirc1984@gmail.com.


What we need

Our projected start up cost is $230,000 which includes the menu, recipe development, site selection, build out, marketing and working capital. Although we are using personal savings and help from friends and family, we still need to raise close to $80,000 to ensure the healthy start of our venture.

There are so many variables that go into setting a price point when it comes to opening a restaurant.  After much research, here are the main numbers that determine the capital needed:

Website and intellectual property - $19,000.

Menu development - $11,000.

Site build out and equipment - $105,000.

Inventory $15,000.

Marketing - $20,000.

Working capital - $80,000.


The Impact

Our mission is to offer healthy, sustainable and affordable food in the most convenient manner. We are the next generation fast food drive thru restaurant.

When we take care of ourselves by eating healthy  we are more focused, more productive, more efficient, and above all healthy!

A section of our menu will be dedicated to Superfood meals that are proven cancer fighters. From broccoli and berries to nuts and beans, we will offer delicious plant based  made-to-order meals that will help us prevent and fight cancer. We will then donate a portion of the sales to people in our local communities fighting cancer.

 

Risks & Challenges

We have worked for over a year developing Salad Street's concept, recipes and menu.  Assembling the right team and finding the right concept is challenging but with over four decades of combined experience in the restaurant industry we are confident that we will succeed and bring a healthy revolution to our country.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that some of you just can't contribute, but you can still help. Please share our campaign with your friends and family, we greatly appreciate it!

story:
As Featured In


About Pollution

In 2011,CDC (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention) pointed out about 1 in 12 Americans suffered from asthma and the numbers were increasing every year.Poor air quality is one of the main reasons for an asthma attack. 

In 2014, report from ALA(American Lung Association) showed that 47% of residents in the United States had been living in polluted air circumstance, according to the air quality index statistics of EPA(US Environmental Protection Agency). 

Now air pollution has become a global problem, which is severely threatening our health. Therefore, we start this healthy life campaign. We are committed to help us eliminate various of air pollutions so that everyone can enjoy a healthier life.

Today we develop a smart AI to solve kinds of air problems.We hope that the smart AI not only can detect pollutions, but eliminating pollutions. Health is everyone’s basic human right.

After all, our capability is limited, so we sincerely hope everyone browsed this campaign could share AI with your friends, simply by clicking the “Share” button on left side. Please let more friends know and keep healthy. 

Every backer will receive a mysterious gift for free, if you share AI on Facebook and send the screenshot to our Facebook page.


What AI can do？

AI is capable of monitoring temperature, humidity and air quality. It helps to clean some harmful substances, including PM2.5, formaldehyde, benzene, TVOC, pollen, dust, secondhand smoke, hairs, and flocs. It can eliminate some pathogens such as viruses, bacteria, fungus, etc.It may produce 24 million negative oxygen per second. AI can also remove odor and clean air. It is an essential all-in-1 smart air manager. 



What's inside?


 What is PM 2.5? 

In our daily life, we may often see some particles suspending in the air. According to their diameter, they are divided into several categories.

Over 90% of particles, which are bigger than 10 μm, will be kept outside our body by our nose hair and snot and sometime you may find black dust in your nose.

While particles, with diameter smaller than or equal to 10 μm, will be inhaled into our respiratory tract through nose. Therefore, it is called inhalable particulate matter or PM10 for short. Don’t worry too much about it. Cilium in upper respiratory tract swing 20 times per second, attaching PM10 to its mucus and pushing them to the throat. At last, PM10 will be swollen or coughed up. 

Particles, which are smaller than or equal to 2.5 μm, can easily pass through the upper and lower respiratory tract and reach the alveoli at last. That is PM2.5. Consisting of some toxic substances, for example, soot and dust, PAHs, heavy metals, PM2.5 will trigger leucocytes and lymphocytes to fight against themselves on its way to lower respiratory tract, causing various inflammations. After reaching the alveoli, PM2.5 will do harm to pulmonary ventilation function, making people easily deprived of oxygen. Even though macrophages can hardly break down some harmful substances, such as heavy metals. On the contrary, macrophages will break and die for it is difficult to decompose, causing a decrease in immunity. 

Among those particles, which are smaller than 0.5μm, can directly pass through alveoli into blood, injuring intima of blood vessels and narrowing blood vessels. This will cause a rise in blood pressure and trigger thrombosis. It can even reach the heart through blood circulation, resulting in cardiac ischemia, myocardial injury, arrhythmia and myocardial infarction. 

For now, the United States, the UK, France, India and China are the world’s most polluted countries of PM2.5 and millions of people die from air pollution every year. PNAS has reported that air pollution may cut our lifespan by 5.5 years. 


How to disinfect the room? 

UV exposure for a long time will do harm our health. But UV-C can hardly penetrate some materials like glass and plastic. Along with ZnO coating inside it, AI can 100% keep UV-C outside and make you safe.

 

How to purify the air? 



 What is negative oxygen? 

In recent years, WHO has monitored air quality in more than 1,600 cities, finding only 12% of residents has access to qualified air and more than 50% of the cities pollutant is over 250%.

On the other hand, the report shows that negative oxygen can degrade dust, PM10, PM2.5 in the air and purify pungent odors. Therefore, the higher concentration of negative oxygen in the air is, the fresher the air is, which makes negative oxygen widely applied in air freshener.

In nature, lighting and water can ionize a large amount of electrons, which contribute to negative oxygen after being captured by oxygen molecules. Therefore, the air is always exceptionally pure and fresh after rain. 


Near the forest, waterfalls and seaside, the negative oxygen is usually more than 10,000 pcs/cm³, we can feel the particularly fresh air when we stay there. While the negative oxygen in air-conditioned room is less than 50 pcs/cm³ and the average negative oxygen in city is not more than 200 pcs/cm³. 

At the same time, negative oxygen is more absorbable. Besides degrading dust, it can also reduce lactic acid in muscles, relieve fatigue, promote sleep and improve cardiovascular circulation. Therefore, people live in the place with high concentration of negative oxygen, such as forest and seaside, can live a longer and healthier life than others. 

By high-pressure ionization and oxygen molecule association, AI stimulates generation process of negative oxygen. Combining a large amount of electrons and oxygen molecules, it can produce 24 million negative oxygen per second. It makes you enjoy your life as if you were in the natural and fresh air and live a healthy life. 


THE APP


Who needs AI most? 

Automobile exhaust is one of the main pollution sources in our daily life. It is mainly composed of PM10, PM2.5, CO, hydrocarbons, nitrogen oxides, heavy metals and so on, which contributes to respiratory diseases and various inflammations and long-term inhalation could even trigger malignant tumors and cardiovascular diseases. Even when you are exposed to all kinds of industrial and chemical pollution, AI will help to create a qualified air environment and enable your family to live an environmentally-friendly life. 


Smoking affects both you and the ones you love. SHS is the one of the biggest indoor pollutant sources, containing thousands of harmful substances, such as PM2.5, nicotine, coal tar, heavy metals, nitrosamine, BaP and Po, may lead to asthma, pneumonia, heart disease, genital hypoplasia and the risk of developing lung cancer is 260%~600% higher than normal people. AI can quickly clean up the pollution and keep you away from SHS. It is a loyal heath guardian for smokers and their families and friends. 

Asthma is a common chronic disease, which attacks repeatedly and can not be cured. Mites, pet hair, air pollution, second hand smoking and pathogens in the air might be the trigger for an asthma attack. The powerful purification of AI can quickly clean up air pollution like PM10, PM2.5, TVOC, second hand smoking and pet hair. Also, it is able to wipe out mites and pathogens in the air permanently. 


Being allergic to pollen is a kind of common disease, it can trigger rhinitis, asthma, dermatitis and so on, which seriously affect our health and life. AI’s powerful purification function can quickly filtrate all kinds of pollens in the air and prevent your family away from being disturbed by pollens and  asthma. 


Sub-health is one of the biggest potential threats to modern people. Problems like malnutrition, sleep deprivation, psychological stress, low spirits, lack of exercise and sever fatigue will weaken our immunity system. But if we are exposed to polluted environment, we will easily get sick. Besides cleaning up the air, the sterilization function of AI can eliminate 99% of the pathogens within 1 second and keep us away from diseases. 


Pets are our good companions, but in the meanwhile, they bring hairs and parasites which are hard to clean. The powerful purification function of AI can clean up hairs and in the same time the sterilization function can eliminate various parasites. AI helps your family live a healthy life with your pets. 


TVOC in furniture like formaldehyde, benzene, and PM2.5, pathogens in the air will lead to different problems including dizziness and headache, blunted in response, losing weight, nausea and vomiting, neurasthenia, anemia, mental retardation and cancers. These will do harm to children’s health. AI can purify all kinds of air pollutions, eliminate pathogens, and remove odors, thus providing a safe environment for our children. 


The research has shown air pollution like PM2.5, TVOC, SHS will severely affect baby’s health, triggering all kinds of congenital problems including premature births, low birth weight, nervous system diseases, respiratory diseases, cancers, cardiovascular diseases, malformation and even SIDS. AI can quickly purify the air and clean various air pollutions like PM 2.5, TVOC, SHS. It cares for pregnant women and babies all the time. 


As we age, various functions in our body decline and air pollutions pose threat to the old. PM 2.5, TVOC, dust and various pathogens will trigger sore throat, trachitis, pneumonia, cardiovascular diseases, cancers and even cerebral hemorrhage. AI can not only purify the air and eliminate all kinds of pollutant air, the negative oxygen it produce can also relieve fatigue, promote sleep, and improve cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases, helping the old live a long and healthy life. 


Many people choose indoor sports because of their work and bad weather. Apart from building a safe sporting environment by air purification and sterilization, AI can also produce negative oxygen which can relieve fatigue when you are having aerobic exercise. Meanwhile, it can strengthen the functions of heart and lung, promote sleep, and improve sport quality, ensuring you a healthy life. 


Where is it often used? 

AI is applied in various common environments. Whether exhaust gas, pollen, PM2.5, TVOC from the windows when you are driving or harmful substances like formaldehyde and benzene, dust, hairs, flocs, mites in home, AI performs well in purification. AI can effectively remove cooking fume, keep food away from invisible harmful particulate, and purify all kinds of odors produced by household garbage. It can also eliminate various pathogens, like viruses and bacteria, produce amount of negative oxygen to relive fatigue, and strengthen cardiovascular circulation. It is your necessary air minder. 


TECH





PERKS

Normally an air quality monitor can reach up to $100, but this powerful multi-functional AI is only $99. By offering such a  price, we sincerely hope more friends can enjoy a healthier life. You definitely deserve one and please share it with more friends. Thank you.


THE GOAL


TIMELINE



THE TEAM

Jinglin had studied two master degrees in Australia. Those four years offered him insight into air pollution. He decided to develop a smart air manager and help more people enjoy a healthier life.


Tiange had four years designing experience. As a sufferer of air pollution, she is allergic to pollen. During the time we prepared our video, she suffered eyelid inflammation for weeks because of air pollution. She detests these pollutions.


Kai has worked as an electronics engineer for ten years. He had realized the impact of air pollution during his wife’s pregnancy. Then he begun to study the clearance of air pollution so babies will have a healthy, happy growing up environment.


Yang had five years software developing experience. This year he became a father. Same as Kai, he wishes his son to stay away from air pollution and grow up healthily and happily. He throws himself into the work of air pollution improvement.


Thanks for INDEGOGO giving us this valuable opportunity to introduce AI to us. If you believe our project can help others, please share it with your friends in Facebook and Twitter. Let us work together to help more people live away from air pollution and be able to breathe fresher and healthier air. 

We sincerely hope that everyone can live in a green and healthy environment and stay away from pollutions and diseases. AI is just the start, we will work hard to improve people’s health and living through more methods. 

After all,if you have any questions or suggestions, do not hesitate to comment us. Since our energy is limited, we will reply your question irregularly. We will try our best to communicate with every friend. Thank everyone again for your support. 


Plese do not hesitate to contact us via email if you have any questions.
