As Featured In


About Pollution


In 2011,CDC (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention) pointed out about 1 in 12 Americans suffered from asthma and the numbers were increasing every year.Poor air quality is one of the main reasons for an asthma attack. 
In 2014, report from ALA(American Lung Association) showed that 47% of residents in the United States had been living in polluted air circumstance, according to the air quality index statistics of EPA(US Environmental Protection Agency). 
Now air pollution has become a global problem, which is severely threatening our health. Therefore, we start this healthy life campaign. We are committed to help us eliminate various of air pollutions so that everyone can enjoy a healthier life.
Today we develop a smart AI to solve kinds of air problems.We hope that the smart AI not only can detect pollutions, but eliminating pollutions. Health is everyone’s basic human right.
After all, our capability is limited, so we sincerely hope everyone browsed this campaign could share AI with your friends, simply by clicking the “Share” button on left side. Please let more friends know and keep healthy. 
Every backer will receive a mysterious gift for free, if you share AI on Facebook and send the screenshot to our Facebook page.

What AI can do？AI is capable of monitoring temperature,
humidity and air quality. It helps to clean some harmful substances, including
PM2.5, formaldehyde, benzene, TVOC, pollen, dust,
secondhand smoke, hairs, and flocs. It can eliminate some pathogens such as
viruses, bacteria, fungus, etc.It may produce 24 million negative oxygen
per second. AI can also remove odor and clean air. It is an essential
all-in-1 smart air manager. 

What's inside?






 What is PM 2.5? 




In our daily life, we may often see some particles suspending in the air. According to their diameter, they are divided into several categories.

Over
90% of particles, which are bigger than 10 μm, will be kept outside our body by
our nose hair and snot and sometime you may find black dust in your nose.
While particles, with diameter smaller than or equal to 10 μm, will be inhaled into our respiratory tract through nose. Therefore, it is called inhalable particulate matter or PM10 for short. Don’t worry too much about it. Cilium in upper respiratory tract swing 20 times per second, attaching PM10 to its mucus and pushing them to the throat. At last, PM10 will be swollen or coughed up. 


Particles, which are smaller than or equal to 2.5 μm, can easily pass through the upper and lower respiratory tract and reach the alveoli at last. That is PM2.5. Consisting of some toxic substances, for example, soot and dust, PAHs, heavy metals, PM2.5 will trigger leucocytes and lymphocytes to fight against themselves on its way to lower respiratory tract, causing various inflammations. After reaching the alveoli, PM2.5 will do harm to pulmonary ventilation function, making people easily deprived of oxygen. Even though macrophages can hardly break down some harmful substances, such as heavy metals. On the contrary, macrophages will break and die for it is difficult to decompose, causing a decrease in immunity. 

Among those particles, which are
smaller than 0.5μm, can directly pass through alveoli into blood, injuring intima of blood
vessels and narrowing blood vessels. This will cause a rise in blood pressure
and trigger thrombosis. It can even reach the heart through blood
circulation, resulting in cardiac ischemia, myocardial injury, arrhythmia and
myocardial infarction. 

For now, the United States, the UK, France, India and China are the world’s most polluted countries of PM2.5 and millions of people die from air pollution every year. PNAS has reported that air pollution may cut our lifespan by 5.5 years. 



How to disinfect the room? 






UV
exposure for a long time will do harm our health. But UV-C can hardly
penetrate some materials like glass and plastic. Along with ZnO coating inside
it, AI can 100% keep UV-C outside and make you safe.


 
How to purify the air? 






 What is negative oxygen? 









In recent years, WHO has monitored air
quality in more than 1,600 cities, finding only 12% of residents has access to
qualified air and more than 50% of the cities pollutant is over 250%.On the other hand, the report shows that negative oxygen can degrade dust, PM10, PM2.5 in the air and purify pungent odors. Therefore, the higher concentration of negative oxygen in the air is, the fresher the air is, which makes negative oxygen widely applied in air freshener.


In nature, lighting and water can ionize a
large amount of electrons, which contribute to negative oxygen after being
captured by oxygen molecules. Therefore, the air is always exceptionally pure
and fresh after rain.

the negative oxygen is usually more than 10,000 pcs/cm³, we can feel the
particularly fresh air when we stay there. While the negative oxygen in

city is not more than 200 pcs/cm³. 


At the same time, negative oxygen is more
absorbable. Besides degrading dust, it can also reduce lactic acid in muscles,
relieve fatigue, promote sleep and improve cardiovascular circulation.
Therefore, people live in the place with high concentration of negative oxygen,
such as forest and seaside, can live a longer and healthier life than others. 
By high-pressure ionization and oxygen
molecule association, AI stimulates generation process of negative oxygen.
Combining a large amount of electrons and oxygen molecules, it can produce 24
million negative oxygen per second. It makes you enjoy your life as if you were
in the natural and fresh air and live a healthy life.

story:
Make the healthy choice the easy choice.
Give New York City Public Schools a well-researched and highly successful 
4th and 5th grade bike and nutrition curriculum developed
in conjunction with Boston University academics.

Who is a CYCLE Kid?
For the first time, Antonio felt like he was good at something. Learning to ride a bike made Antonio realize he could be successful. He began focusing on his academic work, making friends, and working with adult mentors to help him acclimate to his new community. Becoming physically active and learning how to eat well became a foundation of change for Antonio. Now, he is a student at a local community college…and he rides his bike to school!

Our goal is to help children realize the healthy choice is the easy choice.

Mission
Building healthy, productive communities, starting with children and families. 

Stories where a bike provides a right of passage for a child can be seen throughout the 11-year history of the CYCLE Kids program.  The CYCLE Kids program gets kids focusing on better physical activity and nutrition habits. When kids do this, there is a shift toward better academic performance. Teaching kids to ride bikes gets them to reach outside their comfort zones, building their confidence to make new friends and try new things. 

CYCLE Kids reaches 3,500 children every year, and over 
13,000 children since inception.

What Your Donation Will Do
Our Indiegogo Campaign Goal is to raise funds to open a CYCLE Kids program in New York City. By opening a program, you will give hundreds of students each year access to a learning experience that will not only teach them how to ride a bike and how to make healthier eating choices, but help them build confidence, create supportive relationships, and succeed academically. Through the CYCLE Kids program the kids learn about nutrition, they learn how to ride a bike, they get exercise, and most importantly they develop confidence 

Your donation will provide a New York City Public School with a life-long CYCLE Kids Program. One lucky school will receive 10 Specialized Bicycles, 25 helmets, a research based bike skills and nutrition curriculum in the form of a Teacher's Guide and Student & Parent Textbooks, and ongoing support from the CYCLE Kids team. 

Your donation will help us give a school important tools to build healthy productive communities, starting with their children and families. 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can’t contribute, don’t worry, but please help us spread the word by sharing this page with all your friends and family, and through your social media platforms!

Thank You
Thank you for making a donation to give kids an opportunity for happy, healthy, successful, and active futures!  

For more information: www.cyclekids.org or email: info@cyclekids.org 

Check out our photo and video gallery at the top of this page. 

An investment in one CYCLE Kids program will impact children and families in that school for 10 years or more.

story:
Who We Are

We are the Medical Team supporting the Central New Hampshire Special Operations Unit (CNHSOU) located in Concord, NH.  This is a non-profit, regional agency serving 15 communities and provides tactical emergency medical care on an as needed, on-call basis.  Our mission is to provide expert Paramedic level care inside dangerous, potentially criminal environments where traditional emergency services would not be safe. This includes care of first responders, bystanders, and those involved in crime situations (such as victims and hostages), who would otherwise have to wait until the scene is deemed safe.  We also respond to requests for Search and Rescue and Natural Disasters.  Our medical team is comprised of Firefighter/Paramedics who work full-time in other agencies and volunteer their time to the CNHSOU.  

Currently each Paramedic carries their own medical gear and brings their personal vehicle for both training operations and emergencies.  If someone is injured, the team does not have a private treatment area and our necessary gear is on various other vehicles that may not be readily available where we need them.

What We Need
This campaign is to raise $5,000 to purchase a used ambulance to organize and improve our gear and treatment areas.  This will provide us some very needed benefits:
  • It provides a private area to treat patients especially those who may be victims of crime and/or abuse.  
  • It provides a needed rehab area for patients and our team to rest and recover during incidents.
  • Our medical gear can be organized in one easy to find location for all members of the team.
  • Communications equipment will be available to each of us operating the Ambulance (having this expensive equipment in each of our personal vehicles is impractical and costly).
Your Impact
Contributing to this campaign will improve our resources and aid us in providing better medical care within our communities.  Your contributions will be used for the sole purpose of obtaining this Ambulance (see below).  In the event that we raise more than our goal, the funds will be used for modifications (such as paint, lettering, etc.) for the ambulance, equipment upgrades, and/or maintenance.  If we raise less than our goal, the funds will be used to purchase medical equipment.
Remember...Your donation is tax deductible!

The Ambulance

We have been looking at a particular ambulance which, currently in use at one of our local fire departments, is due to be replaced.  It is a known entity and is in good condition (see gallery).  This is a 2006 Ford F450 with 104 thousand miles.  If the vehicle was sold to a private citizen, it would have to be stripped and all the emergency equipment removed (such as, lights, sirens, radios, etc.)  This costs both time and money to the fire department. This is an opportunity to obtain a great ambulance for a minimal price.  If we cannot raise our funds in the next 25 days this vehicle will be returned to the manufacturer for disposal/resale at a higher price.

Other Ways You Can Help

Sure you may not be able to contribute, and we understand that.  Please spread the word to everyone that may have an interest in helping us out.  Thank you for looking at our cause!

story:
Hello everybody :) My name is Alex Jones i'm 17 years old and i live in Newport in South Wales! As some of you may/may not know i am transgender (female to male). I have been battling with the NHS now for 2 years to get the treatment i need and sadly, im still not getting anywhere. A couple of weeks ago i decided to go private for treatment with GenderCare as it is a much quicker process, but sadly it is expensive.

As a 17 year old with a part time job in McDonalds and a college student i cannot afford £200 in the next two months. So i'm hoping to fund-raise half of the money i need (£100).

I AM NOT begging for your money. I know what it is like to struggle with money so i will not be beggin! But if you could donate 10p, 50p, £1 or even more id be so happy because every little counts! If you donate in the near future i will repay you back because this treatment is ultimately going to save my life!

I shall be positing daily achievements onto this page and when i do hit my target of £100 i will let you all know!

Thank you for taking the time to read this and thank you for donating if you have done.

Blog Link - https://happinesswillcomesoon.wordpress.com/
Facebook Group - 'Alex's transition'.
story_txt: Hello everybody :) My name is Alex Jones i'm 17 years old and i live in Newport in South Wales! As some of you may/may not know i am transgender (female to male). I have been battling with the NHS now for 2 years to get the treatment i need and sadly, im still not getting anywhere. A couple of weeks ago i decided to go private for treatment with GenderCare as it is a much quicker process, but sadly it is expensive.As a 17 year old with a part time job in McDonalds and a college student i cannot afford £200 in the next two months. So i'm hoping to fund-raise half of the money i need (£100).I AM NOT begging for your money. I know what it is like to struggle with money so i will not be beggin! But if you could donate 10p, 50p, £1 or even more id be so happy because every little counts! If you donate in the near future i will repay you back because this treatment is ultimately going to save my life!I shall be positing daily achievements onto this page and when i do hit my target of £100 i will let you all know!Thank you for taking the time to read this and thank you for donating if you have done.Blog Link - https://happinesswillcomesoon.wordpress.com/Facebook Group - 'Alex's transition'.

story:
The Bahrain Triathlon Association High Performance Program (elite team) is aimed to develop talented junior, U23 and elite athletes through their full potential in the sport of triathlon. The program is designed for highly talented athletes who desire to compete representing the Kingdom of Bahrain and the BTA at international level.

In order to achieve our goals, we need some funds for covering the basic athletes' needs (training equipment, nutrition, trips and competition fees).

Your help will allow us to set the base of triathlon in the country. With your contribution, Bahrain will have the chance to be represented by local athletes in several competitions (including World Championships).

Budget (for the upcoming 6 months)

Training equipment

x3 bikes for our youth athletes - 2400$

x6 turbo trainers - 1000$

x10 elastics bands - 200$

x4 swimming elastic cords - 400$

Physiological equipment for test - 800$

Training gear (t-shirts, shorts, swimsuits, etc...) - 800$

Nutitionist

6 month of nutritional assistance - 2000$
Competitions and training camp
World aquathlon championship
World Biathlon championship
World duathlon championship
African and European cups
Regional and local
Training Camp
Total: 24600$
Our existing funds are limiting the participation of our athletes in further competitions. As a result of not being able to plan competitions well in advance, it affects our athletes enthusiasm and focus in training. Your contribution will allow us to plan more races, and give our athletes the opportunity to represent Bahrain globally.

story:
With the donation of 7 hematology, chemistry and immunoassay machines from Suburban Hospital ...

Hope for Lives in Sierra Leone can make a huge contribution towards improving healthcare in Sierra Leone. Our plan is to transport these vital machines, together with a large supply of medical equipment and supplies to Sierra Leone. This is the latest of our ongoing shipments of medical devices, equipment and supplies to the country. The fundraising WILL continue after the 60 day campaign period as this is part of a larger effort to have our own facility in Sierra Leone. Some of our donors are not quite hip to Indiegogo and offline donations are currently not represented in the overall total. 

This shipment is THE most critical and valuable we have sent in the last 3 years. Three Beckman Coulter Unicel DxC 800 Synchron Clinical Chemistry Analyzers and Two Beckman Coulter DxI 800 Immunoassay Systems. Two Coulter LH 750 Hematology Analyzers with Slidemaker. As a group, over $2,000,000, in medical equipment if we were buying them new. They've been very generously donated by Suburban Hospital in Bethesda, Maryland. Together with these 7 machines are a number of cardiology machines (EEG, Stress, etc.) donated by our cardiologist friends from other medical facilities. 

Our goal of $25,000 is part of a progressive fundraising effort accomplished in 3-4 stages to include; Shipping & Handling, Placement, Setup, Supplies and Sustainability. We will accomplish each stage of our goal as supported by funding.

Note: We are preparing our list of perks and will post them soon. We'll make sure everyone that donates now will have an opportunity to select theirs once they are published.

Backgrounder:

Currently, ALL comprehensive blood and urine testing must be sent out of Sierra Leone as there are no machines of this kind in the country. In the United States, blood testing for diabetes, heart disease, STD's, cancer, toxicity, infectious diseases and a host of other acute and chronic health conditions is something we TAKE FOR GRANTED. In Sierra Leone, these tests virtually unavailable to the majority of the population. 

The most recent (and still present) danger of Ebola in West Africa alerted the world to the danger of a widespread epidemic and the difficulties in assessing and controlling such a devastating disease in the region. The Ebola pandemic makes the news. Acute and chronic diseases in West Africa like malaria, typhoid, hepatitis, AIDs, encephalitis, bacterial infection, tuberculosis, cancers... even common health conditions like diabetes, heart disease, malnutrition... DO NOT MAKE THE NEWS. 

So... we (and YOU!) have an opportunity... a responsibility to make a very huge impact on healthcare in Sierra Leone. We are just beginning to comprehend the magnitude of our effort to bring major technological advances to the region with these machines and the other equipment we are collecting.  

Why we desperately need your donation

We are a relatively new 501(c)3 organization (3-1/2 years), founded by Bobby Smith, a native Sierra Leonean who has worked for over 20 years in the Shock Trauma Unit at Suburban Hospital in Bethesda, Maryland just outside of Washington, DC. 'Saving lives is all he knows'.

We have no institutional funding or grant money as of this writing. Everything we've done has been accomplished with donations from friends and the incredible determination of one guy. A quick summary of our accomplishments:

  • 3 Fishing boats built for a small community near Freetown (the capital) that are feeding hundreds of people every week.
  • Millions of $$$ in medical supplies sent to support the Ebola epidemic.
  • Millions of $$$ in medical equipment, hospital beds, wheelchairs, surgical supplies sent to support Connaught Hospital and other smaller hospitals.
  • The FIRST EVER primary school library built in Sierra Leone at St. Anthony's Catholic School. Computer lab under construction.
  • Over 30,000 pairs of shoes distributed to kids (donated by customers of Shoe Train in Potomac, MD)
  • Tools donated to a local group working with amputees (a very visible reminder of the 11 year civil war)
  • Thousands of bag lunches distributed to school kids, amputees, hospital patients & staff, homeless and others (thanks to Hill Valley Hotel and staff).

Our Goals - Ambitious AND Realistic

Improving the lives of the people of Sierra Leone seems like an ambitious and daunting task. But, those who have visited West Africa know; for people who need virtually EVERYTHING, it doesn't take a lot to have a big impact. These machines can have that BIG IMPACT.

Hope for Lives in Sierra Leone is blessed with volunteers, some of whom are native Sierra Leoneans who have managed medical missions, health screenings, development and relief programs in the country. We take a VERY active role in making sure our supplies go directly where they were intended. Coordinating the inherent challenges associated with delivery, supply, training and medical missions in a way that ensures long-term sustainability is imperative.

Other Ways You Can Help

Visit our website at HopeforSierraLeone.org and see what we're doing.
Visit our YouTube Channel and Like our Facebook page. 

If there is any way you think you can help us in our efforts, please contact us through our website.

Thank you for your donation and your support.

Bobby Smith

story:
COLORADO'S OWN CHANNEL 2 NEWS: http://wp.me/p1ZRmT-1wGe


http://www.denverpost.com/headlines/ci_21230203/northern-colorado-men-find-new-way-protect-homes



FireStop – Eco-Conscious Wildfire
Prevention and Beyond



Hello, my name is Tim Haag; environmentally conscious individual and
retired Fire Marshall after 34 years of service. A few years ago, I met a
brilliant inventor, Dennis Cortese, at a live burn demonstration in the state
of Colorado. Through this chance meeting, I discovered FireStop, a product
designed to protect homes from the ravages of wildfires. This is an
eco-friendly, reasonably priced system that can be self-installed or installed
with the help of a contractor. 


Featured in Two Major CO Media Outlets


Colorado’s Best TV Interview on KWGN



http://coloradosbest.tv/2012/09/21/new-product-could-save-homes-wildfires/


The Denver Post


Article, The Denver Post: Northern Colorado Men Find New Way to
Protect Homes from Fire: A new foam designed from Tim Haag and Dennis Cortese is an added protection. By Pamela Dickman: Reporter-Herald Staff Writerhttp://www.denverpost.com/headlines/ci_21230203/northern-colorado-men-find-new-way-protect-homes




How It Works

 

Imagine a story you have surely seen on your local evening news station
(multiple times over). A wildfire approaches and the owners are ordered to
evacuate. They gather their family, a few precious items and run. As the fire
starts to burn the structure, a fire sensor mounted on the roof of the home
detects the fire and activates the system. The roof and walls of the home begin to be covered automatically with FireStop foam. In seconds, this foam totally encapsulates the home in a thick white foam that will last up to 72 hours.
After the danger has passed and the home owners and their family are allowed
back, they find their home is safe. They wash off the remaining foam and the
clean up is done. That’s right — homes do not need to be destroyed from wildfires!
But, without this protection, once a wildfire starts attacking a home it is too
late.



FireStop is the world’s only fully automated fire prevention device to spray
fire retardant foam on homes and other valuable structures. The foam is
formulated to be COMPETELY SAFE FOR THE ENVIRONMENT. The formula is top secret and, unfortunately, can not be revealed. Imagine, also, the implications of water conservation for the planet.


Vast Potential


This foam is not limited to homes alone, the potential is vast. Uses can be
found for any instance of fire including: vehicles, ships, aircrafts, tanker
trucks, oil rigs etc…



After years of successful research, development and field-testing, FireStop
is ready to implement; we just need your help. All that is needed to save
thousands of lives and homes taken unnecessarily by the devastation of a
wildfire is funds to produce, market and distribute FireStop to big box retailers nationwide. Fires can be dealt with in a more eco-friendly, effective and efficient manner with a technology such as ours. 


Future of Firestop

 

FireStop will be established as a solely non-profit organization dedicated
to saving lives and the planet.


Supporting Evidence


Please read this article for predictions about the future impact of
wildfires on the West. Though published in 2012, it still is valid regarding
current affairs:



Science Daily Online, Article: Sobering Future of Wildfire Dangers in U.S.
West, Researchers Predict. Source: University of Oregon. Summary: The American West has seen a recent increase in large wildfires due to droughts, the build-up of combustible fuel, or biomass, in forests, a spread of fire-prone
species and increased tree mortality from insects and heat. A research team
warns that these conditions may be "a perfect storm" for more fires…



http://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2012/02/120214134936.htm



Giving Back


With a donation of only $25, FireStop will donate 10% of the total proceeds
back to victims displaced by wildfires in Colorado in 2014. Help us help them,
and prevent others from going through what they have had to endure.


Money will be given personally to each family with a letter telling how
this donation came to be. A list of all those who helped us get this project
off the ground will be included on our website (currently being developed).



Main Image Courtesy of www.wikipedia.comThumbnail
Image Courtesy of http://multivu.prnewswire.com/mnr/adcouncil/50581/

Help Us Meet Our Goal of Becoming a Not-for Profit Organization



Thanks for Your Support!



If you are unable to donate, please spread the word! Share our link, our message and our campaign via word of mouth, our
Indiegogo link and your social media page.

story:
Short Summary


Working towards opening a vapor lounge in Welland and bringing a home to the Welland Cannabis community and abroad and to help build a stronger sense of community in this city.

What We Need & What You Get


What we need is simple, the initial Funding to get the doors open and item stock required.

what will be purchased with the funds raised?
- Rent for the first 3 months
- 5-9 Volcano Vaporizers
- 5 LCD TV's
- 1 computer
- 2 cash registers
- 8 camera security system
- 7-10 black leather couches
- 10-15 tables and the equivalent in chairs
- product stock (bong's, pipes, vaporizers)
- Food supplies ( candy, pop, chips....)
- 2-4 carbon scrubbers\air filters


What you get:
- a safe environment to medicate
- a place to get cannabis users off the streets
- a business that wants to see and contribute to social change and community development
- a business run for the people, by the people to help the people

What we plan to do with any funds raised if our goal is not met:
-hold the funds and keep accumulating until our goal is reached to ensure all funds are distributed as planned.

The Impact


The impact will be extensive, what we plan to do is isolate 10-15% of our monthly income after the first 6 months* to invest into rebuilding a community here in Welland.

For example: as we all know the roads and parks and other city infrastructure are falling apart and clearly the city cant afford to budget the repairs into its fiscal budget, so what we will do is acquire the estimates of how much it will cost(labor, materials....) take the money from our community contributions funds (the 10-15%) and invest into the city, NOT give the city the money but hire those needed to do the job ourselves, giving the citizens a say and giving us a chance to show how the power of people can outweigh the power of corrupt city politics.

Another project we will invest in is providing community gardens for the less fortunate and low income families, allowing them the chance to learn survival skills, agricultural skills, a sense of community.

Yet another project we will be investing in is assisting the local food banks and soup kitchens with donations collected, weekly meal contributions**, as well as other possible needed items. 

those are just some of the examples of the projects that we have planned, the possibilities are endless.

Ultimately our goal is to HELP fix the city and put it on the right track for the future.
- * (trial period to ensure the business operates and is financially stable)
-**(our local soup kitchens currently provide lunch 6 days a week, the food is not always prepared properly, by contributions we mean to purchase from local establishments\businesses like pizza shops or other restaurants thus helping the local businesses and providing fresh, good quality food to those that need it most.) 

Risks & Challenges


Many risks and challenges are associated with opening a business of ANY kind,
the vapor lounge\medical wellness center does not come without its fair share,

some of the problems we may encounter:
- licensing through the city
- new laws preventing the use of vaporizers
- finding a property suitable for the business

What we plan to do to overcome those problems:
- to solve any potential Licensing issues, we refer to currently operating lounges and the licensing they fall under and show those required that the established business model already works and works good.
- the new laws, there is not much we can do unfortunately, but an extensive petitioning campaign could overcome that obstacle
- as always with a business of this sort, finding a property suitable for this type of business will be difficult but not insurmountable, given Canada's stance on Cannabis and the potential of the laws changing soon more people are open and willing to permit this LEGAL business to open on their property.
 
In conclusion, our goal is to help not only this city but the people that live in it too.
although not everyone can contribute, helping can occur in many ways, simply by sharing this campaign with friends and family.

We thank you for taking the time to read our idea, we also thank those of you that have or will contribute, without you this just would not be possible.

story:
After having built the distillery by myself, getting the license and permits, I found out in October 2012 that I could not sell our product. The distillery was in the county and the county was "DRY".  What an incredible blow, both mentally and financially.

In October of 2014 we sold our first bottle of liquor in our own store, 24 months after starting production. The time lag has wiped out the working capital, but not stopped us from making National Award Winning Spirits. Two television shows, Smithsonian Channel, "The United States of Drinking" and Discovery Channel, "Toxicology of Moonshine" and articles in national press, have provided the recognition  our efforts deserve.

We have distribution in Maryland, Delaware, Washington DC, and soon Colorado. But the development of a brand takes money. Appalachian Mountain Spirits is a destination distillery, but we need help to pay for and make the spirits to go in the barrels. In fact we already have the barrels but need labor, bottles and supplies.

We make the best corn whiskys in the country, my wife, Dana and I, have worked tirelessly 7 days a week, with no salary to make our community proud, we have revitalize Marion's Main Street, help making it the "Coolest Small Town Main St in America", as awarded by the SBA.

The company can not handle anymore debt, so I am reaching out to you, if you believe in Entrepreneurship, in Quality Products, in an individual's passion and love for Appalachia, support us with a contribution.

The time lag has wiped out the working capital, but not stopped us from making National Award Winning Spirits. Two television shows, Smithsonian Channel, "The United States of Drinking" and Discovery Channel, "Toxicology of Moonshine" and articles in national press, have provided the recognition  our efforts deserve. We have distribution in Maryland, Delaware, Washington DC, and soon Colorado. But the development of a brand takes money. Appalachian Mountain Spirits is a destination distillery, but we need help to pay for and make the spirits to go in the barrels. In fact we already have the barrels but need labor, bottles and supplies.We make the best corn whiskys in the country, my wife, Dana and I, have worked tirelessly 7 days a week, with no salary to make our community proud, we have revitalize Marion's Main Street, help making it the "Coolest Small Town Main St in America", as awarded by the SBA. The company can not handle anymore debt, so I am reaching out to you, if you believe in Entrepreneurship, in Quality Products, in an individual's passion and love for Appalachia, support us with a contribution.

story:
We are excited that our PDF version of RefluxMD's Recipe for Relief is now available!  We appreciate your purchase and the proceeds will be reinvested in the Kindle version (June availability) and print version (July availability) along with a new diet website for all those who suffer from this disease.  If you prefer to wait until the print and Kindle versions are available, simply send an email to refluxdiet@refluxmd.com, indicating which version you prefer, and we will email you when it is available for purchase.

Who we are

RefluxMD is a healthcare community website devoted to helping the 125 million worldwide adults who suffer from acid reflux disease. RefluxMD was launched in 2012 with globally and nationally recognized medical experts and offered disease information and online tools. Since then we have provided content and services with one singular vision in mind – to help our members develop a path to relief and good health at no cost to them. Over the past 2½ years we have learned from our membership that their top need is something that does not exist today: a comprehensive, user-friendly meal and diet plan designed exclusively for those suffering from GERD.  

Why this matters

All physicians agree that a GERD-friendly diet is mandatory for symptom relief and to slow or stop the progression of this disease. Unfortunately, changing dietary habits can be tough, so this critical element of any GERD treatment plan often falls by the wayside.

Starting in late 2013 we initiated development of the most comprehensive acid reflux-friendly eating plan and diet program available today.  By partnering with a leading GERD surgeon, a top dietitian on digestive disorders, and an expert clinical psychologist focused on self-help-to-success programs, we are now close to releasing for sale our food and diet solution for adults suffering from GERD symptoms. This program consists of a comprehensive manual for eating and dieting along with a private website available later this year to provide additional help for our diet program members.  The manual includes:

  • A medical discussion of this disease including a discussion of causes, symptoms, diagnosis, and all treatment alternatives.
  • Important nutrition and diet concepts important to GERD sufferers.
  • A plan for an innovative lifetime GERD-friendly eating and diet program based upon the #1 rated diet program available today.
  • Practical advice for making successful lifestyle changes.
  • Examples of 21 daily meal plans.
  • 90+ GERD-friendly recipes.

Click here to view the complete Table of Contents.

In addition to this manual, RefluxMD is making available a fee-based website with additional daily plans, more recipes, additional support to succeed with this diet program, and online tools to make even more services available for symptom relief and good health.

How Your Help Will Make a Difference

Our goal is to use the proceeds from this effort to finalize the final formatting of the Kindle version and the paperback version of the book, fund marketing and promotion to reach more adults that suffer from GERD, and begin the development of our diet website.  Your purchase is important and will help us reach our goal. 

The PDF version of the book is now available. Purchase the PDF version today and we'll send you a copy as soon as we are notified of payment, but not longer than 24 hours (see perks for details), so you can get started on your path to relief. 

Thanks for learning about us!

If you experience the painful symptoms of acid reflux disease, please visit our website, www.refluxmd.com, to learn more about what you can do find a path to relief and good health.

We believe our program can make a difference for the millions of people struggling with this disease, but we need your help to get there. Thank you for your support!

story:
Help us continue our campaign to make our fantastic greenhouses even more affordable for everyone. We are raising funds to cut out the middle man and purchase our own fabrication machines. This will cut the price significantly from what we are currently having to charge and make these American made greenhouse kits even more affordable for everyone who wants one.

Features:

Our greenhouses are made from heavy duty Galvanized steel frames. They have a hard polycarbonate exterior siding that will withstand high winds, heavy snow loads and even medium sized hail. 

They are anchored to the ground every 4 feet with a 3' anchor driven into the ground, so high winds will never destroy your new greenhouse.

A weekend project for most people to set up. Nothing too heavy for the average person to lift. Once installed it should be virtually maintenance free for life.

Currently featured in this months editions of Mother Earth News magazine & Countryside magazine. Also previously featured in Hobby Farms magazine.

ORDERS WILL BE FILLED AND SHIPPED OUT IN THE ORDER THEY ARE RECEIVED. So the sooner you place your order the sooner you will get it.

Some of the photos show wooden end walls. That was back when our crew did all of the installs. Now that we only ship out the kits, all of our building come with the steel end walls included for faster installation.

Be sure to look in our picture gallery for lots more photos.

story:
Lorelei Redfern & Acidosis

Lorelei Redfern has a genetic condition called acidosis.
Acidosis is a condition in which there is too much acid in the fluids of the body. At a young age of 23, she began to loose her teeth. The experience was painful, tragic, and life changing. Due to disabilities and limited income, she cannot afford to get the proper care she needs and has been without teeth for over 11 years. To prevent further issues, such as structural damage, gum disease, etc. we are reaching out to the community for your help. To raise money to get her the proper dental care and implants that she will need to be able to live a healthier lifestyle, we are offering gifts in exchange for your charitable donations.

Please see our Facebook page for more details. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/1817817161778106/?fref=nf

What We Need & What You Get


  • We need as much money as possible to help Lorelei get her teeth implants, due to insurance not covering the cost.
  • The more money raised, the quicker this procedure can be done.
  • Multiple Fundraisers will be held throughout the year, until our goal is met. 
  • Donate today, and receive gifts for your generosity! Every dollar counts!
  • Add $5 or more to your donation and receive random surprise gift!
  • This is an ongoing fundraiser until our goal is met. 
  • The sooner funds are raiser, Lorelei's quality of a healthy lifestyle can be improved. 
Perks
Wishes Do Come True! Genie The Unicorn G1 Style Custom Pony $20


Sprinkle 'n Sparkle @ Sprinkles Waterfall: Officially licensed G1 style Mystery My Little Pony figure $5


Sparkle 'n Shine : 925 Sterling Silver Pony Pendant $10


Two is a Charm! One Random Pair of officially licensed G1 Style My Little Pony Earrings. $15



Love Your ZELF - One Random Medium Zelf Figure $15


The Impact

  • Your donations can improve the quality of someones life!
  • We have raised other fundraisers for Lorelei in the past, also the Chicago Meet 'n Greet.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know some can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Spread the word, even if you cannot personally donate at this time!
  • Offer Items to Sell on Facebook or message board to raise for the cause!

story:
Dust Mites impact 1.2 Billion People World Wide

My name is Arlen Bento Jr. and I am the Co Founder and Co Owner of Fight Mite Global LLC.  In early 2014, dust mites became a problem in my home as my youngest son was having issues with allergies and congestion, especially in the morning.  I was telling my business partner about my son and he told me that he thought it was dust mites.  My partner was familiar with dust mites because he had severe dust mite allergies. So our quest to help my son started the development of Fight Mite Capture Pads.

Dust mites are spider-like microscopic insects found by the thousands in many parts of a house, such as mattresses, upholstered furniture, linen closets, carpets, pillows and stuffed animals. Dust mites spend their life cycle eating human skin flakes and eliminating waste. 

According to the United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), every home has significant levels of dust mites. Dust mites are one of the leading causes of indoor allergies and asthma according to the American Lung Association (ALA).  Dust mite infestations are so prevalent that the ALA says that four out of five homes have some level of detectable dust mite allergen in at least one of the home's beds.

The Asthma and Allergy Foundation of America (AAFA) estimates that about 20 million Americans have a confirmed allergy to dust mites. Symptoms of dust mite allergy include sneezing, watery eyes and a runny nose, according to WebMD. Dust mite droppings and the shedding of their exoskeletons produce a harmful allergen that can cause an allergic reaction and asthma in many people, especially children, with dust mite allergy, cautions the EPA.

In fact, the American College of Allergy, Asthma and Immunology (ACAAI) cites dust mites as the most common cause of childhood asthma, and a trigger for 90% of people with asthma. Signs of asthma in people with dust mite allergies include difficulty breathing, tightness in the chest and wheezing, according to the Mayo Clinic.

The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists dust mites as a major asthma trigger and advises affected individuals to take steps to eliminate dust mites from their homes and to limit their exposure to dust mite allergens. The presence of dust mites can lead to chronic illness, so it is important for people to take steps to get rid of dust mite infestations to maintain a healthy home environment.

Then the idea hit me?  What if we just get the dust mites out of the bedding or at least come up with simple, easy to use and effective way to help detect, control and remove the dust mite populations in the bedding?  The idea for Fight Mite was born.

My background is in business, sales and product development.  I started to do my research into dust mites and I found that there was no simple way to help people with the symptoms caused by dust mite allergies.  I learned that my family alternatives were new bedding with expensive plastic covers, removing rugs/carpeting, getting rid of our dog (my son loves his dog) and allergy shots (ouch).

So, with my background in product development and help from my two partners in import / export we were able to create our product.

We developed a simple product that captures dust mites for 90 days and started our patent process.  The product features two pieces of cloth that are sewn together forming a pad.  In between the two cloth layers is a trade secret blend of safe ingredients (no pesticides) that attract dust mites. The ingredients form a stripe that captures dust mites.  This internal strip is not sticky on the outside and has no discernible smell to humans, but dust mites just love it, we named it “Mite Perfume”.  Each pad is effective for 90 days and can capture thousands upon thousands of dust mites.  After 90 days you just simply throw out the pads and replace with new pads.  In some cases you can actually cut open the pads after 90 days to see dust mites residues; it normally looks like a yellow muck.

Fight Mite capture pads are now part of a complete regiment to help control dust mites in your home.  With the use of our product, washing your bedding regularly in hot water and replacing your bedding with dust mite control pillow covers and mattress covers your are on you way helping your family feel better.

Now we need your help to get our product out to millions of people who are suffering with dust mite allergies. Many people don’t even know that dust mites are causing their allergies.

What We Need & What You Get

We launched our product Fight Mite in early 2014 after applying for a patent on our product design.  We were able to get our product tested in clinical lab studies to prove that the product worked and within three months of launch we got an order from QVC.  In one study, one Fight Mite Capture Pad successfully captured 10,671 dust mites from a sample of 30,000 in just one week, our product works in your home for 90 days.

My partners and I spent a lot of time and money developing the brand and now we need your help to fund our national direct selling advertising program to put Fight Mite on TV so millions of people can improve their quality of life.

We have a great business plan in place that was developed by successful direct selling consultants.  We have already developed a great production partner and now we need funding for our advertising.

We are seeking $45,000 to fund the first three months of advertising.  In our business plan, our business becomes self supporting in three months helping millions of people with their dust mite issues.  We will also be creating brand awareness for our product that will help drive sales to QVC and our future retail distributors and big box stores.  All sales profits from this funding project with go directly to the national direct selling advertising program.

Please note, that we do not claim to treat or cure any medical condition like allergies and or asthma, however, we do understand that removing dust mites from your home is a good thing for people that suffer from dust mite issues.

The Impact

As part of the building of our business we are passionate about helping people. 

Fight Mite has the potential to help impact millions of people that suffer with allergies associated with Dust Mites.

My two partners and I are dads, husbands and people just like you trying to help others and build businesses to provide for our families.

We have years of experience in product development, but Fight Mite can be our crowning achievement with the ability to help millions of people. 

Risks & Challenges

Like in all new ventures there is always a risk. As a group, my partners and I feel that Fight Mite has the potential to help millions of people so if we can get the word out to the consumers the risks are not as high as other products.

We already have validated our product with QVC.  QVC is not an easy sell and they are very diligent in their research taking on new products.

Our business plan and concepts have all been validated by experts in consumer products, direct selling and advertising.  All we need is your funding help to get the product launched.

Other Ways You Can Help

I hope you enjoyed reading and learning about our product.  If you think Fight Mite can help you and or people you may know I hope you join our funding effort. 

Can you please help share our story with others?  There are great sharing tools on Indiegogo, your help is appreciated.

story:
My son had a brain tumor that was cancer when he was 9 years old. it was 4 years of pure torture for the entire family. during that time sloan kettering was always doing something to try and make the experience brighter for the kids and there familys. clowns were one the best therapys for all. That was fourteen years ago and he is healthy and graduating college in the spring. hearing more and more kids getting cancer everyday I want to be able to have the clowns visit the homes of these kids and try to bring smiles and happiness to there family's. with my experience with cancer and the treatments I feel I can bring smiles to the kids affected with this horrible disease.


my mission is to outfit at least 4 clowns with everything they will need to make a 30 minute visit to each house. I will gather the lists from the hospitals in the area and send the clowns to the homes of these children. I would also like to gat access to the hospitals so they can make room visits while getting treatments.

I will use  the moneys to outfit the clowns and purchase toys and give away's  to distribute to each child. the clowns will be working as voulanteers .

story:
Healthy Sleep has been empirically proven to be the single most important determinant in predicting longevity, more important than diet, exercise, or heredity.

PSiO has been designed to reconcile technology with natural techniques to propose a REAL solution to end sleepless nights and stress all together. 

Link to the PSiO magazine : http://psio.com/pdf/Psio-magazine-n0-EN.pdf

PSiO works with light and audio stimulation thus working on the two most important body senses : vision and hearing.

Stéphane Dumonceau, PHD in psychology, is the CEO of PSiO. He invented the technology over 25 years ago and has finetuned it in hospital settings to propose this jewel of technology as you see it today!

The principle of the PSiO is simple:

  • First, it stops brain chatter, this overflow of thoughts that prevents you from falling asleep
  • Second, reduces the level of internal tension that causes nocturnal awakening

Thanks to the voices, the sounds and lights studied for this purpose, the PSiO distracts your attention and naturally decreases the inner tension. This will favor falling asleep and prevent nocturnal awakening. 

The advantages of the PSiO are :

- The most advanced and patented optical technology (5 years R&D) for optimal light stimulation

- Stress and sleep management recordings designed by specialized doctors. The PSiO is the only device of its kind to integrate a true professional psychological support for stress related disorders in addition to sleep.

- PSiO is certified to all relevant certifications, including CE Medical IIA certificate.

- PSiO technology is endorsed by studies and by 25 years of clinical use.

- Easy and fun to use ! testimonials show that PSiO clients and health professionals use the technology on a regular basis.

The PSiO technology is endorsed by internationally recognized experts ! Find out more on our downloadable magazine online.

The reason why we are raising funds today is to fund and finalize a research study in collaboration with NASA.

This validation of our research with such a prestigious American institution should ideally help us install the PSIO in the international space station for the stress and sleep management of astronauts.

For this Indiegogo campaign, we offer you a PSIO in limited edition which consists of the latest generation 3.0 that will be released in mid-2018 and which is offered with a selection of the best programs chosen by the inventor himself. Order your PSiO now, you won’t believe how peaceful and energized you will feel!

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT.

Healthy Sleep has been empirically proven to be the single most important determinant in predicting longevity, more important than diet, exercise, or heredity.PSiO has been designed to reconcile technology with natural techniques to propose a REAL solution to end sleepless nights and stress all together. Link to the PSiO magazine : http://psio.com/pdf/Psio-magazine-n0-EN.pdfPSiO works with light and audio stimulation thus working on the two most important body senses : vision and hearing.Stéphane Dumonceau, PHD in psychology, is the CEO of PSiO. He invented the technology over 25 years ago and has finetuned it in hospital settings to propose this jewel of technology as you see it today!The principle of the PSiO is simple:
First, it stops brain chatter, this overflow of thoughts that prevents you from falling asleep
Second, reduces the level of internal tension that causes nocturnal awakening
Thanks to the voices, the sounds and lights studied for this purpose, the PSiO distracts your attention and naturally decreases the inner tension. This will favor falling asleep and prevent nocturnal awakening. The advantages of the PSiO are :- The most advanced and patented optical technology (5 years R&D) for optimal light stimulation- Stress and sleep management recordings designed by specialized doctors. story:
Dan Wilson, creator of the SteadiWare line of eating utensils, was a brilliant and caring man who wanted nothing more than to help people. When diagnosed with Parkinson's himself, Dan searched far and wide for a utensil that would allow him to eat in spite of his hand tremors. His search was fruitless. Being a consummate problem-solver, he decided to create his own set of utensils for himself. Dan found them to be so successful that he wanted others with hand tremors to have them as well. He applied for and gained a patent on the utensils in 2013. SteadiWare LLC is realizing Dan's dream of helping the millions who will benefit greatly from his ingenious design.

Early-Bird Special:

Be one of SteadiWare's early supporters and get a full pack of all three specially engineered medical quality units for only $80!

Our product features:

  • A set of 3 patented eating utensils (Fork, Spoon & Knife)
  • Easy grip handle
  • No batteries or charging required
  • no moving-parts
  • Fully assembled, ready for use
  • Dishwasher safe
  • Discreet, portable & affordable

How we got to where we are now:

Funding Breakdown:

Included is a cost estimate for the mass production of the Steadiware utensils. 

Due to the urgency of the need expressed by our customers, the confidence and generosity of our supporters, and the commitments of several investors we now have adequate funds to proceed with the mass-production of the entire set of utensils (Fork, Spoon, and a Knife).

Required Funds Task/Activities Status
1) $1,000-$2,000: Complete Final Design Changes, Status: Funds Available
2) $2,000-$3,000: Print Prototype for Mass Production, Status: Funds Available
3) $18,000 - $20,000: Develop Molds for Mass Production, Status: Funds Available

We have secured the necessary funding to produce the prototypes and test the molds.

Our Fantastic Team 

FAQ

1) How are SteadiWare utensils different from other utensils? Our utensils are designed to virtually halt hand tremors, while in use, by utilizing a patented grip handle which targets the tremors themselves. Our competitors only target the stability of the utensil, not the stability of the hand itself.

2) Do the utensils require charging? Our utensils do not require any batteries or accessories and are always ready to use at any time. Just pick up your SteadiWare utensils and go!

3) Are the utensils dishwasher safe? Yes! SteadiWare utensils are designed to be durable and dishwasher safe.

4) Will the final product look exactly like the utensils pictured? The utensils you receive will be identical in design and function to those prototypes pictured. Improvements will be made to the refinement of the finish and the color of the handle.

5) How long will it take to receive my order? We plan to ship all SteadiWare orders beginning in late 2018. Watch our website and our Indiegogo page for further updates.

6) Can I participate in the campaign if I live outside the U.S.? Yes, we are excited to have individuals all over the world benefit from the unique design of our utensils.

7) How can I contact you? You can contact the SteadiWare team directly through our email, support@steadiware.info and feel free to visit our social media pages to message us on any questions you may have.

8) How can I invest in this company? For more information on investment in SteadiWare, contact us at press@steadiware.info

story:
Short Summary

Hi!
We are a team of long-time martial art practitioners who love traveling for training. There are so many great teachers we can learn from in the world!

However, we noticed how bothersome it can be to travel with all your equipment – or even go to your regular classes! Paying extra fees at the airport, excuse yourself in the crowded bus on your way to the class... not anymore!

We took long time to develop and make perfect a modular training tool to solve this problem! All you have to do now is to get this 7in1 set and you will have:
  • a knife-size stick
  • a short staff of about the size of a short sword ("Wakizashi" or "Shoto")
  • a half-staff of about 1 m ("Hanbo") - same size as a Katana
  • a middle-size staff of about 1.4 m ("Jo")
  • a long staff of about 1.8 m ("Bo")
  • a spear of about 2 m ("Yari")
  • a "Kunai" (Ninja tool)
And all this in a bag of... cca. 40 cm! And not even 2 kg! That is a SMART Tool (Scalable Martial Art Training Tool) 7in1! All parts are rounded and made from high-quality, long-standing wood, plastic and metal material.

What We Need & What You Get

This is going to be the first 100 staffs in the world. Get one now, and have it personalized as a unique opportunity: you will have your name in it graved by a high precision lazer (please provide us with the name you want to be tagged on yuugendojo at gmail dot com). Also, you can have a handy bag with your tool for USD 19 - an exclusive product which will not be commercialized later!

Perks prices are set by speed: if you are faster, you can get it cheaper! The production team is full for December: orders from now on will be delivered during January 2016.

Challenge for every engineer and DIY friend: We think that the SMART 7in1 is close to perfection but if you manage to make it even better and we adopt your idea, we refund your purchase and send you the next version as a gift.

Thank you All for supporting our campaign, spreading the word and helping us to make this dream come true. Once our SMART 7in1 Staff has reached you, airplanes and other commuting vehicles will have less to carry, and we can travel in greater comfort. Choose your travel bag, Buyu ;-)

story:
Short Summary

Hello! I'm Jackie, an herbalist in Colorado. I have always had a love for plants and nature, and grew up exploring the Rocky Mountains learning to appreciate the natural world. I began learning about the power of herbal medicine in my twenties and began reading everything I could get my hands on in the matter. Finding my true passion and wanting to delve deeper, I began an apprenticeship with a local herbalist. I learned how to make remedies, and about local plants and their healing properties. Still finding myself lacking in the detailed knowledge I wanted; I returned to school and completed the renowned and extensive program of Bachelors in Herbal Sciences offered by Bastyr University just outside Seattle Washington. While the continuing joke among my friends is that I went to hogwarts, and some of my classes may have resembled herbology and potions; in reality my education was based in science and has allowed me to understand how best to extract different herbs, and which herbs and essential oils can best be used for different ailments. I continue to learn about different herbs, and new studies to keep up with current research.

While attending school I received an opportunity to create and sell healing salves at the local Harmony Massage and Boutique in Bothell, Washington. I had already discovered my passion for herbal medicine, but seemed here to find my niche. I now create several salves and lotions that can aide in helping to ease muscle and joint pain, eczema, sinus congestion, and acute injuries such as bruises, or cuts and scrapes. I now also sell these products at Kate's Cafe in Oak Creek Colorado. They sell quickly, and word of mouth and repeating customers have left me struggling to keep up with demand, so much so that I have temporarily had to let my etsy page expire.

The Impact

This is where all of you wonderful people come in. I had no startup capital to speak of, and am still financially struggling to start and maintain my business. The money you can donate would help me to expand product lines, and offer my products at more local businesses, farmers markets, and craft sales, as well as online to the world at large. Each new product type requires new labeling, ingredients, and packaging. As I struggle to maintain the demand for my current products, adding new ones is out of reach. The money you will donate can also help me to buy equipment such as an herb press, an herb grinder, and better ingredients to create more luxurious and healing salves and lotions.

I also have larger plans for the future, expanding my passion as an herbalist into creating herbal tea and tincture formulas, catered to ones individual needs. I would like to one day teach classes, helping people learn remedies that they can create in their own kitchen, and grow their own herbs. In this way I can help my small corner of the earth become a better place where people can more easily take their health into their own hands.

My products work. They have helped real people struggling with real pain and discomfort. By donating here, and sharing this page, you are helping not just me, but those who will benefit from my salves. I appreciate your help and kindness.

story:
The Project Momentum Fitness Mission

My name is Amanda.   I am a mom, wife, professor, & life-long learner.  I am also a proud individual with cerebral palsy whose health, work, and life have been transformed by rehabilitative functional fitness training.  This training has helped me shed pounds, leg braces, & canes.  It has helped me become stronger, healthier, & more independent.  It has helped me change my mindset & my reality.  

  • I want to do everything in my power to pay these blessings forward.  To use every tool in my toolbox to build the same opportunities for others. 
  • I want to help other individuals with disabilities & unique health conditions use fitness as a gateway for improved long-term health, healing, & quality of life.
  • I want to make health & fitness possible for everyone-- especially people often ignored or overlooked in the health & fitness world.
  • I created the non-profit Project Momentum Fitness Inc. to provide extraordinary health and fitness support for individuals with exceptional needs. 
  • The Project Momentum Fitness Team wants to help others pursue long-term health regardless of age, circumstance, ability, or disability.

Our Story

Like most adults with disabilities I used my standard 4 physical therapy visits per year, was as active as I had to be, & accepted the status quo of surviving the reality of my unhappy, painful, frustrating physical world. My physical health was in shambles so my emotional health was in crisis. My work suffered, my marriage suffered, my parenting suffered, my relationships suffered. Two years ago that status quo changed.  I had already used my allotted PT visits for the year so I stumbled into Crossfit77 in Mooresville, NC to ask about a fitness membership. I asked for help.  Armored behind leg braces & canes I steeled myself for them to say NO because I was too "risky," too "broken," too "disabled." Instead, they simply said, "Let's get to work."  And work we did.

Project Momentum Fitness Inc began.  

  • It began as my personal health & fitness dream of walking barefoot in the sand-- brace-free, cane-free, help-free to experience the world through my children's eyes.  

  • It grew into an individual health & fitness idea sprawled out on the gym floor relearning how to wiggle my toes by training my brain & my body to work together instead of against each other.  

  • It ignited into a joint health & fitness mission to open closed doors, to take first steps, to conquer fears.  

  • It transformed into a shared health & fitness community of underdogs & champions rallying together to never look back and always move forward.


  • We need your help gaining momentum!

Check out a recent documentary highlighting one of the adventures of my health & fitness journey made possible by my training with Project Momentum Fitness at Crossfit 77.  HELP US MAKE ADVENTURES LIKE THESE- BIG, SMALL, & IN BETWEEN- POSSIBLE FOR OTHERS.

Our Needs

We're still growing & need your help! We need support, we need partnerships, & we need FUNDS to help establish our charitable base & evidence our outreach.

  • Project Momentum Fitness Inc has been approved by the Secretary of State as a non-profit organization (EIN 81-0822720) but our 501(c)(3) IRS tax exempt status is still  pending.  
  • THAT MEANS...while charitable, contributions to Project Momentum Fitness Inc. are not yet tax-deductible.  (Please consult your tax professional for more information.)  
  • THAT DOESN'T MEAN... you can't donate.  Think of it in the same way you would donate to other crowd-source campaigns (GoFundMe, Kickstarter, etc.) for individual or interesting causes.  We are a registered non-profit. We'll graciously & thankfully accept whatever support you can extend to us!  It simply means we can't provide a tax exemption receipt for your donation (yet).

Your Impact

Except for the fees charged by Indiegogo (5%), ALL donations go toward funding personal training costs & gym fitness memberships for individuals with disabilities & exceptional health needs.

  • To date, these costs have been funded privately & personally by individuals who believe in Project Momentum's mission & ministry.
  • But the need is great & growing.  There are 10 clients training at one Project Momentum gym (Project Momentum at Crossfit 77 in Mooresville, NC) alone! Crossfit Cornelius, Crossfit Juicebox, & Crossfit Eternal Davidson are already building their own momentum as Project partner sites.  Contacts are pouring in from fitness facilities across the state eager to work with exceptional individuals & extend our reach.  We've heard from dozens & dozens of people with wide ranges of adaptive needs who want to tackle their health & fitness with Project Momentum's support.
  • EVERY dollar counts.  Every dollar paves the way for someone like me to start their health & fitness journey.  Every dollar creates fitness innovation instead of limitation.  Every dollar enables someone to say “I can” in a world overrun by “You can’ts.”
To learn more about some of the individuals your Project Momentum Fitness donation will support go to: ProMoFit Athlete Highlights & Success Stories or visit our Facebook page Project Momentum Fitness.

Risks & Challenges

REMEMBER: Project Momentum Fitness Inc has been approved by the Secretary of State as a non-profit organization (EIN 81-0822720) but our 501(c)(3) IRS tax exempt status is still  pending.  So, while charitable, contributions to Project Momentum Fitness Inc. are not yet tax-deductible.  (Please consult your tax professional for more information.) ...

We understand you may not want to take the plunge & donate without the security of tax exemption.  We thank you for your support, spreading the word, & sharing our campaign.  Be assured we are tirelessly working through the 501(c)(3) process & will update all of our stakeholders when it is complete.  Until then, we appreciate the generous, small gift amounts folks are comfortable & willing to donate.  Think of it this way...

  • Many people spend an average of $75 dollars per month on coffeehouse coffee. That expense is not typically tax deductible.  A $75 dollar gift to Project Momentum funds multiple athletes' personal training session costs.
  • Some people spend an average of $500 per year on shoes.  That expense is not typically tax deductible.  A $500 dollar gift to Project Momentum can outfit a partner gym with the mats, bands, balance beams, wraps, etc. to support it's work with all of its clients with disabilities.  
  • Most people spend an average of $5 per day on fast food.  That expense is not typically tax deductible.  Just imagine the fitness possibilities created if you & each one of your social media friends donated that $5 to Project Momentum! (And then ate a salad.)
We can't yet get you your "money back" in taxes... but... we can get you your "money's worth" in Project Momentum Fitness outreach!

Other Ways You Can Help

No donation?  No problem!

  • Make some noise about our campaign & spread the word about Project Momentum Fitness instead!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools, like our Facebook page, go to our website www.projectmomentumfitness.org, follow us on Twitter @projmomentumfit!
Unsure about donating through Indiegogo or waiting for a 'better time'? No worries!

  • Make a donation directly to Project Momentum Fitness Inc. via the "Donate" PayPal link on our website www.projectmomentumfitness.org.
  • & Although the campaign "launch" counts down for 60 days, the campaign will stay active thereafter-- the site just won't have all of the fancy features it does during the 60 day kick start. ;)

THANK YOU!

     personally by individuals who believe in Project Momentum's mission &
     ministry.
But the need is great & growing.  There are 10 clients training at one Project Momentum gym (Project Momentum at Crossfit
     77 in Mooresville, NC) alone! Crossfit Cornelius, Crossfit Juicebox, & Crossfit Eternal Davidson are already building their own momentum as Project partner sites.  Contacts are pouring in from fitness facilities across the state eager to work with exceptional individuals &
     extend our reach.  We've heard from dozens & dozens of
     people with wide ranges of adaptive needs who want to tackle their health
     & fitness with Project Momentum's support.
EVERY dollar counts.  Every dollar paves the way
     for someone like me to start their health & fitness journey.  Every dollar creates fitness innovation
     instead of limitation.  Every dollar
     enables someone to say “I can” in a world overrun by “You can’ts.”
To learn more about some of the individuals your Project Momentum Fitness donation will support go to: ProMoFit Athlete Highlights & Success Stories or visit our Facebook page Project Momentum Fitness.
Risks
& Challenges
REMEMBER: Project Momentum Fitness Inc has been approved by the Secretary of State as a non-profit organization (EIN 81-0822720) but our 501(c)(3) IRS tax exempt status is still  pending.  So, while charitable, contributions to Project Momentum Fitness Inc. are not yet tax-deductible.  (Please consult your tax professional for more information.) ...We understand you may not want to take the plunge & donate without the security of tax exemption.  We thank you for your support, spreading the word, & sharing our campaign.  Be assured we are tirelessly working through the 501(c)(3) process & will update all of our stakeholders when it is complete.  Until then, we appreciate the generous, small gift amounts folks are comfortable & willing to donate.  Think of it this way...
Many people spend an average of $75 dollars per month on coffeehouse coffee. That expense is not typically tax deductible.  A $75 dollar gift to Project Momentum funds multiple athletes' personal training session costs.
Some people spend an average of $500 per year on shoes.  That expense is not typically tax deductible.  A $500 dollar gift to Project Momentum can outfit a partner gym with the mats, bands, balance beams, wraps, etc. to support it's work with all of its clients with disabilities.  
Most people spend an average of $5 per day on fast food.  That expense is not typically tax deductible.  Just imagine the fitness possibilities created if you & each one of your social media friends donated that $5 to Project Momentum! (And then ate a salad.)
We can't yet get you your "money back" in taxes... but... we can get you your "money's worth" in Project Momentum Fitness outreach!

Other
Ways You Can Help
No donation?  No problem!

Make some noise about our campaign & spread the word about Project Momentum Fitness instead!
Use the Indiegogo share tools, like our Facebook page, go to our website www.projectmomentumfitness.org, follow us on Twitter @projmomentumfit!
Unsure about donating through Indiegogo or waiting for a 'better time'? No worries!


Make a donation directly to Project Momentum Fitness Inc. via the "Donate" PayPal link on our website www.projectmomentumfitness.org.

& Although the campaign "launch" counts down for 60 days, the campaign will stay active thereafter-- the site just won't have all of the fancy features it does during the 60 day kick start. ;)

THANK YOU!

story:
Who we are:

My name is Chana Frazin, known locally as 'the oil lady'.

We live in the Golan Heights with our 4 children, ages 2 1/2 – 10.

I stopped working outside the home after my second son was born, I wanted to be home with my kids. After my fourth child was born I felt it was time to do something other than the never-ending laundry and food prep. I found an amazing opportunity with doTERRA oils, got started and birthed a line of natural creams and remedies inspired by the needs of our family. With 4 small children at home and 2 parents with a lifetime  of allergies it was easy to find a thousand home uses for the oils. We treated fevers, coughs, colds, flu, allergies, itchy ears, asthma and so much more. We were amazed and thrilled with the results!

I will never forget

the night my 3-1/2 year old daughter came into our room in the middle of the night, and crawled into our bed burning up with fever. A few minutes later her baby sister followed her, with her hot, limp little body. I applied our fever reducer oil to their little feet and got up to wash my hands. When I returned to our bed a few minutes later, both girls were asleep and their bodies had already cooled down dramatically. I couldn't believe it! It was the first time we had used the oils in this way. I woke my husband up to make sure I wasn't creating the result I wanted in my head. He woke up, felt their bodies and confirmed, in amazement, that they both were in fact much cooler already.

From that moment on we have treated all the ailments in our home with the oils and developed a line of natural healing products for people to easily use in their homes.

We are ready to move our home business forward to the next level.

To us that means an online store and web presence. We are running this campaign to help pay for the graphic artist, photographer, translator, web host, etc. Once we have this we can reach markets all over the world and go way beyond our current, mostly word of mouth approach.  Although we are thrilled to have satisfied costumers continue to spread the good word about us!

What we need & what you get:

We need your support, financially and emotionally, to get off the ground. In return, we will give you the items listed on the right, made with love and good intentions. In addition, we'll keep your name for our special sales list which we'll offer to you before anyone else.  In specific, we need approximately:

  • $1200 - product images
  • $1500 - logo and website graphics
  • $1000 - product text and editing
  • $1000 - translation and editing
  • $500 - website hosting, platform and site building
  • $2000 - beginning production supplies
  • $1000 - production of brochure
  • $800 - business advisor
  • $1000 - lawyer

Many of the items on the right are going to be made specifically for you for this campaign.

Some of the more fun and interesting products we have for you:

  • ADD/ADHD Blend - this blend has really helped us with some of our children.  It's tough to raise a child with attention or sensory issues.  Please let us help you with this!
  • Athlete's Pack - This will help you get in the zone and stay pain-free afterwards!
  • Honeymoon Basket - A loving aromatic experience!
  • After-Birth Kit - The perfect gift for you or someone you love who just gave birth.  Help her get back on feet naturally.
  • Yoga Essentials Kit - One of my favorites!!

Other ways you can help

Even if you can't help us financially, we really appreciate your support.  And if you have a friend or family member or co-worker or neighbor ...feel free to pass it on to them!  Tell us you want in on the special sales list and we'll be happy to add you.

story:
For the last five years in South Africa we have been preparing for the trial of the Cannabis plant. We have challenged the South African Government to answer to our charges of enacting unlawful and outdated laws prohibiting Cannabis. 

We have set a precedent in South African law and our case is due to be heard in the Pretoria High Court in March 2016.

Fields of Green for ALL is registered as a Non-Profit Company in South Africa and listed as a Public Benefit Organisation with the South African Revenue Service.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We have a list of international expert witnesses who are willing to come to South Africa and testify in court. Criminologists, sociologists, toxicologists, neuropsychopharmacologists - top experts in their fields have made themselves available for the Trial Of The Plant
  • Your contributions will assist us to fly these busy professionals from the USA and Europe and accommodate them for the duration of the trial.
  • The South African Rand is the weakest it has ever been against the US Dollar and our experts are all Dollar based. This is primarily why we require your assistance in dollars.
  • We have compiled an interesting list of perks to express our gratitude for your donation. Changing the Cannabis laws in South Africa will have a worldwide impact and we assure you a place in history according to which perk you choose. ALL donors will receive a signed jpg poster of The Dagga Couple's first ever newspaper headline.
  • ALL Groups, Organisations and Companies who donate will receive a Social Media ShoutOut across all of our networks.
  • We would have loved to offer you a share in the first ever legal Cannabis crop in South Africa but unfortunately this is against Indiegogo's terms and conditions ;)

The Impact

  • The current laws prohibiting the cultivation, use of and trade in the Cannabis plant are unscientific and outdated. It is essential that we gather the top experts in the world to give evidence.
  • The Trial of the Plant starts in the High Court, where the judges will decide on the constitutionality of the matter. All evidence is heard in the High Court. From there we go to the highest (!) court in the land, the South African Constitutional Court. Once the Constitutional Court has declared the laws unlawful (yes, we are very positive) we intend taking our case all the way to the International Court of Human Rights - taking every government in the world to task on this issue - so that this plant never has to be put on trial again, anywhere in the world.
  • From small back rooms in rural villages to the TEDx stage and a number of international conferences, The Dagga Couple and other South African activists have been pounding the pavements since 2010. We have amassed a large online presence and connected with many people. It is the people who make the success and Cannabis Activism surely brings the most diverse and interesting people together.

Risks & Challenges

  • As the time for the Trial of the Plant draws closer, we have had to stick our necks out and invite many esteemed academics and professionals to participate by giving evidence. We know that this puts us in the position where we HAVE to raise the money. It is this delicate balancing act we are playing that is the most challenging part of our journey so far.
  • We know that we can only afford a limited number of flights from far away. We are very confident with our local experts and our legal team is working tirelessly to knit the whole thing together.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please consider donating as a group if a single donation is beyond your means.
  • Please share our campaign with your network by using the Indiegogo share tools.
  • Please TALK about this to everybody you meet, shout it loud across the mountains and valleys, across the deserts and plains and far out to sea! Let's talk about getting rid of the LAST APARTHEID LAW until the message is ringing in the whole world's ears!
